original: āyuḥ asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajām tvaṣṭar adhinidhehi asmai  / rāyaḥ poṣam savitar ā suva asmai śatam jīvāti śaradaḥ tava ayam  /
analyzed: āyuḥ asmai dhehi jātavedaḥ prajām tvaṣṭar adhinidhehi asmai    rāyaḥ poṣam savitar ā suva asmai śatam jīvāti śaradaḥ tava ayam  /

original: āśīḥ naḥ ūrjam uta sauprajāstvam dakṣam dhattam draviṇam sacetasau  / jayam kṣetrāṇi sahasā ayam indra kṛṇvānaḥ anyān adharān sapatnān  /
analyzed: āśīḥ naḥ ūrjam uta sauprajāstvam dakṣam dhattam draviṇam sacetasau   jayam kṣetrāṇi sahasā ayam indra kṛṇvānaḥ anyān adharān sapatnān  /

original: indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ marudbhiḥ ugraḥ prahitaḥ naḥ āgan  / eṣa vām dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe mā kṣudhat mā tṛṣat  /
analyzed: indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ marudbhiḥ ugraḥ prahitaḥ naḥ āgan   eṣa vām dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe mā kṣudhat mā tṛṣat  /

original: ūrjam asmai ūrjasvatī dhattam payaḥ asmai payasvatī dhattam  / ūrjam asmai dyāvapṛthivī adhātām viśve devāḥ marutaḥ ūrjam āpaḥ  //
analyzed: ūrjam asmai ūrjasvatī dhattam payaḥ asmai payasvatī dhattam   ūrjam asmai dyāvapṛthivī adhātām viśve devāḥ marutaḥ ūrjam āpaḥ  /

original: śivābhiḥ te hṛdayam tarpayāmi anamīvaḥ modiṣṭhāḥ su varcāḥ  / sa vāsinau pibatām mantham etam aśvinaḥ rūpam paridhāya māyām  //
analyzed: śivābhiḥ te hṛdayam tarpayāmi anamīvaḥ modiṣṭhāḥ su varcāḥ   sa vāsinau pibatām mantham etam aśvinaḥ rūpam paridhāya māyām  /

original: indraḥ etām sasṛje viddhaḥ agre ūrjām svadhām ajarām sā te eṣā  / tayā tvam jīva śaradaḥ su varcāḥ mā te ā susrot bhiṣajaḥ te akran  /
analyzed: indraḥ etām sasṛje viddhaḥ agre ūrjām svadhām ajarām sā te eṣā    tayā tvam jīva śaradaḥ su varcāḥ mā te ā susrot bhiṣajaḥ te akran  /

original: yathā idam bhūmyāḥ adhi tṛṇam vātaḥ mathāyati  / eva ā mathnāmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā idam bhūmyāḥ adhi tṛṇam vātaḥ mathāyati   eva ā mathnāmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /

original: sam ced nayāthaḥ aśvinā kāminā sam ca vakṣathaḥ  / sam vām bhagāsaḥ agmata sam cittāni sam u vratā  /
analyzed: sam ced nayāthaḥ aśvinā kāminā sam ca vakṣathaḥ   sam vām bhagāsaḥ agmata sam cittāni sam u vratā  /

original: yat suparṇāḥ vivakṣavaḥ anamīvāḥ vivakṣavaḥ  / tatra me gacchatāt dhavam śalyaḥ iva kulmalam yathā  /
analyzed: yat suparṇāḥ vivakṣavaḥ anamīvāḥ vivakṣavaḥ   tatra me gacchatāt dhavam śalyaḥ iva kulmalam yathā

original: yat antaram tat bāhyam yat bāhyam tat antaram  / kanyānām viśva rūpāṇām manaḥ gṛbhāya auṣadhe  //
analyzed: yat antaram tat bāhyam yat bāhyam tat antaram   kanyānām viśva rūpāṇām manaḥ gṛbhāya auṣadhe

original: ā iyam agan pati kāmā jani kāmaḥ aham āgamam  / aśvaḥ kanikradat yathā bhagena aham saha agamam  //
analyzed: ā iyam agan pati kāmā jani kāmaḥ aham āgamam    aśvaḥ kanikradat yathā bhagena aham saha agamam  /

original: indrasya yā mahī dṛṣat krimeḥ viśvasya tarhaṇī  / tayā pinaṣmi sam krimīn dṛṣadā khalvān iva  /
analyzed: indrasya yā mahī dṛṣad krimeḥ viśvasya tarhaṇī    tayā pinaṣmi sam krimīn dṛṣadā khalvān iva  /

original: dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam atṛham atho kurūrum atṛham  / algaṇḍūn sarvān śalunān krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi  //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam a dṛṣṭam atṛham atho kurūrum atṛham    algaṇḍūn sarvān śalunān krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi  /

original: algaṇḍūn hanmi mahatā vadhena dūnāḥ adūnāḥ arasāḥ abhūvan  / śiṣṭān aśiṣṭān ni tirāmi vācā yathā krimīṇām nakir ucchiṣātai  /
analyzed: algaṇḍūn hanmi mahatā vadhena dūnāḥ adūnāḥ arasāḥ abhūvan    śiṣṭān aśiṣṭān ni tirāmi vācā yathā krimīṇām nakir ucchiṣātai  /

original: anvāntryam śīrṣaṇyam atho pārṣṭeyam krimīn  / avaskavam vyadhvaram krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi  //
analyzed: anvāntryam śīrṣaṇyam atho pārṣṭeyam krimīn   avaskavam vyadhvaram krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi  /

original: ye krimayaḥ parvata īśu vaneṣu oṣadhīṣu paśuṣu apsu antar  / ye asmākam tanvam āviviśuḥ sarvam tat dhanmi janima krimīṇām  /
analyzed: ye krimayaḥ parvata īśu vaneṣu oṣadhīṣu paśuṣu apsu antar   ye asmākam tanvam āviviśuḥ sarvam tat dhanmi janima krimīṇām  /

original: udyan ādityaḥ krimīn hantu nimrocan hantu raśmibhiḥ  / ye antar krimayaḥ gavi  //
analyzed: udyan ādityaḥ krimīn hantu nimrocan hantu raśmibhiḥ   ye antar krimayaḥ gavi  /

original: viśva rūpam catur akṣam krimim sāraṅgam arjunam  / śṛṇāmi asya pṛṣṭīḥ api vṛścāmi yat śiraḥ  /
analyzed: viśva rūpam catur akṣam krimim sāraṅgam arjunam    śṛṇāmi asya pṛṣṭīḥ api vṛścāmi yat śiraḥ  /

original: atri vat vaḥ krimayaḥ hanmi kaṇva vat jamadagni vat  / agastyasya brahmaṇā sam pinaṣmi aham krimīn  /
analyzed: atri vat vaḥ krimayaḥ hanmi kaṇva vat jamadagni vat    agastyasya brahmaṇā sam pinaṣmi aham krimīn  /

original: hataḥ rājā krimīṇām uta eṣām sthapatiḥ hataḥ  / hataḥ hata mātā krimiḥ hata bhrātā hata svasā  /
analyzed: hataḥ rājā krimīṇām uta eṣām sthapatiḥ hataḥ   hataḥ hata mātā krimiḥ hata bhrātā hata svasā  /

original: hatāsaḥ asya veśasaḥ hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ  / atho ye kṣullakāḥ iva sarve te krimayaḥ hatāḥ  /
analyzed: hatāsaḥ asya veśasaḥ hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ   atho ye kṣullakāḥ iva sarve te krimayaḥ hatāḥ  /

original: pra te śṛṇāmi śṛṅge yābhyām vitudāyasi  / bhinādmi te kuṣumbham yaḥ te viṣa dhānaḥ  /
analyzed: pra te śṛṇāmi śṛṅge yābhyām vitudāyasi   bhinādmi te kuṣumbham yaḥ te viṣa dhānaḥ  /

original: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi  / yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi  / yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt  / yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt    yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: hṛdayāt te pari klomnaḥ halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām  / yakṣmam matasnābhyām plīhnaḥ yaknaḥ te vi vṛhāmasi  //
analyzed: hṛdayāt te pari klomnaḥ halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām    yakṣmam matasnābhyām plīhnaḥ yaknaḥ te vi vṛhāmasi  /

original: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ udarāt adhi  / yakṣmam kukṣibhyām plāśeḥ nābhyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ udarāt adhi   yakṣmam kukṣibhyām plāśeḥ nābhyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām  / yakṣmam bhasadyam śroṇibhyām bhāsadam bhaṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām   yakṣmam bhasadyam śroṇibhyām bhāsadam bhaṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: asthibhyaḥ te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyaḥ dhamanibhyaḥ  / yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyaḥ nakhebhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: asthibhyaḥ te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyaḥ dhamanibhyaḥ   yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyaḥ nakhebhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: aṅge aṅge lomni lomni yaḥ te parvaṇi parvaṇi  / yakṣmam tvacasyam te vayam kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi  //
analyzed: aṅge aṅge lomni lomni yaḥ te parvaṇi parvaṇi    yakṣmam tvacasyam te vayam kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi  /

original: yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām catuṣpadām uta yaḥ dvipadām  / niṣkrītaḥ sa yajñiyam bhāgam etu rāyaḥ poṣāḥ yajamānam sacantām  /
analyzed: yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām catuṣpadām uta yaḥ dvipadām   niṣkrītaḥ sa yajñiyam bhāgam etu rāyaḥ poṣāḥ yajamānam sacantām  /

original: pramuñcantaḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ gātum dhatta yajamānāya devāḥ  / upākṛtam śaśamānam yat asthāt priyam devānām api etu pāthaḥ  //
analyzed: pramuñcantaḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ gātum dhatta yajamānāya devāḥ   upākṛtam śaśamānam yat asthāt priyam devānām api etu pāthaḥ  /

original: ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānāḥ anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca  / agniḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ viśvakarmā prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ  /
analyzed: ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānāḥ anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca   agniḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ viśvakarmā prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ  /

original: ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ virūpāḥ santaḥ bahudhā eka rūpāḥ  / vāyuḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ  /
analyzed: ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ virūpāḥ santaḥ bahudhā eka rūpāḥ    vāyuḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ  /

original: prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu pūrve prāṇam aṅgebhyaḥ pari ācarantam  / divam gaccha prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ svargam yāhi pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ  /
analyzed: prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu pūrve prāṇam aṅgebhyaḥ pari ācarantam    divam gaccha prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ svargam yāhi pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ  /

original: ye bhakṣayantaḥ na vasūni ānṛdhuḥ yān agnayaḥ anvatapyanta dhiṣṇyāḥ  / yā teṣām avayā duriṣṭiḥ su iṣṭim naḥ tām kṛṇavat viśvakarmā  /
analyzed: ye bhakṣayantaḥ na vasūni ānṛdhuḥ yān agnayaḥ anvatapyanta dhiṣṇyāḥ   yā teṣām avayā duriṣṭiḥ su iṣṭim naḥ tām kṛṇavat viśvakarmā  /

original: yajñapatim ṛṣayaḥ enasā āhuḥ nirbhaktam prajāḥ anutapyamānam  / mathavyān stokān apa yān rarādha sam naḥ tebhiḥ sṛjatu viśvakarmā  /
analyzed: yajñapatim ṛṣayaḥ enasā āhuḥ nirbhaktam prajāḥ anutapyamānam   mathavyān stokān apa yān rarādha sam naḥ tebhiḥ sṛjatu viśvakarmā  /

original: adānyān soma pād manyamānaḥ yajñasya vidvān samaye na dhīraḥ  / yat enaḥ cakṛvān baddhaḥ eṣa tam viśvakarman pra muñca svastaye  /
analyzed: adānyān soma pād manyamānaḥ yajñasya vidvān samaye na dhīraḥ   yat enaḥ cakṛvān baddhaḥ eṣa tam viśvakarman pra muñca svastaye  /

original: ghorāḥ ṛṣayaḥ namaḥ astu ebhyaḥ cakṣuḥ yat eṣām manasaḥ ca satyam  / bṛhaspataye mahiṣa dyuman namaḥ viśvakarman namaḥ te pāhi asmān  /
analyzed: ghorāḥ ṛṣayaḥ namaḥ astu ebhyaḥ cakṣuḥ yat eṣām manasaḥ ca satyam   bṛhaspataye mahiṣa dyumat namaḥ viśvakarman namaḥ te pāhi asmān  /

original: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi  / imam yajñam vitatam viśvakarmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ  /
analyzed: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi    imam yajñam vitatam viśvakarmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ  /

original: ā naḥ agne sumatim saṃbhalaḥ gamet imām kumārīm saha naḥ bhagena  / juṣṭā vareṣu samaneṣu valguḥ oṣam patyā saubhagam astu asyai  /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne sumatim saṃbhalaḥ gamet imām kumārīm saha naḥ bhagena   juṣṭā vareṣu samaneṣu valguḥ oṣam patyā saubhagam astu asyai  /

original: soma juṣṭam brahma juṣṭam aryamnā saṃbhṛtam bhagam  / dhātuḥ devasya satyena kṛṇomi pati vedanam  /
analyzed: soma juṣṭam brahma juṣṭam aryamnā saṃbhṛtam bhagam    dhātuḥ devasya satyena kṛṇomi pati vedanam  /

original: iyam agne nārī patim videṣṭa somaḥ hi rājā subhagām kṛṇoti  / suvānā putrān mahiṣī bhavāti gatvā patim subhagā vi rājatu  //
analyzed: iyam agne nārī patim videṣṭa somaḥ hi rājā subhagām kṛṇoti   suvānā putrān mahiṣī bhavāti gatvā patim subhagā vi rājatu  /

original: yathā ākharaḥ maghavan cāruḥ eṣa priyaḥ mṛgāṇām suṣadā babhūva  / eva bhagasya juṣṭā iyam astu nārī saṃpriyā patyā avirādhayantī  /
analyzed: yathā ākharaḥ maghavan cāruḥ eṣa priyaḥ mṛgāṇām suṣadā babhūva   eva bhagasya juṣṭā iyam astu nārī saṃpriyā patyā avirādhayantī  /

original: bhagasya nāvam ā roha pūrṇām anupadasvatīm  / tayā upapratāraya yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ  /
analyzed: bhagasya nāvam ā roha pūrṇām anupadasvatīm    tayā upapratāraya yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ  /

original: ā krandaya dhanapate varam āmanasam kṛṇu  / sarvam pradakṣiṇam kṛṇu yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ  /
analyzed: ā krandaya dhanapate varam āmanasam kṛṇu   sarvam pradakṣiṇam kṛṇu yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ  /

original: idam hiraṇyam gulgulu ayam aukṣaḥ atho bhagaḥ  / ete patibhyaḥ tvām aduḥ pratikāmāya vettave  / 7
analyzed: idam hiraṇyam gulgulu ayam aukṣaḥ atho bhagaḥ    ete patibhyaḥ tvām aduḥ pratikāmāya vettave

original: ā te nayatu savitā nayatu patiḥ yaḥ pratikāmyaḥ  / agniḥ naḥ śatrūn prati etu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim  / sa senām mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ  /
analyzed: ā te nayatu savitā nayatu patiḥ yaḥ pratikāmyaḥ   agniḥ naḥ śatrūn prati etu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim   sa senām mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ  /

original: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ īdṛśe stha abhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam  / amīmṛṇan vasavaḥ nāthitāḥ ime agniḥ hi eṣām dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān  /
analyzed: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ īdṛśe stha abhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam   amīmṛṇan vasavaḥ nāthitāḥ ime agniḥ hi eṣām dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān  /

original: amitra senām maghavan asmān śatrūyatīm abhi  / yuvam tām indra vṛtrahan agniḥ ca dahatam prati  /
analyzed: amitra senām maghavan asmān śatrūyatīm abhi    yuvam tām indra vṛtrahan agniḥ ca dahatam prati  /

original: prasūtaḥ indra pravata haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn  / jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ viṣvak satyam kṛṇuhi cittam eṣām  /
analyzed: prasūtaḥ indra pravata haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn    jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ viṣvak satyam kṛṇuhi cittam eṣām  /

original: indra senām mohaya amitrāṇām  / agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya  //
analyzed: indra senām mohaya amitrāṇām    agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya  /

original: indraḥ senām mohayatu marutaḥ ghnantu ojasā  / cakṣūṃsi agniḥ ā dattām punar etu parājitā  /
analyzed: indraḥ senām mohayatu marutaḥ ghnantu ojasā   cakṣūṃsi agniḥ ā dattām punar etu parājitā  /

original: agniḥ naḥ dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim  / sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ  /
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim    sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ  /

original: ayam agniḥ amūmuhat yāni cittāni vaḥ hṛdi  / vi vaḥ dhamatu okasaḥ pra vaḥ dhamatu sarvatas  /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ amūmuhat yāni cittāni vaḥ hṛdi   vi vaḥ dhamatu okasaḥ pra vaḥ dhamatu sarvatas  /

original: indra cittāni mohayan arvāṅ ākūtyā cara  / agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya  //
analyzed: indra cittāni mohayan arvāṅ ākūtyā cara    agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya  /

original: vi ākūtayaḥ eṣām ita atho cittāni muhyata  / atha u yat adya eṣām hṛdi tat eṣām pari niḥ jahi  //
analyzed: vi ākūtayaḥ eṣām ita atho cittāni muhyata    atha u yat adya eṣām hṛdi tat eṣām pari niḥ jahi  /

original: amīṣām cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi  / abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ grāhya amitrān tamasā vidhya śatrūn  /
analyzed: amīṣām cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi   abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ grāhya amitrān tamasā vidhya śatrūn  /

original: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān aiti abhi ojasā spardhamānā  / tām vidhyata tamasā apavratena yathā eṣām anyaḥ anyam na jānāt  /
analyzed: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān aiti abhi ojasā spardhamānā    tām vidhyata tamasā apavratena yathā eṣām anyaḥ anyam na jānāt  /

original: acikradat su apāḥ iha bhuvat agne vi acasva rodasī urūcī  / yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā amum naya namasā rāta havyam  /
analyzed: acikradat su apāḥ iha bhuvat agne vi acasva rodasī urūcī   yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā amum naya namasā rāta havyam  /

original: dūre cit santam aruṣāsaḥ indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram  / yat gāyatrīm bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyā dadhṛṣanta devāḥ  /
analyzed: dūre cit santam aruṣāsaḥ indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram    yat gāyatrīm bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyā dadhṛṣanta devāḥ  /

original: adbhyaḥ tvā rāja varuṇaḥ hvayatu somaḥ tvā hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ  / indraḥ tvā hvayatu viḍbhyaḥ ābhyaḥ śyenaḥ bhūtvā viśaḥ ā pata imāḥ  //
analyzed: adbhyaḥ tvā rāja varuṇaḥ hvayatu somaḥ tvā hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ   indraḥ tvā hvayatu viḍbhyaḥ ābhyaḥ śyenaḥ bhūtvā viśaḥ ā pata imāḥ  /

original: śyenaḥ havyam nayatu ā parasmāt anya kṣetre aparuddham carantam  / aśvinā panthām kṛṇutām sugam te imam sajātāḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam  // {5}
analyzed: śyenaḥ havyam nayatu ā parasmāt anya kṣetre aparuddham carantam    aśvinā panthām kṛṇutām sugam te imam sajātāḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam  /

original: hvayantu tvā pratijanāḥ prati mitrāḥ avṛṣata  / indra agnī viśve devāḥ te viśi kṣemam adīdharan  //  // {6}
analyzed: hvayantu tvā pratijanāḥ prati mitrāḥ avṛṣata   indra agnī viśve devāḥ te viśi kṣemam adīdharan
yaḥ te havam vivadat sajātaḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ   apāñcam indra tam kṛtvā atha imam iha ava gamaya

original: ā tvā gan rāṣtram saha varcasā ud ihi prāṅ viśām patiḥ ekarāj tvam vi rāja  / sarvāḥ tvā rājan pradiśaḥ hvayantu upasadyaḥ namasyaḥ bhava iha  /
analyzed: ā tvā gan rāṣtram saha varcasā ud ihi prāṅ viśām patiḥ ekarāj tvam vi rāja    sarvāḥ tvā rājan pradiśaḥ hvayantu upasadyaḥ namasyaḥ bhava iha  /

original: tvām viśaḥ vṛṇatām rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ  / varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni  //
analyzed: tvām viśaḥ vṛṇatām rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ   varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni  /

original: acha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātāḥ agniḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ sam carātai  / jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanasaḥ bhavantu bahum balim prati paśyāsai ugraḥ  /
analyzed: acha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātāḥ agniḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ sam carātai   jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanasaḥ bhavantu bahum balim prati paśyāsai ugraḥ  /

original: aśvinā tvā agre mitrāvaruṇā ubhā viśve devāḥ marutaḥ tvā hvayantu  / adhā manaḥ vasu deyāya kṛṇuṣva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni  /
analyzed: aśvinā tvā agre mitrāvaruṇā ubhā viśve devāḥ marutaḥ tvā hvayantu   adhā manaḥ vasu deyāya kṛṇuṣva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni  /

original: ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām  / tat ayam rājā varuṇaḥ tathā āha sa tvā ayam ahvat saḥ upa idam ehi  //
analyzed: ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām   tat ayam rājā varuṇaḥ tathā āha sa tvā ayam ahvat saḥ upa idam ehi  /

original: indra indra manuṣyāḥ parehi sam hi ajñāsthāḥ varuṇaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ  / sa tvā ayam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat saḥ u kalpayat viśaḥ  /
analyzed: indra indra manuṣyāḥ parehi sam hi ajñāsthāḥ varuṇaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ    sa tvā ayam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat saḥ u kalpayat viśaḥ  /

original: pathyāḥ revatīḥ bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya varīyaḥ te akran  / tāḥ tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānāḥ hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanāḥ vaśā iha  /
analyzed: pathyāḥ revatīḥ bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya varīyaḥ te akran   tāḥ tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānāḥ hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanāḥ vaśā iha  /

original: ā ayam agan parṇa maṇiḥ balī balena pramṛṇan sapatnān  / ojaḥ devānām payaḥ oṣadhīnām varcasā mā jinvantu a prayāvan  //
analyzed: ā ayam agan parṇa maṇiḥ balī balena pramṛṇan sapatnān    ojaḥ devānām payaḥ oṣadhīnām varcasā mā jinvantu a prayāvan  /

original: mayi kṣatram parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayatāt rayim  / aham rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge nijaḥ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /
analyzed: mayi kṣatram parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayatāt rayim    aham rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge nijaḥ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /

original: yam nidadhuḥ vanaspatau guhyam devāḥ priyam maṇim  / tam asmabhyam saha āyuṣā devāḥ dadatu bhartave  /
analyzed: yam nidadhuḥ vanaspatau guhyam devāḥ priyam maṇim   tam asmabhyam saha āyuṣā devāḥ dadatu bhartave  /

original: somasya parṇaḥ sahaḥ ugram āgan indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ  / tam priyāsam bahu rocamānaḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /
analyzed: somasya parṇaḥ sahaḥ ugram āgan indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ   tam priyāsam bahu rocamānaḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /

original: ā mā arukṣat parṇa maṇiḥ mahyāḥ ariṣṭatātaye  / yathā aham uttaraḥ asāni aryamṇaḥ uta saṃvidaḥ  /
analyzed: ā mā arukṣat parṇa maṇiḥ mahyāḥ ariṣṭatātaye   yathā aham uttaraḥ asāni aryamṇaḥ uta saṃvidaḥ  /

original: ye dhīvānaḥ rathakārāḥ karmārāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ  / upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān  /
analyzed: ye dhīvānaḥ rathakārāḥ karmārāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ    upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān  /

original: ye rājānaḥ rāja kṛtaḥ sūtāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ca ye  / upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān //
analyzed: ye rājānaḥ rāja kṛtaḥ sūtāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ca ye    upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān

original: parṇaḥ asi tanū pānaḥ sayoniḥ vīraḥ vīreṇa mayā  / saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe  /
analyzed: parṇaḥ asi tanū pānaḥ sayoniḥ vīraḥ vīreṇa mayā   / saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe  /

original: pumān puṃsaḥ parijātaḥ aśvatthaḥ khadirāt adhi  / sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /
analyzed: pumān puṃsaḥ parijātaḥ aśvatthaḥ khadirāt adhi    sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /

original: tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādha dodhataḥ  / indreṇa vṛtra ghnā medī mitreṇa varuṇena ca  /
analyzed: tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādha dodhataḥ   indreṇa vṛtra ghnā medī mitreṇa varuṇena ca  /

original: yathā aśvattha nirabhanaḥ antar mahati arṇave  / eva tān sarvān niḥ bhaṅgdhi yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /
analyzed: yathā aśvattha nirabhanaḥ antar mahati arṇave    eva tān sarvān niḥ bhaṅgdhi yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /

original: yaḥ sahamānaḥ carasi sāsahānaḥ iva ṛṣabhaḥ  / tena aśvattha tvayā vayam sapatnān sahiṣīmahi  //
analyzed: yaḥ sahamānaḥ carasi sāsahānaḥ iva ṛṣabhaḥ   tena aśvattha tvayā vayam sapatnān sahiṣīmahi  /

original: sinātu enān nirṛtiḥ mṛtyoḥ pāśaiḥ amokyaiḥ  / aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /
analyzed: sinātu enān nirṛtiḥ mṛtyoḥ pāśaiḥ amokyaiḥ   aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām  /

original: yathā aśvattha vānaspatyān ārohan kṛṇuṣe adharān  / eva me śatroḥ mūrdhānam viṣvak bhinddhi sahasva ca  /
analyzed: yathā aśvattha vānaspatyān ārohan kṛṇuṣe adharān   eva me śatroḥ mūrdhānam viṣvak bhinddhi sahasva ca  /

original: te adharāñcaḥ pra plavantām chinnā nauḥ iva bandhanāt  / na vaibādha praṇuttānām punar asti nivartanam  /
analyzed: te adharāñcaḥ pra plavantām chinnā nauḥ iva bandhanāt   na vaibādha praṇuttānām punar asti nivartanam  /

original: pra eṇān nude manasā pra cittena uta brahmaṇā  / pra eṇān vṛkṣasya śākhayā aśvatthasya nudāmahe  /
analyzed: pra eṇān nude manasā pra cittena uta brahmaṇā   pra eṇān vṛkṣasya śākhayā aśvatthasya nudāmahe  /

original: hariṇasya raghuṣyadaḥ adhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam  / sa kṣetriyam viṣāṇayā viṣūcīnam anīnaśat  /
analyzed: hariṇasya raghuṣyadaḥ adhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam   sa kṣetriyam viṣāṇayā viṣūcīnam anīnaśat  /

original: anu tvā hariṇaḥ vṛṣā padbhiḥ caturbhiḥ akramīt  / viṣāṇe vi sya guṣpitam yat asya kṣetriyam hṛdi  //
analyzed: anu tvā hariṇaḥ vṛṣā padbhiḥ caturbhiḥ akramīt   viṣāṇe vi sya guṣpitam yat asya kṣetriyam hṛdi  /

original: adaḥ yat avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva chadiḥ  / tena te sarvam kṣetriyam aṅgebhyaḥ nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: adaḥ yat avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva chadiḥ    tena te sarvam kṣetriyam aṅgebhyaḥ nāśayāmasi  /

original: amū ye divi subhage vicṛtau nāma tārake  / vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamam pāśam uttamam  /
analyzed: amū ye divi subhage vicṛtau nāma tārake   vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamam pāśam uttamam  /

original: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ  / āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt  /
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ   āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt  /

original: yat āsuteḥ kriyamānāyāḥ kṣetriyam tvā vyānaśe  / veda aham tasya bheṣajam kṣetriyam nāśayāmi tvat  /
analyzed: yat āsuteḥ kriyamānāyāḥ kṣetriyam tvā vyānaśe   veda aham tasya bheṣajam kṣetriyam nāśayāmi tvat  /

original: apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāse uṣasām uta  / apa asmat sarvam durbhūtam apa kṣetriyam ucchatu  //
analyzed: apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāse uṣasām uta    apa asmat sarvam durbhūtam apa kṣetriyam ucchatu  /

original: ā yātu mitraḥ ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthivīm usriyābhiḥ  / atha asmabhyam varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ agniḥ bṛhat rāṣṭram saṃveśyam dadhātu  //
analyzed: ā yātu mitraḥ ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthivīm usriyābhiḥ   atha asmabhyam varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ agniḥ bṛhat rāṣṭram saṃveśyam dadhātu  /

original: dhātā rātiḥ savitā idam juśantām indraḥ tvaṣṭā prati haryantu me vacaḥ  / huve devīm aditim śūra putrām sajātānām madhyameṣṭhā yathā asāni  //
analyzed: dhātā rātiḥ savitā idam juśantām indraḥ tvaṣṭā prati haryantu me vacaḥ   huve devīm aditim śūra putrām sajātānām madhyameṣṭhā yathā asāni  /

original: huve somam savitāram namobhiḥ viśvān ādityām aham uttara tve  / ayam agniḥ dīdāyat dīrgham eva sajātaiḥ iddhaḥ a pratibruvadbhiḥ  /
analyzed: huve somam savitāram namobhiḥ viśvān ādityām aham uttara tve    ayam agniḥ dīdāyat dīrgham eva sajātaiḥ iddhaḥ a pratibruvadbhiḥ  /

original: iha id asātha na paras gamātha iryaḥ gopāḥ puṣṭa patiḥ vaḥ ājat  / asmai kāmāya upa kāminīḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ upasaṃyantu  /
analyzed: iha id asātha na paras gamātha iryaḥ gopāḥ puṣṭa patiḥ vaḥ ājat    asmai kāmāya upa kāminīḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ upasaṃyantu  /

original: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi  / amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi  //
analyzed: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi    amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi  /

original: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta  / mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta  /
analyzed: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta    mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta  /

original: karśaphasya viśaphasya dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā  / yathā abhicakra devāḥ tathā apa kṛṇuta punar  /
analyzed: karśaphasya viśaphasya dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā    yathā abhicakra devāḥ tathā apa kṛṇuta punar

original: aśreṣmāṇaḥ adhārayan tathā tat manunā kṛtam  / kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandham muṣkābarhaḥ gavām iva  /
analyzed: aśreṣmāṇaḥ adhārayan tathā tat manunā kṛtam   kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandham muṣkābarhaḥ gavām iva  /

original: piśaṅge sūtre khṛgalam tat ā badhnanti vedhasaḥ  / śravasyum śuṣmam kābavam vadhrim kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ  /
analyzed: piśaṅge sūtre khṛgalam tat ā badhnanti vedhasaḥ   śravasyum śuṣmam kābavam vadhrim kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ  /

original: yena śravasyavaḥ caratha devāḥ iva asura māyayā  / śunām kapiḥ iva dūṣaṇaḥ bandhurā kābavasya ca  /
analyzed: yena śravasyavaḥ caratha devāḥ iva asura māyayā   śunām kapiḥ iva dūṣaṇaḥ bandhurā kābavasya ca  /

original: duṣṭyai hi tvā bhatsyāmi dūṣayiṣyāmi kābavam  / ud āśavaḥ rathāḥ iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha  /
analyzed: duṣṭyai hi tvā dūṣayiṣyāmi kābavam     ud āśavaḥ rathāḥ iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha  /

original: eka śatam viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu  / teṣām tvām agre ud jaharuḥ maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam  /
analyzed: eka śatam viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu   teṣām tvām agre ud jaharuḥ maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam  /

original: prathamā ha vi uvāsa sā dhenuḥ abhavat yame  / sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām  /
analyzed: prathamā ha vi uvāsa sā dhenuḥ abhavat yame    sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām  /

original: yām devāḥ pratinandanti rātrim dhenum upāyatīm  / saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī  /
analyzed: yām devāḥ pratinandanti rātrim dhenum upāyatīm     saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī  /

original: saṃvatsarasya pratimām yām tvā rātri upāsmahe  / sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja  /
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya pratimām yām tvā rātri upāsmahe    sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja  /

original: iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchat āsu itarāsu carati praviṣṭā  / mahāntaḥ asyām mahimānaḥ antar vadhūḥ jigāya navagat janitrī  /
analyzed: iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchat āsu itarāsu carati praviṣṭā   mahāntaḥ asyām mahimānaḥ antar vadhūḥ jigāya navagat janitrī  /

original: vānaspatyāḥ grāvāṇaḥ ghoṣam akrata haviḥ kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam  / eka aṣṭake suprajasaḥ su vīrāḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām  /
analyzed: vānaspatyāḥ grāvāṇaḥ ghoṣam akrata haviḥ kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam      eka aṣṭake suprajasaḥ su vīrāḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām  /

original: iḍāyāḥ padam ghṛtavat sarīsṛpam jātavedaḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya  / ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ teṣām saptānām mayi rantiḥ astu  /
analyzed: iḍāyāḥ padam ghṛtavat sarīsṛpam jātavedaḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya   ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ teṣām saptānām mayi rantiḥ astu  /

original: ā mā puṣṭe ca poṣe ca rātri devānām sumatau syāma  / pūrṇā darve parā pata su pūrṇā punar ā pata  / sarvān yajñān saṃbhuñjati iṣam ūrjam naḥ ā bhara  //
analyzed: ā mā puṣṭe ca poṣe ca rātri devānām sumatau syāma   pūrṇā darve parā pata su pūrṇā punar ā pata   sarvān yajñān saṃbhuñjati iṣam ūrjam naḥ ā bhara  /

original: ā ayam agan saṃvatsaraḥ patiḥ eka aṣṭake tava  / sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja  //
analyzed: ā ayam agan saṃvatsaraḥ patiḥ eka aṣṭake tava    sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja  /

original: ṛtūn yaja ṛtupatīn ārtavān uta hāyanān  / samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān bhūtasya pataye yaje  //
analyzed: ṛtūn yaje ṛtu patīn ārtavān uta hāyanān    samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān bhūtasya pataye yaje  /

original: ṛtubhyaḥ tvā ārtavebhyaḥ mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ  / dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje  //
analyzed: ṛtubhyaḥ tvā ārtavebhyaḥ mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ    dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje  /

original: iḍayā juhvataḥ vayam devān ghṛtavatā yaje  / gṛhān a lubhyataḥ vayam sam viśema upa gomataḥ  /
analyzed: iḍayā juhvataḥ vayam devān ghṛtavatā yaje   gṛhān a lubhyataḥ vayam sam viśema upa gomataḥ  /

original: eka aṣṭakā tapasā tapyamānā jajāna garbham mahimānam indram  / tena devāḥ vi asahanta śatrūn hantā dasyūnām abhavat śacīpatiḥ  /
analyzed: eka aṣṭakā tapasā tapyamānā jajāna garbham mahimānam indram   tena devāḥ vi asahanta śatrūn hantā dasyūnām abhavat śacīpatiḥ  /

original: indra putre soma putre duhitā asi prajāpateḥ  / kāmān asmākam pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi naḥ haviḥ  //
analyzed: indra putre soma putre duhitā asi prajāpateḥ   kāmān asmākam pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi naḥ haviḥ  /

original: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rāja yakṣmāt  / grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi etat enam tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam  /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rāja yakṣmāt    grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi etat enam tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam  /

original: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam eva  / tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt a spārśam enam śata śāradāya  /
analyzed: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam eva   tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt a spārśam enam śata śāradāya  /

original: sahasra akṣeṇa śata vīryeṇa śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  / indraḥ yathā enam śaradaḥ nayāti ati viśvasya duritasya pāram  /
analyzed: sahasra akṣeṇa śata vīryeṇa śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam    indraḥ yathā enam śaradaḥ nayāti ati viśvasya duritasya pāram  /

original: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān  / śatam te indraḥ agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  /
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān    śatam te indraḥ agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  /

original: pra viśatam prāṇa apānau anaḍvāhau iva vrajam  / vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam  /
analyzed: pra viśatam prāṇa apānau anaḍvāhau iva vrajam   vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam  /

original: iha eva stam prāṇa apānau mā apa gātam itas yuvam  / śarīram asya aṅgāni jarase vahatam punar  /
analyzed: iha eva stam prāṇa apānau mā apa gātam itas yuvam    śarīram asya aṅgāni jarase vahatam punar

original: jarāyai tvā pari dadāmi jarāyai ni dhuvāmi tvā  / jarā tvā bhadrā neṣṭa vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam  /
analyzed: jarāyai tvā pari dadāmi jarāyai ni dhuvāmi tvā    jarā tvā bhadrā neṣṭa vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam  /

original: abhi tvā jarimā ahita gām ukṣaṇam iva rajjvā  / yaḥ tvā mṛtyuḥ abhyadhatta jāyamānam su pāśayā  / tam te satyasya hastābhyām ud amuñcat bṛhaspatiḥ  /
analyzed: abhi tvā jarimā ahita gām ukṣaṇam iva rajjvā   yaḥ tvā mṛtyuḥ abhyadhatta jāyamānam su pāśayā   tam te satyasya hastābhyām ud amuñcat bṛhaspatiḥ  /

original: iha eva dhruvām ni minomi śālām kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā  / tām tvā śāle sarva vīrāḥ su vīrāḥ ariṣṭa vīrāḥ upa sam carema  /
analyzed: iha eva dhruvām ni minomi śālām kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā    tām tvā śāle sarva vīrāḥ su vīrāḥ ariṣṭa vīrāḥ upa sam carema  /

original: iha eva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle aśvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī  / ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvatī ud śrayasva mahate saubhagāya  //
analyzed: iha eva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle aśvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī    ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvatī ud śrayasva mahate saubhagāya  /

original: dharuṇī asi śāle bṛhacchandāḥ pūti dhānyā  / ā tvā vatsaḥ gamet ā kumāraḥ ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ  /
analyzed: dharuṇī asi śāle bṛhacchandāḥ pūti dhānyā   ā tvā vatsaḥ gamet ā kumāraḥ ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ  /

original: imām śālām savitā vāyuḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ni minotu prajānan  / ukṣantu udnāḥ marutaḥ ghṛtena bhagaḥ naḥ rājā ni kṛṣim tanotu  /
analyzed: imām śālām savitā vāyuḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ni minotu prajānan   ukṣantu udnāḥ marutaḥ ghṛtena bhagaḥ naḥ rājā ni kṛṣim tanotu  /

original: mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhiḥ nimitā asi agre  / tṛṇam vasānā sumanāḥ asaḥ tvam atha asmabhyam saha vīram rayim dāḥ  /
analyzed: mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhiḥ nimitā asi agre   tṛṇam vasānā sumanāḥ asaḥ tvam atha asmabhyam saha vīram rayim dāḥ  /

original: ṛtena sthūṇām adhi roha vaṃśa ugraḥ virājan apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn  / mā te riṣan upasattāraḥ gṛhāṇām śāle śatam jīvema śaradaḥ sarva vīrāḥ  /
analyzed: ṛtena sthūṇām adhi roha vaṃśa ugraḥ virājan apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn    mā te riṣan upasattāraḥ gṛhāṇām śāle śatam jīvema śaradaḥ sarva vīrāḥ  /

original: ā imām kumāraḥ taruṇaḥ ā vatsaḥ jagatā saha  / ā imām parisrutaḥ kumbhaḥ ā dadhnaḥ kalaśaiḥ aguḥ  /
analyzed: ā imām kumāraḥ taruṇaḥ ā vatsaḥ jagatā saha   ā imām parisrutaḥ kumbhaḥ ā dadhnaḥ kalaśaiḥ aguḥ  /

original: pūrṇam nāri pra bhara kumbham etam ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtena saṃbhṛtām  / imām pātṝn amṛtena sam aṅgdhi iṣṭāpūrtam abhi rakṣāti enām  /
analyzed: pūrṇam nāri pra bhara kumbham etam ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtena saṃbhṛtām   imām pātṝn amṛtena sam aṅgdhi iṣṭāpūrtam abhi rakṣāti enām  /

original: imāḥ āpaḥ pra bharāmi a yakṣmāḥ yakṣma nāśanīḥ  / gṛhān upa pra sīdāmi amṛtena saha agninā  /
analyzed: imāḥ āpaḥ pra bharāmi a yakṣmāḥ yakṣma nāśanīḥ   gṛhān upa pra sīdāmi amṛtena saha agninā  /

original: yat adaḥ saṃprayatīḥ ahau anadata hate  / tasmāt ā nadyaḥ nāma stha tāḥ vaḥ nāmāni sindhavaḥ  /
analyzed: yat adaḥ saṃprayatīḥ ahau anadata hate    tasmāt ā nadyaḥ nāma stha tāḥ vaḥ nāmāni sindhavaḥ  /

original: yat preṣitā varuṇena at śībham samavalgata  / tat āpnot indraḥ vaḥ yatīḥ tasmāt āpaḥ anu sthana  //
analyzed: yat preṣitā varuṇena at śībham samavalgata   tat āpnot indraḥ vaḥ yatīḥ tasmāt āpaḥ anu sthana  /

original: apakāmam syandamānāḥ avīvarata vaḥ hi kam  / indraḥ vaḥ śaktibhiḥ devīḥ tasmāt vār nāma vaḥ hitam  /
analyzed: apakāmam syandamānāḥ avīvarata vaḥ hi kam   indraḥ vaḥ śaktibhiḥ devīḥ tasmāt vār nāma vaḥ hitam  /

original: ekaḥ vaḥ devaḥ api atiṣṭhat syandamānāḥ yathāvaśam  / ud āniṣuḥ mahīḥ iti tasmāt udakam ucyate  /
analyzed: ekaḥ vaḥ devaḥ api atiṣṭhat syandamānāḥ yathāvaśam   ud āniṣuḥ mahīḥ iti tasmāt udakam ucyate  /

original: āpaḥ bhadrāḥ ghṛtam id āpaḥ āsan agnīṣomau bibhrati āpaḥ id tāḥ  / tīvraḥ rasaḥ madhu pṛcām araṃgamaḥ ā mā prāṇena saha varcasā gamet  /
analyzed: āpaḥ bhadrāḥ ghṛtam id āpaḥ āsan agnīṣomau bibhrati āpaḥ id tāḥ    tīvraḥ rasaḥ madhu pṛcām araṃgamaḥ ā mā prāṇena saha varcasā gamet  /

original: āt id paśyāmi uta vā śṛṇomi ā mā ghoṣaḥ gacchati vāc māsām  / manye bhejānaḥ amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇya varṇāḥ atṛpam yadā vaḥ  /
analyzed: āt id paśyāmi uta vā śṛṇomi ā mā ghoṣaḥ gacchati vāc māsām    manye bhejānaḥ amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇya varṇāḥ atṛpam yadā vaḥ  /

original: idam vaḥ āpaḥ hṛdayam ayam vatsaḥ ṛtāvarīḥ  / iha ittham eta śakvarīḥ yatra idam veśayāmi vaḥ  /
analyzed: idam vaḥ āpaḥ hṛdayam ayam vatsaḥ ṛtāvarīḥ   iha ittham eta śakvarīḥ yatra idam veśayāmi vaḥ  /

original: sam vaḥ goṣṭhena suṣadā sam rayyā sam subhūtyā  / ahar jātasya yat nāma tena vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: sam vaḥ goṣṭhena suṣadā sam rayyā sam subhūtyā    ahar jātasya yat nāma tena vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: sam vaḥ sṛjatu aryamā sam pūṣā sam bṛhaspatiḥ  / sam indraḥ yaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ mayi puṣyata yat vasu  //
analyzed: sam vaḥ sṛjatu aryamā sam pūṣā sam bṛhaspatiḥ   sam indraḥ yaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ mayi puṣyata yat vasu  /

original: saṃjagmānāḥ abibhyuṣīḥ asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇīḥ  / bibhratīḥ somyam madhu anamīvāḥ upetana  /
analyzed: saṃjagmānāḥ abibhyuṣīḥ asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇīḥ   bibhratīḥ somyam madhu anamīvāḥ upetana  /

original: iha eva gāvaḥ etana iha u śakā iva puṣyata  / iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ  /
analyzed: iha eva gāvaḥ etana iha u śakā iva puṣyata    iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ  /

original: śivaḥ vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ bhavatu śāriśākā iva puṣyata  / iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayā vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: śivaḥ vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ bhavatu śāriśākā iva puṣyata   iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayā vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: mayā gāvaḥ gopatinā sacadhvam ayam vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ iha poṣayiṣṇuḥ  / rāyaḥ poṣeṇa bahulāḥ bhavantīḥ jīvāḥ jīvantīḥ upa vaḥ sadema  /
analyzed: mayā gāvaḥ gopatinā sacadhvam ayam vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ iha poṣayiṣṇuḥ   rāyaḥ poṣeṇa bahulāḥ bhavantīḥ jīvāḥ jīvantīḥ upa vaḥ sadema  /

original: indram aham vaṇijam codayāmi sa naḥ aitu puraetā naḥ astu  / nudan arātim paripanthinam mṛgam saḥ īśānaḥ dhana dāḥ astu mahyam  /
analyzed: indram aham vaṇijam codayāmi sa naḥ aitu puraetā naḥ astu   nudan arātim paripanthinam mṛgam saḥ īśānaḥ dhana dāḥ astu mahyam  /

original: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti  / te mā juṣantām payasā ghṛtena yathā krītvā dhanam āharāṇi  //
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti   te mā juṣantām payasā ghṛtena yathā krītvā dhanam āharāṇi  /

original: idhmena agne ichamānaḥ ghṛtena juhomi havyam tarase balāya  / yāvat īśe brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ imām dhiyam śata seyāya devīm  /
analyzed: idhmena agne ichamānaḥ ghṛtena juhomi havyam tarase balāya   yāvat īśe brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ imām dhiyam śata seyāya devīm  /

original: imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ yam adhvānam agāma dūram  / śunam naḥ astu prapaṇaḥ vikrayaḥ ca pratipaṇaḥ phalinam mā kṛṇotu  / idam havyam saṃvidānau juṣethām śunam naḥ astu caritam utthitam ca  /
analyzed: imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ yam adhvānam agāma dūram     śunam naḥ astu prapaṇaḥ vikrayaḥ ca pratipaṇaḥ phalinam mā kṛṇotu   idam havyam saṃvidānau juṣethām śunam naḥ astu caritam utthitam ca  /

original: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ  / tat me bhūyaḥ bhavatu mā kanīyaḥ agne sātaghnaḥ devān haviṣā ni sedha  /
analyzed: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ   tat me bhūyaḥ bhavatu mā kanīyaḥ agne sātaghnaḥ devān haviṣā ni sedha  /

original: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ  / tasmin me indraḥ rucim ā dadhātu prajāpatiḥ savitā somaḥ agniḥ  /
analyzed: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ   tasmin me indraḥ rucim ā dadhātu prajāpatiḥ savitā somaḥ agniḥ  /

original: upa tvā namasā vayam hotar vaiśvānara stumaḥ  / sa naḥ prajāsu ātmasu goṣu prāṇeṣu jāgṛhi  //
analyzed: upa tvā namasā vayam hotar vaiśvānara stumaḥ   sa naḥ prajāsu ātmasu goṣu prāṇeṣu jāgṛhi  /

original: viśvāhā te sadam id bharema aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate jātavedaḥ  / rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /
analyzed: viśvāhā te sadam id bharema aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate jātavedaḥ    rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /

original: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā  / prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim prātar somam uta rudram havāmahe  /
analyzed: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā   prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim prātar somam uta rudram havāmahe  /

original: prātar jitam bhagam ugram havāmahe vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā  / ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha  /
analyzed: prātar jitam bhagam ugram havāmahe vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā   ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha  /

original: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam ud ava dadat naḥ  / bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma  /
analyzed: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam ud ava dadat naḥ    bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma  /

original: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām  / uta uditau maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma  /
analyzed: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām    uta uditau maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma  /

original: bhagaḥ eva bhagavān astu devaḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma  / tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīmi sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha  /
analyzed: bhagaḥ eva bhagavān astu devaḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma   tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīmi sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha  /

original: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya  / arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam me ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu  //
analyzed: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya    arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam me ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu  /

original: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ  / ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ   ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /

original: sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ yugā vi tanvate pṛthak  / dhīrāḥ deveṣu sumnayau  /
analyzed: sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ yugā vi tanvate pṛthak   dhīrāḥ deveṣu sumnayau  /

original: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam  / virājaḥ śnuṣṭiḥ sabharāḥ asan naḥ nedīyaḥ id sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā yavan  /
analyzed: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam   virājaḥ śnuṣṭiḥ sabharāḥ asat naḥ nedīyaḥ id sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā yavan  /

original: lāṅgalam pavīravat su śīmam soma satsaru  / ud id vapatu gām avim prasthāvat rathavāhanam pībarīm ca prapharvyam  /
analyzed: lāṅgalam pavīravat su śīmam soma satsaru     ud id vapatu gām avim prasthāvat rathavāhanam pībarīm ca prapharvyam  /

original: indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣā abhi rakṣatu  / sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām  /
analyzed: indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣā abhi rakṣatu   sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām  /

original: śunam su phālāḥ vi tudantu bhūmim śunam kīnāśāḥ anu yantu vāhān  / śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kartam asmai  /
analyzed: śunam su phālāḥ vi tudantu bhūmim śunam kīnāśāḥ anu yantu vāhān   śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kartam asmai  /

original: śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam  / śunam varatrā badhyantām śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya  //
analyzed: śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam   śunam varatrā badhyantām śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya  /

original: śunāsīra iha sma me juṣethām  / yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ tena imām upa siñcatam  /
analyzed: śunāsīra iha sma me juṣethām    yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ tena imām upa siñcatam  /

original: sīte vandāmahe tvā arvācī subhage bhava  / yathā naḥ sumanāḥ asaḥ yathā naḥ suphalāḥ bhuvar  /
analyzed: sīte vandāmahe tvā arvācī subhage bhava   yathā naḥ sumanāḥ asaḥ yathā naḥ suphalāḥ bhuvar  /

original: ghṛtena sītā madhunā samaktā viśvaiḥ devaiḥ anumatā marudbhiḥ  / sā naḥ sīte payasā abhyāvavṛtsva ūrjasvatī ghṛtavat pinvamānā  /
analyzed: ghṛtena sītā madhunā samaktā viśvaiḥ devaiḥ anumatā marudbhiḥ    sā naḥ sīte payasā abhyāvavṛtsva ūrjasvatī ghṛtavat pinvamānā  /

original: imām khanāmi oṣadhim vīrudhām balavattamām  / yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim  //
analyzed: imām khanāmi oṣadhim vīrudhām balavattamām   yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim  /

original: uttānaparṇe subhage deva jūte sahasvati  / sapatnīm me parā nuda patim me kevalam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: uttānaparṇe subhage deva jūte sahasvati   / sapatnīm me parā nuda patim me kevalam kṛdhi  /

original: nahi te nāma jagrāha naḥ asmin ramase patau  / parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm gamayāmasi  //
analyzed: nahi te nāma jagrāha naḥ asmin ramase patau   parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm gamayāmasi  /

original: uttarā aham uttaraḥ uttaret uttarābhyaḥ  / adhas sapatnī yā mama adharā sā adharābhyaḥ  //
analyzed: uttarā aham uttaraḥ uttaret uttarābhyaḥ   adhas sapatnī yā mama adharā sā adharābhyaḥ

original: aham asmi sahamānā atho tvam asi sāsahiḥ  / ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvā sapatnīm me sahāvahai  /
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānā atha u tvam asi sāsahiḥ   ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvā sapatnīm me sahāvahai  /

original: abhi te adhām sahamānām upa te adhām sahīyasīm  / mām anu pra te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu  //
analyzed: abhi te adhām sahamānām upa te adhām sahīyasīm    mām anu pra te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu  /

original: saṃśitam me idam brahma saṃśitam vīryam balam  / saṃśitam kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇuḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ  /
analyzed: saṃśitam me idam brahma saṃśitam vīryam balam   saṃśitam kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇuḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ  /

original: sam aham eṣām rāṣṭram syāmi sam ojaḥ vīryam balam  / vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham  /
analyzed: sam aham eṣām rāṣṭram syāmi sam ojaḥ vīryam balam   vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham  /

original: nīcais padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ sūrim maghavānam pṛtanyān  / kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇā amitrān ud nayāmi svān aham  /
analyzed: nīcais padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ sūrim maghavānam pṛtanyān   kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇā amitrān ud nayāmi svān aham  /

original: tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ paraśoḥ agneḥ tīkṣṇatarāḥ uta  / indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ  /
analyzed: tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ paraśoḥ agneḥ tīkṣṇatarāḥ uta   indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ  /

original: eṣām aham āyudhā sam syāmi eṣām rāṣṭram su vīram vardhayāmi  / eṣām kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu eṣām cittam viśve avantu devāḥ  /
analyzed: eṣām aham āyudhā sam syāmi eṣām rāṣṭram su vīram vardhayāmi    eṣām kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu eṣām cittam viśve avantu devāḥ  /

original: ud dharṣantām maghavan vājināni ud vīrāṇām jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ  / pṛthak ghoṣāḥ ululayaḥ ketumantaḥ ud īratām  / devāḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marutaḥ yantu senayā  /
analyzed: ud dharṣantām maghavan vājināni ud vīrāṇām jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ   pṛthak ghoṣāḥ ululayaḥ ketumantaḥ ud īratām   devāḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marutaḥ yantu senayā  /

original: pretāḥ jayata naraḥ ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ  / tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ abala dhanvanaḥ hata ugra āyudhāḥ abalān ugra bāhavaḥ  /
analyzed: pretāḥ jayata naraḥ ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ   tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ abala dhanvanaḥ hata ugra āyudhāḥ abalān ugra bāhavaḥ  /

original: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite  / jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahi eṣām varaṃvaram mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana  /
analyzed: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite    jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahi eṣām varaṃvaram mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana  /

original: ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ yatas jātaḥ arocathāḥ  / tam jānan agne ā roha adha naḥ vardhaya rayim  //
analyzed: ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ yatas jātaḥ arocathāḥ   tam jānan agne ā roha adha naḥ vardhaya rayim  /

original: agne achā vada iha naḥ pratyak naḥ sumanāḥ bhava  / pra naḥ yaccha viśām pate dhana dāḥ asi naḥ tvam  /
analyzed: agne achā vada iha naḥ pratyak naḥ sumanāḥ bhava   pra naḥ yaccha viśām pate dhana dāḥ asi naḥ tvam  /

original: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ  / pra devīḥ pra uta sūnṛtā rayim devī dadhātu me  /
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ   pra devīḥ pra uta sūnṛtā rayim devī dadhātu me  /

original: somam rājānam avase agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe  / ādityam viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim  //
analyzed: somam rājānam avase agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe    ādityam viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim  /

original: tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ brahma yajñam vardhaya  / tvam naḥ deva dātave rayim dānāya codaya  //
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ brahma yajñam vardhaya   tvam naḥ deva dātave rayim dānāya codaya  /

original: indra vāyū ubhau iha su havā iha havāmahe  / yathā naḥ sarvaḥ id janaḥ saṃgatyām sumanāḥ asat dāna kāmaḥ ca naḥ bhuvat  /
analyzed: indra vāyū ubhau iha su havā iha havāmahe    yathā naḥ sarvaḥ id janaḥ saṃgatyām sumanāḥ asat dāna kāmaḥ ca naḥ bhuvat  /

original: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya  / vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam  /
analyzed: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya   vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam  /

original: vājasya nu prasave sam babhūvima imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni antar  / uta āditsantam dāpayatu prajānan rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha  /
analyzed: vājasya nu prasave sam babhūvima imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni antar    uta āditsantam dāpayatu prajānan rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha  /

original: duhrām me pañca pradiṣaḥ duhrām urvīḥ yathābalam  / prāpeyam sarvāḥ ākūtīḥ manasā hṛdayena ca  /
analyzed: duhrām me pañca pradiṣaḥ duhrām urvīḥ yathābalam   prāpeyam sarvāḥ ākūtīḥ manasā hṛdayena ca  /

original: go sanim vācam udeyam varcasā mā abhyudihi  / ā rundhām sarvatas vāyuḥ tvaṣṭā poṣam dadhātu me  /
analyzed: go sanim vācam udeyam varcasā mā abhyudihi   ā rundhām sarvatas vāyuḥ tvaṣṭā poṣam dadhātu me  /

original: ye agnayaḥ apsu antar ye vṛtre ye puruṣe ye aśmasu  / yaḥ āviveśa oṣadhīḥ yaḥ vanaspatīn tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ apsu antar ye vṛtre ye puruṣe ye aśmasu    yaḥ āviveśa oṣadhīḥ yaḥ vanaspatīn tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: yaḥ some antar yaḥ goṣu antar yaḥ āviṣṭaḥ vayaḥsu yaḥ mṛgeṣu  / yaḥ āviveśa dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: yaḥ some antar yaḥ goṣu antar yaḥ āviṣṭaḥ vayaḥsu yaḥ mṛgeṣu   yaḥ āviveśa dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: yaḥ indreṇa sa ratham yāti devaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ uta viśvadāvyaḥ  / yam johavīmi pṛtanāsu sāsahim tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: yaḥ indreṇa sa ratham yāti devaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ uta viśvadāvyaḥ   yam johavīmi pṛtanāsu sāsahim tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: yaḥ devaḥ viśvāt yam u kāmam āhuḥ yam dātāram pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ  / yaḥ dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūḥ adābhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: yaḥ devaḥ viśvāt yam u kāmam āhuḥ yam dātāram pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ    yaḥ dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūḥ adābhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: yam tvā hotāram manasā abhi saṃviduḥ trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ  / varcaḥ dhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: yam tvā hotāram manasā abhi saṃviduḥ trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ   varcaḥ dhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase  / vaiśvānara jyeṣṭhebhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase    vaiśvānara jyeṣṭhebhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: divam pṛthivīm anu antarikṣam ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti  / ye dikṣu antar ye vāte antar tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /
analyzed: divam pṛthivīm anu antarikṣam ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti   ye dikṣu antar ye vāte antar tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat  /

original: hiraṇya pāṇim savitāram indram bṛhaspatim varuṇam mitram agnim  / viśvān devān aṅgirasaḥ havāmahe imam kravya adam śamayantu agnim  //
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇim savitāram indram bṛhaspatim varuṇam mitram agnim    viśvān devān aṅgirasaḥ havāmahe imam kravya adam śamayantu agnim  /

original: śāntaḥ agniḥ kravyād śāntaḥ puruṣa reṣaṇaḥ  / atha u yaḥ viśva dāvyaḥ tam kravyādam aśīśamam  /
analyzed: śāntaḥ agniḥ kravyād śāntaḥ puruṣa reṣaṇaḥ   atha u yaḥ viśva dāvyaḥ tam kravyādam aśīśamam  /

original: ye parvatāḥ soma pṛṣṭhāḥ āpaḥ uttāna śīvarīḥ  / vātaḥ parjanyaḥ āt agniḥ te kravya adam aśīśaman  //
analyzed: ye parvatāḥ soma pṛṣṭhāḥ āpaḥ uttāna śīvarīḥ   vātaḥ parjanyaḥ āt agniḥ te kravya adam aśīśaman  /

original: hasti varcasam prathatām bṛhat yaśaḥ adityāḥ yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva  / tat sarve sam aduḥ mahyam etat viśve devāḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ  /
analyzed: hasti varcasam prathatām bṛhat yaśaḥ adityāḥ yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva   tat sarve sam aduḥ mahyam etat viśve devāḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ  /

original: mitraḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca indraḥ rudraḥ ca cetatu  / devāsaḥ viśva dhāyasaḥ te māñjantu varcasā  /
analyzed: mitraḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca indraḥ rudraḥ ca cetatu   devāsaḥ viśva dhāyasaḥ te mā añjantu varcasā  /

original: yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyesu apsu antar  / yena devāḥ devatām agre āyan tena mām adya varcasā agne varcasvinam kṛṇu  //
analyzed: yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyesu apsu antar   yena devāḥ devatām agre āyan tena mām adya varcasā agne varcasvinam kṛṇu  /

original: yat te varcaḥ jātavedaḥ bṛhat bhavati āhuteḥ  / yāvat sūryasya varcaḥ āsurasya ca hastinaḥ  / tāvat me aśvinā varcaḥ ā dhattām puṣkara srajā  /
analyzed: yat te varcaḥ jātavedaḥ bṛhat bhavati āhuteḥ   yāvat sūryasya varcaḥ āsurasya ca hastinaḥ   tāvat me aśvinā varcaḥ ā dhattām puṣkara srajā  /

original: yāvat catasraḥ pradiśaḥ cakṣuḥ yāvat samaśnute  / tāvat samaitu indriyam mayi tat dhasti varcasam  /
analyzed: yāvat catasraḥ pradiśaḥ cakṣuḥ yāvat samaśnute   tāvat samaitu indriyam mayi tat dhasti varcasam  /

original: hastī mṛgāṇām suṣadām atiṣṭhāvān babhūva hi  / tasya bhagena varcasā abhi siñcāmi mām aham  /
analyzed: hastī mṛgāṇām suṣadām atiṣṭhāvān babhūva hi   tasya bhagena varcasā abhi siñcāmi mām aham  /

original: yena vehat babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat tvat  / idam tat anyatra tvat apa dūre ni dadhmasi  //
analyzed: yena vehat babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat tvat    idam tat anyatra tvat apa dūre ni dadhmasi

original: ā te yonim garbhe etu pumān bāṇaḥ iva iṣudhim  / ā vīraḥ atra jāyatām putraḥ te daśamāsyaḥ  /
analyzed: ā te yonim garbhe etu pumān bāṇaḥ iva iṣudhim   ā vīraḥ atra jāyatām putraḥ te daśamāsyaḥ  /

original: pumāṃsam putram janaya tam pumān anu jāyatām  / bhavāsi putrāṇām mātā jātānām janayāḥ ca yān  /
analyzed: pumāṃsam putram janaya tam pumān anu jāyatām   bhavāsi putrāṇām mātā jātānām janayāḥ ca yān  /

original: yāni badrāṇi bījāni ṛṣabhāḥ janayanti ca  / taiḥ tvam putram vindasva sā prasūḥ dhenukā bhava  //
analyzed: yāni badrāṇi bījāni ṛṣabhāḥ janayanti ca   taiḥ tvam putram vindasva sā prasūḥ dhenukā bhava  /

original: kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yonim garbhe etu te  / vindasva tvam putram nāri yaḥ tubhyam śam asat śam u tasmai tvam bhava  //
analyzed: kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yonim garbhe etu te    vindasva tvam putram nāri yaḥ tubhyam śam asat śam u tasmai tvam bhava  /

original: yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudraḥ mūlam vīrudhām babhūva  / tāḥ tvā putra vidyāya daivīḥ prāvantu oṣadhayaḥ  /
analyzed: yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudraḥ mūlam vīrudhām babhūva   tāḥ tvā putra vidyāya daivīḥ prāvantu oṣadhayaḥ  /

original: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ  / atha u payasvatīnām ā bhare aham sahasraśas  /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ   atha u payasvatīnām ā bhare aham sahasraśas  /

original: veda aham payasvantam cakāra dhānyam bahu  / saṃbhṛtvā nāma yaḥ devaḥ tam vayam havāmahe yoyo a yajvanaḥ gṛhe  /
analyzed: veda aham payasvantam cakāra dhānyam bahu   saṃbhṛtvā nāma yaḥ devaḥ tam vayam havāmahe yoyo a yajvanaḥ gṛhe  /

original: imāḥ yāḥ pañca pradiśaḥ mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ  / vṛṣṭe śāpam nadīḥ iva iha sphātim samāvahān  //
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ pañca pradiśaḥ mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ   vṛṣṭe śāpam nadīḥ iva iha sphātim samāvahān  /

original: ud utsam śata dhāram sahasra dhāram akṣitam  / eva asmāka idam dhānyam sahasra dhāram akṣitam  /
analyzed: ud utsam śata dhāram sahasra dhāram akṣitam    eva asmāka idam dhānyam sahasra dhāram akṣitam  /

original: śata hasta samāhara sahasra hasta sam kira  / kṛtasya kāryasya ca iha sphātim samāvaha  //
analyzed: śata hasta samāhara sahasra hasta sam kira    kṛtasya kāryasya ca iha sphātim samāvaha  /

original: tisraḥ mātrāḥ gandharvāṇām catasraḥ gṛhapatnyāḥ  / tāsām yā sphātimattamā tayā tvā abhi mṛśāmasi  //
analyzed: tisraḥ mātrāḥ gandharvāṇām catasraḥ gṛhapatnyāḥ   tāsām yā sphātimattamā tayā tvā abhi mṛśāmasi  /

original: upohaḥ ca samūhaḥ ca kṣattārau te prajāpate  / tau iha ā vahatām sphātim bahum bhūmānam akṣitam  /
analyzed: upohaḥ ca samūhaḥ ca kṣattārau te prajāpate    tau iha ā vahatām sphātim bahum bhūmānam akṣitam  /

original: uttudaḥ tvā ud tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve  / iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi  //
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā ud tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve    iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi  /

original: ādhīparṇām kāma śalyām iṣum saṃkalpa kulmalām  / tām su saṃnatām kṛtvā kāmaḥ vidhyatu tvā hṛdi  //
analyzed: ādhīparṇām kāma śalyām iṣum saṃkalpa kulmalām    tām su saṃnatām kṛtvā kāmaḥ vidhyatu tvā hṛdi  /

original: yā plīhānam śoṣayati kāmasya iṣuḥ su saṃnatā  / prācīna pakṣā vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi  /
analyzed: yā plīhānam śoṣayati kāmasya iṣuḥ su saṃnatā   prācīna pakṣā vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi  /

original: śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣkā asyāḥ abhi sarpa mā  / mṛduḥ nimanyuḥ kevalī priya vādinī anuvratā  /
analyzed: śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣkā asyāḥ abhi sarpa mā   / mṛduḥ nimanyuḥ kevalī priya vādinī anuvratā  /

original: ājāmi tvājanyā pari mātuḥ atho pituḥ  / yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  //
analyzed: ājāmi tvājanyā pari mātuḥ atho pituḥ    yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  /

original: vi asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaḥ cittāni asyatam  / atha enām a kratum kṛtvā mama eva kṛṇutam vaśe  /
analyzed: vi asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaḥ cittāni asyatam   atha enām a kratum kṛtvā mama eva kṛṇutam vaśe  /

original: ye asyām stha prācyām diśi hetayaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ agniḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha prācyām diśi hetayaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ agniḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: ye asyām stha dakṣiṇāyām diśi aviṣyavaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ kāmaḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha dakṣiṇāyām diśi aviṣyavaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ kāmaḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: ye asyām stha pratīcyām diśi vairājāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ āpaḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha pratīcyām diśi vairājāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ āpaḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: ye asyām stha udīcyām diśi pravidhyantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ vātaḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha udīcyām diśi pravidhyantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ vātaḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: ye asyām stha dhruvāyām diśi nilimpāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ oṣadhīḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha dhruvāyām diśi nilimpāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ oṣadhīḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: ye asyām stha ūrdhvāyām diśi avasvantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ iṣavaḥ  / te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: ye asyām stha ūrdhvāyām diśi avasvantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ iṣavaḥ   te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ adhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā  /

original: prācī diś agniḥ adhipatiḥ asitaḥ rakṣitā ādityāḥ iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: prācī diś agniḥ adhipatiḥ asitaḥ rakṣitā ādityāḥ iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: dakṣiṇā diś indraḥ adhipatiḥ tiraścirājī rakṣitā pitaraḥ iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā diś indraḥ adhipatiḥ tiraścirājī rakṣitā pitaraḥ iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: pratīcī diś varuṇaḥ adhipatiḥ pṛdākuḥ rakṣitā annam iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: pratīcī diś varuṇaḥ adhipatiḥ pṛdākuḥ rakṣitā annam iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: udīcī diś somaḥ adhipatiḥ svajaḥ rakṣitā aśaniḥ iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: udīcī diś somaḥ adhipatiḥ svajaḥ rakṣitā aśaniḥ iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: dhruvā diś viṣṇuḥ adhipatiḥ kalmāṣa grīvaḥ rakṣitā vīrudhaḥ iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: dhruvā diś viṣṇuḥ adhipatiḥ kalmāṣa grīvaḥ rakṣitā vīrudhaḥ iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: ūrdhvā diś bṛhaspatiḥ adhipatiḥ śvitraḥ rakṣitā varṣam iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu  / yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /
analyzed: ūrdhvā diś bṛhaspatiḥ adhipatiḥ śvitraḥ rakṣitā varṣam iṣavaḥ   tebhyaḥ namaḥ adhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu    yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ  /

original: ekaikayā eṣā sṛṣṭyā sam babhūva yatra gāḥ asṛjanta bhūta kṛtaḥ viśva rūpāḥ  / yatra vijāyate yaminī apartuḥ sā paśūn kṣiṇāti riphatī ruśatī  /
analyzed: ekaikayā eṣā sṛṣṭyā sam babhūva yatra gāḥ asṛjanta bhūta kṛtaḥ viśva rūpāḥ   yatra vijāyate yaminī apartuḥ sā paśūn kṣiṇāti riphatī ruśatī  /

original: eṣā paśūn sam kṣiṇāti kravyād bhūtvā vyadvarī  / uta enām brahmaṇe dadyāt tathā syonā śivā syāt  /
analyzed: eṣā paśūn sam kṣiṇāti kravyād bhūtvā vyadvarī   uta enām brahmaṇe dadyāt tathā syonā śivā syāt  /

original: śivā bhava puruṣebhyaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ śivā  / śivā asmai sarvasmai kṣetrāya śivā naḥ iha edhi  //
analyzed: śivā bhava puruṣebhyaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ śivā   śivā asmai sarvasmai kṣetrāya śivā naḥ iha edhi  /

original: iha puṣṭiḥ iha rasaḥ iha sahasra sātamā bhava  / paśūn yamini poṣaya  /
analyzed: iha puṣṭiḥ iha rasaḥ iha sahasra sātamā bhava   paśūn yamini poṣaya

original: yatra suhārdaḥ su kṛtaḥ madanti vihāya rogam tanvaḥ svāyāḥ  / tam lokam yaminī abhisaṃbabhūva sā naḥ mā hiṃsīt puruṣān paśūn ca  /
analyzed: yatra suhārdaḥ su kṛtaḥ madanti vihāya rogam tanvaḥ svāyāḥ   tam lokam yaminī abhisaṃbabhūva sā naḥ mā hiṃsīt puruṣān paśūn ca  /

original: yatra suhārdām su kṛtām agnihotra hutām yatra lokaḥ  / tam lokam yaminī abhisaṃbabhūva sā naḥ mā hiṃsīt puruṣān paśūn ca  /
analyzed: yatra suhārdām su kṛtām agnihotra hutām yatra lokaḥ    tam lokam yaminī abhisaṃbabhūva sā naḥ mā hiṃsīt puruṣān paśūn ca  /

original: yat rājānaḥ vibhajante iṣṭāpūrtasya ṣoḍaśam yamasya amī sabhāsadaḥ  / aviḥ tasmāt pra muñcati dattaḥ śitipād svadhā  /
analyzed: yat rājānaḥ vibhajante iṣṭāpūrtasya ṣoḍaśam yamasya amī sabhāsadaḥ   aviḥ tasmāt pra muñcati dattaḥ śitipād svadhā  /

original: sarvān kāmān pūrayati ābhavan prabhavan bhavan  / ākūti praḥ aviḥ dattaḥ śiti pād na upa dasyati  //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān pūrayati ābhavan prabhavan bhavan    ākūti praḥ aviḥ dattaḥ śiti pād na upa dasyati  /

original: yaḥ dadāti śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam  / sa nākam abhyārohati yatra śulkaḥ na kriyate abalena balīyase  /
analyzed: yaḥ dadāti śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam   sa nākam abhyārohati yatra śulkaḥ na kriyate abalena balīyase  /

original: pañca apūpam śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam  / pradātā upa jīvati pitṝṇām loke akṣitam  /
analyzed: pañca apūpam śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam   pradātā upa jīvati pitṝṇām loke akṣitam  /

original: pañca apūpam śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam  / pradātā upa jīvati sūryāmāsayoḥ akṣitam  /
analyzed: pañca apūpam śiti pādam avim lokena saṃmitam   pradātā upa jīvati sūryāmāsayoḥ akṣitam  /

original: irā iva nā upa dasyati samudraḥ iva payaḥ mahat  / devau sa vāsinau iva śitipād nā upa dasyati  //
analyzed: irā iva nā upa dasyati samudraḥ iva payaḥ mahat   devau sa vāsinau iva śitipād nā upa dasyati  /

original: kaḥ idam kasmai adāt kāmaḥ kāmāya adāt  / kāmaḥ dātā kāmaḥ pratigrahītā kāmaḥ samudram ā viveśa  / kāmena tvā prati gṛhnāmi kāma etat te  /
analyzed: kaḥ idam kasmai adāt kāmaḥ kāmāya adāt    kāmaḥ dātā kāmaḥ pratigrahītā kāmaḥ samudram ā viveśa   kāmena tvā prati gṛhnāmi kāma etat te  /

original: bhūmiḥ tvā prati gṛhṇātu antarikṣam idam mahat  / mā aham prāṇena mā ātmanā mā prajayā pratigṛhya vi rādhiṣi  //
analyzed: bhūmiḥ tvā prati gṛhṇātu antarikṣam idam mahat   mā aham prāṇena mā ātmanā mā prajayā pratigṛhya vi rādhiṣi  /

original: sahṛdayam sāṃmanasyam a vidveṣam kṛṇomi vaḥ  / anyaḥ anyam abhi haryata vatsam jātam iva aghnyā  /
analyzed: sahṛdayam sāṃmanasyam a vidveṣam kṛṇomi vaḥ   anyaḥ anyam abhi haryata vatsam jātam iva aghnyā  /

original: anuvrataḥ pituḥ putraḥ mātrā bhavatu saṃmanāḥ  / jāyā patye madhumatīm vācam vadatu śantivām  /
analyzed: anuvrataḥ pituḥ putraḥ mātrā bhavatu saṃmanāḥ   jāyā patye madhumatīm vācam vadatu śantivām  /

original: mā bhrātā bhrātaram dvikṣan mā svasāram uta svasā  / samyañcaḥ savratāḥ bhūtvā vācam vadata bhadrayā  /
analyzed: mā bhrātā bhrātaram dvikṣat mā svasāram uta svasā          bhūtvā vācam vadata bhadrayā  /

original: yena devāḥ na viyanti na u ca vidviṣate mithas  / tat kṛṇmaḥ brahma vaḥ gṛhe saṃjñānam puruṣebhyaḥ  //
analyzed: yena devāḥ na viyanti na u ca vidviṣate mithas   tat kṛṇmaḥ brahma vaḥ gṛhe saṃjñānam puruṣebhyaḥ

original: jyāyasvantaḥ cittinaḥ mā vi yauṣṭa saṃrādhayantaḥ sadhurāḥ carantaḥ  / anyaḥ anyasmai valgu vadantaḥ eta sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ krṇomi  //
analyzed: jyāyasvantaḥ cittinaḥ mā vi yauṣṭa saṃrādhayantaḥ sadhurāḥ carantaḥ   anyaḥ anyasmai valgu vadantaḥ eta sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ krṇomi  /

original: samānī prapā saha vaḥ anna bhāgaḥ samāne yoktre saha vaḥ yunajmi  / samyañcaḥ agnim saparyatārāḥ nābhim iva abhitas  /
analyzed: samānī prapā saha vaḥ anna bhāgaḥ samāne yoktre saha vaḥ yunajmi    samyañcaḥ agnim saparyatārāḥ nābhim iva abhitas  /

original: sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ kṛṇomi eka śnuṣṭīn saṃvananena sarvān  / devāḥ iva amṛtam rakṣamāṇāḥ sāyaṃprātar saumanasaḥ vaḥ astu  /
analyzed: sadhrīcīnān vaḥ saṃmanasaḥ kṛṇomi eka śnuṣṭīn saṃvananena sarvān   devāḥ iva amṛtam rakṣamāṇāḥ sāyaṃprātar saumanasaḥ vaḥ astu  /

original: vi devāḥ jarasā āvṛtan vi tvam agne arātyā  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: vi devāḥ jarasā āvṛtan vi tvam agne arātyā   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: vi ārtyā pavamānaḥ vi śakraḥ pāpa kṛtyayā  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: vi ārtyā pavamānaḥ vi śakraḥ pāpa kṛtyayā   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: vi grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ āraṇyaiḥ vi āpaḥ tṛṣṇayā asaran  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: vi grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ āraṇyaiḥ vi āpaḥ tṛṣṇayā asaran   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: vi me dyāvāpṛthivī itas vi panthānaḥ diśaṃdiśam  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: vi me dyāvāpṛthivī itas vi panthānaḥ diśaṃdiśam    vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum yunakti iti idam viśvam bhuvanam vi yāti  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum yunakti iti idam viśvam bhuvanam vi yāti   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: agniḥ prāṇān sam dadhāti candraḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: agniḥ prāṇān sam dadhāti candraḥ prāṇena saṃhitaḥ   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: prāṇena viśvatas vīryam devāḥ sūryam sam airayan  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: prāṇena viśvatas vīryam devāḥ sūryam sam airayan   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: āyuṣmatām āyuṣkṛtām prāṇena jīva mā mṛthāḥ  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: āyuṣmatām āyuṣkṛtām prāṇena jīva mā mṛthāḥ   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: prāṇena prāṇa tām prāṇa iha eva bhava mā mṛthāḥ  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: prāṇena prāṇa tām prāṇa iha eva bhava mā mṛthāḥ    vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: ud āyuṣā sam āyuṣā ud oṣadhīnām rasena  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: ud āyuṣā sam āyuṣā ud oṣadhīnām rasena    vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: ā parjanyasya vṛṣṭyā ud asthāma amṛtāḥ vayam  / vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /
analyzed: ā parjanyasya vṛṣṭyā ud asthāma amṛtāḥ vayam   vi aham sarveṇa pāpmanā vi yakṣmeṇa sam āyuṣā  /

original: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt vi sīmataḥ su rucaḥ venaḥ āvaḥ  / sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vi var  /
analyzed: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt vi sīmataḥ su rucaḥ venaḥ āvaḥ    sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vi var  /

original: iyam pitryā rāṣṭrī etu agre prathamāya januṣe bhuvaneṣṭhāḥ  / tasmai etam su rucam hvāram ahyam gharmam śrīṇantu prathamāya dhāsyave  /
analyzed: iyam pitryā rāṣṭrī etu agre prathamāya januṣe bhuvaneṣṭhāḥ   tasmai etam su rucam hvāram ahyam gharmam śrīṇantu prathamāya dhāsyave  /

original: pra yaḥ jajñe vidvān asya bandhuḥ viśvā devānām janimā vivakti  / brahma brahmaṇaḥ ud jabhāra madhyāt nicais uccais svadhāḥ abhi pra tasthau  /
analyzed: pra yaḥ jajñe vidvān asya bandhuḥ viśvā devānām janimā vivakti   brahma brahmaṇaḥ ud jabhāra madhyāt nicais uccais svadhāḥ abhi pra tasthau  /

original: sa hi vidaḥ sa pṛthivyāḥ ṛta sthāḥ mahī kṣemam rodasī askabhāyat  / mahān mahī askabhāyat vi jātaḥ dyām sadma pārthivam ca rajaḥ  /
analyzed: sa hi vidaḥ sa pṛthivyāḥ ṛta sthāḥ mahī kṣemam rodasī askabhāyat   mahān mahī askabhāyat vi jātaḥ dyām sadma pārthivam ca rajaḥ  /

original: sa bhudhnyāt āṣṭra januṣaḥ abhi agram bṛhaspatiḥ devatā tasya samrāj  / ahar yat śukram jyotiṣaḥ janiṣṭa atha dyumantaḥ vi vasantu viprāḥ  /
analyzed: sa bhudhnyāt āṣṭra januṣaḥ abhi agram bṛhaspatiḥ devatā tasya samrāj    ahar yat śukram jyotiṣaḥ janiṣṭa atha dyumantaḥ vi vasantu viprāḥ  /

original: nūnam tat asya kāvyaḥ hinoti mahaḥ devasya pūrvyasya dhāma  / eṣa jajñe bahubhiḥ sākam itthā pūrve ardhe viṣite sasan nu  /
analyzed: nūnam tat asya kāvyaḥ hinoti mahaḥ devasya pūrvyasya dhāma    eṣa jajñe bahubhiḥ sākam itthā pūrve ardhe viṣite sasan nu  /

original: yaḥ atharvāṇam pitaram deva bandhum bṛhaspatim namasā ava ca gacchāt  / tvam viśveṣām janitā yathā asaḥ kaviḥ devaḥ na dabhāyat svadhāvān  /
analyzed: yaḥ atharvāṇam pitaram deva bandhum bṛhaspatim namasā ava ca gacchāt   tvam viśveṣām janitā yathā asaḥ kaviḥ devaḥ na dabhāyat svadhāvān  /

original: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ  / yaḥ asya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ   yaḥ asya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā ekaḥ rājā jagataḥ babhūva  / yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā ekaḥ rājā jagataḥ babhūva   yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: yam krandasī avataḥ caskabhāne bhiyasāne rodasī ahvayethām  / yasya asau panthāḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: yam krandasī avataḥ caskabhāne bhiyasāne rodasī ahvayethām    yasya asau panthāḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: yasya dyauḥ urvī pṛthivī ca mahī yasya adaḥ uru antarikṣam  / yasya asau sūraḥ vitataḥ mahitvā kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: yasya dyauḥ urvī pṛthivī ca mahī yasya adaḥ uru antarikṣam   yasya asau sūraḥ vitataḥ mahitvā kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: yasya viśve himavantaḥ mahitvā samudre yasya rasām id āhuḥ  / imāḥ ca pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: yasya viśve himavantaḥ mahitvā samudre yasya rasām id āhuḥ    imāḥ ca pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: āpaḥ agre viśvam āvan garbham dadhānāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ  / yāsu devīṣu adhi devaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: āpaḥ agre viśvam āvan garbham dadhānāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ   yāsu devīṣu adhi devaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: hiraṇya garbhaḥ sam avartata agre bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt  / sa dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: hiraṇya garbhaḥ sam avartata agre bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt   sa dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: āpaḥ vatsam janayantīḥ garbham agre sam airayan  / tasya uta jāyamānasya ulbaḥ āsīt hiraṇyayaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: āpaḥ vatsam janayantīḥ garbham agre sam airayan    tasya uta jāyamānasya ulbaḥ āsīt hiraṇyayaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema  /

original: ud itas trayaḥ akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣaḥ vṛkaḥ  / hiruk ghi yanti sindhavaḥ hiruk devaḥ vanaspatiḥ hiruk namantu śatravaḥ  /
analyzed: ud itas trayaḥ akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣaḥ vṛkaḥ    hiruk ghi yanti sindhavaḥ hiruk devaḥ vanaspatiḥ hiruk namantu śatravaḥ  /

original: pareṇa etu pathā vṛkaḥ parameṇa uta taskaraḥ  / pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu  /
analyzed: pareṇa etu pathā vṛkaḥ parameṇa uta taskaraḥ   pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu  /

original: akṣyau ca te mukham ca te vyāghra jambhayāmasi  / āt sarvān viṃśatim nakhān  /
analyzed: akṣyau ca te mukham ca te vyāghra jambhayāmasi   āt sarvān viṃśatim nakhān

original: vyāghram datvatām vayam prathamam jambhayāmasi  / āt u stenam atha u ahim yātudhānam atha u vṛkam  /
analyzed: vyāghram datvatām vayam prathamam jambhayāmasi   āt u stenam atha u ahim yātudhānam atha u vṛkam  /

original: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati  / pathām apadhvaṃsena etu indraḥ vajreṇa hantu tam  /
analyzed: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati    pathām apadhvaṃsena etu indraḥ vajreṇa hantu tam  /

original: mūrṇāḥ mṛgasya dantāḥ apiśīrṇāḥ u pṛṣṭayaḥ  / nimruc te godhā bhavatu nīcāyat śaśayuḥ mṛgaḥ  /
analyzed: mūrṇāḥ mṛgasya dantāḥ apiśīrṇāḥ u pṛṣṭayaḥ   nimruc te godhā bhavatu nīcāyat śaśayuḥ mṛgaḥ  /

original: yat saṃyamaḥ na vi yamaḥ vi yamaḥ yat na saṃyamaḥ  / indra jāḥ soma jāḥ ātharvaṇam asi vyāghra jambhanam  //
analyzed: yat saṃyamaḥ na vi yamaḥ vi yamaḥ yat na saṃyamaḥ   indra jāḥ soma jāḥ ātharvaṇam asi vyāghra jambhanam  /

original: yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat varuṇāya mṛtabhraje  / tām tvā vayam khanāmasi oṣadhim śepaharṣaṇīm  /
analyzed: yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat varuṇāya mṛtabhraje    tām tvā vayam khanāmasi oṣadhim śepaharṣaṇīm  /

original: ud uṣāḥ ud u sūryaḥ ud idam māmakam vacaḥ  / ud ejatu prajāpatiḥ vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā  /
analyzed: ud uṣāḥ ud u sūryaḥ ud idam māmakam vacaḥ   ud ejatu prajāpatiḥ vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā  /

original: yathā sma te virohataḥ abhitaptam iva anati  / tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyam kṛṇotu oṣadhiḥ  /
analyzed: yathā sma te virohataḥ abhitaptam iva anati   tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyam kṛṇotu oṣadhiḥ

original: ud śuṣmā oṣadhīnām sārāḥ ṛṣabhāṇām  / sam puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam asmin dhehi tanū vaśin  /
analyzed: ud śuṣmāḥ oṣadhīnām sārāḥ ṛṣabhāṇām    sam puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam asmin dhehi tanū vaśin  /

original: apām rasaḥ prathama jaḥ atha u vanaspatīnām  / uta somasya bhrātā asi uta arśam asi vṛṣṇyam  /
analyzed: apām rasaḥ prathama jaḥ atha u vanaspatīnām      / uta somasya bhrātā asi uta arśam asi vṛṣṇyam  /

original: adya agne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati  / adya asya brahmaṇaḥ pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ  /
analyzed: adya agne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati      adya asya brahmaṇaḥ pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ  /

original: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani  / kramasva rśaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā  /
analyzed: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani   kramasva rśaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā  /

original: aśvasya aśvatarasya ajasya petvasya ca  / atha ṛṣabhasya ye vājāḥ tān asmin dhehi tanū vaśin //
analyzed: aśvasya aśvatarasya ajasya petvasya ca    atha ṛṣabhasya ye vājāḥ tān asmin dhehi tanū vaśin

original: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt udācarat  / tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi  //
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt udācarat   tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi  /

original: na bhūmim vātaḥ ati vāti na ati paśyati kaś cana  / striyaḥ ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaḥ ca indra sakhā caran  /
analyzed: na bhūmim vātaḥ ati vāti na ati paśyati kaś cana    striyaḥ ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaḥ ca indra sakhā caran  /

analyzed: proṣṭheśayāḥ talpeśayāḥ nārīḥ yāḥ vahya śīvarīḥ   striyaḥ yāḥ puṇya gandhayaḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi  /

original: ejat ejat ajagrabham cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham  / aṅgāni ajagrabham sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare  /
analyzed: ejat ejat ajagrabham cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham    aṅgāni ajagrabham sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare

original: yaḥ āste yaḥ carati yaḥ ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati  / teṣām sam dadhmaḥ akṣīṇi yathā idam harmyam tathā  /
analyzed: yaḥ āste yaḥ carati yaḥ ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati   teṣām sam dadhmaḥ akṣīṇi yathā idam harmyam tathā  /

original: svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ  / svapantu asyai jñātayaḥ svaptu ayam abhitas janaḥ  /
analyzed: svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ   svapantu asyai jñātayaḥ svaptu ayam abhitas janaḥ  /

original: svapna svapna abhikaraṇena sarvam ni svāpaya janam  / otsūryam anyān svāpaya avyuṣam jāgṛtāt aham indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣitaḥ  /
analyzed: svapna svapna abhikaraṇena sarvam ni svāpaya janam    otsūryam anyān svāpaya avyuṣam jāgṛtāt aham indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣitaḥ  /

original: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe prathamaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ daśa āsyaḥ  / sa somam prathamaḥ papau sa cakāra arasam viṣam  /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe prathamaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ daśa āsyaḥ   sa somam prathamaḥ papau sa cakāra arasam viṣam  /

analyzed: yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat sapta sindhavaḥ vitaṣṭhire   vācam viṣasya dūṣaṇīm tām itas niḥ avādiṣam  /

original: suparṇaḥ tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat  / na amīmadaḥ na ārūrupaḥ uta asmai abhavaḥ pituḥ  /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat   na amīmadaḥ na ārūrupaḥ uta asmai abhavaḥ pituḥ  /

original: yaḥ te āsyat pañca aṅguriḥ vakrāt cit adhi dhanvanaḥ  / apaskambhasya śalyāt niḥ avocam aham viṣam  /
analyzed: yaḥ te āsyat pañca aṅguriḥ vakrāt cit adhi dhanvanaḥ   apaskambhasya śalyāt niḥ avocam aham viṣam  /

analyzed: śalyāt viṣam niḥ avocam prāñjanāt uta parṇadheḥ   apāṣṭhāt śṛṅgāt kulmalāt niḥ avocam aham viṣam  /

original: arasaḥ te iṣaḥ śalyaḥ atho te arasam viṣam  / uta arasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuḥ te arasa arasam  /
analyzed: arasaḥ te iṣaḥ śalyaḥ atho te arasam viṣam    uta arasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuḥ te arasa arasam  /

original: ye apīṣan ye adihan ye āsyan ye avāsṛjan  / sarve te vadhrayaḥ kṛtāḥ vadhriḥ viṣa giriḥ kṛtaḥ  /
analyzed: ye apīṣan ye adihan ye āsyan ye avāsṛjan     sarve te vadhrayaḥ kṛtāḥ vadhriḥ viṣa giriḥ kṛtaḥ  /

original: vadhrayaḥ te khanitāraḥ vadhriḥ tvam asi oṣadhe  / vadhriḥ sa parvataḥ giriḥ yatas jātam idam viṣam  /
analyzed: vadhrayaḥ te khanitāraḥ vadhriḥ tvam asi oṣadhe   vadhriḥ sa parvataḥ giriḥ yatas jātam idam viṣam  /

original: vār idam vārayātai varaṇāvatyām adhi  / tatra amṛtasya āsiktam tena te vāraye viṣam  /
analyzed: vār idam vārayātai varaṇāvatyām adhi   / tatra amṛtasya āsiktam tena te vāraye viṣam  /

original: arasam prācyam viṣam arasam yat udīcyam  / atha idam adharācyam karambheṇa vi kalpate  /
analyzed: arasam prācyam viṣam arasam yat udīcyam     atha idam adharācyam karambheṇa vi kalpate  /
