analyzed: imam me kuṣṭha pūruṣam tam ā vaha tam niḥ kuru   tam u me agadam kṛdhi  /

original: devebhyaḥ adhi jātaḥ asi somasya asi sakhā hitaḥ  / sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa  //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ adhi jātaḥ asi somasya asi sakhā hitaḥ   sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa  /

original: udaṅ jātaḥ himavataḥ sa prācyām nīyase janam  / tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāni uttamāni vi bhejire  /
analyzed: udaṅ jātaḥ himavataḥ sa prācyām nīyase janam   tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāni uttamāni vi bhejire  /

original: uttamaḥ nāma kuṣṭhasi uttamaḥ nāma te pitā  / yakṣmam ca sarvam nāśaya takmānam ca arasam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: uttamaḥ nāma kuṣṭhasi uttamaḥ nāma te pitā   yakṣmam ca sarvam nāśaya takmānam ca arasam kṛdhi  /

original: śīrṣa āmayam upahatyām akṣyoḥ tanvaḥ rapaḥ  / kuṣṭhaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karat daivam samaha vṛṣṇyam  //
analyzed: śīrṣa āmayam upahatyām akṣyoḥ tanvaḥ rapaḥ   kuṣṭhaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karat daivam samaha vṛṣṇyam  /

original: rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitā aryamā te pitāmahaḥ  / silācī nāma vai asi sā devānām asi svasā  /
analyzed: rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitā aryamā te pitāmahaḥ   silācī nāma vai asi sā devānām asi svasā  /

original: yaḥ tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣam tvam  / bhartrī hi śaśvatām asi janānām ca nyañcanī  //
analyzed: yaḥ tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣam tvam    bhartrī hi śaśvatām asi janānām ca nyañcanī  /

original: vṛkṣam vṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantī iva kanyalā  / jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī sparaṇī nāma vai asi  /
analyzed: vṛkṣam vṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantī iva kanyalā   jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī sparaṇī nāma vai asi  /

original: yat daṇḍena yat iṣvā yat vāruḥ harasā kṛtam  / tasya tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ sā imam niḥ kṛdhi pūruṣam  /
analyzed: yat daṇḍena yat iṣvā yat vāruḥ harasā kṛtam   tasya tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ sā imam niḥ kṛdhi pūruṣam  /

original: bhadrāt plakṣāt niḥ tiṣṭhasi aśvatthāt khadirāt dhavāt  / bhadrāt nyagrodhāt parṇāt sā naḥ ehi arundhati  //
analyzed: bhadrāt plakṣāt niḥ tiṣṭhasi aśvatthāt khadirāt dhavāt    bhadrāt nyagrodhāt parṇāt sā naḥ ehi arundhati  /

original: hiraṇya varṇe subhage sūrya varṇe vapuṣṭame  / rutam gacchāsi niṣkṛte niṣkṛtiḥ nāma vai asi  /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇe subhage sūrya varṇe vapuṣṭame   rutam gacchāsi niṣkṛte niṣkṛtiḥ nāma vai asi  /

original: hiraṇya varṇe subhage śuṣme lomaśa vakṣane  / apām asi svasā lākṣe vātaḥ ha ātmā babhūva te  /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇe subhage śuṣme lomaśa vakṣane   apām asi svasā lākṣe vātaḥ ha ātmā babhūva te  /

analyzed: aśvasya asnaḥ saṃpatitā sā vṛkṣām abhi siṣyade   sarā patatriṇī bhūtvā sā naḥ ehi arundhati  /

analyzed: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt vi sīmataḥ su rucaḥ venaḥ āvaḥ    sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vi var  /

original: an āptāḥ ye vaḥ prathamāḥ yāni karmāṇi cakrire  / vīrān naḥ atra mā dabhan tat vaḥ etat puras dadhe  /

analyzed: sahasra dhāre eva te sam asvaran divaḥ nāke madhu jihvāḥ asaścataḥ    tasya spaśaḥ na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ padepade pāśinaḥ santi setave  /

analyzed: ava etena arātsīḥ asau svāhā                 iha su mṛḍatam naḥ  /

analyzed: apa etena arātsīḥ asau svāhā                iha su mṛḍatam naḥ  /

analyzed: mumuktam asmān duritāt avadyāt juṣethām yajñam amṛtam asmāsu dhattam  /

analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ hete manasaḥ hete brahmaṇaḥ hete tapasaḥ ca hete      menyā meniḥ asi amenayaḥ te santu ye asmām abhyaghāyanti  /

original: indrasya gṛhaḥ asi  / tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /
analyzed: indrasya gṛhaḥ asi   tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /

original: indrasya śarmā asi  / tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /
analyzed: indrasya śarmā asi   tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /

original: indrasya varmā asi  / tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /
analyzed: indrasya varmā asi   tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /

original: indrasya varūtham asi  / tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me asti tena  /

original: ā naḥ bhara mā pari stha arāte mā naḥ rakṣīḥ dakṣiṇām nīyamānām  / namaḥ vīrtsāyāḥ asamṛddhaye namaḥ astu arātaye  /

analyzed: yam arāte purodhatse puruṣam parirāpiṇam   namaḥ te tasmai kṛṇmaḥ mā vanim vyathayīḥ mama  /

analyzed: pra naḥ vaniḥ deva kṛtā divā naktam ca kalpatām   arātim anupremaḥ vayam namaḥ astu arātaye  /

analyzed: sarasvatīm anumatim bhagam yantaḥ havāmahe   vācam juṣṭām madhumatīm avādiṣam devānām deva hūtiṣu  /

analyzed: yam yācāmi aham vācā sarasvatyā manaḥ yujā    śraddhā tam adya vindatu dattā somena babhruṇā  /

analyzed: vaikaṅkatena idhmena devebhyaḥ ājyam vaha   agne tām iha mādaya sarve ā yantu me havam  /

analyzed: indra ā yāhi me havam idam kariṣyāmi tat śṛṇu   ime aindrāḥ atisarāḥ ākūtim sam namantu me   tebhiḥ śakema vīryam jātavedaḥ tanū vaśin  /

original: ati dhāvata atisarāḥ indrasya vacasā hata  / avim vṛkaḥ iva mathnīta sa vaḥ jīvan mā moci prāṇam asya api nahyata  /
analyzed: ati dhāvata atisarāḥ indrasya vacasā hata    avim vṛkaḥ iva mathnīta sa vaḥ jīvan mā moci prāṇam asya api nahyata  /

original: yam amī purodadhire brahmāṇam apabhūtaye  / indra sa te adhaspadam tam prati asyāmi mṛtyave  //
analyzed: yam amī purodadhire brahmāṇam apabhūtaye    indra sa te adhaspadam tam prati asyāmi mṛtyave  /

original: yadi preyuḥ deva purā brahma varmāṇi cakrire  / tanū pānam paripāṇam kṛṇvānāḥ yat upocire sarvam tat arasam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: yadi preyuḥ deva purā brahma varmāṇi cakrire   tanū pānam paripāṇam kṛṇvānāḥ yat upocire sarvam tat arasam kṛdhi  /

original: yān asau atisarān cakāra kṛṇavat ca yān  / tvam tān indra vṛtrahan pratīcaḥ punar ā kṛdhi yathā amum tṛṇa hām janam  /
analyzed: yān asau atisarān cakāra kṛṇavat ca yān       tvam tān indra vṛtrahan pratīcaḥ punar ā kṛdhi yathā amum tṛṇa hām janam  /

original: yathā indraḥ udvācanam labdhvā cakre adhaspadam  / kṛṇve aham adharān tathā amūn śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā indraḥ udvācanam labdhvā cakre adhaspadam   kṛṇve aham adharān tathā amūn śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ  /

original: atra enān indra vṛtrahan ugraḥ marmaṇi vidhya  / atra eva enān abhi tiṣṭha indra medi aham tava  / anu tvā indra ā rabhāmahe syāma sumatau tava  /
analyzed: atra enān indra vṛtrahan ugraḥ marmaṇi vidhya   atra eva enān abhi tiṣṭha indra medi aham tava    anu tvā indra ā rabhāmahe syāma sumatau tava  /

original: sūryaḥ me cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇaḥ antarikṣam ātmā pṛthivī śarīram  / astṛtaḥ nāma aham ayam asmi saḥ ātmānam ni dadhe dyāvāpṛthivībhyām gopīthāya  //
analyzed: sūryaḥ me cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇaḥ antarikṣam ātmā pṛthivī śarīram   astṛtaḥ nāma aham ayam asmi saḥ ātmānam ni dadhe dyāvāpṛthivībhyām gopīthāya  /

original: ud āyuḥ ud balam ud kṛtam ud kṛtyām ud manīṣām ud indriyam  / āyuṣkṛt āyuṣpatnī svadhāvantau gopāḥ me stam gopāyatam mā  / ātma sadau me stam mā mā hiṃsiṣṭam  /
analyzed: ud āyuḥ ud balam ud kṛtam ud kṛtyām ud manīṣām ud indriyam  / āyuṣkṛt āyuṣpatnī svadhāvantau gopāḥ me stam gopāyatam mā   ātma sadau me stam mā mā hiṃsiṣṭam  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā prācyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā prācyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā udīcyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā udīcyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā diśām antardeśebhyaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt  / etat saḥ ṛchāt  /
analyzed: aśma varma me asi yaḥ mā diśām antardeśebhyaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt   etat saḥ ṛchāt  /

original: bṛhatā manaḥ upa hvaye mātariśvanā prāṇa apānau  / sūryāt cakṣuḥ antarikṣāt śrotram pṛthivyāḥ śarīram  / sarasvatyāḥ vācam upa hvayāmahe manaḥ yujā  /
analyzed: bṛhatā manaḥ upa hvaye mātariśvanā prāṇa apānau   sūryāt cakṣuḥ antarikṣāt śrotram pṛthivyāḥ śarīram   sarasvatyāḥ vācam upa hvayāmahe manaḥ yujā  /

original: katham mahe asurāya abravīḥ iha katham pitre haraye tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ  / pṛśnim varuṇa dakṣiṇām dadāvān punarmagha tvam manasā acikitsīḥ  /
analyzed: katham mahe asurāya abravīḥ iha katham pitre haraye tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ   pṛśnim varuṇa dakṣiṇām dadāvān punarmagha tvam manasā acikitsīḥ  /

original: na kāmena punarmaghaḥ bhavāmi sam cakṣe kam pṛśnim etām upāje  / kena nu tvam atharvan kāvyena kena jātena asi jātavedāḥ  /
analyzed: na kāmena punarmaghaḥ bhavāmi sam cakṣe kam pṛśnim etām upāje    kena nu tvam atharvan kāvyena kena jātena asi jātavedāḥ  /

original: satyam aham gabhīraḥ kāvyena satyam jātena asmi jātavedāḥ  / na me dāsaḥ nāryaḥ mahitvā vratam mīmāya yat aham dhariṣye  //
analyzed: satyam aham gabhīraḥ kāvyena satyam jātena asmi jātavedāḥ    na me dāsaḥ nāryaḥ mahitvā vratam mīmāya yat aham dhariṣye  /

original: na tvat anyaḥ kavitaraḥ na medhayā dhīrataraḥ varuṇa svadhāvan  / tvam tā viśvā bhuvanāni vettha sa cit nu tvat janaḥ māyī bibhāya  //
analyzed: na tvat anyaḥ kavitaraḥ na medhayā dhīrataraḥ varuṇa svadhāvan    tvam tā viśvā bhuvanāni vettha sa cit nu tvat janaḥ māyī bibhāya  /

original: tvam hi aṅga varuṇa svadhāvan viśvā vettha janima su praṇīte  / kim rajasaḥ enā paraḥ anyat asti enā kim pareṇa avaram amura  /
analyzed: tvam hi aṅga varuṇa svadhāvan viśvā vettha janima su praṇīte   kim rajasaḥ enā paras anyat asti enā kim pareṇa avaram amura  /

original: ekam rajasaḥ enā paras anyat asti enā paras ekena durṇaśam cit arvāk  / tat te vidvān varuṇa pra bravīmi adhas vacasaḥ paṇayaḥ bhavantu nīcais dāsāḥ upa sarpantu bhūmim  /
analyzed: ekam rajasaḥ enā paras anyat asti enā paras ekena durṇaśam cit arvāk   tat te vidvān varuṇa pra bravīmi adhas vacasaḥ paṇayaḥ bhavantu nīcais dāsāḥ upa sarpantu bhūmim  /

original: tvam hi aṅga varuṇa bravīṣi punarmagheṣu avadyāni bhūri  / mā u su paṇīn abhi etāvataḥ bhūt mā tvā vocan arādhasam janāsaḥ  /
analyzed: tvam hi aṅga varuṇa bravīṣi punarmagheṣu avadyāni bhūri   mā u su paṇīn abhi etāvataḥ bhūt mā tvā vocan arādhasam janāsaḥ  /

original: mā mā vocan arādhasam janāsaḥ punar te pṛśnim jaritar dadāmi  / stotram me viśvam ā yāhi śacībhiḥ antar viśvāsu mānuṣīṣu dikṣu  /
analyzed: mā mā vocan arādhasam janāsaḥ punar te pṛśnim jaritar dadāmi    stotram me viśvam ā yāhi śacībhiḥ antar viśvāsu mānuṣīṣu dikṣu  /

original: ā te stotrāṇi udyatāni yantu antar viśvāsu mānuṣīṣu dikṣu  / dehi nu me yat me a dattaḥ asi yujyaḥ me sapta padaḥ sakhā asi  /
analyzed: ā te stotrāṇi udyatāni yantu antar viśvāsu mānuṣīṣu dikṣu   dehi nu me yat me a dattaḥ asi yujyaḥ me sapta padaḥ sakhā asi  /

original: samā nau bandhuḥ varuṇa samā jā veda aham tat yat nau eṣā samā jā  / dadāmi tat yat te a dattaḥ asmi yujyaḥ te sapta padaḥ sakhā asmi  /
analyzed: samā nau bandhuḥ varuṇa samā jā veda aham tat yat nau eṣā samā jā    dadāmi tat yat te a dattaḥ asmi yujyaḥ te sapta padaḥ sakhā asmi  /

original: devaḥ devāya gṛṇate vayodhāḥ vipraḥ viprāya stuvate sumedhāḥ  / ajījanaḥ hi varuṇa svadhāvan atharvāṇam pitaram deva bandhum  / tasmai u rādhaḥ kṛṇuhi su praśastam sakhā naḥ asi paramam ca bandhuḥ  //
analyzed: devaḥ devāya gṛṇate vayodhāḥ vipraḥ viprāya stuvate sumedhāḥ    ajījanaḥ hi varuṇa svadhāvan atharvāṇam pitaram deva bandhum   tasmai u rādhaḥ kṛṇuhi su praśastam sakhā naḥ asi paramam ca bandhuḥ  /

original: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ  / ā ca vaha mitra mahaḥ cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ  /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ    ā ca vaha mitra mahaḥ cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ  /

original: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānāt madhvā samañjan svadaya su jihva  / manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ  /
analyzed: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānāt madhvā samañjan svadaya su jihva     manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ  /

original: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ bandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ  / tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣīṣitaḥ yajīyān  //
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ bandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ   tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān  /

original: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām  / vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam  /
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām    vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam  /

original: vyacasvatīḥ urviyāḥ vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ  / devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ  /
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ urviyāḥ vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ   devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ  /

original: ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau  / divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī su rukme adhi śriyam śukrapiśam dadhāne  /
analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau     divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī su rukme adhi śriyam śukrapiśam dadhāne  /

original: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai  / pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā  /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai    pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā  /

original: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḍā manuṣvat iha cetayantī  / tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatīḥ su apasaḥ sadantām  /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḍā manuṣvat iha cetayantī    tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatīḥ su apasaḥ sadantām  /

original: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apiṃśat bhuvanāni viśvā  / tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān  /
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apiṃśat bhuvanāni viśvā   tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān  /

original: upa avasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi  / vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena  /
analyzed: upa avasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi   vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena  /

original: sadyas jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ  / asya hotuḥ praśiṣi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ  /
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ    asya hotuḥ praśiṣi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ  /

original: dadiḥ hi mahyam varuṇaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ vacobhiḥ ugraiḥ ni riṇāmi te viṣam  / khātam akhātam uta saktam agrabham irā iva dhanvan ni jajāsa te viṣam  /
analyzed: dadiḥ hi mahyam varuṇaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ vacobhiḥ ugraiḥ ni riṇāmi te viṣam   khātam akhātam uta saktam agrabham irā iva dhanvan ni jajāsa te viṣam  /

original: yat te apodakam viṣam tat te etāsu agrabham  / gṛhṇāmi te madhyamam uttamam rasam uta avamam bhiyasā neśat āt u te  /
analyzed: yat te apodakam viṣam tat te etāsu agrabham   gṛhṇāmi te madhyamam uttamam rasam uta avamam bhiyasā neśat āt u te  /

original: vṛṣā me ravaḥ nabhasā na tanyatuḥ ugreṇa te vacasā bādhaḥ āt u te  / aham tam asya nṛbhiḥ agrabham rasam tamasaḥ iva jyotiḥ ud etu sūryaḥ  /
analyzed: vṛṣā me ravaḥ nabhasā na tanyatuḥ ugreṇa te vacasā bādhaḥ āt u te    aham tam asya nṛbhiḥ agrabham rasam tamasaḥ iva jyotiḥ ud etu sūryaḥ  /

original: cakṣuṣā te cakṣuḥ hanmi viṣeṇa hanmi te viṣam  / ahe mriyasva mā jīvīḥ pratyak abhi etu tvā viṣam  /
analyzed: cakṣuṣā te cakṣuḥ hanmi viṣeṇa hanmi te viṣam   ahe mriyasva mā jīvīḥ pratyak abhi etu tvā viṣam

original: kairāta pṛśnaḥ upatṛṇya babhro ā me śṛṇuta asitāḥ alīkāḥ  / mā me sakhyuḥ stāmānam api ṣṭhāta āśrāvayantaḥ ni viṣe ramadhvam  /
analyzed: kairāta pṛśnaḥ upatṛṇya babhro ā me śṛṇuta asitāḥ alīkāḥ   mā me sakhyuḥ stāmānam api ṣṭhāta āśrāvayantaḥ ni viṣe ramadhvam  /

original: asitasya taimātasya babhroḥ apodakasya ca  / sātrāsāhasya aham manyoḥ ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ vi muñcāmi rathān iva  /
analyzed: asitasya taimātasya babhroḥ apodakasya ca    sātrāsāhasya aham manyoḥ ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ vi muñcāmi rathān iva  /

original: āligī ca viligī ca pitā ca matā ca  / vidma vaḥ sarvatas bandhu arasāḥ kim kariṣyatha  //
analyzed: āligī ca viligī ca pitā ca matā ca   vidma vaḥ sarvatas bandhu arasāḥ kim kariṣyatha  /

original: urugūlāyāḥ duhitā jātā dāsī asiknyā  / prataṅkam dadruṣīṇām sarvāsām arasam viṣam  /
analyzed: urugūlāyāḥ duhitā jātā dāsī asiknyā    prataṅkam dadruṣīṇām sarvāsām arasam viṣam  /

original: karṇā śvāvidh tat abravīt gireḥ avacarantikā  / yāḥ kāḥ ca imāḥ khanitrimāḥ tāsām arasatamam viṣam  /
analyzed: karṇā śvāvidh tat abravīt gireḥ avacarantikā    yāḥ kāḥ ca imāḥ khanitrimāḥ tāsām arasatamam viṣam  /

original: tābuvam na tābuvam na gha id tvam asi tābuvam  / tābuvena arasam viṣam  /
analyzed: tābuvam na tābuvam na gha id tvam asi tābuvam    tābuvena arasam viṣam

original: tastuvam na tastuvam na gha id tvam asi tastuvam  / tastuvena arasam viṣam  /
analyzed: tastuvam na tastuvam na gha id tvam asi tastuvam    tastuvena arasam viṣam

original: suparṇaḥ tvā anu avindat sūkaraḥ tvā akhanat nasā  / dipsā oṣadhe tvam dipsantam ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi  //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ tvā anu avindat sūkaraḥ tvā akhanat nasā   dipsā oṣadhe tvam dipsantam ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi  /

original: ava jahi yātudhānān ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi  / atha u yaḥ asmān dipsati tam u tvam jahi oṣadhe  /
analyzed: ava jahi yātudhānān ava kṛtyā kṛtam jahi    atha u yaḥ asmān dipsati tam u tvam jahi oṣadhe  /

original: riśyasya iva parīśāsam parikṛtya pari tvacaḥ  / kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte devāḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcata  /
analyzed: riśyasya iva parīśāsam parikṛtya pari tvacaḥ   kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte devāḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcata  /

original: punar kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte hasta gṛhya parā naya  / samakṣam asmai ā dhehi yathā kṛtyā kṛtam hanat  /
analyzed: punar kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte hasta gṛhya parā naya   / samakṣam asmai ā dhehi yathā kṛtyā kṛtam hanat  /

original: kṛtyāḥ santu kṛtyā kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate  / sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartatām kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam punar  /
analyzed: kṛtyāḥ santu kṛtyā kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate    sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartatām kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam punar  /

original: yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyām cakāra pāpmane  / tām u tasmai nayāmasi aśvam iva aśva abhidhānyā  /
analyzed: yadi strī yadi vā pumān kṛtyām cakāra pāpmane   tām u tasmai nayāmasi aśvam iva aśva abhidhānyā  /

original: yadi vā asi deva kṛtā yadi vā puruṣaiḥ kṛtā  / tām tvā punar nayāmasi indreṇa sayujā vayam  /
analyzed: yadi vā asi deva kṛtā yadi vā puruṣaiḥ kṛtā   tām tvā punar nayāmasi indreṇa sayujā vayam  /

original: agne pṛtanāṣāh pṛtanāḥ sahasva  / punar kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte pratiharaṇena harāmasi  //
analyzed: agne pṛtanāṣāh pṛtanāḥ sahasva   punar kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛte pratiharaṇena harāmasi  /

original: kṛta vyadhani vidhya tam yaḥ cakāra tam id jahi  / na tvām acakruṣe vayam vadhāya sam śiśīmahi  //
analyzed: kṛta vyadhani vidhya tam yaḥ cakāra tam id jahi   na tvām acakruṣe vayam vadhāya sam śiśīmahi

original: putraḥ iva pitaram gaccha svajaḥ iva abhiṣṭhitaḥ daśa  / bandham iva avakrāmī gaccha kṛtye kṛtyā kṛtam punar  /

original: agniḥ iva etu pratikūlam anukūlam iva udakam  / sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartatām kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam punar  /

original: te avadan prathamāḥ brahma kilbiṣe akūpāraḥ salilaḥ mātariśvā  / vīḍu harāḥ tapaḥ ugram mayaḥ bhūḥ āpaḥ devīḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtasya  /

original: somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahma jāyām punar prāyacchat a hṛṇīyamānaḥ  / anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt agniḥ hotā hasta gṛhyā nināya  //
analyzed: somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahma jāyām punar prāyacchat a hṛṇīyamānaḥ   anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt agniḥ hotā hasta gṛhyā nināya  /

original: hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ brahma jāyā iti ced avocat  / na dūtāya praheyā tasthe eṣā tathā rāṣṭram gupitam kṣatriyasya  /
analyzed: hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ brahma jāyā iti ced avocat    na dūtāya praheyā tasthe eṣā tathā rāṣṭram gupitam kṣatriyasya  /

original: yām āhuḥ tārakā eṣā vikeśī iti duchunām grāmam avapadyamānām  / sā brahma jāyā vi dunoti rāṣṭram yatra prāpādi śaśaḥ ulkuṣīmān  /
analyzed: yām āhuḥ tārakā eṣā vikeśī iti duchunām grāmam avapadyamānām    sā brahma jāyā vi dunoti rāṣṭram yatra prāpādi śaśaḥ ulkuṣīmān  /

original: brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam  / tena jāyām anu avindat bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ  /
analyzed: brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam   tena jāyām anu avindat bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ  /

original: devāḥ vai etasyām avadanta pūrve sapta ṛṣayaḥ tapasā ye niṣeduḥ  / bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya apanītā durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman  /
analyzed: devāḥ vai etasyām avadanta pūrve sapta ṛṣayaḥ tapasā ye niṣeduḥ   bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya apanītā durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman  /

original: ye garbhāḥ avapadyante jagat yat ca apalupyate  / vīrāḥ ye tṛhyante mithas brahma jāyāḥ hinasti tān  /
analyzed: ye garbhāḥ avapadyante jagat yat ca apalupyate   vīrāḥ ye tṛhyante mithas brahma jāyāḥ hinasti tān  /

original: uta yat patayaḥ daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ  / brahmā ced hastam agrahīt saḥ eva patiḥ ekadhā  /
analyzed: uta yat patayaḥ daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ   brahmā ced hastam agrahīt saḥ eva patiḥ ekadhā  /

original: brāhmaṇaḥ eva patiḥ na rājanyaḥ na vaiśyaḥ  / tat sūryaḥ prabruvan eti pañcabhyaḥ mānavebhyaḥ  /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ eva patiḥ na rājanyaḥ na vaiśyaḥ   tat sūryaḥ prabruvan eti pañcabhyaḥ mānavebhyaḥ

original: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ adaduḥ  / rājānaḥ satyam gṛhṇānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ  /
analyzed: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ adaduḥ   rājānaḥ satyam gṛhṇānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ  /

original: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvā devaiḥ nikilbiṣam  / ūrjam pṛthivyāḥ bhaktvā uru gāyam upāsate  /
analyzed: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvā devaiḥ nikilbiṣam   ūrjam pṛthivyāḥ bhaktvā uru gāyam upāsate  /

original: na asya jāyā śata vāhī kalyāṇī talpam ā śaye  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na asya jāyā śata vāhī kalyāṇī talpam ā śaye   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na vikarṇaḥ pṛthu śirāḥ tasmin veśmani jāyate  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na vikarṇaḥ pṛthu śirāḥ tasmin veśmani jāyate   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na asya kṣattā niṣka grīvaḥ sūnānām eti agratas  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na asya kṣattā niṣka grīvaḥ sūnānām eti agratas   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na asya śvetaḥ kṛṣṇakarṇaḥ dhuri yuktaḥ mahīyate  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na asya śvetaḥ kṛṣṇakarṇaḥ dhuri yuktaḥ mahīyate   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na asya kṣetre puṣkariṇī nāṇḍīkam jāyate bisam  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na asya kṣetre puṣkariṇī nāṇḍīkam jāyate bisam   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na asmai pṛśnim vi duhanti ye asyāḥ doham upāsate  / yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /
analyzed: na asmai pṛśnim vi duhanti ye asyāḥ doham upāsate   yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā  /

original: na asya dhenuḥ kalyāṇī na anaḍvān sahate dhuram  / vijāniḥ yatra brahmaṇaḥ rātrim vasati pāpayā  /
analyzed: na asya dhenuḥ kalyāṇī na anaḍvān sahate dhuram    vijāniḥ yatra brahmaṇaḥ rātrim vasati pāpayā  /

original: na etām te devāḥ adaduḥ tubhyam nṛpate attave  / mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gām jighatso anādyām  /
analyzed: na etām te devāḥ adaduḥ tubhyam nṛpate attave    mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gām jighatsaḥ anādyām  /

original: akṣa drugdhaḥ rājanyaḥ pāpaḥ ātma parājitaḥ  / sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyāt adya jīvāni mā śvas  /
analyzed: akṣa drugdhaḥ rājanyaḥ pāpaḥ ātma parājitaḥ   sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyāt adya jīvāni mā śvas  /

original: āviṣṭita agha viṣā pṛdākūḥ iva carmaṇā  / sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭā eṣā gauḥ anādyā  /
analyzed: āviṣṭita agha viṣā pṛdākūḥ iva carmaṇā    sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭā eṣā gauḥ anādyā  /

original: niḥ vai kṣatram nayati hanti varcaḥ agniḥ iva ārabdhaḥ vi dunoti sarvam  / yaḥ brāhmaṇam manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya  /
analyzed: niḥ vai kṣatram nayati hanti varcaḥ agniḥ iva ārabdhaḥ vi dunoti sarvam   yaḥ brāhmaṇam manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya  /

original: yaḥ enam hanti mṛdum manyamānaḥ deva pīyuḥ dhana kāmaḥ na cittāt  / sam tasya indraḥ hṛdaye agnim indhe ubhe enam dviṣṭaḥ nabhasī carantam  /
analyzed: yaḥ enam hanti mṛdum manyamānaḥ deva pīyuḥ dhana kāmaḥ na cittāt     sam tasya indraḥ hṛdaye agnim indhe ubhe enam dviṣṭaḥ nabhasī carantam  /

original: na brāhmaṇaḥ hiṃsitavyaḥ agniḥ priya tanoḥ iva  / somaḥ hi asya dāyādaḥ indraḥ asya abhiśasti pāḥ  /
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ hiṃsitavyaḥ agniḥ priya tanoḥ iva   somaḥ hi asya dāyādaḥ indraḥ asya abhiśasti pāḥ  /

original: śata apāṣṭhām ni girati tām na śaknoti niḥkhidam  / annam yaḥ brahmaṇām malvaḥ svādu admi iti manyate  /
analyzed: śata apāṣṭhām ni girati tām na śaknoti niḥkhidam    annam yaḥ brahmaṇām malvaḥ svādu admi iti manyate  /

original: jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalam vāc nāḍīkā dantāḥ tapasā abhidigdhāḥ  / tebhiḥ brahmā vidhyati deva pīyūn hṛd balaiḥ dhanurbhiḥ deva jūtaiḥ  /
analyzed: jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalam vāc nāḍīkā dantāḥ tapasā abhidigdhāḥ   tebhiḥ brahmā vidhyati deva pīyūn hṛd balaiḥ dhanurbhiḥ deva jūtaiḥ  /

original: tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ hetimantaḥ yām asyanti śaravyām na sā mṛṣā  / anuhāya tapasā manyunā ca uta durāt ava bhindanti enam  /
analyzed: tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ hetimantaḥ yām asyanti śaravyām na sā mṛṣā   anuhāya tapasā manyunā ca uta durāt ava bhindanti enam  /

original: ye sahasram arājan āsan daśa śatāḥ uta  / te brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan  //
analyzed: ye sahasram arājan āsan daśa śatāḥ uta    te brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan  /

original: gauḥ eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyām avātirat  / ye kesara prābandhāyāḥ caramājām apeciran  /
analyzed: gauḥ eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyām avātirat   ye kesara prābandhāyāḥ caramājām apeciran  /

original: eka śatam tāḥ janatāḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta  / prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan  /
analyzed: eka śatam tāḥ janatāḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta   prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan  /

original: deva pīyuḥ carati martyeṣu gara gīrṇaḥ bhavati asthi bhūyān  / yaḥ brāhmaṇam deva bandhum hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam api eti lokam  /
analyzed: deva pīyuḥ carati martyeṣu gara gīrṇaḥ bhavati asthi bhūyān   yaḥ brāhmaṇam deva bandhum hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam api eti lokam  /

original: agniḥ vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somaḥ dāyādaḥ ucyate  / hantā abhiśasta indraḥ tathā tat vedhasaḥ viduḥ  /
analyzed: agniḥ vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somaḥ dāyādaḥ ucyate   hantā abhiśasta indraḥ tathā tat vedhasaḥ viduḥ  /

original: iṣuḥ iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūḥ iva gopate  / sā brāhmaṇasya iṣuḥ ghorā tayā vidhyati pīyataḥ  /
analyzed: iṣuḥ iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūḥ iva gopate      sā brāhmaṇasya iṣuḥ ghorā tayā vidhyati pīyataḥ  /

original: atimātram avardhanta na ud iva divam aspṛśan  / bhṛgum hiṃsitvā sṛñjayāḥ vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan  /
analyzed: atimātram avardhanta na ud iva divam aspṛśan   bhṛgum hiṃsitvā sṛñjayāḥ vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan  /

original: ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇam janāḥ  / petvaḥ teṣām ubhaya adam aviḥ tokāni āvayat  //
analyzed: ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇam janāḥ   petvaḥ teṣām ubhaya adam aviḥ tokāni āvayat  /

original: ye brāhmaṇam pratyaṣṭhīvan ye vā asmin śulkam īṣire  / asnaḥ te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādantaḥ āsate  /
analyzed: ye brāhmaṇam pratyaṣṭhīvan ye vā asmin śulkam īṣire   asnaḥ te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādantaḥ āsate  /

original: brahmagavī pacyamānā yāvat sā abhi vijaṅgahe  / tejaḥ rāṣṭrasya niḥ hanti na vīraḥ jāyate vṛṣā  /
analyzed: brahmagavī pacyamānā yāvat sā abhi vijaṅgahe     tejaḥ rāṣṭrasya niḥ hanti na vīraḥ jāyate vṛṣā  /

original: krūram asyāḥ āśasanam tṛṣṭam piśitam asyate  / kṣīram yat asyāḥ pīyate tat vai pitṛṣu kilbiṣam  /
analyzed: krūram asyāḥ āśasanam tṛṣṭam piśitam asyate   kṣīram yat asyāḥ pīyate tat vai pitṛṣu kilbiṣam  /

original: ugraḥ rājā manyamānaḥ brāhmaṇam yaḥ jighatsati  / parā tat sicyate rāṣṭram brāhmaṇaḥ yatra jīyate  /
analyzed: ugraḥ rājā manyamānaḥ brāhmaṇam yaḥ jighatsati   parā tat sicyate rāṣṭram brāhmaṇaḥ yatra jīyate  /

original: aṣṭāpadī catur akṣī catur śrotrā catur hanuḥ  / dvi āsyā dvi jihvā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute brahmajyasya  //
analyzed: aṣṭāpadī catur akṣī catur śrotrā catur hanuḥ   dvi āsyā dvi jihvā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute brahmajyasya  /

original: tat vai rāṣṭram ā sravati nāvam bhinnām iva udakam  / brahmāṇam yatra hiṃsanti tat rāṣṭram hanti duchunā  /
analyzed: tat vai rāṣṭram ā sravati nāvam bhinnām iva udakam   brahmāṇam yatra hiṃsanti tat rāṣṭram hanti duchunā  /

original: tam vṛkṣāḥ apa sedhanti chāyām naḥ mā upa gāḥ iti  / yaḥ brāhmaṇasya sat dhanam abhi nārada manyate  /
analyzed: tam vṛkṣāḥ apa sedhanti chāyām naḥ mā upa gāḥ iti   yaḥ brāhmaṇasya sat dhanam abhi nārada manyate  /

original: viṣam etat deva kṛtam rājā varuṇaḥ abravīt  / na brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā rāstre jāgāra kaḥ cana  /
analyzed: viṣam etat deva kṛtam rājā varuṇaḥ abravīt   na brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā rāstre jāgāra kaḥ cana  /

original: nava eva tāḥ navatayaḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta  / prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan  /
analyzed: nava eva tāḥ navatayaḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta   prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan  /

original: yām mṛtāya anubadhnanti kūdyam pada yopanīm  / tat vai brahmajya te devāḥ upastaraṇam abruvan  /
analyzed: yām mṛtāya anubadhnanti kūdyam pada yopanīm   tat vai brahmajya te devāḥ upastaraṇam abruvan  /

original: aśrūṇi kṛpamānasya yāni jītasya vāvṛtuḥ  / tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan  //
analyzed: aśrūṇi kṛpamānasya yāni jītasya vāvṛtuḥ   tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan  /

original: yena mṛtam snapayanti śmaśrūṇi yena undate  / tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan  //
analyzed: yena mṛtam snapayanti śmaśrūṇi yena undate      tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan  /

original: na varṣam maitrāvaruṇam brahmajyam abhi varṣati  / na asmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitram nayate vaśam  //
analyzed: na varṣam maitrāvaruṇam brahmajyam abhi varṣati    na asmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitram nayate vaśam  /

original: uccais ghoṣaḥ dundubhiḥ satvanāyan vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ usṛiyābhiḥ  / vācam kṣuṇuvānaḥ damayan sapatnān siṃhaḥ iva jeṣyan abhi taṃstanīhi  //
analyzed: uccais ghoṣaḥ dundubhiḥ satvanāyan vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ usṛiyābhiḥ    vācam kṣuṇuvānaḥ damayan sapatnān siṃhaḥ iva jeṣyan abhi taṃstanīhi  /

original: siṃhaḥ iva astānīt druvayaḥ vibaddhaḥ abhikrandan ṛṣabhaḥ vāsitām iva  / vṛṣā tvam vadhrayaḥ te sapatnāḥ aindraḥ te śuṣmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ  /
analyzed: siṃhaḥ iva astānīt druvayaḥ vibaddhaḥ abhikrandan ṛṣabhaḥ vāsitām iva    vṛṣā tvam vadhrayaḥ te sapatnāḥ aindraḥ te śuṣmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ  /

original: vṛṣā iva yūthe sahasā vidānaḥ gavyan abhi ruva saṃdhanājit  / śucā vidhya hṛdayam pareṣām hitvā grāmān pracyutāḥ yantu śatravaḥ  /
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthe sahasā vidānaḥ gavyan abhi ruva saṃdhanājit     śucā vidhya hṛdayam pareṣām hitvā grāmān pracyutāḥ yantu śatravaḥ  /

original: saṃjayan pṛtanāḥ ūrdhvam āyuḥ gṛhyāḥ gṛhṇānaḥ bahudhā vi cakṣva  / daivīm vācam dundubhe ā gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ  /
analyzed: saṃjayan pṛtanāḥ ūrdhvam āyuḥ gṛhyāḥ gṛhṇānaḥ bahudhā vi cakṣva    daivīm vācam dundubhe ā gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ  /

original: dundubheḥ vācam prayatām vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣa buddhā  / nārī putram dhāvatu hasta gṛhya amitrī bhītā samare vadhānām  /
analyzed: dundubheḥ vācam prayatām vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣa buddhā    nārī putram dhāvatu hasta gṛhya amitrī bhītā samare vadhānām  /

original: pūrvaḥ dundubhe pra vadāsi vācam bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada rocamānaḥ  / amitra senām abhijañjabhānaḥ dyumat vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat  /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ dundubhe pra vadāsi vācam bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada rocamānaḥ   amitra senām abhijañjabhānaḥ dyumat vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat  /

original: antarā ime nabhasī ghoṣaḥ astu pṛthak te dhvanayaḥ yantu śībham  / abhi kranda stanaya utpipānaḥ śloka kṛt mitra tūryāya svardhī  /
analyzed: antarā ime nabhasī ghoṣaḥ astu pṛthak te dhvanayaḥ yantu śībham   abhi kranda stanaya utpipānaḥ śloka kṛt mitra tūryāya svardhī  /

original: dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra vadāti vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni  / indramedī satvanaḥ ni hvayasva mitraiḥ amitrām ava jaṅghanīhi  //
analyzed: dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra vadāti vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni   indramedī satvanaḥ ni hvayasva mitraiḥ amitrām ava jaṅghanīhi  /

original: saṃkrandanaḥ pravadaḥ dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ praveda kṛt bahudhā grāma ghoṣī  / śriyaḥ vanvanaḥ vayunāni vidvān kīrtim bahubhyaḥ vi hara dvirāje  /
analyzed: saṃkrandanaḥ pravadaḥ dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ praveda kṛt bahudhā grāma ghoṣī    śriyaḥ vanvanaḥ vayunāni vidvān kīrtim bahubhyaḥ vi hara dvirāje  /

original: śreyaḥ ketaḥ vasu jit sahīyān saṃgrāma jit saṃśitaḥ brahmaṇā asi  / aṃśūn iva grāvā adhiṣavaṇe adriḥ gavyan dundubhe adhi nṛtya vedaḥ  /
analyzed: śreyaḥ ketaḥ vasu jit sahīyān saṃgrāma jit saṃśitaḥ brahmaṇā asi   aṃśūn iva grāvā adhiṣavaṇe adriḥ gavyan dundubhe adhi nṛtya vedaḥ  /

original: śatrūṣāh nīṣāt abhimātiṣāhaḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamānaḥ udbhid  / vāgvī iva mantram pra bharasva vācam sāṃgrāma jityāya iṣam ud vada iha  /
analyzed: śatrūṣāh nīṣāh abhimātiṣāhaḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamānaḥ udbhid    vāgvī iva mantram pra bharasva vācam sāṃgrāma jityāya iṣam ud vada iha  /

original: acyuta cyut samadaḥ gamiṣṭhaḥ mṛdhaḥ jetā puraeta ayodhyaḥ  / indreṇa guptaḥ vidathā nicikyat dhṛddyotanaḥ dviṣatām yāhi śībham  /
analyzed: acyuta cyut samadaḥ gamiṣṭhaḥ mṛdhaḥ jetā puraeta ayodhyaḥ   indreṇa guptaḥ vidathā nicikyat dhṛddyotanaḥ dviṣatām yāhi śībham  /

original: vihṛdayam vaimanasyam vada amitreṣu dundubhe  / vidveṣam kaśmaśam bhayam amitreṣu ni dadhmasi ava enān dundubhe jahi  //
analyzed: vihṛdayam vaimanasyam vada amitreṣu dundubhe    vidveṣam kaśmaśam bhayam amitreṣu ni dadhmasi ava enān dundubhe jahi  /

original: udvepamānāḥ manasā cakṣuṣā hṛdayena ca  / dhāvantu bibhyataḥ amitrāḥ pratrāsena ājye hute  /
analyzed: udvepamānāḥ manasā cakṣuṣā hṛdayena ca    dhāvantu bibhyataḥ amitrāḥ pratrāsena ājye hute  /

original: vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ usriyābhiḥ viśva gotryaḥ  / pratrāsam amitrebhyaḥ vada ājyena abhighāritaḥ  /
analyzed: vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ usriyābhiḥ viśva gotryaḥ   pratrāsam amitrebhyaḥ vada ājyena abhighāritaḥ  /

original: yathā mṛgāḥ saṃvijante āraṇyāḥ puruṣāt adhi  / eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  //
analyzed: yathā mṛgāḥ saṃvijante āraṇyāḥ puruṣāt adhi  / eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  /

original: yathā vṛkāt aja avayaḥ dhāvanti bahu bibhyatīḥ  / eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  //
analyzed: yathā vṛkāt aja avayaḥ dhāvanti bahu bibhyatīḥ   eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  /

original: yathā śyenāt patatriṇaḥ saṃvijante ahardivi siṃhasya stanathoḥ yathā  / eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  //
analyzed: yathā śyenāt patatriṇaḥ saṃvijante ahardivi siṃhasya stanathoḥ yathā  / eva tvam dundubhe amitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya  /

original: parā amitrān dundubhinā hariṇasya ajinena ca  / sarve devāḥ atitrasan ye saṃgrāmasya īṣate  /
analyzed: parā amitrān dundubhinā hariṇasya ajinena ca    sarve devāḥ atitrasan ye saṃgrāmasya īṣate  /

original: yaiḥ indraḥ prakrīḍate pad ghoṣaiḥ chāyayā saha  / taiḥ amitrāḥ trasantu naḥ amī ye yanti anīkaśas  /
analyzed: yaiḥ indraḥ prakrīḍate pad ghoṣaiḥ chāyayā saha   taiḥ amitrāḥ trasantu naḥ amī ye yanti anīkaśas  /

original: jyā ghoṣāḥ dundubhayaḥ abhi krośantu yāḥ diśaḥ  / senāḥ parājitāḥ yatīḥ amitrāṇām anīkaśas  /
analyzed: jyā ghoṣāḥ dundubhayaḥ abhi krośantu yāḥ diśaḥ   senāḥ parājitāḥ yatīḥ amitrāṇām anīkaśas  /

original: āditya cakṣuḥ ā datsva marīcayaḥ anu dhāvata  / patsaṅginīḥ ā sajantu vigate bāhu vīrye  /
analyzed: āditya cakṣuḥ ā datsva marīcayaḥ anu dhāvata   patsaṅginīḥ ā sajantu vigate bāhu vīrye  /

original: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ indreṇa yujā pra mṛnīta śatrūn  / somaḥ rājā varuṇaḥ rājā mahādevaḥ uta mṛtyuḥ indraḥ  /
analyzed: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ indreṇa yujā pra mṛnīta śatrūn   somaḥ rājā varuṇaḥ rājā mahādevaḥ uta mṛtyuḥ indraḥ  /

original: etāḥ deva senāḥ sūrya ketavaḥ sacetasaḥ  / amitrān naḥ jayantu svāhā  /
analyzed: etāḥ deva senāḥ sūrya ketavaḥ sacetasaḥ   amitrān naḥ jayantu svāhā

original: agniḥ takmānam apa bādhatām itas somaḥ grāvā varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ  / vediḥ barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānāḥ apa dveṣāṃsi amuyā bhavantu  /
analyzed: agniḥ takmānam apa bādhatām itas somaḥ grāvā varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ   vediḥ barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānāḥ apa dveṣāṃsi amuyā bhavantu  /

original: ayam yaḥ viśvān haritān kṛṇoṣi ucchocayan agniḥ iva abhidunvan  / adhā hi takman arasaḥ hi bhūyāḥ adhā nyaṅ adharān vā parehi  /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ viśvān haritān kṛṇoṣi ucchocayan agniḥ iva abhidunvan    adhā hi takman arasaḥ hi bhūyāḥ adhā nyaṅ adharān vā parehi  /

original: yaḥ paruṣaḥ pāruṣeyaḥ avadhvaṃsaḥ iva aruṇaḥ  / takmānam viśvadhā vīrya adharāñcam parā suva  /
analyzed: yaḥ paruṣaḥ pāruṣeyaḥ avadhvaṃsaḥ iva aruṇaḥ    takmānam viśvadhā vīrya adharāñcam parā suva  /

original: adharāñcam pra hiṇomi namaḥ kṛtvā takmane  / śakambharasya muṣṭi hā punar etu mahā vṛṣān  /
analyzed: adharāñcam pra hiṇomi namaḥ kṛtvā takmane   śakambharasya muṣṭi hā punar etu mahā vṛṣān  /

original: okaḥ asya mūjavantaḥ okaḥ asya mahā vṛṣāḥ  / yāvat jātaḥ takman tāvān asi balhikeṣu nyocaraḥ  /
analyzed: okaḥ asya mūjavantaḥ okaḥ asya mahā vṛṣāḥ   yāvat jātaḥ takman tāvān asi balhikeṣu nyocaraḥ  /

original: takman vyāla vi gada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya  / dāsīm niṣṭakvarīm icha tām vajreṇa sam arpaya  //
analyzed: takman vyāla vi gada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya   dāsīm niṣṭakvarīm icha tām vajreṇa sam arpaya  /

original: takman mūjavataḥ gaccha balhikān vā parastarām  / śūdrām icha prapharvyam tām takman vi iva dhūnuhi  //
analyzed: takman mūjavataḥ gaccha balhikān vā parastarām   / śūdrām icha prapharvyam tām takman vi iva dhūnuhi  /

original: mahāvṛṣāt mūjavataḥ bandhu addhi paretya  / pra etāni takmane brūmaḥ anya kṣetrāṇi vai imā  /
analyzed: mahāvṛṣāt mūjavataḥ bandhu addhi paretya   pra etāni takmane brūmaḥ anya kṣetrāṇi vai imā  /

original: anya kṣetre na ramase vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ  / abhūt u prārthaḥ takmā sa gamiṣyati balhikān  /
analyzed: anya kṣetre na ramase vaśī san mṛḍayāsi naḥ   abhūt u prārthaḥ takmā sa gamiṣyati balhikān  /

original: yat tvam śītaḥ atho rūraḥ saha kāsāvepayaḥ  / bhīmāḥ te takman hetayaḥ tābhiḥ sma pari vṛṅgdhi naḥ  /
analyzed: yat tvam śītaḥ atho rūraḥ saha kāsā avepayaḥ    bhīmāḥ te takman hetayaḥ tābhiḥ sma pari vṛṅgdhi naḥ  /

original: mā sma etān sakhīn kuruthāḥ balāsam kāsam udyugam  / mā sma atas arvāṅ aiḥ punar tat tvā takman upa bruve  /
analyzed: mā sma etān sakhīn kuruthāḥ balāsam kāsam udyugam   mā sma atas arvāṅ aiḥ punar tat tvā takman upa bruve  /

original: takman bhrātrā balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha  / pāpmā bhrātṛvyeṇa saha gaccha amum araṇam janam  /
analyzed: takman bhrātrā balāsena svasrā kāsikayā saha   pāpmā bhrātṛvyeṇa saha gaccha amum araṇam janam  /

original: tṛtīyakam vitṛtīyam sadandim uta śāradam  / takmānam śītam rūram graiṣmam nāśaya vārṣikam  /
analyzed: tṛtīyakam vitṛtīyam sadandim uta śāradam    takmānam śītam rūram graiṣmam nāśaya vārṣikam  /

original: gandhāribhyaḥ mūjavadbhyaḥ aṅgebhyaḥ magadhebhyaḥ  / praiṣyan janam iva śevadhim takmānam pari dadmasi  //
analyzed: gandhāribhyaḥ mūjavadbhyaḥ aṅgebhyaḥ magadhebhyaḥ   praiṣyan janam iva śevadhim takmānam pari dadmasi  /

original: ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī  / otau me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca krimim jambhayatām iti  /
analyzed: ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī    otau me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca krimim jambhayatām iti  /

original: asya indra kumārasya krimīn dhanapate jahi  / hatāḥ viśvāḥ arātayaḥ ugreṇa vacasā mama  /
analyzed: asya indra kumārasya krimīn dhanapate jahi    hatāḥ viśvāḥ arātayaḥ ugreṇa vacasā mama  /

original: yaḥ akṣyau parisarpati yaḥ nāse parisarpati  / datām yaḥ madhyam gacchati tam krimim jambhayāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ akṣyau parisarpati yaḥ nāse parisarpati    datām yaḥ madhyam gacchati tam krimim jambhayāmasi  /

original: sarūpau dvau virūpau dvau kṛṣṇau dvau rohitau dvau  / babhruḥ ca babhrukarṇaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ kokaḥ ca te hatāḥ  /
analyzed: sarūpau dvau virūpau dvau kṛṣṇau dvau rohitau dvau    babhruḥ ca babhrukarṇaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ kokaḥ ca te hatāḥ  /

original: ye krimayaḥ śiti kakṣāḥ ye kṛṣṇāḥ śiti bāhavaḥ  / ye ke ca viśva rūpāḥ tān krimīn jambhayāmasi  //
analyzed: ye krimayaḥ śiti kakṣāḥ ye kṛṣṇāḥ śiti bāhavaḥ   ye ke ca viśva rūpāḥ tān krimīn jambhayāmasi  /

original: ud purastāt sūryaḥ eti viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā  / dṛṣṭān ca ghnan adṛṣṭān ca sarvān ca pramṛṇan krimīn  /
analyzed: ud purastāt sūryaḥ eti viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā   dṛṣṭān ca ghnan adṛṣṭān ca sarvān ca pramṛṇan krimīn  /

original: yeva āṣāsaḥ kaṣkaṣāsaḥ ejatkāḥ śipavitnukāḥ  / dṛṣṭaḥ ca hanyatām krimiḥ uta adṛṣṭaḥ ca hanyatām  /
analyzed: yeva āṣāsaḥ kaṣkaṣāsaḥ ejatkāḥ śipavitnukāḥ    dṛṣṭaḥ ca hanyatām krimiḥ uta adṛṣṭaḥ ca hanyatām  /

original: hataḥ yevāṣaḥ krimīṇām hataḥ nadanimā uta  / sarvān ni maṣmaṣākaram dṛṣadā khalvān iva  /
analyzed: hataḥ yevāṣaḥ krimīṇām hataḥ nadanimā uta  / sarvān ni maṣmaṣākaram dṛṣadā khalvān iva  /

original: tri śīrṣāṇam trikakudam krimim sāraṅgam arjunam  / śṛṇāmi asya pṛṣṭīḥ api vṛścāmi yat śiraḥ  /
analyzed: tri śīrṣāṇam trikakudam krimim sāraṅgam arjunam    śṛṇāmi asya pṛṣṭīḥ api vṛścāmi yat śiraḥ  /

original: atri vat vaḥ krimayaḥ hanmi kaṇva vat jamadagni vat  / agastyasya brahmaṇā sam pinaṣmi aham krimīn  /
analyzed: atri vat vaḥ krimayaḥ hanmi kaṇva vat jamadagni vat    agastyasya brahmaṇā sam pinaṣmi aham krimīn  /

original: hataḥ rājā krimīṇām uta eṣām sthapatiḥ hataḥ  / hataḥ hata mātā krimiḥ hata bhrātā hata svasā  /
analyzed: hataḥ rājā krimīṇām uta eṣām sthapatiḥ hataḥ   hataḥ hata mātā krimiḥ hata bhrātā hata svasā  /

original: hatāsaḥ asya veśasaḥ hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ  / atho ye kṣullakāḥ iva sarve te krimayaḥ hatāḥ  /
analyzed: hatāsaḥ asya veśasaḥ hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ   atho ye kṣullakāḥ iva sarve te krimayaḥ hatāḥ  /

original: sarveṣām ca krimīṇām sarvāsām ca krimīnām  / bhinadmi aśmanā śiraḥ dahāmi agninā mukham  //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca krimīṇām sarvāsām ca krimīnām    bhinadmi aśmanā śiraḥ dahāmi agninā mukham

original: savitā prasavānām adhipatiḥ sa mā avatu  / asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām  / cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā  /
analyzed: savitā prasavānām adhipatiḥ sa mā avatu   asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām   cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā  /

original: agniḥ vanaspatīnām adhipatiḥ sa mā avatu  / asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām  / cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā  /

analyzed: bhūmiḥ tvā pātu haritena viśva bhṛt agniḥ pipartu ayasā sajoṣāḥ   vīrudbhiḥ te arjunam saṃvidānam dakṣam dadhātu sumanasyamānam  /

original: tredhā jātam janmanā idam hiraṇyam agneḥ ekam priyatamam babhūva somasya ekam hiṃsitasya parāpatat  / apām ekam vedhasām retaḥ āhuḥ tat te hiraṇyam trivṛt astu āyuṣe  /
analyzed: tredhā jātam janmanā idam hiraṇyam agneḥ ekam priyatamam babhūva somasya ekam hiṃsitasya parāpatat   apām ekam vedhasām retaḥ āhuḥ tat te hiraṇyam trivṛt astu āyuṣe  /

original: tri āyuṣam jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tri āyuṣam  / tredhā amṛtasya cakṣaṇam trīṇi āyūṃṣi te akaram  /
analyzed: tri āyuṣam jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tri āyuṣam    tredhā amṛtasya cakṣaṇam trīṇi āyūṃṣi te akaram  /

original: trayaḥ suparṇāḥ trivṛtā yat āyan eka akṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ  / prati auhat mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānāḥ duritāni viśvā  /
analyzed: trayaḥ suparṇāḥ trivṛtā yat āyan eka akṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ   prati auhat mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānāḥ duritāni viśvā  /

original: divaḥ tvā pātu haritam madhyāt tvā pātu arjunam  / bhūmyāḥ ayasmayam pātu prāgāt deva purāḥ ayam  /
analyzed: divaḥ tvā pātu haritam madhyāt tvā pātu arjunam   bhūmyāḥ ayasmayam pātu prāgāt deva purāḥ ayam  /

original: imāḥ tisraḥ deva purāḥ tāḥ tvā rakṣantu sarvatas  / tāḥ tvam bibhrat varcasvī uttaraḥ dviṣatām bhava  /
analyzed: imāḥ tisraḥ deva purāḥ tāḥ tvā rakṣantu sarvatas   tāḥ tvam bibhrat varcasvī uttaraḥ dviṣatām bhava  /

original: puram devānām amṛtam hiraṇyam yaḥ ābedhe prathamaḥ devaḥ agre  / tasmai namaḥ daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomi anu manyatām trivṛt ābadhe me  /
analyzed: puram devānām amṛtam hiraṇyam yaḥ ābedhe prathamaḥ devaḥ agre   tasmai namaḥ daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomi anu manyatām trivṛt ābadhe me  /

original: ā tvā cṛtatu aryamā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ  / ahar jātasya yat nāma tena tvā ati cṛtāmasi  //
analyzed: ā tvā cṛtatu aryamā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ   ahar jātasya yat nāma tena tvā ati cṛtāmasi  /

original: ṛtubhiḥ tvā ārtavaiḥ āyuṣe varcase tvā  / saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena saṃhanu kṛṇmasi  //
analyzed: ṛtubhiḥ tvā ārtavaiḥ āyuṣe varcase tvā    saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena saṃhanu kṛṇmasi  /

original: ghṛtāt ulluptam madhunā samaktam bhūmi dṛṃham acyutam pārayiṣṇu  / bhindat sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvat ā mā roha mahate saubhagāya  //
analyzed: ghṛtāt ulluptam madhunā samaktam bhūmi dṛṃham acyutam pārayiṣṇu   bhindat sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvat ā mā roha mahate saubhagāya  /

original: purastāt yuktaḥ vaha jātavedaḥ agne viddhi kriyamāṇam yathā idam  / tvam bhiṣaj bheṣajasya asi kartā tvayā gām aśvam puruṣam sanema  /
analyzed: purastāt yuktaḥ vaha jātavedaḥ agne viddhi kriyamāṇam yathā idam    tvam bhiṣaj bheṣajasya asi kartā tvayā gām aśvam puruṣam sanema  /

original: tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ  / yaḥ naḥ dideva yatamaḥ jaghāsa yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti  //
analyzed: tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ   yaḥ naḥ dideva yatamaḥ jaghāsa yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti  /

original: yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ  / viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ    viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ  /

original: akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayam ni vidhya jihvām ni tṛnddhi pra dataḥ mṛṇīhi  / piśācaḥ asya yatamaḥ jaghāsa agne yaviṣṭha prati śṛṇīhi  //
analyzed: akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayam ni vidhya jihvām ni tṛnddhi pra dataḥ mṛṇīhi   piśācaḥ asya yatamaḥ jaghāsa agne yaviṣṭha prati śṛṇīhi  /

original: yat asya hṛtam vihṛtam yat parābhṛtam ātmanaḥ jagdham yatamat piśācaiḥ  / tat agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvam śarīre māṃsam asum erayāmaḥ  //
analyzed: yat asya hṛtam vihṛtam yat parābhṛtam ātmanaḥ jagdham yatamat piśācaiḥ   tat agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvam śarīre māṃsam asum erayāmaḥ  /

original: āme su pakve śabale vipakve yaḥ mā piśācaḥ aśane dadambha  / tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /
analyzed: āme su pakve śabale vipakve yaḥ mā piśācaḥ aśane dadambha   tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /

original: kṣire mā manthe yatamaḥ dadambha ākṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ  / tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /
analyzed: kṣire mā manthe yatamaḥ dadambha ākṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ    tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /

original: apām mā pāne yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam  / tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /
analyzed: apām mā pāne yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam    tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /

original: divā mā naktam yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam  / tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  //
analyzed: divā mā naktam yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam    tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ ayam astu  /

original: kravya adam agne rudhiram piśācam manohanam jahi jātavedaḥ  / tam indraḥ vājī vajreṇa hantu chinattu somaḥ śiraḥ asya dhṛṣṇuḥ  /
analyzed: kravya adam agne rudhiram piśācam manohanam jahi jātavedaḥ   tam indraḥ vājī vajreṇa hantu chinattu somaḥ śiraḥ asya dhṛṣṇuḥ  /

original: sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ  / sahamūrān anu daha kravya adaḥ mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ  //
analyzed: sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ   sahamūrān anu daha kravya adaḥ mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ  /

original: samāhara jātavedaḥ yat dhṛtam yat parābhṛtam  / gātrāṇi asya vardhantām aṃśuḥ iva ā pyāyatām ayam  /
analyzed: samāhara jātavedaḥ yat dhṛtam yat parābhṛtam   gātrāṇi asya vardhantām aṃśuḥ iva ā pyāyatām ayam  /

original: somasya iva jātavedaḥ aṃśuḥ ā pyāyatām ayam  / agne virapśinam medhyam a yakṣmam kṛṇu jīvatu  //
analyzed: somasya iva jātavedaḥ aṃśuḥ ā pyāyatām ayam   agne virapśinam medhyam a yakṣmam kṛṇu jīvatu  /

original: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ piśāca jambhanīḥ  / tāḥ tvam juṣasva prati ca enāḥ gṛhāṇa jātavedaḥ  /
analyzed: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ piśāca jambhanīḥ   tāḥ tvam juṣasva prati ca enāḥ gṛhāṇa jātavedaḥ  /

original: tārṣṭā aghīḥ agne samidhaḥ prati gṛhṇāhi arciṣā  / jahātu kravyād rūpam yaḥ asya māṃsam jihīrṣati  //
analyzed: tārṣṭā aghīḥ agne samidhaḥ prati gṛhṇāhi arciṣā   jahātu kravyād rūpam yaḥ asya māṃsam jihīrṣati  /

original: āvataḥ te āvataḥ parāvataḥ te āvataḥ  / iha eva bhava mā nu gāḥ mā pūrvān anu gāḥ pitṝn asum badhnāmi te dṛḍham  //
analyzed: āvataḥ te āvataḥ parāvataḥ te āvataḥ      / iha eva bhava mā nu gāḥ mā pūrvān anu gāḥ pitṝn asum badhnāmi te dṛḍham  /

original: yat tvā abhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ svaḥ yat araṇaḥ janaḥ  / unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /
analyzed: yat tvā abhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ svaḥ yat araṇaḥ janaḥ   unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /

original: yat dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā  / unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /
analyzed: yat dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā   / unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /

original: yat enasaḥ mātṛ kṛtāt śeṣe pitṛ kṛtāt ca yat  / unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /
analyzed: yat enasaḥ mātṛ kṛtāt śeṣe pitṛ kṛtāt ca yat  / unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te  /

original: yat te mātā yat te pitā jamiḥ bhrātā ca sarjataḥ  / pratyak sevasva bheṣajam jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā  /
analyzed: yat te mātā yat te pitā jamiḥ bhrātā ca sarjataḥ    pratyak sevasva bheṣajam jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā  /

original: iha edhi puruṣa sarveṇa manasā saha  / dūtau yamasya mānu gāḥ adhi jīva purā ihi  //
analyzed: iha edhi puruṣa sarveṇa manasā saha    dūtau yamasya mā anu gāḥ adhi jīva purā ihi  /

original: anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanam pathaḥ  / ārohaṇam ākramaṇam jīvataḥ jīvataḥ ayanam  //
analyzed: anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanam pathaḥ   ārohaṇam ākramaṇam jīvataḥ jīvataḥ ayanam  /

original: mā bibheḥ na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā  / niḥ avocam aham yakṣmam aṅgebhyaḥ aṅga jvaram tava  /
analyzed: mā bibheḥ na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā   niḥ avocam aham yakṣmam aṅgebhyaḥ aṅga jvaram tava  /

original: aṅga bhedaḥ aṅga jvaraḥ yaḥ ca te hṛdaya āmayaḥ  / yakṣmaḥ śyenaḥ iva prāpaptat vacā sāḍhaḥ parastarām  /
analyzed: aṅga bhedaḥ aṅga jvaraḥ yaḥ ca te hṛdaya āmayaḥ   yakṣmaḥ śyenaḥ iva prāpaptat vacā sāḍhaḥ parastarām  /

original: ṛṣī bodha pratībodhau asvapnaḥ yaḥ ca jāgṛviḥ  / tau te prāṇasya goptārau divā naktam ca jāgṛtām  /
analyzed: ṛṣī bodha pratībodhau asvapnaḥ yaḥ ca jāgṛviḥ   tau te prāṇasya goptārau divā naktam ca jāgṛtām  /

original: ayam agniḥ upasadyaḥ iha sūryaḥ ud etu te  / udehi mṛtyoḥ gambhīrāt kṛṣṇāt cit tamasaḥ pari  /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ upasadyaḥ iha sūryaḥ ud etu te    udehi mṛtyoḥ gambhīrāt kṛṣṇāt cit tamasaḥ pari  /

original: namaḥ yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ uta ye nayanti  / utpāraṇasya yaḥ veda tam agnim puras dadhe asmai ariṣṭatātaye  /
analyzed: namaḥ yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ uta ye nayanti   utpāraṇasya yaḥ veda tam agnim puras dadhe asmai ariṣṭatātaye  /

original: aitu prāṇaḥ aitu manaḥ aitu cakṣuḥ atho balam  / śarīram asya sam vidām tat padbhyām prati tiṣṭhatu  //
analyzed: aitu prāṇaḥ aitu manaḥ aitu cakṣuḥ atho balam   śarīram asya sam vidām tat padbhyām prati tiṣṭhatu

original: prāṇena agne cakṣuṣā sam sṛja imam sam īraya tanvā sam balena  / vettha amṛtasya mā nu gāt mā nu bhūmi gṛhaḥ bhuvat  /
analyzed: prāṇena agne cakṣuṣā sam sṛja imam sam īraya tanvā sam balena   vettha amṛtasya mā nu gāt mā nu bhūmi gṛhaḥ bhuvat  /

original: mā te prāṇaḥ upa dasat mā u apānaḥ api dhāyi te  / sūryaḥ tvā adhipatiḥ mṛtyoḥ udāyacchatu raśmibhiḥ  /
analyzed: mā te prāṇaḥ upa dasat mā u apānaḥ api dhāyi te   sūryaḥ tvā adhipatiḥ mṛtyoḥ udāyacchatu raśmibhiḥ  /

original: iyam antar vadati jihvā baddhā paniṣpadā  / tvayā yakṣmam niḥ avocam śatam ropīḥ ca takmanaḥ  /
analyzed: iyam antar vadati jihvā baddhā paniṣpadā    tvayā yakṣmam niḥ avocam śatam ropīḥ ca takmanaḥ  /

original: ayam lokaḥ priyatamaḥ devānām aparājitaḥ  / yasmai tvam iha mṛtyave diṣṭaḥ puruṣa jajñiṣe  / sa ca tvā anu hvayāmasi mā purā jarasaḥ mṛthāḥ  //
analyzed: ayam lokaḥ priyatamaḥ devānām aparājitaḥ   yasmai tvam iha mṛtyave diṣṭaḥ puruṣa jajñiṣe   sa ca tvā anu hvayāmasi mā purā jarasaḥ mṛthāḥ  /

original: yām te cakruḥ āme pātre yām cakruḥ miśra dhānye  / āme māṃse kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ āme pātre yām cakruḥ miśra dhānye   āme māṃse kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ kṛkavākau aje vā yām kurīriṇi  / avyām te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ kṛkavākau aje vā yām kurīriṇi   avyām te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ ekaśaphe paśūnām ubhayādati  / gardabhe kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ ekaśaphe paśūnām ubhayādati  / gardabhe kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ amūlāyām valagam vā narācyām  / kṣetre te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ amūlāyām valagam vā narācyām   kṣetre te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ gārhapatye pūrvāgnau uta duścitaḥ  / śālāyām kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ gārhapatye pūrvāgnau uta duścitaḥ    śālāyām kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ sabhāyām yām cakruḥ adhidevane  / akṣeṣu kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ sabhāyām yām cakruḥ adhidevane   akṣeṣu kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ senāyām yām cakruḥ iṣvāyudhe  / dundubhau kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ senāyām yām cakruḥ iṣvāyudhe    dundubhau kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te kṛtyām kūpe avadadhuḥ śmaśāne vā nicakhnuḥ  / sadmani kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te kṛtyām kūpe avadadhuḥ śmaśāne vā nicakhnuḥ   sadmani kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: yām te cakruḥ puruṣa āsthe agnau saṃkasuke ca yām  / mrokam nirdāham kravya adam punar prati harāmi tām  /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ puruṣa āsthe agnau saṃkasuke ca yām    mrokam nirdāham kravya adam punar prati harāmi tām  /

original: apathena ā jabhāra enām tām pathā itas pra hiṇmasi  / adhīraḥ maryā adhīrebhyaḥ sam jabhāra acittyā  /
analyzed: apathena ā jabhāra enām tām pathā itas pra hiṇmasi   adhīraḥ maryā adhīrebhyaḥ sam jabhāra acittyā  /

original: yaḥ cakāra na śaśāka kartum śaśre pādam aṅgurim  / cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhagaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ  //
analyzed: yaḥ cakāra na śaśāka kartum śaśre pādam aṅgurim    cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhagaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ  /

original: kṛtyā kṛtam valaginam mūlinam śapatheyyam  / indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena agniḥ vidhyatu astayā  /
analyzed: kṛtyā kṛtam valaginam mūlinam śapatheyyam   indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena agniḥ vidhyatu astayā  /

original: doṣaḥ gāya bṛhat gāya dyumat dhehi  / ātharvaṇaḥ stuhi devam savitāram  /
analyzed: doṣaḥ gāya bṛhat gāya dyumat dhehi   ātharvaṇaḥ stuhi devam savitāram  /

original: tam u stuhi yaḥ antar sindhau sūnuḥ  / satyasya yuvānam adrogha vācam su śevam  /
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ antar sindhau sūnuḥ   satyasya yuvānam adrogha vācam su śevam  /

original: sa ghā naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat amṛtāni bhūri  / ubhe suṣṭutī sugātave  /
analyzed: sa ghā naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat amṛtāni bhūri    ubhe suṣṭutī sugātave  /

original: indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunota ca dhāvata  / stotuḥ yaḥ vacaḥ śṛṇavat dhavam ca me  /
analyzed: indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunota ca dhāvata   stotuḥ yaḥ vacaḥ śṛṇavat dhavam ca me  /

original: ā yam viśanti indavaḥ vayaḥ na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ  / virapśin vi mṛdhaḥ jahi rakṣasvinīḥ  /
analyzed: ā yam viśanti indavaḥ vayaḥ na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ   virapśin vi mṛdhaḥ jahi rakṣasvinīḥ  /

original: sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe  / yuvā jeta īśānaḥ sa puruṣṭutaḥ  /
analyzed: sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe   yuvā jete īśānaḥ sa puruṣṭutaḥ  /

original: pātam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ  / apām napāt sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta dyauḥ  /
analyzed: pātam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ   apām napāt sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta dyauḥ  /

original: pātām naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somaḥ naḥ aṃhasaḥ  / pātu naḥ devī subhagā sarasvatī pātu agniḥ śivā ye asya pāyavaḥ  /
analyzed: pātām naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somaḥ naḥ aṃhasaḥ   pātu naḥ devī subhagā sarasvatī pātu agniḥ śivā ye asya pāyavaḥ  /

original: pātām naḥ deva aśvinā śubhaḥ patī uṣāsānakta uta naḥ uruṣyatām  / apām napāt abhihrutī gayasya cit deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye  /
analyzed: pātām naḥ deva aśvinā śubhaḥ patī uṣāsānakta uta naḥ uruṣyatām    apām napāt abhihrutī gayasya cit deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye  /

original: tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ parjanyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ  / putraiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ aditiḥ nu pātu naḥ duṣṭaram trāyamāṇam sahaḥ  //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ parjanyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ   putraiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ aditiḥ nu pātu naḥ duṣṭaram trāyamāṇam sahaḥ  /

original: aṃśaḥ bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ  / apa tasya dveṣaḥ gamet abhihrutaḥ yāvayat śatrum antitam  /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ    apa tasya dveṣaḥ gamet abhihrutaḥ yāvayat śatrum antitam  /

original: dhiye sam aśvinā prāvatam naḥ uruṣyāḥ naḥ urujman aprayuchan  / dyauḥ pitar yāvaya duchunā yā  /
analyzed: dhiye sam aśvinā prāvatam naḥ uruṣyāḥ naḥ urujman aprayuchan    dyauḥ pitar yāvaya duchunā yā  /

original: ud enam uttaram naya agne ghṛtena āhuta  / sam enam varcasā sṛja prajayā ca bahum kṛdhi  //
analyzed: ud enam uttaram naya agne ghṛtena āhuta   sam enam varcasā sṛja prajayā ca bahum kṛdhi  /

original: indra imam prataram kṛdhi sajātānām asat vaśī  / rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja jīvātave jarase naya  //
analyzed: indra imam prataram kṛdhi sajātānām asat vaśī    rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja jīvātave jarase naya  /

original: yasya kṛṇmaḥ haviḥ gṛhe tam agne vardhaya tvam  / tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇas patiḥ  /
analyzed: yasya kṛṇmaḥ haviḥ gṛhe tam agne vardhaya tvam   tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇas patiḥ  /

original: yaḥ asmān brahmaṇas pate a devaḥ abhimanyate  / sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate  /
analyzed: yaḥ asmān brahmaṇas pate a devaḥ abhimanyate    sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate  /

original: yaḥ naḥ soma su śaṃsinaḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ ādideśati  / vajreṇa asya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati  //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ soma su śaṃsinaḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ ādideśati   vajreṇa asya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati  /

original: yaḥ naḥ soma abhidāsati sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ  / apa tasya balam tira mahī iva dyauḥ vadhatmanā  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ soma abhidāsati sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ    apa tasya balam tira mahī iva dyauḥ vadhatmanā  /

original: yena soma aditiḥ pathā mitrāḥ vā yanti adruhaḥ  / tena naḥ avasā gahi  //
analyzed: yena soma aditiḥ pathā mitrāḥ vā yanti adruhaḥ   tena naḥ avasā gahi  /

original: yena soma sāhantyā asurān randhayāsi naḥ  / tena naḥ adhi vocata  /
analyzed: yena soma sāhantyā asurān randhayāsi naḥ   tena naḥ adhi vocata  /

original: yena devāḥ asurāṇām ojāṃsi avṛṇīdhvam  / tena naḥ śarma yacchata  /
analyzed: yena devāḥ asurāṇām ojāṃsi avṛṇīdhvam   tena naḥ śarma yacchata  /

original: yathā vṛkṣam libujā samantam pariṣasvaje  / eva pari svajasva mām yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā vṛkṣam libujā samantam pariṣasvaje    eva pari svajasva mām yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /

original: yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām  / eva ni hanmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām    eva ni hanmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /

original: yathā ime dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas paryeti sūryaḥ  / eva pari emi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā ime dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas paryeti sūryaḥ    eva pari emi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagāḥ asaḥ  /

original: vāñcha me tanvam pādau vāñcha akṣyau vāñcha sakthyau  / akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśāḥ mām te kāmena śuṣyantu  //
analyzed: vāñcha me tanvam pādau vāñcha akṣyau vāñcha sakthyau   akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśāḥ mām te kāmena śuṣyantu  /

original: mama tvā doṣaṇi śriṣam kṛṇomi hṛdaya śriṣam  / yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  //
analyzed: mama tvā doṣaṇi śriṣam kṛṇomi hṛdaya śriṣam    yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  /

original: yāsām nābhiḥ ārehaṇam hṛdi saṃvananam kṛtam gāvaḥ ghṛtasya mātaraḥ amūm sam vānayantu me //
analyzed: yāsām nābhiḥ ārehaṇam hṛdi saṃvananam kṛtam gāvaḥ ghṛtasya mātaraḥ amūm sam vānayantu me

original: pṛthivyai śrotrāya vanaspatibhyaḥ agnaye adhipataye svāhā  /
analyzed: pṛthivyai śrotrāya vanaspatibhyaḥ agnaye adhipataye svāhā

original: prāṇāya antarikṣāya vayobhyaḥ vāyave adhipataye svāhā //
analyzed: prāṇāya antarikṣāya vayobhyaḥ vāyave adhipataye svāhā

original: dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāya adhipataye svāhā  /
analyzed: dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāya adhipataye svāhā

original: śamīm aśvatthe ārūḍhaḥ tatra puṃsuvanam kṛtam  / tat vai putrasya vedanam tat strīṣu ā bharāmasi  //
analyzed: śamīm aśvatthe ārūḍhaḥ tatra puṃsuvanam kṛtam   tat vai putrasya vedanam tat strīṣu ā bharāmasi  /

original: puṃsi vai retaḥ bhavati tat striyām anu sicyate  / tat vai putrasya vedanam tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt  //
analyzed: puṃsi vai retaḥ bhavati tat striyām anu sicyate   tat vai putrasya vedanam tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt

original: prajāpatiḥ anumatiḥ sinīvālī acīkḷpat  / straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha  /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ anumatiḥ sinīvālī acīkḷpat   straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha  /

original: pari dyām iva sūryaḥ ahīnām janima agamam  / rātrī jagat iva anyat dhaṃsāt tena te vāraye viṣam  /
analyzed: pari dyām iva sūryaḥ ahīnām janima agamam   rātrī jagat iva anyat dhaṃsāt tena te vāraye viṣam  /

original: yat brahmabhiḥ yat ṛṣibhiḥ yat devaiḥ viditam purā  / yat bhūtam bhavyam āsanvat tena te vāraye viṣam  /
analyzed: yat brahmabhiḥ yat ṛṣibhiḥ yat devaiḥ viditam purā   yat bhūtam bhavyam āsanvat tena te vāraye viṣam  /

original: madhvā pṛñce nadyaḥ parvatāḥ girayaḥ madhu  / madhu paruṣṇī śīpālā śam āsne astu śam hṛde  /
analyzed: madhvā pṛñce nadyaḥ parvatāḥ girayaḥ madhu    madhu paruṣṇī śīpālā śam āsne astu śam hṛde  /

original: namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ namaḥ rāja vadhebhyaḥ  / atho ye viśyānām vadhāḥ tebhyaḥ mṛtyo namaḥ astu te  /
analyzed: namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ namaḥ rāja vadhebhyaḥ   atho ye viśyānām vadhāḥ tebhyaḥ mṛtyo namaḥ astu te  /

original: namaḥ te adhivākāya parāvākāya te namaḥ  / sumatyai mṛtyo te namaḥ durmatyai te idam namaḥ  //
analyzed: namaḥ te adhivākāya parāvākāya te namaḥ    sumatyai mṛtyo te namaḥ durmatyai te idam namaḥ  /

original: namaḥ te yātudhānebhyaḥ namaḥ te bheṣajebhyaḥ  / namaḥ te mṛtyo mūlebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ idam namaḥ  /
analyzed: namaḥ te yātudhānebhyaḥ namaḥ te bheṣajebhyaḥ   namaḥ te mṛtyo mūlebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ idam namaḥ  /

original: asthi sraṃsam paru sraṃsam āsthitam hṛdaya āmayam  / balāsam sarvam nāśaya aṅgeṣṭhāḥ yaḥ ca parvasu  //
analyzed: asthi sraṃsam paru sraṃsam āsthitam hṛdaya āmayam   balāsam sarvam nāśaya aṅgeṣṭhāḥ yaḥ ca parvasu  /

original: niḥ balāsam balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi muṣkaram yathā  / chinadmi asya bandhanam mūlam urvārvā iva  /
analyzed: niḥ balāsam balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi muṣkaram yathā    chinadmi asya bandhanam mūlam urvārvā iva  /

original: niḥ balāsā itas pra pata aśuṅgaḥ śiśukaḥ yathā  / atha u itas iva hāyanaḥ apa drāhi avīra hā  /
analyzed: niḥ balāsā itas pra pata aśuṅgaḥ śiśukaḥ yathā    atha u itas iva hāyanaḥ apa drāhi avīra hā  /

original: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ  / upastiḥ astu saḥ asmākam yaḥ asmām abhidāsati  //
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ   upastiḥ astu saḥ asmākam yaḥ asmām abhidāsati  /

original: sabandhuḥ ca asabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati  / teṣām sā vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /
analyzed: sabandhuḥ ca asabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati   teṣām sā vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /

original: yathā somaḥ oṣadhīnām uttamaḥ haviṣām kṛtaḥ  / talāśāḥ vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā somaḥ oṣadhīnām uttamaḥ haviṣām kṛtaḥ   talāśāḥ vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ  /

original: ābayaḥ anābayaḥ rasaḥ te ugraḥ ābayo  / ā te karambham admasi  / ā te karambham admasi  /
analyzed: ābayo anābayaḥ rasaḥ te ugraḥ ābayo    ā te karambham admasi    ā te karambham admasi

original: vihahlaḥ nāma te pitā madāvatī nāma te mātā  / sa hina tvam asi yaḥ tvam ātmānam āvayaḥ  //
analyzed: vihahlaḥ nāma te pitā madāvatī nāma te mātā    sa hina tvam asi yaḥ tvam ātmānam āvayaḥ

original: tauvilike avelaya ava ayam ailaba ailayīt  / babhruḥ ca babhrukarṇaḥ ca apehi niḥ āla  /
analyzed: tauvilike avelaya ava ayam ailaba ailayīt    babhruḥ ca babhrukarṇaḥ ca apehi niḥ āla  /

original: alasāla asi pūrva silāñjāla asi uttarā / nīlāgalasāla //
analyzed: alasāla asi pūrva silāñjāla asi uttarā nīlāgalasāla

original: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī bhūtānām garbham ādadhe  / eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī bhūtānām garbham ādadhe   eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /

original: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn  / eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn    eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /

original: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra parvatān girīn  / eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra parvatān girīn    eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /

original: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra viṣṭhitam jagat / eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra viṣṭhitam jagat eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave  /

original: īrṣyāyāḥ dhrājim prathamām prathamasyāḥ uta aparām  / agnim hṛdayyam śokam tam te niḥ vāpayāmasi  //
analyzed: īrṣyāyāḥ dhrājim prathamām prathamasyāḥ uta aparām    agnim hṛdayyam śokam tam te niḥ vāpayāmasi  /

original: yathā bhūmiḥ mṛta manāḥ mṛtāt mṛta manastarā  / yathā uta mamruṣaḥ manaḥ eva īrṣyoḥ mṛtam manaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā bhūmiḥ mṛta manāḥ mṛtāt mṛta manastarā   yathā uta mamruṣaḥ manaḥ eva īrṣyoḥ mṛtam manaḥ  /

original: adaḥ yat te hṛdi śritam manaskam patayiṣṇukam  / tatas te īrṣyām muñcāmi niḥ ūṣmāṇam dṛteḥ iva  /
analyzed: adaḥ yat te hṛdi śritam manaskam patayiṣṇukam   tatas te īrṣyām muñcāmi niḥ ūṣmāṇam dṛteḥ iva  /

original: punantu mā deva janāḥ punantu manavaḥ dhiyā  / punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā  /
analyzed: punantu mā deva janāḥ punantu manavaḥ dhiyā   punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā  /

original: pavamānaḥ punātu mā kratve dakṣāya jīvase  / atha u ariṣṭatātaye  /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ punātu mā kratve dakṣāya jīvase    atha u ariṣṭatātaye

original: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca  / asmān punīhi cakṣase  /
analyzed: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca    asmān punīhi cakṣase

original: agneḥ iva asya dahataḥ eti śuṣmiṇaḥ uta iva mattaḥ vilapan apāyati  / anyam asmat icchatu kam cit avrataḥ tapuḥ vadhāya namaḥ astu takmane  /
analyzed: agneḥ iva asya dahataḥ eti śuṣmiṇaḥ uta iva mattaḥ vilapan apāyati    anyam asmat icchatu kam cit avrataḥ tapuḥ vadhāya namaḥ astu takmane  /

original: namaḥ rudrāya namaḥ astu takmane namaḥ rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate  / namaḥ dive namaḥ pṛthivyai namaḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ  /
analyzed: namaḥ rudrāya namaḥ astu takmane namaḥ rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate   namaḥ dive namaḥ pṛthivyai namaḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ

original: ayam yaḥ abhiśocayiṣṇuḥ viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoṣi  / tasmai te aruṇāya babhrave namaḥ kṛṇomi vanyāya takmane  /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ abhiśocayiṣṇuḥ viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoṣi   tasmai te aruṇāya babhrave namaḥ kṛṇomi vanyāya takmane  /

original: imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ tāsām ha bhūmiḥ uttamā  / tāsām adhi tvacaḥ aham bheṣajam sam u jagrabham  //
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ tāsām ha bhūmiḥ uttamā   tāsām adhi tvacaḥ aham bheṣajam sam u jagrabham  /

original: śreṣṭham asi bheṣajānām vasiṣṭham vīrudhānām  / somaḥ bhagaḥ iva yāmeṣu deveṣu varuṇaḥ yathā  /
analyzed: śreṣṭham asi bheṣajānām vasiṣṭham vīrudhānām   somaḥ bhagaḥ iva yāmeṣu deveṣu varuṇaḥ yathā  /

original: revatīḥ anādhṛṣaḥ siṣāsavaḥ siṣāsatha  / uta stha keśa dṛmhaṇīḥ atha u ha keśa vardhanīḥ  /
analyzed: revatīḥ anādhṛṣaḥ siṣāsavaḥ siṣāsatha    uta stha keśa dṛmhaṇīḥ atha u ha keśa vardhanīḥ  /

original: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti  / te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ  /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti   te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ  /

original: payasvatīḥ kṛṇutha apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ yat ejatha marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ  / ūrjam ca tatra sumatim ca pinvata yatra naraḥ marutaḥ siñcatha madhu  //
analyzed: payasvatīḥ kṛṇutha apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ yat ejatha marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ    ūrjam ca tatra sumatim ca pinvata yatra naraḥ marutaḥ siñcatha madhu  /

original: uda prutaḥ marutaḥ tām iyarta vṛṣṭiḥ yā viśvā nivataḥ pṛṇāti  / ejāti glahā kanyā iva tunnairum tundānā patyā iva jāyā  /
analyzed: uda prutaḥ marutaḥ tām iyarta vṛṣṭiḥ yā viśvā nivataḥ pṛṇāti   ejāti glahā kanyā iva tunnairum tundānā patyā iva jāyā  /

original: sasruṣīḥ tat apasaḥ divā naktam ca sasruṣīḥ  / vareṇya kratuḥ aham apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye  /
analyzed: sasruṣīḥ tat apasaḥ divā naktam ca sasruṣīḥ   vareṇya kratuḥ aham apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye  /

original: otāḥ āpaḥ karmaṇyāḥ muñcantu itas praṇītaye  / sadyas kṛṇvantu etave  /
analyzed: otāḥ āpaḥ karmaṇyāḥ muñcantu itas praṇītaye   sadyas kṛṇvantu etave  /

original: devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvantu mānuṣāḥ  / śam naḥ bhavantu apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ  /
analyzed: devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvantu mānuṣāḥ   śam naḥ bhavantu apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ

original: himavataḥ pra sravanti sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ  / āpaḥ ha mahyam tat devīḥ dadan hṛd dyota bheṣajam  /
analyzed: himavataḥ pra sravanti sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ   āpaḥ ha mahyam tat devīḥ dadan hṛd dyota bheṣajam  /

original: yat me akṣyoḥ ādidyota pārṣṇyoḥ prapadoḥ ca yat  / āpaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karan bhiṣajām subhiṣaktamāḥ  /
analyzed: yat me akṣyoḥ ādidyota pārṣṇyoḥ prapadoḥ ca yat    āpaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karan bhiṣajām subhiṣaktamāḥ  /

original: sindhu patnīḥ sindhu rājñīḥ sarvāḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ sthana  / datta naḥ tasya bheṣajam tena vaḥ bhunajāmahai  /
analyzed: sindhu patnīḥ sindhu rājñīḥ sarvāḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ sthana   datta naḥ tasya bheṣajam tena vaḥ bhunajāmahai  /

original: pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśat ca saṃyanti manyāḥ abhi  / itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /
analyzed: pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśat ca saṃyanti manyāḥ abhi   itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /

original: sapta ca yāḥ saptatiḥ ca saṃyanti graivyāḥ abhi  / itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /
analyzed: sapta ca yāḥ saptatiḥ ca saṃyanti graivyāḥ abhi   itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /

original: nava ca yāḥ navatiḥ ca saṃyanti skandhyāḥ abhi  / itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /
analyzed: nava ca yāḥ navatiḥ ca saṃyanti skandhyāḥ abhi   itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva  /

original: ava mā pāpman sṛja vaśī san mṛdayā asi naḥ  / ā mā bhadrasya loke pāpman dhehi a vihrutam  /
analyzed: ava mā pāpman sṛja vaśī san mṛdayā asi naḥ    ā mā bhadrasya loke pāpman dhehi a vihrutam  /

original: yaḥ naḥ pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimaḥ vayam  / pathām anu vyāvartane anyam pāpmā anu padyatām  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimaḥ vayam   pathām anu vyāvartane anyam pāpmā anu padyatām  /

original: anyatra asmat ni ucyatu sahasra akṣaḥ amartyaḥ  / yam dveṣāma tam ṛchatu yam u dviṣmaḥ tam id jahi  //
analyzed: anyatra asmat ni ucyatu sahasra akṣaḥ amartyaḥ   yam dveṣāma tam ṛchatu yam u dviṣmaḥ tam id jahi  /

original: devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat ichan dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma  / tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade  /
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat ichan dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma   tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade  /

original: śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛham naḥ  / agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu  //
analyzed: śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛham naḥ   agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu  /

original: hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān āṣṭrī padam kṛṇute agnidhāne  / śivaḥ gobhyaḥ uta puruṣebhyaḥ naḥ astu mā naḥ devāḥ iha hiṃsīt kapota  /
analyzed: hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān āṣṭrī padam kṛṇute agnidhāne    śivaḥ gobhyaḥ uta puruṣebhyaḥ naḥ astu mā naḥ devāḥ iha hiṃsīt kapota  /

original: ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gām nayāmaḥ  / saṃlobhayantaḥ duritā padāni hitvā naḥ ūrjam pra padāt pathiṣṭhaḥ  //
analyzed: ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gām nayāmaḥ    saṃlobhayantaḥ duritā padāni hitvā naḥ ūrjam pra padāt pathiṣṭhaḥ  /

original: pari ime agnim arṣata pari ime gām aneṣata  / deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imān ā dadharṣati  //
analyzed: pari ime agnim arṣata pari ime gām aneṣata    deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imān ā dadharṣati  /

original: yaḥ prathamaḥ pravatam āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām an upaspaśānaḥ  / yaḥ asya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  //
analyzed: yaḥ prathamaḥ pravatam āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām an upaspaśānaḥ   yaḥ asya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  /

original: amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ni etu yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat  / yat vā kapota padam agnau kṛṇoti  //
analyzed: amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ni etu yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat   yat vā kapota padam agnau kṛṇoti  /

original: yau te dūtau nirṛte idam etaḥ a prahitau prahitau vā gṛham naḥ  / kapota ulūkābhyām a padam tat astu  /
analyzed: yau te dūtau nirṛte idam etaḥ a prahitau prahitau vā gṛham naḥ    kapota ulūkābhyām a padam tat astu  /

original: avairahatyāya idam ā papatyāt su vīra tāyai idam ā sasadyāt  / parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam  / yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe arasam praticākaśān ābhūkam praticākaśān  /
analyzed: avairahatyāya idam ā papatyāt su vīra tāyai idam ā sasadyāt    parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam    yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe arasam praticākaśān ābhūkam praticākaśān  /

original: devāḥ imam madhunā saṃyutam yavam sarasvatyām adhi maṇau acarkṛṣuḥ  / indraḥ āsīt sīra patiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśāḥ āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ  /
analyzed: devāḥ imam madhunā saṃyutam yavam sarasvatyām adhi maṇau acarkṛṣuḥ   indraḥ āsīt sīra patiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśāḥ āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ  /

original: yaḥ te madaḥ avakeśaḥ vikeśaḥ yena abhihasyam puruṣam kṛṇoṣi  / ārāt tvat anyā vanāni vṛkṣi tvam śami śata valśā vi roha  /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ avakeśaḥ vikeśaḥ yena abhihasyam puruṣam kṛṇoṣi   ārāt tvat anyā vanāni vṛkṣi tvam śami śata valśā vi roha  /

original: bṛhat palāśe subhage varṣa vṛddhe ṛtāvari  / mātā iva putrebhyaḥ mṛḍa keśebhyaḥ śami  //
analyzed: bṛhat palāśe subhage varṣa vṛddhe ṛtāvari   mātā iva putrebhyaḥ mṛḍa keśebhyaḥ śami  /

original: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras  / pitaram ca prayan svar  /
analyzed: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras    pitaram ca prayan svar  /

original: antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānataḥ  / vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ svar  /
analyzed: antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānataḥ   vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ svar  /

original: triṃśat dhāmā vi rājati vāc pataṅgaḥ aśiśriyat  / prati vastoḥ ahar dyubhiḥ  //
analyzed: triṃśat dhāmā vi rājati vāc pataṅgaḥ aśiśriyat   prati vastoḥ ahar dyubhiḥ

original: antardāve juhuta su etat yātudhāna kṣayaṇam ghṛtena  / ārāt rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam agne na naḥ gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi  //
analyzed: antardāve juhuta su etat yātudhāna kṣayaṇam ghṛtena    ārāt rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam agne na naḥ gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi  /

original: rudraḥ vaḥ grīvāḥ aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīḥ vaḥ api śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ  / vīrudh vaḥ viśvatovīryā yamena sam ajīgamat  /
analyzed: rudraḥ vaḥ grīvāḥ aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīḥ vaḥ api śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ   vīrudh vaḥ viśvatovīryā yamena sam ajīgamat  /

original: abhayam mitrāvaruṇau iha astu naḥ arciṣā attriṇaḥ nudatam pratīcaḥ  / mā jñātāram mā pratiṣṭhām vidanta mithas vighnānāḥ upa yantu mṛtyum  //
analyzed: abhayam mitrāvaruṇau iha astu naḥ arciṣā attriṇaḥ nudatam pratīcaḥ   mā jñātāram mā pratiṣṭhām vidanta mithas vighnānāḥ upa yantu mṛtyum  /

original: yasya idam ā rajaḥ yujaḥ tuje janā navam svar  / indrasya rantyam bṛhat  //
analyzed: yasya idam ā rajaḥ yujaḥ tuje janā navam svar    indrasya rantyam bṛhat  /

original: na ādhṛṣaḥ ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇaḥ dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ  / purā yathā vyathiḥ śravaḥ indrasya naḥ ādhṛṣe śavaḥ  //
analyzed: na ādhṛṣaḥ ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇaḥ dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ   purā yathā vyathiḥ śravaḥ indrasya naḥ ādhṛṣe śavaḥ

original: sa naḥ dadātu tām rayim urum piśaṅga saṃdṛśam  / indraḥ patiḥ tuviṣṭamaḥ janeṣu ā  /
analyzed: sa naḥ dadātu tām rayim urum piśaṅga saṃdṛśam   indraḥ patiḥ tuviṣṭamaḥ janeṣu ā

original: pra agnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām  / sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /
analyzed: pra agnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām   sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: yaḥ rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati agniḥ tigmena śociṣā  / sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati agniḥ tigmena śociṣā   sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /

original: yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ tiras dhanva atirocate  / sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ tiras dhanva atirocate    sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /

original: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati  / sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati   sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /

original: yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata  / sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata   sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ūtaye ā pra yātu parāvataḥ  / agniḥ naḥ suṣṭutīḥ upa  /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ūtaye ā pra yātu parāvataḥ   agniḥ naḥ suṣṭutīḥ upa  /
