original: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ āgamat imam yajñam sajūs upa  / agniḥ uktheṣu aṃhasu  /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ āgamat imam yajñam sajūs upa   agniḥ uktheṣu aṃhasu  /

original: vaiśvānaraḥ aṅgirasām stomam uktham ca cākḷpat / ā eṣu dyumnam svar yamat //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ aṅgirasām stomam uktham ca cākḷpat ā eṣu dyumnam svar yamat

original: ṛtāvānam vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patim / ajasram gharmam īmahe //
analyzed: ṛtāvānam vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patim ajasram gharmam īmahe

original: sa viśvā prati cākḷpa ṛtūṃr ud sṛjate vaśī  / yajñasya vayaḥ uttiran  /
analyzed: sa viśvā prati cākḷpe ṛtūṃr ud sṛjate vaśī   yajñasya vayaḥ uttiran

original: agniḥ pareṣu dhāmasu kāmaḥ bhūtasya bhavyasya  / samrāt ekaḥ vi rājati  //
analyzed: agniḥ pareṣu dhāmasu kāmaḥ bhūtasya bhavyasya   samrāt ekaḥ vi rājati  /

original: upa prāgāt sahasrākṣaḥ yuktvā śapathaḥ ratham  / śaptāram anvichat mama vṛkaḥ iva avimataḥ gṛham  /
analyzed: upa prāgāt sahasrākṣaḥ yuktvā śapathaḥ ratham    śaptāram anvichat mama vṛkaḥ iva avimataḥ gṛham  /

original: pari naḥ vṛṅgdhi śapatha hradam agniḥ iva ā dahan  / śaptāram atra naḥ jahi divaḥ vṛkṣam iva aśaniḥ  /
analyzed: pari naḥ vṛṅgdhi śapatha hradam agniḥ iva ā dahan    śaptāram atra naḥ jahi divaḥ vṛkṣam iva aśaniḥ

original: yaḥ naḥ śapāt a śapataḥ śapataḥ yaḥ ca naḥ śapāt  / śune peṣṭram iva avakṣāmam tam prati asyāmi mṛtyave  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ śapāt a śapataḥ śapataḥ yaḥ ca naḥ śapāt    śune peṣṭram iva avakṣāmam tam prati asyāmi mṛtyave  /

original: siṃhe vyāghraḥ uta yā pṛdākau tviṣiḥ agnau brāhmaṇe sūrye yā  / indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /
analyzed: siṃhe vyāghraḥ uta yā pṛdākau tviṣiḥ agnau brāhmaṇe sūrye yā    indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /

original: yā hastini dvīpini yā hiraṇye tviṣiḥ apsu goṣu yā puruṣeṣu  / indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /
analyzed: yā hastini dvīpini yā hiraṇye tviṣiḥ apsu goṣu yā puruṣeṣu   indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /

original: rathe akṣeṣu ṛṣabhasya vāje vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme  / indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /
analyzed: rathe akṣeṣu ṛṣabhasya vāje vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme    indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā  /

original: rājanye dundubhau āyatāyām aśvasya vāje puruṣasya māyau  / indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā samvidānā  /
analyzed: rājanye dundubhau āyatāyām aśvasya vāje puruṣasya māyau   indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā samvidānā  /

original: yaśaḥ haviḥ vardhatām indra jūtam sahasra vīryam su bhṛtam sahaskṛtam  / prasarsrāṇam anu dīrghāya cakṣase haviṣmantam mā vardhaya jyeṣṭhatātaye  /
analyzed: yaśaḥ haviḥ vardhatām indra jūtam sahasra vīryam su bhṛtam sahaskṛtam    prasarsrāṇam anu dīrghāya cakṣase haviṣmantam mā vardhaya jyeṣṭhatātaye  /

original: achā naḥ indram yaśasam yaśobhiḥ yaśasvinam namasānāḥ vidhema  / sa naḥ rāsva rāṣṭram indra jūtam tasya te rātau yaśasaḥ syāma  /
analyzed: achā naḥ indram yaśasam yaśobhiḥ yaśasvinam namasānāḥ vidhema    sa naḥ rāsva rāṣṭram indra jūtam tasya te rātau yaśasaḥ syāma  /

original: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata  / yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ  /
analyzed: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata   yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ  /

original: abhayam dyāvāpṛthivī iha astu naḥ abhayam somaḥ savitā naḥ kṛṇotu  / abhayam naḥ astu uru antarikṣam sapta ṛṣīṇām ca haviṣā abhayam naḥ astu  /
analyzed: abhayam dyāvāpṛthivī iha astu naḥ abhayam somaḥ savitā naḥ kṛṇotu   abhayam naḥ astu uru antarikṣam sapta ṛṣīṇām ca haviṣā abhayam naḥ astu  /

original: asmai grāmāya pradiśaḥ catasraḥ ūrjam su bhūtam svasti savitā naḥ kṛṇotu  / a śatru indraḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu anyatra rājñām abhi yātu manyuḥ  /
analyzed: asmai grāmāya pradiśaḥ catasraḥ ūrjam su bhūtam svasti savitā naḥ kṛṇotu   a śatru indraḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu anyatra rājñām abhi yātu manyuḥ  /

original: anamitram naḥ adharāt anamitram naḥ uttarāt  / indra anamitram naḥ paścāt anamitram puras kṛdhi  //
analyzed: anamitram naḥ adharāt anamitram naḥ uttarāt   indra anamitram naḥ paścāt anamitram puras kṛdhi  /

original: manase cetase dhiyaḥ ākūtaye uta cittaye  / matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam  /
analyzed: manase cetase dhiyaḥ ākūtaye uta cittaye    matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam  /

original: apānāya vyānāya prāṇāya bhūri dhāyase  / sarasvatyāḥ uru vyace vidhema haviṣā vayam  /
analyzed: apānāya vyānāya prāṇāya bhūri dhāyase   sarasvatyāḥ uru vyace vidhema haviṣā vayam  /

original: mā naḥ hāsiṣuḥ ṛṣayaḥ daivyāḥ ye tanū pāḥ ye naḥ tanvaḥ tanūjāḥ  / amartyāḥ martyām abhi naḥ sacadhvam āyuḥ dhatta prataram jīvase naḥ  /
analyzed: mā naḥ hāsiṣuḥ ṛṣayaḥ daivyāḥ ye tanū pāḥ ye naḥ tanvaḥ tanū jāḥ    amartyāḥ martyām abhi naḥ sacadhvam āyuḥ dhatta prataram jīvase naḥ  /

original: ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ manyum tanomi te hṛdaḥ  / yathā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhāyau iva sacāvahai  //
analyzed: ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ manyum tanomi te hṛdaḥ   yathā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhāyau iva sacāvahai  /

original: sakhāyau iva sacāvahai ava manyum tanomi te  / adhas te aśmanaḥ manyum upāsyāmasi yaḥ guruḥ  /
analyzed: sakhāyau iva sacāvahai ava manyum tanomi te    adhas te aśmanaḥ manyum upāsyāmasi yaḥ guruḥ  /

original: abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyum pārṣṇyā prapadena ca  / yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  //
analyzed: abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyum pārṣṇyā prapadena ca    yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  /

original: ayam darbhaḥ vimanyukaḥ svāya cāraṇāya ca  / manyoḥ vimanyukasya ayam manyu śamanaḥ ucyate  /
analyzed: ayam darbhaḥ vimanyukaḥ svāya cāraṇāya ca   manyoḥ vimanyukasya ayam manyu śamanaḥ ucyate  /

original: ayam yaḥ bhūri mūlaḥ samudram avatiṣṭhati  / darbhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ utthitaḥ manyu śamanaḥ ucyate  /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ bhūri mūlaḥ samudram avatiṣṭhati   darbhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ utthitaḥ manyu śamanaḥ ucyate  /

original: vi te hanavyām śaraṇim vi te mukhyām nayāmasi  / yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  //
analyzed: vi te hanavyām śaraṇim vi te mukhyām nayāmasi    yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi  /

original: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat  / asthuḥ vṛkṣāḥ ūrdhva svapnāḥ tiṣṭhāt rogaḥ ayam tava  /
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat   asthuḥ vṛkṣāḥ ūrdhva svapnāḥ tiṣṭhāt rogaḥ ayam tava  /

original: śatam yāḥ bheṣajāni te sahasram saṃgatāni ca  / śreṣṭham āsrāva bheṣajam vasiṣṭham roga nāśanam  //
analyzed: śatam yāḥ bheṣajāni te sahasram saṃgatāni ca   / śreṣṭham āsrāva bheṣajam vasiṣṭham roga nāśanam  /

original: rudrasya mūtram asi amṛtasya nābhiḥ  / viṣāṇakā nāma vai asi pitṝṇām mūlāt utthitā vātīkṛta nāśanī  /
analyzed: rudrasya mūtram asi amṛtasya nābhiḥ   viṣāṇakā nāma vai asi pitṝṇām mūlāt utthitā vātīkṛta nāśanī  /

original: paras apehi manaspāpa kim aśastāni śaṃsasi  / parehi na tvā kāmaye vṛkṣām vanāni sam cara gṛheṣu goṣu me manaḥ  /
analyzed: paras apehi manaspāpa kim aśastāni śaṃsasi   parehi na tvā kāmaye vanāni sam cara gṛheṣu goṣu me manaḥ  /

original: avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ  / agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni a juṣṭāni āre asmat dadhātu  /
analyzed: avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ   agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni a juṣṭāni āre asmat dadhātu  /

original: yat indra brahmaṇas pate api mṛṣā carāmasi  / pracetāḥ naḥ āṅgirasaḥ duritāt pātu aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: yat indra brahmaṇas pate api mṛṣā carāmasi   pracetāḥ naḥ āṅgirasaḥ duritāt pātu aṃhasaḥ  /

original: yaḥ na jīvaḥ asi na mṛtaḥ devānām amṛta garbhaḥ asi svapna  / varuṇānī te mātā yamaḥ pitā araruḥ nāma asi  /
analyzed: yaḥ na jīvaḥ asi na mṛtaḥ devānām amṛta garbhaḥ asi svapna   varuṇānī te mātā yamaḥ pitā araruḥ nāma asi  /

original: vidma te svapna janitram deva jāmīnām putraḥ asi yamasya karaṇaḥ  / antakaḥ asi mṛtyuḥ asi tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi  //
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram deva jāmīnām putraḥ asi yamasya karaṇaḥ   antakaḥ asi mṛtyuḥ asi tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi  /

original: yathā kalām yathā śapham yatharṇam saṃnayanti  / eva duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate sam nayāmasi  //
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yatharṇam saṃnayanti    eva duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate sam nayāmasi  /

original: agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātu asmān vaiśvānaraḥ viśva kṛt viśva śaṃbhūḥ  / sa naḥ pāvakaḥ draviṇe dadhātu āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma  /
analyzed: agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātu asmān vaiśvānaraḥ viśva kṛt viśva śaṃbhūḥ    sa naḥ pāvakaḥ draviṇe dadhātu āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma  /

original: viśve devāḥ marutaḥ indraḥ asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ  / āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣām vadantaḥ vayam devānām sumatau syāma  /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ marutaḥ indraḥ asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ   āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣām vadantaḥ vayam devānām sumatau syāma  /

original: idam tṛtīyam savanam kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta  / te saudhanvanāḥ svar ānaśānāḥ su iṣṭim naḥ abhi vasyaḥ nayantu  /
analyzed: idam tṛtīyam savanam kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta    te saudhanvanāḥ svar ānaśānāḥ su iṣṭim naḥ abhi vasyaḥ nayantu  /

original: śyenaḥ asi gāyatra chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe  / svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā  /
analyzed: śyenaḥ asi gāyatra chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe   svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: ṛbhuḥ asi jagacchandāḥ anu tvā rabhe  / svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā  /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ asi jagacchandāḥ anu tvā rabhe    svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: vṛṣā asi triṣṭubh chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe  / svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā  /
analyzed: vṛṣā asi triṣṭubh chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe   svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: nahi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyaḥ  / kapiḥ babhasti tejanam svam jarāyu gauḥ iva  /
analyzed: nahi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyaḥ   kapiḥ babhasti tejanam svam jarāyu gauḥ iva  /

original: meṣaḥ iva vai sam ca vi ca uru acyase yat uttaradrau uparaḥ ca khādataḥ  / śīrṣṇā śiraḥ apsasā apsaḥ ardayan aṃśūn babhasti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ  /
analyzed: meṣaḥ iva vai sam ca vi ca uru acyase yat uttaradrau uparaḥ ca khādataḥ   śīrṣṇā śiraḥ apsasā apsaḥ ardayan aṃśūn babhasti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ  /

original: suparṇā vācam akrata upa dyavi ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ  / ni yat niyanti uparasya niṣkṛtim purū retaḥ dadhire sūrya śritaḥ  /
analyzed: suparṇā vācam akrata upa dyavi ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ   ni yat niyanti uparasya niṣkṛtim purū retaḥ dadhire sūrya śritaḥ  /

original: hatam tardam samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chintam śiraḥ api pṛṣṭīḥ śṛṇītam  / yavān na id adān api nahyatam mukham atha abhayam kṛṇutam dhānyāya  /
analyzed: hatam tardam samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chintam śiraḥ api pṛṣṭīḥ śṛṇītam   yavān na id adān api nahyatam mukham atha abhayam kṛṇutam dhānyāya  /

original: tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa  / brahma iva a saṃsthitam haviḥ anadantaḥ imān yavān a hiṃsantaḥ apodita  /
analyzed: tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa   brahma iva a saṃsthitam haviḥ anadantaḥ imān yavān a hiṃsantaḥ apodita  /

original: tardāpate vaghāpate tṛṣṭa jambhāḥ ā śṛṇota me  / ye āraṇyāḥ vyadvarāḥ ye ke ca stha vyadvarāḥ tān sarvān jambhayāmasi  //
analyzed: tardāpate vaghāpate tṛṣṭa jambhāḥ ā śṛṇota me   ye āraṇyāḥ vyadvarāḥ ye ke ca stha vyadvarāḥ tān sarvān jambhayāmasi  /

original: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ ati drutaḥ  / indrasya yujaḥ sakhā  /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ ati drutaḥ   indrasya yujaḥ sakhā

original: āpaḥ asmāt mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛtapvaḥ punantu  / viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi  //
analyzed: āpaḥ asmāt mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛtapvaḥ punantu   viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi  /

original: yat kim ca idam varuṇa daivye jane abhidroham manuṣyāḥ caranti  / acittyā ced tava dharma yuyopima mā naḥ tasmāt enasaḥ deva rīriṣaḥ  /
analyzed: yat kim ca idam varuṇa daivye jane abhidroham manuṣyāḥ caranti    acittyā ced tava dharma yuyopima mā naḥ tasmāt enasaḥ deva rīriṣaḥ  /

original: ud sūryaḥ divaḥ eti puras rakṣāṃsi nijūrvan  / ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā  /
analyzed: ud sūryaḥ divaḥ eti puras rakṣāṃsi nijūrvan   ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā  /

original: ni gāvaḥ goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata  / ni ūrmayaḥ nadīnam ni adṛṣṭāḥ alipsata  /
analyzed: ni gāvaḥ goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata    ni ūrmayaḥ nadīnam ni adṛṣṭāḥ alipsata  /

original: āyuḥ dadam vipaścitam śrutām kaṇvasya vīrudham  / ābhāriṣam viśva bheṣajīm asya adṛṣṭāt ni śamayat  /
analyzed: āyuḥ dadam vipaścitam śrutām kaṇvasya vīrudham   ābhāriṣam viśva bheṣajīm asya adṛṣṭāt ni śamayat  /

original: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukraḥ bṛhan dakṣiṇayā pipartu  / anu svadhā cikitām somaḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ naḥ pātu savitā bhagaḥ ca  /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukraḥ bṛhan dakṣiṇayā pipartu   anu svadhā cikitām somaḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ naḥ pātu savitā bhagaḥ ca  /

original: punar prāṇaḥ punar ātmā naḥ aitu punar cakṣuḥ punar asuḥ naḥ aitu  / vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adabdhaḥ tanū pāḥ antar tiṣṭhāti duritāni viśvā  /
analyzed: punar prāṇaḥ punar ātmā naḥ aitu punar cakṣuḥ punar asuḥ naḥ aitu   vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adabdhaḥ tanū pāḥ antar tiṣṭhāti duritāni viśvā  /

original: sam varcasā payasā sam tanūbhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena  / tvaṣṭā naḥ atra varīyaḥ kṛṇotu anu naḥ mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yat viriṣṭam  /
analyzed: sam varcasā payasā sam tanūbhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena   tvaṣṭā naḥ atra varīyaḥ kṛṇotu anu naḥ mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yat viriṣṭam  /

original: idam tat yujaḥ uttaram indram śumbhāmi aṣṭaye  / asya kṣatram śriyam mahīm vṛṣṭiḥ iva vardhaya tṛṇam  //
analyzed: idam tat yujaḥ uttaram indram śumbhāmi aṣṭaye    asya kṣatram śriyam mahīm vṛṣṭiḥ iva vardhaya tṛṇam  /

original: asmai kṣatram agnīṣomau asmai dhārayatam rayim  / imam rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge kṛṇutam yujaḥ uttaram  /
analyzed: asmai kṣatram agnīṣomau asmai dhārayatam rayim   imam rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge kṛṇutam yujaḥ uttaram  /

original: sabandhuḥ ca a sabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati  / sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate  //
analyzed: sabandhuḥ ca a sabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati    sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate  /

original: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti  / teṣām ajyānim yatamaḥ vahāti tasmai mā devāḥ pari datta iha sarve  /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti   teṣām ajyānim yatamaḥ vahāti tasmai mā devāḥ pari datta iha sarve  /

original: grīṣmaḥ hemantaḥ śiśiraḥ vasantaḥ śarad varṣāḥ svite naḥ dadhāta  / ā naḥ goṣu bhajata prajāyām nivāte id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma  /
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ hemantaḥ śiśiraḥ vasantaḥ śarad varṣāḥ svite naḥ dadhāta   ā naḥ goṣu bhajata prajāyām nivāte id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma  /

original: idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇuta bṛhat namaḥ  / teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre sau manase syāma  /
analyzed: idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇuta bṛhat namaḥ   teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre sau manase syāma  /

original: mā naḥ devāḥ ahiḥ vadhīt satokān saha puruṣān  / samyatam na vi sparat vyāttam na sam yamat namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ  / namaḥ astu asitāya namaḥ tiraścirājaye  / svajāya babhrave namaḥ namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ  //
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ ahiḥ vadhīt satokān saha puruṣān   samyatam na vi sparat vyāttam na sam yamat namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ   namaḥ astu asitāya namaḥ tiraścirājaye   svajāya babhrave namaḥ namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ  /

original: sam te hanmi datā dataḥ sam u te hanvā hanū  / sam te jihvayā jihvām sam u āsnāhaḥ āsyam  /
analyzed: sam te hanmi datā dataḥ sam u te hanvā hanū    sam te jihvayā jihvām sam u āsnā ahaḥ āsyam  /

original: idam id vai u bheṣajam idam rudrasya bheṣajam  / yena iṣum eka tejanām śata śalyām apabravat  //
analyzed: idam id vai u bheṣajam idam rudrasya bheṣajam    yena iṣum eka tejanām śata śalyām apabravat  /

original: jālāṣeṇa abhi siñcata jālāṣeṇa upa siñcata  / jālāṣam ugram bheṣajam tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase  /
analyzed: jālāṣeṇa abhi siñcata jālāṣeṇa upa siñcata   jālāṣam ugram bheṣajam tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase  /

original: śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ mā ca naḥ kim cana amamat  / kṣamā rapaḥ viśvam naḥ astu bheṣajam sarvam naḥ astu bheṣajam  /
analyzed: śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ mā ca naḥ kim cana amamat   kṣamā rapaḥ viśvam naḥ astu bheṣajam sarvam naḥ astu bheṣajam  /

original: yaśasam mā indraḥ maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasam dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime  / yaśasam mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyaḥ dātuḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ iha syām  /
analyzed: yaśasam mā indraḥ maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasam dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime   yaśasam mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyaḥ dātuḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ iha syām  /

original: yathā indraḥ dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ yaśasvān yathā apaḥ oṣadhīṣu yaśasvatīḥ  / eva viśveṣu deveṣu vayam sarveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma  /
analyzed: yathā indraḥ dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ yaśasvān yathā apaḥ oṣadhīṣu yaśasvatīḥ    eva viśveṣu deveṣu vayam sarveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma  /

original: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata  / yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ  /
analyzed: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata   yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ  /

original: anaḍudbhyaḥ tvam prathamam dhenubhyaḥ tvam arundhati  / a dhenave vayase śarma yaccha catuṣpade  /
analyzed: anaḍudbhyaḥ tvam prathamam dhenubhyaḥ tvam arundhati    a dhenave vayase śarma yaccha catuṣpade  /

original: śarma yacchatu oṣadhiḥ saha devīḥ arundhatī  / karat payasvantam goṣṭham ayakṣmān uta pūruṣān  /
analyzed: śarma yacchatu oṣadhiḥ saha devīḥ arundhatī    karat payasvantam goṣṭham ayakṣmān uta pūruṣān  /

original: viśva rūpām subhagām achāvadāmi jīvalām  / sā naḥ rudrasya āstām hetim dūram nayatu gobhyaḥ  //
analyzed: viśva rūpām subhagām achāvadāmi jīvalām    sā naḥ rudrasya āstām hetim dūram nayatu gobhyaḥ  /

original: ayam ā yāti aryamā purastāt viṣita stupaḥ  / asyāḥ ichan agruvai patim uta jāyām a jānaye  /
analyzed: ayam ā yāti aryamā purastāt viṣita stupaḥ   asyāḥ ichan agruvai patim uta jāyām a jānaye  /

original: aśramat iyam aryaman anyāsām samanam yatī  / aṅga u nu aryaman asyāḥ anyāḥ samanam āyati  //
analyzed: aśramat iyam aryaman anyāsām samanam yatī    aṅga u nu aryaman asyāḥ anyāḥ samanam āyati  /

original: dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīm dhātā dyām uta sūryam  / dhātā asyai agruvai patim dadhātu pratikāmyam  //
analyzed: dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīm dhātā dyām uta sūryam    dhātā asyai agruvai patim dadhātu pratikāmyam  /

original: mahyam āpaḥ madhumat erayantām mahyam sūraḥ abharat jyotiṣe kam  / mahyam devāḥ uta viśve tapaḥ jāḥ mahyam devaḥ savitā vyacaḥ dhāt  /
analyzed: mahyam āpaḥ madhumat erayantām mahyam sūraḥ abharat jyotiṣe kam   mahyam devāḥ uta viśve tapaḥ jāḥ mahyam devaḥ savitā vyacaḥ dhāt  /

original: aham viveca pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sākam  / aham satyam anṛtam yat vadāmi aham daivīm pari vācam viśaḥ ca  /
analyzed: aham viveca pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sākam   aham satyam anṛtam yat vadāmi aham daivīm pari vācam viśaḥ ca  /

original: aham jajāna pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sindhūn  / aham satvam anṛtam yat vadāmi yaḥ agnīṣomau ajuṣe sakhāyā  /
analyzed: aham jajāna pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sindhūn    aham satvam anṛtam yat vadāmi yaḥ agnīṣomau ajuṣe sakhāyā  /

original: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇena iṣiraḥ nabhobhiḥ  / dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye na punītām  /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇena iṣiraḥ nabhobhiḥ    dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye na punītām  /

original: vaiśvānarīm sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvam yasyāḥ āśāḥ tanvaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ  / tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīnām  /
analyzed: vaiśvānarīm sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvam yasyāḥ āśāḥ tanvaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ   tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīnām  /

original: vaiśvānarīm varcasaḥ ā rabhadhvam śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ  / iha iḍayā sadhamādam madantaḥ jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam  /
analyzed: vaiśvānarīm varcasaḥ ā rabhadhvam śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ   iha iḍayā sadhamādam madantaḥ jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam  /

original: yat te devī nirṛtiḥ ābabandha dāma grīvāsu avimokyam yat  / tat te vi syāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya adomadam annam addhi prasūtaḥ  /
analyzed: yat te devī nirṛtiḥ ābabandha dāma grīvāsu avimokyam yat  / tat te vi syāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya adomadam annam addhi prasūtaḥ  /

original: namaḥ astu te nirṛte tigma tejaḥ ayasmayān vi cṛtā bandha pāśān  / yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  /
analyzed: namaḥ astu te nirṛte tigma tejaḥ ayasmayān vi cṛtā bandha pāśān   yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  /

original: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram  / yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam  /
analyzed: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram   yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam  /

original: saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā  / iḍaḥ pade sam idhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara  /
analyzed: saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā   iḍaḥ pade sam idhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara  /

original: sam jānīdhvam sam pṛcyadhvam sam vaḥ manāṃsi jānatām  / devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve samjānānāḥ upāsate  /
analyzed: sam jānīdhvam sam pṛcyadhvam sam vaḥ manāṃsi jānatām    devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve samjānānāḥ upāsate  /

original: samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam vratam saha cittam eṣām  / samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi samānam cetaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam  /
analyzed: samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam vratam saha cittam eṣām    samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi samānam cetaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam  /

original: samānī vaḥ ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ  / samānam astu vaḥ manaḥ yathā vaḥ su sahā asati  //
analyzed: samānī vaḥ ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ    samānam astu vaḥ manaḥ yathā vaḥ su sahā asati  /

original: ava manyuḥ avāyata ava bāhū manaḥ yujā  / parāśara tvam teṣām parāñcam śuṣmam ardaya adha naḥ rayim ā kṛdhi  //
analyzed: ava manyuḥ avāyata ava bāhū manaḥ yujā    parāśara tvam teṣām parāñcam śuṣmam ardaya adha naḥ rayim ā kṛdhi  /

original: nirhastebhyaḥ nairhastam yam devāḥ śarum asyatha  / vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham  /
analyzed: nirhastebhyaḥ nairhastam yam devāḥ śarum asyatha    vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham  /

original: indraḥ cakāra prathamam nairhastam asurebhyaḥ  / jayantu satvānaḥ mama sthireṇa indreṇa medinā  /
analyzed: indraḥ cakāra prathamam nairhastam asurebhyaḥ   jayantu satvānaḥ mama sthireṇa indreṇa medinā  /

original: nirhastaḥ śatruḥ abhidāsan astu ye senābhiḥ yudham āyanti asmān  / sam arpaya indra mahatā vadhena drātu eṣām agha hāraḥ vividdhaḥ  /
analyzed: nirhastaḥ śatruḥ abhidāsan astu ye senābhiḥ yudham āyanti asmān    sam arpaya indra mahatā vadhena drātu eṣām agha hāraḥ vividdhaḥ  /

original: ātanvānāḥ āyacchantaḥ asyantaḥ ye ca dhāvatha  / nirhastāḥ śatravaḥ sthana indraḥ vaḥ adya parāśarīt  /
analyzed: ātanvānāḥ āyacchantaḥ asyantaḥ ye ca dhāvatha   nirhastāḥ śatravaḥ sthana indraḥ vaḥ adya parāśarīt  /

original: nirhastāḥ santu śatravaḥ aṅga eṣām mlāpayāmasi  / atha eṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśas vi bhajāmahai  /
analyzed: nirhastāḥ santu śatravaḥ aṅga eṣām mlāpayāmasi    atha eṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśas vi bhajāmahai  /

original: pari vartmāni sarvatas indraḥ pūṣā ca sasratuḥ  / muhyantu adya amūḥ senāḥ amitrāṇām parastarām  /
analyzed: pari vartmāni sarvatas indraḥ pūṣā ca sasratuḥ   muhyantu adya amūḥ senāḥ amitrāṇām parastarām  /

original: mūḍhāḥ amitrāḥ carata aśīrṣāṇaḥ iva ahayaḥ  / teṣām vaḥ agni mūḍhānām indraḥ hantu varaṃvaram  /
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ amitrāḥ carata aśīrṣāṇaḥ iva ahayaḥ   teṣām vaḥ agni mūḍhānām indraḥ hantu varaṃvaram  /

original: ā eṣu nahya vṛṣā ajinam hariṇasya bhiyam kṛdhi  / parāṅ amitraḥ eṣatu arvācī gauḥ upeṣatu  /
analyzed: ā eṣu nahya vṛṣā ajinam hariṇasya bhiyam kṛdhi   parāṅ amitraḥ eṣatu arvācī gauḥ upeṣatu  /

original: ā ayam agan savitā kṣureṇa uṣṇena vāyo udakena ihi  / ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ undantu sacetasaḥ somasya rājñaḥ vapata pracetasaḥ  /
analyzed: ā ayam agan savitā kṣureṇa uṣṇena vāyo udakena ihi   ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ undantu sacetasaḥ somasya rājñaḥ vapata pracetasaḥ  /

original: aditiḥ śmaśru vapatu āpaḥ undantu varcasā  / cikitsatu prajāpatiḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya cakṣase  /
analyzed: aditiḥ śmaśru vapatu āpaḥ undantu varcasā   cikitsatu prajāpatiḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya cakṣase  /

original: yena avapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya vidvān  / tena brahmāṇaḥ vapata idam asya gomān aśvavān ayam astu prajāvān  //
analyzed: yena avapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya vidvān   tena brahmāṇaḥ vapata idam asya gomān aśvavān ayam astu prajāvān  /

original: girau aragarāṭeṣu hiranye goṣu yat yaśaḥ  / surāyām sicyamānāyām kīlāle madhu tat mayi  //
analyzed: girau aragarāṭeṣu hiranye goṣu yat yaśaḥ    surāyām sicyamānāyām kīlāle madhu tat mayi  /

original: aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunā aṅktam śubhaḥ patī  / yathā bhargasvatīm vācam āvadāni janām anu  /
analyzed: aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunā aṅktam śubhaḥ patī    yathā bhargasvatīm vācam āvadāni janām anu  /

original: mayi varcaḥ atha u yaśaḥ atha u yajñasya yat payaḥ  / tat mayi prajāpatiḥ divi dyām iva dṛṃhatu  //
analyzed: mayi varcaḥ atha u yaśaḥ atha u yajñasya yat payaḥ   tat mayi prajāpatiḥ divi dyām iva dṛṃhatu  /

original: yathā māṃsam yathā surā yathā akṣāḥ adhidevane  / yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ  / eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /
analyzed: yathā māṃsam yathā surā yathā akṣāḥ adhidevane   yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ   eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /

original: yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam udyuje  / yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ  / eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /
analyzed: yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam udyuje   yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ   eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /

original: yathā pradhiḥ yathā upadhiḥ yathā nabhyam pradhau adhi  / yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ  / eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /
analyzed: yathā pradhiḥ yathā upadhiḥ yathā nabhyam pradhau adhi  / yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ   eva te aghnye manaḥ adhi vatse ni hanyatām  /

original: yat annam admi bahudhā virūpam hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim  / yat eva kim ca pratijagraha aham agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛnotu  //
analyzed: yat annam admi bahudhā virūpam hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim    yat eva kim ca pratijagraha aham agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛnotu  /

original: yat mā hutam ahutam ājagāma dattam pitṛbhiḥ anumatam manuṣyaiḥ  / yasmāt me manaḥ ud iva rārajīti agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: yat mā hutam ahutam ājagāma dattam pitṛbhiḥ anumatam manuṣyaiḥ   yasmāt me manaḥ ud iva rārajīti agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛṇotu  /

original: yat annam admi anṛtena devāḥ dāsyan a dāsyan uta saṃgṛṇāmi  / vaiśvānarasya mahataḥ mahimnā śivam mahyam madhumat astu annam  /
analyzed: yat annam admi anṛtena devāḥ dāsyan a dāsyan uta saṃgṛṇāmi    vaiśvānarasya mahataḥ mahimnā śivam mahyam madhumat astu annam  /

original: yathā asitaḥ prathayate vaśām anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvan asurasya māyayā  / eva te śepaḥ sahasā ayam arkaḥ aṅgena aṅgam saṃsamakam kṛṇotu  /
analyzed: yathā asitaḥ prathayate vaśām anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvan asurasya māyayā    eva te śepaḥ sahasā ayam arkaḥ aṅgena aṅgam saṃsamakam kṛṇotu  /

original: yathā pasaḥ tāya ādaram vātena sthūlabham kṛtam  / yāvat parasvataḥ pasaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ  /
analyzed: yathā pasaḥ tāya ādaram vātena sthūlabham kṛtam   yāvat parasvataḥ pasaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ  /

original: yāvat aṅgīnam pārasvatam hāstinam gārdabham ca yat / yāvat aśvasya vājinaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat aṅgīnam pārasvatam hāstinam gārdabham ca yat yāvat aśvasya vājinaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ

original: ā iha yātu varuṇaḥ somaḥ agniḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vasubhiḥ ā iha yātu  / asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarvaḥ ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ  /
analyzed: ā iha yātu varuṇaḥ somaḥ agniḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vasubhiḥ ā iha yātu    asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarvaḥ ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ  /

original: yaḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ hṛdayeṣu antar ākūtiḥ yā vaḥ manasi praviṣṭā  / tān sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu  /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ hṛdayeṣu antar ākūtiḥ yā vaḥ manasi praviṣṭā   tān sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu  /

original: iha eva sta mā apa yāta adhi asmat pūṣā parastāt apatham vaḥ kṛṇotu  / vāstoḥ patiḥ anu vaḥ johavītu mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu  /
analyzed: iha eva sta mā apa yāta adhi asmat pūṣā parastāt apatham vaḥ kṛṇotu   vāstoḥ patiḥ anu vaḥ johavītu mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu  /

original: sam vaḥ pṛcyantām tanvaḥ sam manāṃsi sam u vratā  / sam vaḥ ayam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ bhagaḥ sam vaḥ ajīgamat  /
analyzed: sam vaḥ pṛcyantām tanvaḥ sam manāṃsi sam u vratā   sam vaḥ ayam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ bhagaḥ sam vaḥ ajīgamat  /

original: samjñapanam vaḥ manasaḥ atho samjñapanam hṛdaḥ  / atho bhagasya yat śrāntam tena saṃjñapayāmi vaḥ  /
analyzed: samjñapanam vaḥ manasaḥ atho samjñapanam hṛdaḥ   atho bhagasya yat śrāntam tena saṃjñapayāmi vaḥ  /

original: yathā ādityāḥ vasubhiḥ sambabhūvuḥ marudbhiḥ ugrāḥ a hṛṇīyamānāḥ  / eva tri nāman a hṛṇīyamānaḥ imān janān saṃmanasaḥ kṛdhi iha  /
analyzed: yathā ādityāḥ vasubhiḥ sambabhūvuḥ marudbhiḥ ugrāḥ a hṛṇīyamānāḥ    eva tri nāman a hṛṇīyamānaḥ imān janān saṃmanasaḥ kṛdhi iha  /

original: niḥ amum nude okasaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ pṛtanyati  / nairbādhyena haviṣā indraḥ enam parāśarīt  /
analyzed: niḥ amum nude okasaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ pṛtanyati   nairbādhyena haviṣā indraḥ enam parāśarīt  /

original: paramām tam parāvatam indraḥ nudatu vṛtrahā  / yatas na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ  //
analyzed: paramām tam parāvatam indraḥ nudatu vṛtrahā    yatas na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ  /

original: etu tisraḥ parāvataḥ etu pañca janām ati  / etu tisraḥ ati rocanāḥ yatas na punar āyati  / śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ yāvat sūryaḥ asat divi  /
analyzed: etu tisraḥ parāvataḥ etu pañca janām ati    etu tisraḥ ati rocanāḥ yatas na punar āyati    śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ yāvat sūryaḥ asat divi  /

original: ye enam pariṣīdanti samādadhati cakṣase  / saṃpreddhaḥ agniḥ jihvābhiḥ ud etu hṛdayāt adhi  //
analyzed: ye enam pariṣīdanti samādadhati cakṣase    saṃpreddhaḥ agniḥ jihvābhiḥ ud etu hṛdayāt adhi  /

original: agneḥ sāmtapanasya aham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe  / addhātiḥ yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ  /
analyzed: agneḥ sāmtapanasya aham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe   addhātiḥ yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ  /

original: yaḥ asya samidham veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām  / nābhihvāre padam ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave  /
analyzed: yaḥ asya samidham veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām    nābhihvāre padam ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave  /

original: na enam ghnanti paryāyiṇaḥ na sannām ava gacchati  / agneḥ yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vidvān nāma gṛhnāti āyuṣe  /
analyzed: na enam ghnanti paryāyiṇaḥ na sannām ava gacchati    agneḥ yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vidvān nāma gṛhnāti āyuṣe  /

original: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat  / āsthāne parvatāḥ asthuḥ sthāmni aśvām atiṣṭhipam  /
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat   āsthāne parvatāḥ asthuḥ sthāmni aśvām atiṣṭhipam  /

original: yaḥ udānat parāyaṇam yaḥ udānaṭ nyāyanam  / āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve  /
analyzed: yaḥ udānat parāyaṇam yaḥ udānaṭ nyāyanam   āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve  /

original: jātavedaḥ ni vartaya śatam te santu āvṛtaḥ  / sahasram te upāvṛtaḥ tābhiḥ naḥ punar ā kṛdhi  //
analyzed: jātavedaḥ ni vartaya śatam te santu āvṛtaḥ   sahasram te upāvṛtaḥ tābhiḥ naḥ punar ā kṛdhi  /

original: tena bhūtena haviṣā ayam ā pyāyatām punar  / jāyām yām asmai āvākṣuḥ tām rasena abhi vardhatām  /
analyzed: tena bhūtena haviṣā ayam ā pyāyatām punar    jāyām yām asmai āvākṣuḥ tām rasena abhi vardhatām  /

original: abhi vardhatām payasā abhi rāṣṭreṇa vardhatām  / rayyā sahasra varcasā imau stām an upakṣitau  /
analyzed: abhi vardhatām payasā abhi rāṣṭreṇa vardhatām   rayyā sahasra varcasā imau stām an upakṣitau  /

original: tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭā asyai tvām patim  / tvaṣṭā sahasram āyuṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām  /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭā asyai tvām patim   tvaṣṭā sahasram āyuṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām  /

original: ayam naḥ nabhasaḥ patiḥ saṃsphānaḥ abhi rakṣatu  / asamātim gṛheṣu naḥ  /
analyzed: ayam naḥ nabhasaḥ patiḥ saṃsphānaḥ abhi rakṣatu   asamātim gṛheṣu naḥ  /

original: tvam naḥ nabhasas pate ūrjam gṛhesu dhāraya  / ā puṣṭam etu ā vasu  //
analyzed: tvam naḥ nabhasas pate ūrjam gṛhesu dhāraya   ā puṣṭam etu ā vasu  /

original: deva saṃsphāna sahasrāpoṣasya īśiṣe  / tasya naḥ rāsva tasya naḥ dhehi tasya te bhaktivāmsaḥ syāma  /
analyzed: deva saṃsphāna sahasrāpoṣasya īśiṣe   tasya naḥ rāsva tasya naḥ dhehi tasya te bhaktivāmsaḥ syāma  /

original: antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā bhūtā avacākaśat  / śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā bhūtā avacākaśat    śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema  /

original: ye trayaḥ kālakāñjāḥ divi devāḥ iva śritāḥ  / tān sarvān ahve ūtaye asmai ariṣṭatātaye  /
analyzed: ye trayaḥ kālakāñjāḥ divi devāḥ iva śritāḥ   tān sarvān ahve ūtaye asmai ariṣṭatātaye  /

original: apsu te janma divi te sadhastham samudre antar mahimā te pṛthivyām  / śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema  /
analyzed: apsu te janma divi te sadhastham samudre antar mahimā te pṛthivyām    śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema  /

original: yantā asi yacchase hastau apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi  / prajām dhanam ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihastaḥ abhūt ayam  /
analyzed: yantā asi yacchase hastau apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi    prajām dhanam ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihastaḥ abhūt ayam  /

original: parihasta vi dhāraya yonim garbhāya dhātave  / maryāde putram ā dhehi tam tvam ā gamaya āgame  //
analyzed: parihasta vi dhāraya yonim garbhāya dhātave   maryāde putram ā dhehi tam tvam ā gamaya āgame  /

original: yam parihastam abibhar aditiḥ putra kāmyā  / tvaṣṭā tam asyāḥ ā badhnāt yathā putram janāt  //
analyzed: yam parihastam abibhar aditiḥ putra kāmyā   tvaṣṭā tam asyāḥ ā badhnāt yathā putram janāt  /

original: āgacchataḥ āgatasya nāma gṛhṇāmi āyataḥ  / indrasya vṛtra ghnaḥ vanve vāsavasya śatakratoḥ  /
analyzed: āgacchataḥ āgatasya nāma gṛhṇāmi āyataḥ   indrasya vṛtra ghnaḥ vanve vāsavasya śatakratoḥ  /

original: yena sūryām sāvitrīm aśvinā ūhatuḥ pathā  / tena mām abravīt bhagaḥ jayām ā vahatāt iti  //
analyzed: yena sūryām sāvitrīm aśvinā ūhatuḥ pathā    tena mām abravīt bhagaḥ jayām ā vahatāt iti  /

original: yaḥ te aṅkuśaḥ vasu dānaḥ bṛhan indra hiraṇyayaḥ  / tena janiyate jāyām mahyam dhehi śacīpate  /
analyzed: yaḥ te aṅkuśaḥ vasu dānaḥ bṛhan indra hiraṇyayaḥ   tena janiyate jāyām mahyam dhehi śacīpate  /

original: apacitaḥ pra patata suparṇaḥ vasateḥ iva  / sūryaḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam candramāḥ vaḥ apocchatu  //
analyzed: apacitaḥ pra patata suparṇaḥ vasateḥ iva   sūryaḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam candramāḥ vaḥ apocchatu  /

original: enī ekā śyenī ekā kṛṣṇā ekā rohiṇī dve  / sarvāsām agrabham nāma avīra ghnīḥ apetana  /
analyzed: enī ekā śyenī ekā kṛṣṇā ekā rohiṇī dve    sarvāsām agrabham nāma avīra ghnīḥ apetana  /

original: asūtikā rāmāyaṇī apacit pra patiṣyati  / glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati sa galuntaḥ naśiṣyati  //
analyzed: asūtikā rāmāyaṇī apacit pra patiṣyati   glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati sa galuntaḥ naśiṣyati  /

original: vīhi svām āhutim juṣānaḥ manasā svāhā manasā yat idam juhomi //
analyzed: vīhi svām āhutim juṣānaḥ manasā svāhā manasā yat idam juhomi

original: yasyāḥ te āsani ghore juhomi eṣām baddhānām avasarjanāya kam  / bhūmiḥ iti tvā abhipramanvate janāḥ nirṛtiḥ iti tvā aham pari veda sarvatas  //
analyzed: yasyāḥ te āsani ghore juhomi eṣām baddhānām avasarjanāya kam   bhūmiḥ iti tvā abhipramanvate janāḥ nirṛtiḥ iti tvā aham pari veda sarvatas  /

original: bhūte haviṣmatī bhava eṣa te bhāgaḥ yaḥ asmāsu  / muñca imān amūn enasaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: bhūte haviṣmatī bhava eṣa te bhāgaḥ yaḥ asmāsu   muñca imān amūn enasaḥ svāhā

original: eva u su asmat nirṛte anehā tvam ayasmayān vi cṛtā bandha pāśān  / yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  /
analyzed: eva u su asmat nirṛte anehā tvam ayasmayān vi cṛta bandha pāśān    yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave  /

original: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram  / yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam  /
analyzed: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram   yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam  /

original: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ  / yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran  /
analyzed: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ   yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran  /

original: indrasya vacasā vayam mitrasya varuṇasya ca  / devānām sarveṣām vācā yakṣmam te vārayāmahe  //
analyzed: indrasya vacasā vayam mitrasya varuṇasya ca    devānām sarveṣām vācā yakṣmam te vārayāmahe  /

original: yathā vṛtraḥ imāḥ āpaḥ tastambha viśvadhā yatīḥ  / eva te agninā yakṣmam vaiśvānareṇa vāraye  /
analyzed: yathā vṛtraḥ imāḥ āpaḥ tastambha viśvadhā yatīḥ    eva te agninā yakṣmam vaiśvānareṇa vāraye  /

original: vṛṣā indrasya vṛṣā divaḥ vṛsā pṛthivyāḥ ayam  / vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /
analyzed: vṛṣā indrasya vṛṣā divaḥ vṛsā pṛthivyāḥ ayam   vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /

original: samudraḥ īśe sravatām agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ vaśī  / candramāḥ nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /
analyzed: samudraḥ īśe sravatām agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ vaśī   candramāḥ nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /

original: samrāj asi asurāṇām kakud manuṣyānām  / devānām ardha bhāj asi tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /
analyzed: samrāj asi asurāṇām kakud manuṣyānām    devānām ardha bhāj asi tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava  /

original: ā tvā ahārṣam antar abhūḥ dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha avicācalat  / viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat  /
analyzed: ā tvā ahārṣam antar abhūḥ dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha avicācalat  / viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat  /

original: iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvataḥ iva avicācalat  / indraḥ iva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha iha rāṣṭram u dhāraya  /
analyzed: iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvataḥ iva avicācalat   / indraḥ iva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha iha rāṣṭram u dhāraya  /

original: indraḥ etam adīdharat dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā  / tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇas patiḥ  /
analyzed: indraḥ etam adīdharat dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā   tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇas patiḥ  /

original: dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvam viśvam idam jagat  / dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam  /
analyzed: dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvam viśvam idam jagat    dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam  /

original: dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ  / dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rāṣṭram dhārayatām dhruvam  /
analyzed: dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ   dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rāṣṭram dhārayatām dhruvam  /

original: dhruvaḥ acyutaḥ pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn śatrūyataḥ adharān pādayasva  / sarvāḥ diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīḥ dhruvāya te samitiḥ kalpatām iha  /
analyzed: dhruvaḥ acyutaḥ pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn śatrūyataḥ adharān pādayasva   sarvāḥ diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīḥ dhruvāya te samitiḥ kalpatām iha  /

original: idam yat preṇyaḥ śiraḥ dattam somena vṛṣṇyam  / tatas pari prajātena hārdim te śocayāmasi  //
analyzed: idam yat preṇyaḥ śiraḥ dattam somena vṛṣṇyam    tatas pari prajātena hārdim te śocayāmasi  /

original: śocayāmasi te hārdim śocayāmasi te manaḥ  / vātam dhūmaḥ iva sadhryak mām eva anu etu ye manaḥ  /
analyzed: śocayāmasi te hārdim śocayāmasi te manaḥ   vātam dhūmaḥ iva sadhryak mām eva anu etu ye manaḥ  /

original: mahyam tvā mitrāvaruṇau mahyam devī sarasvatī  / mahyam tvā madhyam bhūmyāḥ ubhau antau sam asyatām  /
analyzed: mahyam tvā mitrāvaruṇau mahyam devī sarasvatī    mahyam tvā madhyam bhūmyāḥ ubhau antau sam asyatām  /

original: yām te rudraḥ iṣum āsyat aṅgebhyaḥ hṛdayāya ca  / idam tām adya tvat vayam viṣūcīm vi vṛhāmasi  //
analyzed: yām te rudraḥ iṣum āsyat aṅgebhyaḥ hṛdayāya ca   idam tām adya tvat vayam viṣūcīm vi vṛhāmasi  /

original: yāḥ te śatam dhamanayaḥ aṅgāni anu viṣṭhitāḥ  / tāsām te sarvāsām vayam niḥ viṣāṇi hvayāmasi  //
analyzed: yāḥ te śatam dhamanayaḥ aṅgāni anu viṣṭhitāḥ   tāsām te sarvāsām vayam niḥ viṣāṇi hvayāmasi  /

original: namaḥ te rudra asyate namaḥ pratihitāyai  / namaḥ visṛjyamānāyai namaḥ nipatitāyai  //
analyzed: namaḥ te rudra asyate namaḥ pratihitāyai   namaḥ visṛjyamānāyai namaḥ nipatitāyai  /

original: imam yavam aṣṭa āyogaiḥ ṣat yogebhiḥ acarkṛṣuḥ  / tena te tanvaḥ rapaḥ apācīnam apa vyaye  /
analyzed: imam yavam aṣṭa āyogaiḥ ṣat yogebhiḥ acarkṛṣuḥ   tena te tanvaḥ rapaḥ apācīnam apa vyaye  /

original: nyak vātaḥ vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ  / nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ  /
analyzed: nyak vātaḥ vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ   nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ  /

original: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ  / āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam  /
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ   āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam  /

original: vāta raṃhāḥ bhava vājin yujamānaḥ indrasya yāhi prasave manaḥ javāḥ  / yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā te tvastā patsu javam dadhātu  //
analyzed: vāta raṃhāḥ bhava vājin yujamānaḥ indrasya yāhi prasave manaḥ javāḥ   yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā te tvastā patsu javam dadhātu  /

original: javaḥ te arvan nihitaḥ guhā yaḥ śyene vāte uta yaḥ acarat parīttaḥ  / tena tvam vājin balavān balena ājim jaya samane parayiṣṇuḥ  /
analyzed: javaḥ te arvan nihitaḥ guhā yaḥ śyene vāte uta yaḥ acarat parīttaḥ    tena tvam vājin balavān balena ājim jaya samane parayiṣṇuḥ  /

original: tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī vāmam asmabhyam dhāvatu śarma tubhyam  / a hrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devaḥ divi iva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāt  //
analyzed: tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī vāmam asmabhyam dhāvatu śarma tubhyam   a hrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devaḥ divi iva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāt  /

original: yamaḥ mṛtyuḥ aghamāraḥ nirṛthaḥ babhruḥ śarvaḥ astā nīla śikhaṇḍaḥ  / deva janāḥ senayā uttasthivāṃsaḥ te asmākam pari vṛñjantu vīrān  /
analyzed: yamaḥ mṛtyuḥ aghamāraḥ nirṛthaḥ babhruḥ śarvaḥ astā nīla śikhaṇḍaḥ   deva janāḥ senayā uttasthivāṃsaḥ te asmākam pari vṛñjantu vīrān  /

original: manasā homaiḥ harasā ghṛtena śarvāya astre uta rājñe bhavāya  / namasyebhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ kṛṇomi anyatra asmat agha viṣāḥ nayantu  /
analyzed: manasā homaiḥ harasā ghṛtena śarvāya astre uta rājñe bhavāya   namasyebhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ kṛṇomi anyatra asmat agha viṣāḥ nayantu  /

original: trāyadhvam naḥ agha viṣābhyaḥ vadhāt viśve devāḥ marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ  / agnīṣomāḥ varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma  /
analyzed: trāyadhvam naḥ agha viṣābhyaḥ vadhāt viśve devāḥ marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ   agnīṣomāḥ varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma  /

original: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi  / amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi  //
analyzed: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi    amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi  /

original: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta  / mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta  /
analyzed: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta    mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta  /

original: ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī  / otau me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rdhyāsma idam sarasvati  //
analyzed: ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī   otau me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rdhyāsma idam sarasvati  /

original: aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi  / tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata  /
analyzed: aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi   tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata  /

original: hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi  / tatra amṛtasya puṣpam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata  /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi   tatra amṛtasya puṣpam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata  /

original: garbhaḥ asi oṣadhīnām garbhaḥ himavatām uta  / garbhaḥ viśvasya bhūtasya imam me agadam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: garbhaḥ asi oṣadhīnām garbhaḥ himavatām uta   garbhaḥ viśvasya bhūtasya imam me agadam kṛdhi  /

original: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata vicakṣaṇāḥ  / bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata vicakṣaṇāḥ   bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ  /

original: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta  / atha u yamasya paḍvīśāt viśvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt  /
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta  / atha u yamasya paḍvīśāt viśvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt  /

original: yat cakṣuṣā manasā yat ca vācā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ  / somaḥ tāni svadhayā naḥ punātu  /
analyzed: yat cakṣuṣā manasā yat ca vācā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ somaḥ tāni svadhayā naḥ punātu  /

original: abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ abhibhūḥ agniḥ abhibhūḥ somaḥ abhibhūḥ indraḥ  / abhi aham viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ yathā āsāni eva vidhema agnihotrāḥ idam haviḥ  /
analyzed: abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ abhibhūḥ agniḥ abhibhūḥ somaḥ abhibhūḥ indraḥ    abhi aham viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ yathā āsāni eva vidhema agnihotrāḥ idam haviḥ  /

original: svadhā astu mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā prajāvat kṣatram madhunā iha pinvatam  / bādhethām dūram nirṛtim parācais kṛtam cit enaḥ pra mumuktam asmat  /
analyzed: svadhā astu mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā prajāvat kṣatram madhunā iha pinvatam   bādhethām dūram nirṛtim parācais kṛtam cit enaḥ pra mumuktam asmat  /

original: imam vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam  / grāma jitam go jitam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā  /
analyzed: imam vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam    grāma jitam go jitam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā  /

original: indraḥ jayāti na parā jayātai adhirājaḥ rājasu rājayātai  / carkṛtyaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca upasadyaḥ namasyū bhava iha  /
analyzed: indraḥ jayāti na parā jayātai adhirājaḥ rājasu rājayātai    carkṛtyaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca upasadyaḥ namasyū bhava iha  /

original: tvam indra adhirājaḥ śravasyuḥ tvam bhūḥ abhibhūtiḥ janānām  / tvam daivīḥ viśaḥ imāḥ vi rāja āyuṣmat kṣatram ajaram te astu  /
analyzed: tvam indra adhirājaḥ śravasyuḥ tvam bhūḥ abhibhūtiḥ janānām    tvam daivīḥ viśaḥ imāḥ vi rāja āyuṣmat kṣatram ajaram te astu  /

original: prācyāḥ diśaḥ tvam indra asi rājā ūtā udīcyāḥ diśaḥ vṛtrahan śatruhaḥ asi  / yatra yanti srotyāḥ tat jitam te dakṣiṇatas vṛṣabhaḥ eṣi havyaḥ  /
analyzed: prācyāḥ diśaḥ tvam indra asi rājā ūtā udīcyāḥ diśaḥ vṛtrahan śatruhaḥ asi    yatra yanti srotyāḥ tat jitam te dakṣiṇatas vṛṣabhaḥ eṣi havyaḥ  /

original: abhi tvā indra varimataḥ purā tvā aṃhūraṇāt dhuve  / hvayāmi ugram cettāram puruṇāmānam ekajam  /
analyzed: abhi tvā indra varimataḥ purā tvā aṃhūraṇāt dhuve    hvayāmi ugram cettāram puruṇāmānam ekajam  /

original: yaḥ adya senyaḥ vadhaḥ jighāṃsan naḥ udīrate  / indrasya tatra bāhū samantam pari dadmaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ adya senyaḥ vadhaḥ jighāṃsan naḥ udīrate    indrasya tatra bāhū samantam pari dadmaḥ  /

original: pari dadmaḥ indrasya bāhū samantam trātuḥ trāyatām naḥ  / deva savitar soma rājan sumanasam mā kṛṇu svastaye  //
analyzed: pari dadmaḥ indrasya bāhū samantam trātuḥ trāyatām naḥ    deva savitar soma rājan sumanasam mā kṛṇu svastaye  /

original: devāḥ aduḥ sūryaḥ dyauḥ adāt pṛthivī adāt  / tisraḥ sarasvatiḥ aduḥ sa cittāḥ viṣa dūṣaṇam  /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ sūryaḥ dyauḥ adāt pṛthivī adāt   tisraḥ sarasvatiḥ aduḥ sa cittāḥ viṣa dūṣaṇam  /

original: yat vaḥ devāḥ upajīkāḥ āsiñcan dhanvani udakam  / tena deva prasūtena idam dūṣayata viṣam  /
analyzed: yat vaḥ devāḥ upajīkāḥ āsiñcan dhanvani udakam   tena deva prasūtena idam dūṣayata viṣam  /

original: asurāṇām duhitā asi sā devānām asi svasā  / divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sā cakartha arasam viṣam  /
analyzed: asurāṇām duhitā asi sā devānām asi svasā    divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sā cakartha arasam viṣam  /

original: ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca  / yathāṅgam vardhatām śepaḥ tena yoṣitam id jahi  //
analyzed: ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca   yathāṅgam vardhatām śepaḥ tena yoṣitam id jahi  /

original: yena kṛṣam vājayanti yena hinvanti āturam  / tena asya brahmaṇas pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ  //
analyzed: yena kṛṣam vājayanti yena hinvanti āturam      tena asya brahmaṇas pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ  /

original: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani  / kramasva ṛṣaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā  /
analyzed: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani   kramasva ṛṣaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā  /

original: yathā ayam vāhaḥ aśvinā samaiti sam ca vartate  / eva mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu sam ca vartatām  //
analyzed: yathā ayam vāhaḥ aśvinā samaiti sam ca vartate    eva mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu sam ca vartatām  /

original: ā aham khidāmi te manaḥ rāja aśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva  / reṣma chinnam yathā tṛṇam mayi te veṣṭatām manaḥ  /
analyzed: ā aham khidāmi te manaḥ rāja aśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva   reṣma chinnam yathā tṛṇam mayi te veṣṭatām manaḥ  /

original: āñjanasya madughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca  / turaḥ bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ud bhare  //
analyzed: āñjanasya madughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca    turaḥ bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ud bhare  /

original: saṃdānam vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ saṃdānam savitā karat  / saṃdānam mitraḥ aryamā saṃdānam bhagaḥ aśvinā  /
analyzed: saṃdānam vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ saṃdānam savitā karat   saṃdānam mitraḥ aryamā saṃdānam bhagaḥ aśvinā  /

original: sam paramān sam avamān atho sam dyāmi madhyamān  / indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmnā tān agne sam dyā tvam  /
analyzed: sam paramān sam avamān atho sam dyāmi madhyamān   indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmnā tān agne sam dya tvam  /

original: amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvā anīkaśas  / indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmna tān agne sam dyā tvam  /
analyzed: amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvā anīkaśas    indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmna tān agne sam dya tvam  /

original: ādānena saṃdānena amitrān ā dyāmasi  / apānāḥ ye ca eṣām prāṇāḥ asunā asūn sam achidan  /
analyzed: ādānena saṃdānena amitrān ā dyāmasi   apānāḥ ye ca eṣām prāṇāḥ asunā asūn sam achidan  /

original: idam ādānam akaram tapasā indreṇa saṃśitam  / amitrāḥ ye atra naḥ santi tān agne ā dyā tvam  /
analyzed: idam ādānam akaram tapasā indreṇa saṃśitam    amitrāḥ ye atra naḥ santi tān agne ā dyā tvam  /

original: ā enān dyatām indra agnī somaḥ rājā ca medinau  / indraḥ marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ  /
analyzed: ā enān dyatām indra agnī somaḥ rājā ca medinau   indraḥ marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ  /

original: yathā manaḥ manasketaiḥ parāpatati āśumat  / eva tvam kāse pra pata manasaḥ anu pravāyyam  //
analyzed: yathā manaḥ manasketaiḥ parāpatati āśumat     eva tvam kāse pra pata manasaḥ anu pravāyyam  /

original: yathā bāṇaḥ su saṃśitaḥ parāpatati āśumat  / eva tvam kāse pra pata pṛthivyāḥ anu saṃvatam  /
analyzed: yathā bāṇaḥ su saṃśitaḥ parāpatati āśumat     eva tvam kāse pra pata pṛthivyāḥ anu saṃvatam  /

original: yathā sūryasya raśmayaḥ parāpatanti āśumat  / eva tvam kāse pra pata samudrasya anu vikṣaram  /
analyzed: yathā sūryasya raśmayaḥ parāpatanti āśumat     eva tvam kāse pra pata samudrasya anu vikṣaram  /

original: āyane te parāyane dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ  / utsaḥ vā tatra jāyatām hradaḥ vā puṇḍarīkavān  /
analyzed: āyane te parāyane dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ   utsaḥ vā tatra jāyatām hradaḥ vā puṇḍarīkavān  /

original: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam  / madhye hradasya naḥ gṛhāḥ parācīnāḥ mukhā kṛdhi  //
analyzed: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam    madhye hradasya naḥ gṛhāḥ parācīnāḥ mukhā kṛdhi  /

original: himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi  / śītahradā hi naḥ bhuvaḥ agniḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam  /
analyzed: himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi   śītahradā hi naḥ bhuvaḥ agniḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam  /

original: viśvajit trāyamāṇāyai mā pari dehi  / trāyamāṇe dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /
analyzed: viśvajit trāyamāṇāyai mā pari dehi   trāyamāṇe dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /

original: trāyamāṇe viśvajite mā pari dehi  / viśvajit dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /
analyzed: trāyamāṇe viśvajite mā pari dehi   viśvajit dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /

original: viśvajit kalyāṇyai mā pari dehi  / kalyāṇi dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /
analyzed: viśvajit kalyāṇyai mā pari dehi   kalyāṇi dvipād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /

original: kalyāṇi sarva vide mā pari dehi  / sarva vid dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /
analyzed: kalyāṇi sarva vide mā pari dehi   / sarva vid dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam  /

original: tvam naḥ medhe prathamā gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ ā gahi  / tvam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ tvam naḥ asi yajñiyā  /
analyzed: tvam naḥ medhe prathamā gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ ā gahi   tvam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ tvam naḥ asi yajñiyā  /

original: medhām aham prathamām brahmaṇvatīm brahma jūtām ṛṣiṣṭutām  / prapītām brahmacāribhiḥ devānām avase huve  /
analyzed: medhām aham prathamām brahmaṇvatīm brahma jūtām ṛṣiṣṭutām   prapītām brahmacāribhiḥ devānām avase huve  /

original: yām medhām ṛbhavaḥ viduḥ yām medhām asurāḥ viduḥ  / ṛṣayaḥ bhadrām medhām yām viduḥ tām mayi ā veśayāmasi  //
analyzed: yām medhām ṛbhavaḥ viduḥ yām medhām asurāḥ viduḥ   ṛṣayaḥ bhadrām medhām yām viduḥ tām mayi ā veśayāmasi  /

original: yām ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ medhām medhāvinaḥ viduḥ  / tayā mām adya medhayā agne medhāvinam kṛṇu  //
analyzed: yām ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ medhām medhāvinaḥ viduḥ   tayā mām adya medhayā agne medhāvinam kṛṇu  /

original: medhām sāyam medhām prātar medhām madhyandinam pari  / medhām sūryasya raśmibhiḥ vacasā veśayāmahe  /
analyzed: medhām sāyam medhām prātar medhām madhyandinam pari   medhām sūryasya raśmibhiḥ vacasā veśayāmahe  /

original: pippalī kṣipta bheṣajī uta atividdha bheṣajī  / tām devāḥ sam akalpayan iyam jīvitavai alam  /
analyzed: pippalī kṣipta bheṣajī uta atividdha bheṣajī   tām devāḥ sam akalpayan iyam jīvitavai alam  /

original: pippalyaḥ sam avadanta āyatīḥ jananāt adhi  / yam jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ  /
analyzed: pippalyaḥ sam avadanta āyatīḥ jananāt adhi   yam jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ  /

original: asurāḥ tvā ni akhanan devāḥ tvā ud avapan punar  / vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīm atho kṣiptasya bheṣajīm  /
analyzed: asurāḥ tvā ni akhanan devāḥ tvā ud avapan punar    vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīm atho kṣiptasya bheṣajīm  /

original: pratnaḥ hi kam īḍyaḥ adhvareṣu sanāt ca hotā navyaḥ ca satsi  / svām ca agne tanvam piprāyasva asmabhyam ca saubhagam ā yajasva  //
analyzed: pratnaḥ hi kam īḍyaḥ adhvareṣu sanāt ca hotā navyaḥ ca satsi    svām ca agne tanvam piprāyasva asmabhyam ca saubhagam ā yajasva  /

original: jyeṣṭha ghnyām jātaḥ vicṛtoḥ yamasya mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam  / ati enam neṣat duritāni viśvā dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /
analyzed: jyeṣṭha ghnyām jātaḥ vicṛtoḥ yamasya mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam    ati enam neṣat duritāni viśvā dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /

original: vyāghre ahni ajaniṣṭa vīraḥ nakṣatra jāḥ jāyamānaḥ su vīraḥ  / sa mā vadhīt pitaram vardhamānaḥ mā mātaram pra minīt janitrīm  /
analyzed: vyāghre ahni ajaniṣṭa vīraḥ nakṣatra jāḥ jāyamānaḥ su vīraḥ    sa mā vadhīt pitaram vardhamānaḥ mā mātaram pra minīt janitrīm  /

original: imam me agne puruṣam mumugdhi ayam yaḥ baddhaḥ su yataḥ lālapīti  / atas adhi te kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam yadā anunmaditaḥ asati  /
analyzed: imam me agne puruṣam mumugdhi ayam yaḥ baddhaḥ su yataḥ lālapīti   atas adhi te kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam yadā anunmaditaḥ asati  /

original: agniḥ te ni śamayatu yadi te manaḥ udyutam  / kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yathā an unmaditaḥ asasi  //
analyzed: agniḥ te ni śamayatu yadi te manaḥ udyutam   kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yathā an unmaditaḥ asasi  /

original: deva enasāt unmaditam unmattam rakṣasaḥ pari  / kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yadā an unmaditaḥ asati  //
analyzed: deva enasāt unmaditam unmattam rakṣasaḥ pari   kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yadā an unmaditaḥ asati  /

original: punar tvā duḥ apsarasaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ  / punar tvā duḥ viśve devāḥ yathā anunmaditaḥ asasi  /
analyzed: punar tvā duḥ apsarasaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ   punar tvā duḥ viśve devāḥ yathā anunmaditaḥ asasi  /

original: mā jyeṣṭham vadhīt ayam agne eṣām mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam  / sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan tubhyam devāḥ anu jānantu viśve  /
analyzed: mā jyeṣṭham vadhīt ayam agne eṣām mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam    sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan tubhyam devāḥ anu jānantu viśve  /

original: ud muñca pāśān tvam agne eṣām trayaḥ tribhiḥ utsitāḥ yebhiḥ āsan  / sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaram muñca sarvān  /
analyzed: ud muñca pāśān tvam agne eṣām trayaḥ tribhiḥ utsitāḥ yebhiḥ āsan    sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaram muñca sarvān  /

original: yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivittaḥ vibaddhaḥ aṅgeaṅge ārpitaḥ utsitaḥ ca  / vi te mucyantam vimucaḥ hi santi bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva  //
analyzed: yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivittaḥ vibaddhaḥ aṅgeaṅge ārpitaḥ utsitaḥ ca   vi te mucyantam vimucaḥ hi santi bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva  /

original: trite devāḥ amṛjata etat enaḥ tritaḥ enat manuṣyeṣu mamṛje  / tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu  //
analyzed: trite devāḥ amṛjata etat enaḥ tritaḥ enat manuṣyeṣu mamṛje   tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu  /

original: marīcīḥ dhūmān pra viśa anu pāpman udārān gacchota vā nīhārān  / nadīnam phenām anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva  //
analyzed: marīcīḥ dhūmān pra viśa anu pāpman udārān gaccha uta vā nīhārān   nadīnam phenām anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva  /

original: dvādaśadhā nihitam tritasya apamṛṣṭam manuṣya enasāni  / tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu  //
analyzed: dvādaśadhā nihitam tritasya apamṛṣṭam manuṣya enasāni    tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu  /

original: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam devāsaḥ cakṛma vayam  / ādityāḥ tasmāt naḥ yuyam ṛtasya ṛtena muñcata  /
analyzed: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam devāsaḥ cakṛma vayam   ādityāḥ tasmāt naḥ yuyam ṛtasya ṛtena muñcata  /

original: ṛtasya ṛtena ādityāḥ yajatrāḥ muñcata iha naḥ  / yajñam yat yajña vāhasaḥ śikṣantaḥ na upaśekima  /
analyzed: ṛtasya ṛtena ādityāḥ yajatrāḥ muñcata iha naḥ   yajñam yat yajña vāhasaḥ śikṣantaḥ na upaśekima  /

original: medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucā ājyāni juhvataḥ  / akāmāḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ śikṣantaḥ na upa śekima  /
analyzed: medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucā ājyāni juhvataḥ   akāmāḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ śikṣantaḥ na upa śekima  /

original: yat vidvāṃsaḥ yat a vidvāṃsaḥ enāṃsi cakṛma vayam  / yūyam naḥ tasmāt muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ  /
analyzed: yat vidvāṃsaḥ yat a vidvāṃsaḥ enāṃsi cakṛma vayam   yūyam naḥ tasmāt muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ  /

original: yadi jāgrat yadi svapan enaḥ enasyaḥ akaram  / bhūtam mā tasmāt bhavyam ca drupadāt iva muñcatām  /
analyzed: yadi jāgrat yadi svapan enaḥ enasyaḥ akaram    bhūtam mā tasmāt bhavyam ca drupadāt iva muñcatām  /

original: drupadāt iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malāt iva  / pūtam pavitreṇa iva ājyam viśve śumbhantu mā enasaḥ  /
analyzed: drupadāt iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malāt iva   pūtam pavitreṇa iva ājyam viśve śumbhantu mā enasaḥ  /

original: yat yāmam cakruḥ nikhanantaḥ agre kārṣīvaṇāḥ anna vidaḥ na vidyayā  / vaivasvate rājani tat juhomi atha yajñiyam madhumat astu naḥ annam  /
analyzed: yat yāmam cakruḥ nikhanantaḥ agre kārṣīvaṇāḥ anna vidaḥ na vidyayā   vaivasvate rājani tat juhomi atha yajñiyam madhumat astu naḥ annam  /

original: vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam madhu bhāgaḥ madhunā sam sṛjāti  / mātuḥ yat enaḥ iṣitam naḥ āgan yat vā pitā aparāddhaḥ jihīde  /
analyzed: vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam madhu bhāgaḥ madhunā sam sṛjāti    mātuḥ yat enaḥ iṣitam naḥ āgan yat vā pitā aparāddhaḥ jihīde  /

original: yadi idam mātuḥ yadi pituḥ naḥ pari bhrātuḥ putrāt cetasaḥ enaḥ āgan  / yāvantaḥ asmān pitaraḥ sacante teṣām sarveṣām śivaḥ astu manyuḥ  /
analyzed: yadi idam mātuḥ yadi pituḥ naḥ pari bhrātuḥ putrāt cetasaḥ enaḥ āgan   yāvantaḥ asmān pitaraḥ sacante teṣām sarveṣām śivaḥ astu manyuḥ  /

original: apamityam a pratīttam yat asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi  / idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi tvam pāśān vicṛtam vettha sarvān  /
analyzed: apamityam a pratīttam yat asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi    idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi tvam pāśān vicṛtam vettha sarvān  /

original: iha eva santaḥ prati dadmaḥ enat jīvāḥ jīvebhyaḥ ni harāmaḥ enat  / apamitya dhānyam yat jaghasā aham idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi  //
analyzed: iha eva santaḥ prati dadmaḥ enat jīvāḥ jīvebhyaḥ ni harāmaḥ enat    apamitya dhānyam yat jaghasā aham idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi  /

original: anṛṇāḥ asmin anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma  / ye deva yānāḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ ca lokāḥ sarvān pathaḥ anṛṇāḥ ā kṣiyema  /
analyzed: anṛṇāḥ asmin anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma   ye deva yānāḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ ca lokāḥ sarvān pathaḥ anṛṇāḥ ā kṣiyema  /

original: yat dhastābhyām cakṛma kilbiṣāṇi akṣāṇām gatnum upalipsamānāḥ  / ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tat adya apsarasau anu dattām ṛṇam naḥ  /
analyzed: yat dhastābhyām cakṛma kilbiṣāṇi akṣāṇām gatnum upalipsamānāḥ   ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tat adya apsarasau anu dattām ṛṇam naḥ  /

original: ugram paśye rāṣṭrabhṛt kilbiṣāṇi yat akṣa vṛttam anu dattam naḥ etat  / ṛṇāt naḥ naḥ ṛṇam ertsamānaḥ yamasya loke adhirajjuḥ āyat  //
analyzed: ugram paśye rāṣṭrabhṛt kilbiṣāṇi yat akṣa vṛttam anu dattam naḥ etat   ṛṇāt naḥ naḥ ṛṇam ertsamānaḥ yamasya loke adhirajjuḥ āyat  /

original: yasmai ṛṇam yasya jāyām upaimi yam yācamānaḥ abhyaimi devāḥ  / te vācam vādiṣuḥ mā uttarām mat deva patnī apsarasau adhītam  /
analyzed: yasmai ṛṇam yasya jāyām upaimi yam yācamānaḥ abhyaimi devāḥ   te vācam vādiṣuḥ mā uttarām mat deva patnī apsarasau adhītam  /

original: yat a dīvyan ṛṇam aham kṛṇomi a dāsyan agne uta saṃgṛṇāmi  / vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adhipāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ud id nayāti su kṛtasya lokam  /
analyzed: yat a dīvyan ṛṇam aham kṛṇomi a dāsyan agne uta saṃgṛṇāmi    vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adhipāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ud id nayāti su kṛtasya lokam  /

original: vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāmi yadi ṛṇam saṃgaraḥ devatāsu  / saḥ etān pāśān vicṛtam veda sarvān atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāmi yadi ṛṇam saṃgaraḥ devatāsu    saḥ etān pāśān vicṛtam veda sarvān atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: vaiśvānaraḥ pavitā mā punātu yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmi āśām  / an ājānan manasā yācamānaḥ yat tatra enaḥ apa tat suvāmi  //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ pavitā mā punātu yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmi āśām    an ājānan manasā yācamānaḥ yat tatra enaḥ apa tat suvāmi  /

original: yat antarikṣam pṛthivīm uta dyām yat mātaram pitaram vā jihiṃsima  / ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti sukṛtasya lokam  /
analyzed: yat antarikṣam pṛthivīm uta dyām yat mātaram pitaram vā jihiṃsima    ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti sukṛtasya lokam  /

original: bhūmiḥ mātā aditiḥ naḥ janitram bhrātā antarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ  / dyauḥ naḥ pitā pitryāt śam bhavāti jāmim ṛtvā mā ava patsi lokāt  /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ mātā aditiḥ naḥ janitram bhrātā antarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ    dyauḥ naḥ pitā pitryāt śam bhavāti jāmim ṛtvā mā ava patsi lokāt  /

original: yatra suhārdaḥ su kṛtaḥ madanti vihāya rogam tanvaḥ svāyāḥ  / aślonāḥ aṅgaiḥ a hrutāḥ svarge tatra paśyema pitarau ca putrān  /
analyzed: yatra suhārdaḥ su kṛtaḥ madanti vihāya rogam tanvaḥ svāyāḥ   aślonāḥ aṅgaiḥ a hrutāḥ svarge tatra paśyema pitarau ca putrān  /

original: viṣāṇā pāśān vi sya adhi asmat ye uttamāḥ adhamāḥ vāruṇāḥ ye  / duṣvapnyam duritam ni sva asmat atha gacchema su kṛtasya lokam  /
analyzed: viṣāṇā pāśān vi sya adhi asmat ye uttamāḥ adhamāḥ vāruṇāḥ ye    duṣvapnyam duritam ni sva asmat atha gacchema su kṛtasya lokam  /

original: yat dāruṇi badhyase yat ca rajjvām yat bhūmyām badhyase yat ca vācā  / ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti su kṛtasya lokam  /
analyzed: yat dāruṇi badhyase yat ca rajjvām yat bhūmyām badhyase yat ca vācā   ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti su kṛtasya lokam  /

original: ud agātām bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake  / preha amṛtasya yacchatām praitu baddhaka mocanam  /
analyzed: ud agātām bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake   preha amṛtasya yacchatām praitu baddhaka mocanam  /

original: vi jihīṣva lokam kṛṇu bandhāt muñcāsi baddhakam  / yonyāḥ iva pracyutaḥ garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvām anu kṣiya  //
analyzed: vi jihīṣva lokam kṛṇu bandhāt muñcāsi baddhakam   yonyāḥ iva pracyutaḥ garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvām anu kṣiya  /

original: etam bhāgam pari dadāmi vidvān viśvakarman prathama jāḥ ṛtasya  / asmābhiḥ dattam jarasaḥ parastāt achinnam tantum anu sam tarema  /
analyzed: etam bhāgam pari dadāmi vidvān viśvakarman prathama jāḥ ṛtasya   asmābhiḥ dattam jarasaḥ parastāt achinnam tantum anu sam tarema  /

original: tatam tantum anu eke taranti yeṣām dattam pitryam āyanena  / a bandhu eke dadataḥ prayacchantaḥ dātum ced śikṣān sa svarge eva  /
analyzed: tatam tantum anu eke taranti yeṣām dattam pitryam āyanena   a bandhu eke dadataḥ prayacchantaḥ dātum ced śikṣān sa svarge eva  /

original: anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etam lokam śraddadhānāḥ sacante  / yat vām pakvam pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī sam śrayethām  //
analyzed: anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etam lokam śraddadhānāḥ sacante    yat vām pakvam pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī sam śrayethām  /

original: yajñam yantam manasā bṛhantam anvārohāmi tapasā sayoniḥ  / upahūtāḥ agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādam madema  /
analyzed: yajñam yantam manasā bṛhantam anvārohāmi tapasā sayoniḥ   upahūtāḥ agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādam madema  /

original: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi  / yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ aham indraḥ marutvān sa dadātu tat me  /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi   yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ aham indraḥ marutvān sa dadātu tat me  /

original: etam sadhasthāḥ pari vaḥ dadāmi yam śevadhim āvahāt jātavedaḥ  / anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti tam sma jānīta parame vyoman  /
analyzed: etam sadhasthāḥ pari vaḥ dadāmi yam śevadhim āvahāt jātavedaḥ   anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti tam sma jānīta parame vyoman  /

original: jānīta sma enam parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthāḥ vida lokam atra  / anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti iṣṭāpūrtam sma kṛṇuta āvis asmai  /
analyzed: jānīta sma enam parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthāḥ vida lokam atra   anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti iṣṭāpūrtam sma kṛṇuta āvis asmai  /

original: devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ  / yaḥ asmi saḥ asmi  //
analyzed: devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ   yaḥ asmi saḥ asmi

original: sa pacāmi sa dadāmi  / sa yaje sa dattāt mā yūṣam  /
analyzed: sa pacāmi sa dadāmi   sa yaje sa dattāt mā yūṣam

original: nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatra etat prati tiṣṭhatu  / viddhi pūrtasya naḥ rājan sa deva sumanāḥ bhava  //
analyzed: nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatra etat prati tiṣṭhatu   viddhi pūrtasya naḥ rājan sa deva sumanāḥ bhava  /

original: divaḥ nu mām bṛhataḥ antarikṣāt apām stokaḥ abhī apaptat rasena  / sam indriyena payasā aham agne chandobhiḥ yajñaiḥ su kṛtām kṛtena  /
analyzed: divaḥ nu mām bṛhataḥ antarikṣāt apām stokaḥ abhī apaptat rasena    sam indriyena payasā aham agne chandobhiḥ yajñaiḥ su kṛtām kṛtena  /

original: yadi vṛkṣāt abhyapaptat phalam tat yadi antarikṣāt saḥ u vāyuḥ eva  / yatra aspṛkṣat tanvaḥ yat ca vāsasaḥ āpaḥ nudantu nirṛtim parācais  /
analyzed: yadi vṛkṣāt abhyapaptat phalam tat yadi antarikṣāt saḥ u vāyuḥ eva   yatra aspṛkṣat tanvaḥ yat ca vāsasaḥ āpaḥ nudantu nirṛtim parācais  /

original: abhyañjanam surabhi sā samṛddhiḥ hiraṇyam varcaḥ tat u pūtrimam eva  / sarvā pavitrā vitatā adhi asmat tat mā tārīt nirṛtiḥ mā u arātiḥ  /
analyzed: abhyañjanam surabhi sā samṛddhiḥ hiraṇyam varcaḥ tat u pūtrimam eva   sarvā pavitrā vitatā adhi asmat tat mā tārīt nirṛtiḥ mā u arātiḥ  /

original: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ  / gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni  //
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ   gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni  /

original: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ pari ābhṛtam sahaḥ  / apām ojmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja  //
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ pari ābhṛtam sahaḥ    apām ojmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja  /

original: indrasya ojaḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ  / saḥ imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya  //
analyzed: indrasya ojaḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ    saḥ imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya  /

original: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyam purutrā te vanvatām viṣṭhitam jagat  / sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn  /
analyzed: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyam purutrā te vanvatām viṣṭhitam jagat    sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn  /

original: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ abhi stana duritā bādhamānaḥ  / apa sedha dundubhe duchunām itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva  /
analyzed: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ abhi stana duritā bādhamānaḥ   apa sedha dundubhe duchunām itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva  /

original: pra amūm jaya abhīme jayantu ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadītu  / sam aśva parṇāḥ patantu naḥ naraḥ asmākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu  /
analyzed: pra amūm jaya abhīme jayantu ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadītu   sam aśva parṇāḥ patantu naḥ naraḥ asmākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu  /

original: vidradhasya balāsasya lohitasya vanaspate  / visalpakasya auṣadhe mā ud śiṣaḥ piśitam cana  /
analyzed: vidradhasya balāsasya lohitasya vanaspate    visalpakasya auṣadhe mā ud śiṣaḥ piśitam cana  /

original: yau te balāsa tiṣṭhataḥ kakṣe muṣkau apaśritau  / veda aham tasya bheṣajam cīpudruḥ abhicakṣaṇam  /
analyzed: yau te balāsa tiṣṭhataḥ kakṣe muṣkau apaśritau   veda aham tasya bheṣajam cīpudruḥ abhicakṣaṇam  /

original: yaḥ aṅgyaḥ yaḥ karṇyaḥ yaḥ akṣyoḥ visalpakaḥ  / vi vṛhāmaḥ visalpakam vidradham hṛdaya āmayam  / parā tam a jñātam yakṣmam adharāñcam suvāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ aṅgyaḥ yaḥ karṇyaḥ yaḥ akṣyoḥ visalpakaḥ   vi vṛhāmaḥ visalpakam vidradham hṛdaya āmayam   parā tam a jñātam yakṣmam adharāñcam suvāmasi  /

original: śakadhūmam nakṣatrāṇi yat rājānam akurvata  / bhadra aham asmai prāyacchan idam rāṣṭram asāt iti  /
analyzed: śakadhūmam nakṣatrāṇi yat rājānam akurvata    bhadra aham asmai prāyacchan idam rāṣṭram asāt iti

original: bhadra aham naḥ madhyaṃdine bhadra aham sāyam astu naḥ  / bhadra aham naḥ ahnām prātā rātrī bhadra aham astu naḥ  /
analyzed: bhadra aham naḥ madhyaṃdine bhadra aham sāyam astu naḥ    bhadra aham naḥ ahnām prātā rātrī bhadra aham astu naḥ  /

original: ahar rātrābhyām nakṣatrebhyaḥ suryācandramasābhyām  / bhadra aham asmabhyam rājan śakadhūma tvam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: ahar rātrābhyām nakṣatrebhyaḥ suryācandramasābhyām    bhadra aham asmabhyam rājan śakadhūma tvam kṛdhi  /

original: yaḥ naḥ bhadra aham akaraḥ sāyam naktam atho divā  / tasmai te nakṣatra rāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ bhadra aham akaraḥ sāyam naktam atho divā    tasmai te nakṣatra rāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ  /

original: bhagena mā śāṃśapena sākam indreṇa medinā  / kṛṇomi bhaginam mā apa drāntu arātayaḥ  /
analyzed: bhagena mā śāṃśapena sākam indreṇa medinā   kṛṇomi bhaginam mā apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: yena vṛkṣām abhyabhavaḥ bhagena varcasā saha  / tena mā bhaginam kṛṇu apa drāntu arātayaḥ  /
analyzed: yena vṛkṣām abhyabhavaḥ bhagena varcasā saha   tena mā bhaginam kṛṇu apa drāntu arātayaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ andhaḥ yaḥ punaḥsaraḥ bhagaḥ vṛkṣeṣu āhitaḥ   tena mā bhaginam kṛṇu apa drāntu arātayaḥ  /

original: ratha jitām rātha jiteyīnām apsarasām ayam smaraḥ  / devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  //
analyzed: ratha jitām rātha jiteyīnām apsarasām ayam smaraḥ    devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  /

analyzed: asau me smaratāt iti priyaḥ me smaratāt iti    devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  /

original: yathā mama smarāt asau na amuṣya aham kadā cana  / devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  //
analyzed: yathā mama smarāt asau na amuṣya aham kadā cana    devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  /

original: ud mādayata marutaḥ ud antarikṣa mādaya  / agne ud mādaya tvam asau mām anu śocatu  /
analyzed: ud mādayata marutaḥ ud antarikṣa mādaya   agne ud mādaya tvam asau mām anu śocatu  /

original: ni śīrṣataḥ ni pattataḥ ādhyaḥ ni tirāmi te  / devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  //
analyzed: ni śīrṣataḥ ni pattataḥ ādhyaḥ ni tirāmi te    devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  /

original: anumate anu idam manyasva akute sam idam namaḥ  / devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  //
analyzed: anumate anu idam manyasva akute sam idam namaḥ   devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu  /

original: yat dhāvasi tri yojanam pañca yojanam āśvinam  / tatas tvam punar āyasi putrāṇām naḥ asaḥ pitā  /
analyzed: yat dhāvasi tri yojanam pañca yojanam āśvinam   tatas tvam punar āyasi putrāṇām naḥ asaḥ pitā  /

original: yam devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā  / tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: yam devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā    tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /

original: yam viśve devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā  / tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: yam viśve devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā    tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /

original: yam indrāṇī smaram asiñcat apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā  / tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: yam indrāṇī smaram asiñcat apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā    tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /

original: yam indra agnī smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā  / tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: yam indra agnī smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā    tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /

original: yam mitrāvaruṇau smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā  / tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: yam mitrāvaruṇau smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha adhyā    tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā  /

original: yaḥ imām devaḥ mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha yaḥ u naḥ yuyoja  / yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmaḥ sa pāram ichāt saḥ u naḥ vi muñcāt  /
analyzed: yaḥ imām devaḥ mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha yaḥ u naḥ yuyoja   yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmaḥ sa pāram ichāt saḥ u naḥ vi muñcāt  /

original: āhutā asi abhihuta ṛṣīṇām asi āyudham  / pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīra ghnī bhava mekhale  /
analyzed: āhutā asi abhihuta ṛṣīṇām asi āyudham   pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīra ghnī bhava mekhale  /

original: mṛtyoḥ aham brahmacārī yat asmi niryācan bhūtāt puruṣam yamāya  / tam aham brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇa anayā enam mekhalayā sināmi  //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ aham brahmacārī yat asmi niryācan bhūtāt puruṣam yamāya   tam aham brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇa anayā enam mekhalayā sināmi  /

original: śraddhāyāḥ duhitā tapasaḥ adhi jātā svasā ṛṣīṇām bhūta kṛtām babhūva  / sā naḥ mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atha u naḥ dhehi tapaḥ indriyam ca  /
analyzed: śraddhāyāḥ duhitā tapasaḥ adhi jātā svasā ṛṣīṇām bhūta kṛtām babhūva   sā naḥ mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atha u naḥ dhehi tapaḥ indriyam ca  /

original: yām tvā pūrve bhūta kṛtaḥ ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire  / sā tvam pari svajasva mām dīrgha āyu tvāya mekhale  /
analyzed: yām tvā pūrve bhūta kṛtaḥ ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire    sā tvam pari svajasva mām dīrgha āyu tvāya mekhale  /

original: ayam vajraḥ tarpayatām ṛtasya ava asya rāṣṭram apa hantu jīvitam  / śṛṇātu grīvāḥ pra śṛṇātu uṣṇihāḥ vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ  /
analyzed: ayam vajraḥ tarpayatām ṛtasya ava asya rāṣṭram apa hantu jīvitam   śṛṇātu grīvāḥ pra śṛṇātu uṣṇihāḥ vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ  /

original: adharaḥ adharaḥ uttarebhyaḥ gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ mā ud sṛpat  / vajreṇa avahataḥ śayām  /
analyzed: adharaḥ adharaḥ uttarebhyaḥ gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ mā ud sṛpat   vajreṇa avahataḥ śayām  /

original: yaḥ jināti tam anviccha yaḥ jināti tam id jahi  / jinataḥ vajra tvam sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya  //
analyzed: yaḥ jināti tam anviccha yaḥ jināti tam id jahi    jinataḥ vajra tvam sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya  /

original: yat aśnāmi balam kurve ittham vajram ā dade  / skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ  /
analyzed: yat aśnāmi balam kurve ittham vajram ā dade    skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ  /

original: yat pibāmi sam pibāmi samudraḥ iva saṃpibaḥ  / prāṇān amuṣya saṃpāya sam pibāmaḥ amum vayam  /
analyzed: yat pibāmi sam pibāmi samudraḥ iva saṃpibaḥ   prāṇān amuṣya saṃpāya sam pibāmaḥ amum vayam  /

original: yat girāmi sam girāmi samudraḥ iva saṃgiraḥ  / prāṇān amuṣya saṃgīrya sam girāmaḥ amum vayam  /
analyzed: yat girāmi sam girāmi samudraḥ iva saṃgiraḥ   prāṇān amuṣya saṃgīrya sam girāmaḥ amum vayam  /

original: devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asi oṣadhe  / tām tvā nitatni keśebhyaḥ dṛṃhaṇāya khanāmasi  //
analyzed: devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asi oṣadhe   tām tvā nitatni keśebhyaḥ dṛṃhaṇāya khanāmasi  /

analyzed: dṛṃha pratnān janaya a jātān jātān u varṣīyasaḥ kṛdhi
