original: rakṣantu tvā agnayaḥ ye apsu antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyāḥ yam indhate  / vaiśvānaraḥ rakṣatu jātavedāḥ divyaḥ tvā mā pra dhāk vidyutā saha  /
analyzed: rakṣantu tvā agnayaḥ ye apsu antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyāḥ yam indhate    vaiśvānaraḥ rakṣatu jātavedāḥ divyaḥ tvā mā pra dhāk vidyutā saha  /

original: mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃstārāt saṃkasukāt cara rakṣatu tvā dyauḥ rakṣatu  / pṛthivī sūryaḥ ca tvā rakṣatām candramāḥ ca  / antarikṣam rakṣatu deva hetyāḥ  //
analyzed: mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃstā ārāt saṃkasukāt cara rakṣatu tvā dyauḥ rakṣatu  / pṛthivī sūryaḥ ca tvā rakṣatām candramāḥ ca   antarikṣam rakṣatu deva hetyāḥ  /

original: bodhaḥ ca tvā pratibodhaḥ ca rakṣatām asvapnaḥ ca tvā anavadrāṇaḥ ca rakṣatām  / gopāyan ca tvā jāgṛviḥ ca rakṣatām  / gopāyan ca tvā jāgṛviḥ ca rakṣatām  / gopāyan ca tvā jāgṛviḥ ca rakṣatām  /
analyzed: bodhaḥ ca tvā pratibodhaḥ ca rakṣatām asvapnaḥ ca tvā anavadrāṇaḥ ca rakṣatām              ca rakṣatām        ca rakṣatām        ca tvā jāgṛviḥ ca rakṣatām       /

original: te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu tebhyaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā  //
analyzed: te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu tebhyaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā

original: jīvebhyaḥ tvā samude vāyuḥ indraḥ dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ  / mā tvā prāṇaḥ balam ha āsīt asum te anu hvayāmasi  //
analyzed: jīvebhyaḥ tvā samude vāyuḥ indraḥ dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ   mā tvā prāṇaḥ balam ha āsīt asum te anu hvayāmasi  /

original: mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanuḥ mā tamaḥ vidat mā jihvā barhiḥ pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ  / ud tvā ādityāḥ vasavaḥ bharantu ud indra agnī svastaye  /
analyzed: mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanuḥ mā tamaḥ vidat mā jihvā barhiḥ pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ    ud tvā ādityāḥ vasavaḥ bharantu ud indra agnī svastaye  /

original: ud tvā dyauḥ ud pṛthivī ud prajāpatiḥ agrabhīt  / ud tvā mṛtyoḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ apīparan  /
analyzed: ud tvā dyauḥ ud pṛthivī ud prajāpatiḥ agrabhīt    ud tvā mṛtyoḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ apīparan  /

original: ayam devāḥ iha eva astu ayam mā amutra gāt itas  / imam sahasra vīryeṇa mṛtyoḥ ud pārayāmasi  //
analyzed: ayam devāḥ iha eva astu ayam mā amutra gāt itas    imam sahasra vīryeṇa mṛtyoḥ ud pārayāmasi  /

original: ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam sam dhamantu vayodhasaḥ  / mā tvā vyasta keśyaḥ mā tvā agharudaḥ rudan  /
analyzed: ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam sam dhamantu vayodhasaḥ   mā tvā vyasta keśyaḥ mā tvā agharudaḥ rudan  /

original: āhārṣam avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ  / sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam  /
analyzed: āhārṣam avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ    sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam  /

original: vi avāt te jyotiḥ abhūt apa tvat tamaḥ akramīt  / apa tvat mṛtyum nirṛtim apa yakṣmam ni dadhmasi  //  // {2}
analyzed: vi avāt te jyotiḥ abhūt apa tvat tamaḥ akramīt   apa tvat mṛtyum nirṛtim apa yakṣmam ni dadhmasi

original: ā rabhasva imām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim a chidyamānā jaradaṣṭiḥ astu te  / asum te āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajaḥ tamaḥ mā upa gāḥ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ  //
analyzed: ā rabhasva imām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim a chidyamānā jaradaṣṭiḥ astu te    asum te āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajaḥ tamaḥ mā upa gāḥ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ  /

original: jīvatām jyotiḥ abhyehi arvāṅ ā tvā harāmi śata śāradāya  / avamuñcat mṛtyu pāśān aśastim drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram te dadhāmi  //
analyzed: jīvatām jyotiḥ abhyehi arvāṅ ā tvā harāmi śata śāradāya   avamuñcat mṛtyu pāśān aśastim drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram te dadhāmi  /

original: vātāt te prānam avidam sūryāt cakṣuḥ aham tava  / yat te manaḥ tvayi tat dhārayāmi sam vitsva aṅgaiḥ vada jihvayā ālapan  /
analyzed: vātāt te prānam avidam sūryāt cakṣuḥ aham tava    yat te manaḥ tvayi tat dhārayāmi sam vitsva aṅgaiḥ vada jihvayā ālapan  /

original: prāṇena tvā dvipadām catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi sam dhamāmi  / namaḥ te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te akaram  /
analyzed: prāṇena tvā dvipadām catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi sam dhamāmi   namaḥ te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te akaram  /

original: ayam jīvatu mā mṛtaḥ imam sam īrayāmasi  / kṛṇomi asmai bheṣajam mṛtyo mā puruṣam vadhīḥ  //
analyzed: ayam jīvatu mā mṛtaḥ imam sam īrayāmasi   kṛṇomi asmai bheṣajam mṛtyo mā puruṣam vadhīḥ  /

original: jīvalām naghāriṣām jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham  / trāyamāṇām sahamānām sahasvatīm iha huve asmai ariṣṭatātaye  //
analyzed: jīvalām naghāriṣām jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham    trāyamāṇām sahamānām sahasvatīm iha huve asmai ariṣṭatātaye  /

original: adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛja imam tava eva san sarva hāyāḥ iha astu  / bhava aśarvau mṛḍatam śarma yacchatam apasidhya duritam dhattam āyuḥ  /
analyzed: adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛja imam tava eva san sarva hāyāḥ iha astu   bhava aśarvau mṛḍatam śarma yacchatam apasidhya duritam dhattam āyuḥ  /

original: asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhi imam dayasva ud itas ayam etu  / ariṣṭaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ su śrut jarasā śata hāyanaḥ ātmanā bhujam aśnutām  /
analyzed: asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhi imam dayasva ud itas ayam etu    ariṣṭaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ su śrut jarasā śata hāyanaḥ ātmanā bhujam aśnutām  /

original: devānām hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi tvā rajasaḥ ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam  / ārāt agnim kravya adam nirūham jīvātave te paridhim dadhāmi  //
analyzed: devānām hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi tvā rajasaḥ ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam   ārāt agnim kravya adam nirūham jīvātave te paridhim dadhāmi  /
yat te niyānam rajasam mṛtyo an avadharṣyam   pathaḥ imam tasmāt rakṣantaḥ brahma asmai varma kṛṇmasi

original: kṛṇomi te prāṇa apānau jarām mṛtyum dīrgham āyuḥ svasti  / vaivasvatena prahitān yama dūtān carataḥ apa sedhāmi sarvān  /
analyzed: kṛṇomi te prāṇa apānau jarām mṛtyum dīrgham āyuḥ svasti   vaivasvatena prahitān yama dūtān carataḥ apa sedhāmi sarvān  /

original: ārāt arātim nirṛtim paras grāhim kravya adaḥ piśācān  / rakṣaḥ yat sarvam durbhūtam tat tamaḥ iva apa hanmasi  //
analyzed: ārāt arātim nirṛtim paras grāhim kravya adaḥ piśācān    rakṣaḥ yat sarvam durbhūtam tat tamaḥ iva apa hanmasi  /

original: agneḥ ta prānam amṛtāt āyuṣmataḥ vanve jātavedasaḥ  / yathā na riṣyāḥ amṛtaḥ sajūs asaḥ tat te kṛṇomi tat u te sam ṛdhyatām  /
analyzed: agneḥ ta prānam amṛtāt āyuṣmataḥ vanve jātavedasaḥ   yathā na riṣyāḥ amṛtaḥ sajūs asaḥ tat te kṛṇomi tat u te sam ṛdhyatām  /

original: śive te stām dyāvāpṛthivī asaṃtāpe abhiśriyau  / śam te sūryaḥ ā tapatu śam vātaḥ vātu te hṛde  / śivāḥ abhi kṣarantu tvāpaḥ divyāḥ payasvatīḥ  /
analyzed: śive te stām dyāvāpṛthivī asaṃtāpe abhiśriyau   śam te sūryaḥ ā tapatu śam vātaḥ vātu te hṛde   śivāḥ abhi kṣarantu tvāpaḥ divyāḥ payasvatīḥ  /

original: śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ ud tvā ahārṣam adharasyāḥ uttarām pṛthivīm abhi / tatra tvā ādityau rakṣatām sūryācandramasau ubhā //
analyzed: śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ ud tvā ahārṣam adharasyāḥ uttarām pṛthivīm abhi tatra tvā ādityau rakṣatām sūryācandramasau ubhā

original: yat te vāsaḥ paridhānam yām nīvim kṛṇuṣe tvam  / śivam te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe adrūkṣṇam astu te  /
analyzed: yat te vāsaḥ paridhānam yām nīvim kṛṇuṣe tvam    śivam te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe adrūkṣṇam astu te  /

original: yat kṣureṇa marcayatā su tejasā vaptā vapasi keśa śmaśru  / śubham mukham mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ  /
analyzed: yat kṣureṇa marcayatā su tejasā vaptā vapasi keśa śmaśru    śubham mukham mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ  /

original: śivau te stām vrīhi yavau abalāsau adomadhau  / etau yakṣmam vi bādhete etau muñcataḥ aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: śivau te stām vrīhi yavau abalāsau adomadhau   etau yakṣmam vi bādhete etau muñcataḥ aṃhasaḥ  /

original: yat aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyam kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ  / yat ādyam yat anādyam sarvam te annam aviṣam kṛṇomi  //
analyzed: yat aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyam kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ   yat ādyam yat anādyam sarvam te annam aviṣam kṛṇomi  /

original: ahne ca tvā rātraye ca ubhābhyām pari dadmasi  / arāyebhyaḥ jighatsubhyaḥ imam me pari rakṣata  //  // {4}
analyzed: ahne ca tvā rātraye ca ubhābhyām pari dadmasi   arāyebhyaḥ jighatsubhyaḥ imam me pari rakṣata

original: śatam te ayutam hāyanān dve yuge trīṇi catvāri kṛṇmaḥ  / indra agnī viśve devāḥ te anu manyantām a hṛṇīyamānāḥ  /
analyzed: śatam te ayutam hāyanān dve yuge trīṇi catvāri kṛṇmaḥ   indra agnī viśve devāḥ te anu manyantām a hṛṇīyamānāḥ  /

original: śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi  / varṣāṇi tubhyam syonāni yeṣu vardhante oṣadhīḥ  /
analyzed: śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi   varṣāṇi tubhyam syonāni yeṣu vardhante oṣadhīḥ  /

original: mṛtyuḥ īśe dvipadām mṛtyuḥ īśe catuṣpadām  / tasmāt tvām mṛtyoḥ gopateḥ ud bharāmi sa mā bibheḥ  //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ īśe dvipadām mṛtyuḥ īśe catuṣpadām   tasmāt tvām mṛtyoḥ gopateḥ ud bharāmi sa mā bibheḥ  /

original: saḥ ariṣṭa na mariṣyasi na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ  / na vai tatra mriyante naḥ yanti adhamam tamaḥ  //
analyzed: saḥ ariṣṭa na mariṣyasi na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ   na vai tatra mriyante naḥ yanti adhamam tamaḥ  /

original: sarvaḥ vai tatra jīvati gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ  / yatra idam brahma kriyate paridhiḥ jīvanāya kam  /
analyzed: sarvaḥ vai tatra jīvati gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ   yatra idam brahma kriyate paridhiḥ jīvanāya kam  /

original: pari tvā pātu samānebhyaḥ abhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ  / amamriḥ bhava amṛtaḥ atijīvaḥ mā te hāsiṣuḥ asavaḥ śarīram  /
analyzed: pari tvā pātu samānebhyaḥ abhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ    amamriḥ bhava amṛtaḥ atijīvaḥ mā te hāsiṣuḥ asavaḥ śarīram  /

original: ye mṛtyavaḥ eka śatam yāḥ nāṣṭrāḥ atitāryāḥ  / muñcantu tasmāt tvām devāḥ agneḥ vaiśvānarāt adhi  /
analyzed: ye mṛtyavaḥ eka śatam yāḥ nāṣṭrāḥ atitāryāḥ   muñcantu tasmāt tvām devāḥ agneḥ vaiśvānarāt adhi  /

original: agneḥ śarīram asi pārayiṣṇu rakṣaḥ hā asi sapatna hā  / atha u amīva cātanaḥ pūtudruḥ nāma bheṣajam  //  // {5}
analyzed: agneḥ śarīram asi pārayiṣṇu rakṣaḥ hā asi sapatna hā   atha u amīva cātanaḥ pūtudruḥ nāma bheṣajam

original: rakṣaḥ haṇam vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma  / śiśānaḥ agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam  /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma    śiśānaḥ agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam  /

original: ayaḥ daṃṣṭraḥ arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ  / ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravya adaḥ vṛṣṭvā api dhatsva āsan  /
analyzed: ayaḥ daṃṣṭraḥ arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ   ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravya adaḥ vṛṣṭvā api dhatsva āsan  /

original: ubhā ubhayāvin upa dhehi daṃṣṭrau hiṃsraḥ śiśānaḥ avaram param ca  / uta antarikṣe pari yāhi agne jambhaiḥ sam dhehi abhi yātudhānān  /
analyzed: ubhā ubhayāvin upa dhehi daṃṣṭrau hiṃsraḥ śiśānaḥ avaram param ca     uta antarikṣe pari yāhi agne jambhaiḥ sam dhehi abhi yātudhānān  /

original: agne tvacam yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsra aśaniḥ harasā hantu enam  / pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyād kraviṣṇuḥ vi cinotu enam  /
analyzed: agne tvacam yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsra aśaniḥ harasā hantu enam    pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyād kraviṣṇuḥ vi cinotu enam  /

original: yatra idānīm paśyasi jātavedaḥ tiṣṭhantam agne uta vā carantam  / uta antarikṣe patantam yātudhānam tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ  /
analyzed: yatra idānīm paśyasi jātavedaḥ tiṣṭhantam agne uta vā carantam    uta antarikṣe patantam yātudhānam tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ  /

original: yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ saṃnamamānaḥ agne iva ācā śalyām aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ  / tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhi eṣām  /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ saṃnamamānaḥ agne iva ācā śalyām aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ    tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhi eṣām  /

original: uta ārabdhān spṛnuhi jātavedaḥ uta ārebhāṇām ṛṣṭibhiḥ yātudhānān  / agne pūrvaḥ ni jahi śośucānaḥ āma adaḥ kṣviṅkāḥ tam adantu enīḥ  /
analyzed: uta ārabdhān spṛnuhi jātavedaḥ uta ārebhāṇām ṛṣṭibhiḥ yātudhānān    agne pūrvaḥ ni jahi śośucānaḥ āma adaḥ kṣviṅkāḥ tam adantu enīḥ  /

original: iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ saḥ agne yātudhānaḥ yaḥ idam kṛṇoti  / tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛ cakṣasaḥ cakṣuṣe randhaya enam  /
analyzed: iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ saḥ agne yātudhānaḥ yaḥ idam kṛṇoti   tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛ cakṣasaḥ cakṣuṣe randhaya enam  /

original: tīkṣṇena agne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcam vasubhyaḥ pra naya pracetaḥ  / hiṃsram rakṣāṃsi abhi śośucānam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ  /
analyzed: tīkṣṇena agne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcam vasubhyaḥ pra naya pracetaḥ   hiṃsram rakṣāṃsi abhi śośucānam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ  /

original: nṛ cakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhi agrā  / tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca  / tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca  // tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca  // tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca  // tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā m
analyzed: nṛ cakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhi agrā    tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca   tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca     tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca                 / agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca           /

original: tris yātudhānaḥ prasitim te etu ṛtam yaḥ agne anṛtena hanti  / tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni yuṅgdhi  //
analyzed: tris yātudhānaḥ prasitim te etu ṛtam yaḥ agne anṛtena hanti   tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni yuṅgdhi  /

original: yat agne adya mithunā śapātaḥ yat vācaḥ tṛṣṭam janayanta rebhāḥ  / manyoḥ manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān  /
analyzed: yat agne adya mithunā śapātaḥ yat vācaḥ tṛṣṭam janayanta rebhāḥ    manyoḥ manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān  /

original: parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parā agne rakṣaḥ harasā śṛṇīhi  / parā arciṣā mūradevān śṛṇīhi parā asutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi  //
analyzed: parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parā agne rakṣaḥ harasā śṛṇīhi   parā arciṣā mūradevān śṛṇīhi parā asutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi  /

original: parā adya devāḥ vṛjinam śṛṇantu pratyak enam śapathāḥ yantu sṛṣṭāḥ  / vācā stenam śaravaḥ ṛchantu marman viśvasya etu prasitim yātudhānaḥ  /
analyzed: parā adya devāḥ vṛjinam śṛṇantu pratyak enam śapathāḥ yantu sṛṣṭāḥ   vācā stenam śaravaḥ ṛchantu marman viśvasya etu prasitim yātudhānaḥ  /

original: yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yaḥ aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ  / yaḥ aghnyāyāḥ bharati kṣīram agne teṣām śīrṣāṇi harasā api vṛśca  /
analyzed: yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yaḥ aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ    yaḥ aghnyāyāḥ bharati kṣīram agne teṣām śīrṣāṇi harasā api vṛśca  /

original: viṣam gavām yātudhānāḥ bharantām ā vṛścantām aditaye durevāḥ  / para eṇān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnām jayantām  /

original: saṃvatsarīṇam payaḥ usriyāyāḥ tasya mā aśīt yātudhānaḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ  / pīyūṣam agne yatamaḥ titṛpsāt tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marmaṇi  //
analyzed: saṃvatsarīṇam payaḥ usriyāyāḥ tasya mā aśīt yātudhānaḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ   pīyūṣam agne yatamaḥ titṛpsāt tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marmaṇi  /

original: tat agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaḥ yena paśyasi yātudhānān  / atharvavat jyotiṣā daivyena satyam dhūrvantam acitam nyoṣa  /
analyzed: tat agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaḥ yena paśyasi yātudhānān    atharvavat jyotiṣā daivyena satyam dhūrvantam acitam nyoṣa  /

original: pari tvā agne puram vayam vipram sahasya dhīmahi  / dhṛṣat varṇam divedive hantāram bhaṅgurāvataḥ  /
analyzed: pari tvā agne puram vayam vipram sahasya dhīmahi    dhṛṣat varṇam divedive hantāram bhaṅgurāvataḥ  /

original: viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣasaḥ jahi  / agne tigmena śociṣā tapuḥ agrābhiḥ arcibhiḥ  /
analyzed: viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣasaḥ jahi   agne tigmena śociṣā tapuḥ agrābhiḥ arcibhiḥ  /

original: vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāti agniḥ āvis viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā  / pra adevīḥ māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣobhyaḥ vinikṣe  /
analyzed: vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāti agniḥ āvis viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā   pra adevīḥ māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣobhyaḥ vinikṣe  /

original: ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedaḥ tigma hetī brahma saṃśite  / tābhyām durhārdam abhidāsantam kimīdinam  / pratyañcam arciṣā jātavedaḥ vi nikṣva  /
analyzed: ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedaḥ tigma hetī brahma saṃśite    tābhyām durhārdam abhidāsantam kimīdinam   pratyañcam arciṣā jātavedaḥ vi nikṣva  /

original: indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam ni arpayatam vṛṣaṇā tamaḥ vṛdhaḥ  / parā śṛṇītam acitaḥ ni oṣatam hatam nudethām ni śiśītam attriṇaḥ  /
analyzed: indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam ni arpayatam vṛṣaṇā tamaḥ vṛdhaḥ   parā śṛṇītam acitaḥ ni oṣatam hatam nudethām ni śiśītam attriṇaḥ  /

original: indrāsomā sam agha śaṃsam abhi agham tapuḥ yayastu caruḥ agnimān iva  / brahma dviṣe kravya ade ghora cakṣase dveṣaḥ dhattam an avāyam kimīdine  /
analyzed: indrāsomā sam agha śaṃsam abhi agham tapuḥ yayastu caruḥ agnimān iva    brahma dviṣe kravya ade ghora cakṣase dveṣaḥ dhattam an avāyam kimīdine  /

original: indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛtaḥ vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam  / yatas na eṣām punar ekaḥ cana udayat tat vām astu sahase manyumat śavaḥ  /
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛtaḥ vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam   yatas na eṣām punar ekaḥ cana udayat tat vām astu sahase manyumat śavaḥ  /

original: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ vadham sam pṛthivyāḥ agha śaṃsāya tarhaṇam  / ud takṣatam svaryam parvatebhyaḥ yena rakṣaḥ vāvṛdhānam nijūrvathaḥ  /
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ vadham sam pṛthivyāḥ agha śaṃsāya tarhaṇam    ud takṣatam svaryam parvatebhyaḥ yena rakṣaḥ vāvṛdhānam nijūrvathaḥ  /

original: indrāsomāḥ vartayatam divaḥ pari agni taptebhiḥ yuvam aśma hanmabhiḥ  / tapuḥ vadhebhiḥ ajarebhiḥ attriṇaḥ ni parśāne vidhyatam yantu nisvaram  /
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ vartayatam divaḥ pari agni taptebhiḥ yuvam aśma hanmabhiḥ   tapuḥ vadhebhiḥ ajarebhiḥ attriṇaḥ ni parśāne vidhyatam yantu nisvaram  /

original: indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvatas iyam matiḥ kakṣyā aśvā iva vājinā  / yām vām hotrām parihinomi medhayā imā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam  /
analyzed: indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvatas iyam matiḥ kakṣyā aśvā iva vājinā   yām vām hotrām parihinomi medhayā imā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam  /

original: prati smarethām tujayadbhiḥ evaiḥ hatam druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ  / indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūt yaḥ mā kadā cit abhidāsati druhuḥ  /
analyzed: prati smarethām tujayadbhiḥ evaiḥ hatam druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ    indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūt yaḥ mā kadā cit abhidāsati druhuḥ  /

original: yaḥ mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhiḥ vacobhiḥ  / āpaḥ iva kāśinā samgṛbhītāḥ asan astu asataḥ indra vaktā  /

original: ye pāka śaṃsam viharante evaiḥ ye vā bhadram dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ  / ahaye vā tān pradadātu somaḥ ā vā dadhātu nirṛteḥ upaṣṭhe  //

original: paras saḥ astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ adhas astu viśvāḥ  / prati śuṣyatu yaśaḥ asya devāḥ yaḥ mā divā dipsati yaḥ ca naktam  /
analyzed: paras saḥ astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ adhas astu viśvāḥ   prati śuṣyatu yaśaḥ asya devāḥ yaḥ mā divā dipsati yaḥ ca naktam  /

original: su vijñānam cikituṣe janāya sat ca asat ca vacasī paspṛdhāte  / tasyoḥ yat satyam yatarat ṛjīyaḥ tat id somaḥ avati hanti asat  /
analyzed: su vijñānam cikituṣe janāya sat ca asat ca vacasī paspṛdhāte   tasyoḥ yat satyam yatarat ṛjīyaḥ tat id somaḥ avati hanti asat  /

original: na vai u somaḥ vṛjinam hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam  / hanti rakṣaḥ hanti āsat vadantam ubhau indrasya prasitau śayāte  /
analyzed: na vai u somaḥ vṛjinam hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam   hanti rakṣaḥ hanti āsat vadantam ubhau indrasya prasitau śayāte  /

original: yadi vā aham anṛta devaḥ asmi mogham vā devām apyūhe agne  / kim asmabhyam jātavedaḥ hṛṇīṣe drogha vācaḥ te nirṛtham sacantām  /
analyzed: yadi vā aham anṛta devaḥ asmi mogham vā devām apyūhe agne   kim asmabhyam jātavedaḥ hṛṇīṣe drogha vācaḥ te nirṛtham sacantām  /

original: adyā murīya yadi yātudhānaḥ asmi yadi vāyuḥ tatapa puruṣasya  / adhā sa vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ vi yūyāḥ yaḥ mā mogham yātudhāna iti āha  /
analyzed: adyā murīya yadi yātudhānaḥ asmi yadi vāyuḥ tatapa puruṣasya    adhā sa vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ vi yūyāḥ yaḥ mā mogham yātudhāna iti āha  /

original: yaḥ mā ayātum yātudhāna iti āha yaḥ vā rakṣāḥ śiciḥ asmi iti āha  / indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoḥ adhamaḥ padīṣṭa  /
analyzed: yaḥ mā ayātum yātudhāna iti āha yaḥ vā rakṣāḥ śiciḥ asmi iti āha    indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoḥ adhamaḥ padīṣṭa  /

original: pra yā jigāti khargalā iva naktam apa druhuḥ tanvam gūhamānā  / vavram anantam ava sā padīṣṭia grāvāṇaḥ ghnantu rakṣasaḥ upabdaiḥ  /
analyzed: pra yā jigāti khargalā iva naktam apa druhuḥ tanvam gūhamānā   vavram anantam ava sā padīṣṭia grāvāṇaḥ ghnantu rakṣasaḥ upabdaiḥ  /

original: vi tiṣṭhadhvam marutaḥ vikṣu ichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭan  / vayaḥ ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhiḥ ye vā ripaḥ dadhire deve adhvare  /
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhadhvam marutaḥ vikṣu ichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭan   vayaḥ ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhiḥ ye vā ripaḥ dadhire deve adhvare  /

original: pra vartaya divaḥ aśmānam indra soma śitam maghavan sam śiśādhi  / prāktaḥ apāktaḥ adharāt udaktaḥ abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena  /
analyzed: pra vartaya divaḥ aśmānam indra soma śitam maghavan sam śiśādhi    prāktas apāktas adharāt udaktas abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena  /

original: ete u tye patayanti śva yātavaḥ indram dipsanti dipsavaḥ adābhyam  / śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  // śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  // śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  // śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  // śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  // śiśīte śakr
analyzed: ete u tye patayanti śva yātavaḥ indram dipsanti dipsavaḥ adābhyam    śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ    śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ   / śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  / śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  / śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  / śiśīte śakraḥ

original: indraḥ yātūnām abhavat parāśaraḥ havirmathīnām abhi āvivāsatām  / abhi id u śakraḥ paraśuḥ yathā vanam pātrā iva bhindan sataḥ etu rakṣasaḥ  /
analyzed: indraḥ yātūnām abhavat parāśaraḥ havirmathīnām abhi āvivāsatām    abhi id u śakraḥ paraśuḥ yathā vanam pātrā iva bhindan sataḥ etu rakṣasaḥ  /

original: ulūka yātum śuśulūka yātum jahi śva yātum uta koka yātum  / suparṇa yātum uta gṛdhra yātum dṛṣadā iva pra mṛṇa rakṣaḥ indra  /
analyzed: ulūka yātum śuśulūka yātum jahi śva yātum uta koka yātum    suparṇa yātum uta gṛdhra yātum dṛṣadā iva pra mṛṇa rakṣaḥ indra

original: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ abhi naṭ yātumāvat apocchantu mithunāḥ ye kimīdinaḥ  / pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ antarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān  /
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ abhi naṭ yātumāvat apocchantu mithunāḥ ye kimīdinaḥ    pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ antarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān  /

original: indra jahi pumāṃsam yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām  / vigrīvāsaḥ mūradevāḥ ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam  /
analyzed: indra jahi pumāṃsam yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām    vigrīvāsaḥ mūradevāḥ ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam  /

original: # prati cakṣva vi cakṣva indraḥ ca soma jāgṛtam  / rakṣobhyaḥ vadham asyatam aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ  //  //   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /   /
analyzed: prati cakṣva vi cakṣva indraḥ ca soma jāgṛtam     rakṣobhyaḥ vadham asyatam aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ

original: ayam pratisaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate  / vīryavān sapatna hā śūra vīraḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /
analyzed: ayam pratisaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate   vīryavān sapatna hā śūra vīraḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /

original: ayam maṇiḥ sapatna hā su vīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ  / pratyak kṛtyā dūṣayan eti vīraḥ  /
analyzed: ayam maṇiḥ sapatna hā su vīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ   pratyak kṛtyā dūṣayan eti vīraḥ  /

original: anena indraḥ maṇinā vṛtram ahan anena asurān parābhāvayat manīṣī  / anena ajayat dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime anena ajayat pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /
analyzed: anena indraḥ maṇinā vṛtram ahan anena asurān parābhāvayat manīṣī   anena ajayat dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime anena ajayat pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /

original: ayam srāktyaḥ maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥ pratisaraḥ  / ojasvān vimṛdhaḥ vaśī saḥ asmān pātu sarvatas  /
analyzed: ayam srāktyaḥ maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥ pratisaraḥ    ojasvān vimṛdhaḥ vaśī saḥ asmān pātu sarvatas  /

original: tat agniḥ āha tat u somaḥ āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tat indraḥ  / te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu  //
analyzed: tat agniḥ āha tat u somaḥ āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tat indraḥ   te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu  /

original: antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī uta ahar uta sūryam  / te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu  //
analyzed: antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī uta ahar uta sūryam   te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu  /

original: ye srāktyam maṇim janāḥ varmāṇi kṛṇvate  / sūryaḥ iva divam āruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī  /
analyzed: ye srāktyam maṇim janāḥ varmāṇi kṛṇvate   sūryaḥ iva divam āruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī  /

original: srāktyena maṇinā ṛṣiṇā iva manīṣiṇā  / ajaiṣam sarvāḥ pṛtanāḥ vi mṛdhaḥ hanmi rakṣasaḥ  /
analyzed: srāktyena maṇinā ṛṣiṇā iva manīṣiṇā    ajaiṣam sarvāḥ pṛtanāḥ vi mṛdhaḥ hanmi rakṣasaḥ  /

original: yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āṅgirasīḥ yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āsurīḥ yāḥ  / kṛtyāḥ svayaṃkṛtāḥ yāḥ u ca anyebhiḥ ābhṛtāḥ  / ubhayīḥ tāḥ parā yantu parāvataḥ navatim nāvyāḥ ati  /
analyzed: yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āṅgirasīḥ yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āsurīḥ yāḥ   kṛtyāḥ svayaṃkṛtāḥ yāḥ u ca anyebhiḥ ābhṛtāḥ   ubhayīḥ tāḥ parā yantu parāvataḥ navatim nāvyāḥ ati  /

original: asmai maṇim varma badhnantu devāḥ indraḥ viṣṇuḥ savitā rudraḥ agniḥ  / prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāj vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca sarve  /  /  /  /
analyzed: asmai maṇim varma badhnantu devāḥ indraḥ viṣṇuḥ savitā rudraḥ agniḥ prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāj vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca sarve

original: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva  / yam aichāma avidāma tam pratispāśanam antitam  /
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva   yam aichāma avidāma tam pratispāśanam antitam  /

original: saḥ id vyāghraḥ bhavati atha u siṃhaḥ atha u vṛṣā  / atha u sapatna karśanaḥ yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim  //
analyzed: saḥ id vyāghraḥ bhavati atha u siṃhaḥ atha u vṛṣā   atha u sapatna karśanaḥ yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim

original: na enam ghnanti apsarasaḥ na gandharvāḥ na martyāḥ  / sarvāḥ diśaḥ vi rājati yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim  //
analyzed: na enam ghnanti apsarasaḥ na gandharvāḥ na martyāḥ    sarvāḥ diśaḥ vi rājati yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim  /

original: kaśyapaḥ tvām asṛjata kaśyapaḥ tvā sam airayat  / abibhar tvā indraḥ mānuṣe bibhrat saṃśreṣiṇe ajayat  / maṇim sahasra vīryam varma devāḥ akṛṇvata  /
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ tvām asṛjata kaśyapaḥ tvā sam airayat    abibhar tvā indraḥ mānuṣe bibhrat saṃśreṣiṇe ajayat   maṇim sahasra vīryam varma devāḥ akṛṇvata  /

original: yaḥ tvā kṛtyābhiḥ yaḥ tvā dīkṣābhiḥ yajñaiḥ yaḥ tvā jighāṃsati  / pratyak tvam indra tam jahi vajreṇa śata parvaṇā  /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā kṛtyābhiḥ yaḥ tvā dīkṣābhiḥ yajñaiḥ yaḥ tvā jighāṃsati    pratyak tvam indra tam jahi vajreṇa śata parvaṇā  /

original: ayam id vai pratīvartaḥ ojasvān saṃjayaḥ maṇiḥ  / prajām dhanam ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /
analyzed: ayam id vai pratīvartaḥ ojasvān saṃjayaḥ maṇiḥ   prajām dhanam ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /

original: asapatnam naḥ adharāt asapatnam naḥ uttarāt  / indra asapatnam naḥ paścāt jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi  //
analyzed: asapatnam naḥ adharāt asapatnam naḥ uttarāt   indra asapatnam naḥ paścāt jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi  /

original: varma me dyāvāpṛthivī varma ahar varma sūryaḥ  / varma me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca varma dhātā dadhātu me  /
analyzed: varma me dyāvāpṛthivī varma ahar varma sūryaḥ   varma me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca varma dhātā dadhātu me  /

original: aindrāgnam varma bahulam yat ugram viśve devāḥ na atividhyanti sarve  / tat me tanvam trāyatām sarvatas bṛhat āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asāni  //
analyzed: aindrāgnam varma bahulam yat ugram viśve devāḥ na atividhyanti sarve   tat me tanvam trāyatām sarvatas bṛhat āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asāni  /

original: ā mārukṣat deva maṇiḥ mahyāḥ ariṣṭatātaye  / imam methim abhisaṃviśadhvam tanūpānam tri varūtham ojase  /
analyzed: ā mārukṣat deva maṇiḥ mahyāḥ ariṣṭatātaye    imam methim abhisaṃviśadhvam tanūpānam tri varūtham ojase  /

original: asmin indraḥ ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imam devāsaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam  / dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asat  /
analyzed: asmin indraḥ ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imam devāsaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam   dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asat  /

original: svasti dāḥ viśām patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī  / indraḥ badhnātu te maṇim jigīvām aparājitaḥ  / soma pāḥ abhayaṅkaraḥ vṛṣā  / yau te mātā unmamārja jātāyāḥ pati vedanau  / durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhat aliṃśaḥ uta vatsapaḥ  /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ viśām patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī    indraḥ badhnātu te maṇim jigīvām aparājitaḥ   soma pāḥ abhayaṅkaraḥ vṛṣā   yau te mātā unmamārja jātāyāḥ pati vedanau   durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhat aliṃśaḥ uta vatsapaḥ  /

original: palāla anupalālau śarkum kokam malimlucam palījakam  / āśreṣam vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvam pramīlinam  /
analyzed: palāla anupalālau śarkum kokam malimlucam palījakam    āśreṣam vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvam pramīlinam

original: mā sam vṛtaḥ mā upa sṛpaḥ ūrū mā ava sṛpaḥ antarā  / kṛṇomi asyai bheṣajam bajam durṇāma cātanam  /
analyzed: mā sam vṛtaḥ mā upa sṛpaḥ ūrū mā ava sṛpaḥ antarā   kṛṇomi asyai bheṣajam bajam durṇāma cātanam  /

original: durṇāmā ca sunāmā ca ubhā samvṛtam ichataḥ  / arāyān apa hanmaḥ sunāmā straiṇam ichatām  /
analyzed: durṇāmā ca sunāmā ca ubhā samvṛtam ichataḥ    arāyān apa hanmaḥ sunāmā straiṇam ichatām  /

original: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśī asura stamba jaḥ uta tuṇḍikaḥ  / arāyān asyāḥ muṣkābhyām bhaṃsasaḥ apa hanmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśī asura stamba jaḥ uta tuṇḍikaḥ    arāyān asyāḥ muṣkābhyām bhaṃsasaḥ apa hanmasi  /

original: anujighram pramṛśantam kravya adam uta reriham  / arāyām śvakiṣkiṇaḥ bajaḥ piṅgaḥ anīnaśat  /
analyzed: anujighram pramṛśantam kravya adam uta reriham    arāyām śvakiṣkiṇaḥ bajaḥ piṅgaḥ anīnaśat  /

original: yaḥ tvā svapne nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā pitā iva ca  / bajaḥ tān sahatām itas klība rūpān tirīṭinaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapne nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā pitā iva ca  / bajaḥ tān sahatām itas klība rūpān tirīṭinaḥ  /

original: yaḥ tvā svapantīm tsarati yaḥ tvā dipsati jāgratīm  / chāyām iva pra tān sūryaḥ parikrāman anīnaśat  /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapantīm tsarati yaḥ tvā dipsati jāgratīm    chāyām iva pra tān sūryaḥ parikrāman anīnaśat  /

original: yaḥ kṛṇoti mṛta vatsām avatokām imām striyam  / tam oṣadhe tvam nāśaya asyāḥ kamalam añjivam  /
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṇoti mṛta vatsām avatokām imām striyam   tam oṣadhe tvam nāśaya asyāḥ kamalam añjivam  /

original: ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyam gardabha nādinaḥ  / kusūlāḥ ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ karumāḥ srimāḥ  / tān oṣadhe tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya  //  // tvam gandhena viṣūcīnā
analyzed: ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyam gardabha nādinaḥ   kusūlāḥ ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ karumāḥ srimāḥ   tān oṣadhe tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya

original: ye ku kundhāḥ ku kirabhāḥ kṛttīḥ dūrśāni bibhrati  / klībāḥ iva pranṛtyantaḥ vane ye kurvate ghoṣam tān itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: ye ku kundhāḥ ku kirabhāḥ kṛttīḥ dūrśāni bibhrati   klībāḥ iva pranṛtyantaḥ vane ye kurvate ghoṣam tān itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: ye sūryam na titikṣante ātapantam amum divaḥ  / arāyān basta vāsinaḥ durgandhīn lohita āsyān makakān nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: ye sūryam na titikṣante ātapantam amum divaḥ   / arāyān basta vāsinaḥ durgandhīn lohita āsyān makakān nāśayāmasi  /

original: yaḥ ātmānam atimātram aṃse ādhāya bibhrati  / strīṇām śroṇi pratodinaḥ indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya  //
analyzed: yaḥ ātmānam atimātram aṃse ādhāya bibhrati    strīṇām śroṇi pratodinaḥ indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya  /

original: ye pūrve badhvaḥ yanti haste śṛṅgāni bibhrataḥ  / āpākesthāḥ prahāsinaḥ stambe ye kurvate jyotiḥ tān itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: ye pūrve badhvaḥ yanti haste śṛṅgāni bibhrataḥ   āpākesthāḥ prahāsinaḥ stambe ye kurvate jyotiḥ tān itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: yeṣām paścāt prapadāni puras pārṣṇīḥ puras mukhā  / khala jāḥ śakadhūma jāḥ uruṇḍāḥ ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbha muṣkāḥ ayāśavaḥ  / tān asyāḥ brahmaṇas pate pratībodhena nāśaya  //

original: sā ud akrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ upāhvayanta svadhaḥ ehi iti  / tasyāḥ yamaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt rajata pātram pātram  / tām antakaḥ mārtyavaḥ adhok tām svadhām eva adhok  / tām svadhām pitaraḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ upāhvayanta svadhaḥ ehi iti   tasyāḥ yamaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt rajata pātram pātram   tām antakaḥ mārtyavaḥ adhok tām svadhām eva adhok    tām svadhām pitaraḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: sā ud akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām manuṣyāḥ upāhvayanterāvatī ehi iti  / tasyāḥ manuḥ vaivasvataḥ vatsaḥ āsīt pṛthivī pātram  / tām pṛthī vainyaḥ adhok tām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca adhok  / te svadhām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca manuṣyāḥ upa jīvanti kṛṣṭa rādhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām manuṣyāḥ upāhvayanterāvatī ehi iti   tasyāḥ manuḥ vaivasvataḥ vatsaḥ āsīt pṛthivī pātram   tām pṛthī vainyaḥ adhok tām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca adhok    te svadhām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca manuṣyāḥ upa jīvanti kṛṣṭa rādhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: sā ud akrāmat sā sapta ṛṣīn āgacchat tām sapta ṛṣayaḥ upāhvayanta brahmaṇvatī ehi iti  / tasyāḥ somaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt chandaḥ pātram  / tām bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ adhok tām brahma ca tapaḥ ca adhok  / tat brahma ca tapaḥ ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ upa jīvanti brahmavarcasī upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā sapta ṛṣīn āgacchat tām sapta ṛṣayaḥ upāhvayanta brahmaṇvatī ehi iti  / tasyāḥ somaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt chandaḥ pātram   tām bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ adhok tām brahma ca tapaḥ ca adhok    tat brahma ca tapaḥ ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ upa jīvanti brahmavarcasī upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: sā ud akrāmat sā devān āgacchat tām devāḥ upāhvayanta ūrjaḥ ehi iti  / tasyāḥ indraḥ vatsaḥ āsīt camasaḥ pātram  / tām devaḥ savitā adhok tām ūrjām eva adhok  / tām ūrjām devāḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devāḥ tasyāḥ garbhaḥ abhavat viśva rūpaḥ  / tam jātam taruṇam piparti mātā sa jātaḥ viśvā bhuvanā vi caṣṭe  /

original: apām yaḥ agne pratimā babhūva prabhūḥ sarvasmai pṛthivī iva devī  / pitā vatsānām patiḥ aghnyānām sāhasre poṣe api naḥ kṛṇotu  //

original: devānām bhāgaḥ upanāhaḥ eṣaḥ apām rasaḥ oṣadhīnām ghṛtasya  / somasya bhakṣam avṛṇīta śakraḥ bṛhan adriḥ abhavat yat śarīram  /

original: somena pūrṇam kalaśam bibharṣi tvastā rupāṇām janitā paśūnām  / śivāḥ te santu prajanvaḥ iha yāḥ imāḥ ni asmabhyam svadhite yaccha yāḥ amūḥ  /

original: indrasya ojaḥ varuṇasya bāhū aśvinoḥ aṃsau marutām iyam kakud  / bṛhaspatim saṃbhṛtam etam āhuḥ ye dhīrāsaḥ kavayaḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ  /

original: pañca are cakre parivartamāne yasmin ātasthuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā  / tasya na akṣaḥ tapyate bhūri bhāraḥ sanāt eva na chidyate sanābhiḥ  //

original: avas pareṇa paras enāḥ avareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gauḥ ud asthāt  / sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe asmin  /
analyzed: avas pareṇa paras enāḥ avareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gauḥ ud asthāt    sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe asmin  /

original: avas pareṇa pitaram yaḥ asya veda avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa  / kavīyamānaḥ kaḥ iha pra vocat devam manaḥ kutas adhi prajātam  /
analyzed: avas pareṇa pitaram yaḥ asya veda avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa    kavīyamānaḥ kaḥ iha pra vocat devam manaḥ kutas adhi prajātam  /

original: ye arvāñcaḥ tām u parācaḥ āhuḥ ye parāñcaḥ tām u arvācaḥ āhuḥ  / indraḥ ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktāḥ rajasaḥ vahanti  //
analyzed: ye arvāñcaḥ tām u parācaḥ āhuḥ ye parāñcaḥ tām u arvācaḥ āhuḥ   indraḥ ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktāḥ rajasaḥ vahanti  /

original: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pari sasvajāte  / tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti an aśnan anyaḥ abhi cākaśīti  //
analyzed: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pari sasvajāte    tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti an aśnan anyaḥ abhi cākaśīti  /

original: yasmin vṛkṣe madhu adaḥ suparṇāḥ niviśante suvate ca adhi viśve  / tasya yat āhuḥ pippalam svādu agre tat na ud naśat yaḥ pitaram na veda  /
analyzed: yasmin vṛkṣe madhu adaḥ suparṇāḥ niviśante suvate ca adhi viśve   tasya yat āhuḥ pippalam svādu agre tat na ud naśat yaḥ pitaram na veda  /

original: yatra suparṇāḥ amṛtasya bhakṣam animeṣam vidathāḥ abhisvaranti  / enā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa  //  //  // viveśa  //  //  // viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa  //  //  // {25}
analyzed: yatra suparṇāḥ amṛtasya bhakṣam animeṣam vidathāḥ abhisvaranti   enā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa               viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa

original: yat gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitam traiṣṭubham vā traiṣṭubhāt niratakṣata  / yat vā jagat jagati āhitam padam ye id tat viduḥ te amṛta tvam ānuśuḥ  //
analyzed: yat gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitam traiṣṭubham vā traiṣṭubhāt niratakṣata   yat vā jagat jagati āhitam padam ye id tat viduḥ te amṛta tvam ānuśuḥ  /

original: gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam  / vākena vākam dvipadā catuṣpadā akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ  /
analyzed: gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam   vākena vākam dvipadā catuṣpadā akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ  /

original: jagatā sindhum divi askabhāyat rathaṃtare sūryam pari apaśyat  / gāyatrasya samidhaḥ tisraḥ āhuḥ tatas mahnā pra ririce mahitvā  /
analyzed: jagatā sindhum divi askabhāyat rathaṃtare sūryam pari apaśyat   gāyatrasya samidhaḥ tisraḥ āhuḥ tatas mahnā pra ririce mahitvā  /

original: upa hvaye su dughām dhenum etām su hastaḥ go dhuk uta dohat enām  / śreṣṭham savam savitā sāviṣat naḥ abhīddhaḥ gharmaḥ tat u su pra vocat  /
analyzed: upa hvaye su dughām dhenum etām su hastaḥ go duh uta dohat enām    śreṣṭham savam savitā sāviṣat naḥ abhīddhaḥ gharmaḥ tat u su pra vocat  /

original: hiṅkṛṇvatī vasu patnī vasūnām vatsam ichantī manasā abhyāgāt  / duhām aśvibhyām payaḥ aghnyā iyam sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya  //
analyzed: hiṅkṛṇvatī vasu patnī vasūnām vatsam icchantī manasā abhyāgāt    duhām aśvibhyām payaḥ aghnyā iyam sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya  /

original: gauḥ amīmet abhi vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānam hiṅ akṛṇot mātave u / sṛkvāṇam gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ  /
analyzed: gauḥ amīmet abhi vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānam hiṅ akṛṇot mātave u sṛkvāṇam gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ  /

original: ayam sa śiṅkte yena gauḥ abhivṛtā mimāti mayum dhvasanau adhi śritā  / sā cittibhiḥ ni hi cakāra martyān vidyut bhavantī prati vavrim auhata  //
analyzed: ayam sa śiṅkte yena gauḥ abhivṛtā mimāti mayum dhvasanau adhi śritā    sā cittibhiḥ ni hi cakāra martyān vidyut bhavantī prati vavrim auhata  /

original: anat śaye turagātu jīvam ejat dhruvam madhye ā pastyānām  / jīvaḥ mṛtasya carati svadhābhiḥ amartyaḥ martyena sayoniḥ  /
analyzed: anat śaye turagātu jīvam ejat dhruvam madhye ā pastyānām    jīvaḥ mṛtasya carati svadhābhiḥ amartyaḥ martyena sayoniḥ  /

original: vidhum dadrāṇam salilasya pṛṣṭhe yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra  / devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvā adya mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna  /
analyzed: vidhum dadrāṇam salilasya pṛṣṭhe yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra   devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvā adya mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna  /

original: yaḥ īm cakāra na saḥ asya veda yaḥ īm dadarśa hiruk id nu tasmāt  / sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa  // sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa  //  // sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa  //  // sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa  //  // sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa  //  // sa mātuḥ yonā par
analyzed: yaḥ īm cakāra na saḥ asya veda yaḥ īm dadarśa hiruk id nu tasmāt    sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa    sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahu prajāḥ nirṛtiḥ ā viveśa

original: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam  / sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar  /
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam    sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar  /

original: dyauḥ naḥ pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra bandhuḥ naḥ mātā pṛthivī mahī iyam  / uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antar atrā pitā duhituḥ garbham ādhāt  //
analyzed: dyauḥ naḥ pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra bandhuḥ naḥ mātā pṛthivī mahī iyam    uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antar atrā pitā duhituḥ garbham ādhāt  /

original: pṛchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛchāmi vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ  / pṛchāmi viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhim pṛchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma  //
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ   pṛcchāmi viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhim pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma  /

original: iyam vediḥ paraḥ antar pṛthivyāḥ ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ  / ayam yajñaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma  //
analyzed: iyam vediḥ paraḥ antar pṛthivyāḥ ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ   ayam yajñaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma  /

original: na vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi  / yadā mā agan prathama jāḥ ṛtasya āt id vācaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ  /
analyzed: na vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi    yadā mā agan prathama jāḥ ṛtasya āt id vācaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ  /

original: apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ amartyaḥ martyena sayoniḥ  / tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnāḥ viyantā ni anyam cikyuḥ na ni cikyuḥ anyam  /
analyzed: apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ amartyaḥ martyena sayoniḥ   tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnāḥ viyantā ni anyam cikyuḥ na ni cikyuḥ anyam  /

original: sapta ardha garbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ viṣṇoḥ tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi  / te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvatas  /
analyzed: sapta ardha garbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ viṣṇoḥ tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi   te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvatas  /

original: ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ  / yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ye id tat viduḥ te amī sam āsate  /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ   yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ye id tat viduḥ te amī sam āsate  /

original: ṛcaḥ padam mātrayā kalpayantaḥ ardharcena cakḷpuḥ viśvam ejat  / tripād brahma puru rūpam vi taṣṭhe tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ padam mātrayā kalpayantaḥ ardharcena cakḷpuḥ viśvam ejat  / tripād brahma puru rūpam vi taṣṭhe tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /

original: sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ adhā vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma  / addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī  // tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm
analyzed: sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ adhā vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma     addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī    tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī     /

original: gauḥ id mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī  / aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti  /
analyzed: gauḥ id mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī    aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti  /

original: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti  / tam āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ  /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti   tam āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ  /

original: apād eti prathamā padvatīnām kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa  / garbhaḥ bhāram bharati ā cit asyāḥ ṛtam piparti anṛtam ni pāti  /
analyzed: apād eti prathamā padvatīnām kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa    garbhaḥ bhāram bharati ā cit asyāḥ ṛtam piparti anṛtam ni pāti  /

original: virāj vāc virāj pṛthivī virāj antarikṣam virāj prajāpatiḥ  / virāj mṛtyuḥ sādhyānām adhirājaḥ babhūva tasya bhūtam bhavyam vaśe sa me bhūtam bhavyam vaśe kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: virāj vāc virāj pṛthivī virāj antarikṣam virāj prajāpatiḥ   virāj mṛtyuḥ sādhyānām adhirājaḥ babhūva tasya bhūtam bhavyam vaśe sa me bhūtam bhavyam vaśe kṛṇotu  /

original: śaka mayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam viṣūvatā paras enā avareṇa  / ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan  /
analyzed: śaka mayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam viṣūvatā paras enā avareṇa   ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan  /

original: trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām  / viśvam anyaḥ abhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam  /
analyzed: trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām    viśvam anyaḥ abhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam  /

original: catvāri vāc parimitā padāni tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ  / guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti  //
analyzed: catvāri vāc parimitā padāni tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ   guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti  /
indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ atha u divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān    ekam sat viprāḥ bahudhā vadanti agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ

original: yām kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśva rūpām hasta kṛtām cikitsavaḥ  / sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām  /
analyzed: yām kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśva rūpām hasta kṛtām cikitsavaḥ   sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām  /

original: śīrṣaṇvatī nasvatī karṇiṇī kṛtyā kṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśva rūpā  / sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām  /
analyzed: śīrṣaṇvatī nasvatī karṇiṇī kṛtyā kṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśva rūpā    sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām  /

original: śūdra kṛtā rāja kṛtā strī kṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā  / jāyā patyā nuttā iva kartāram bandhu ṛchatu  //
analyzed: śūdra kṛtā rāja kṛtā strī kṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā   jāyā patyā nuttā iva kartāram bandhu ṛchatu  /

original: anayā aham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyāḥ adūduṣam  / yām kṣetre cakruḥ yām goṣu yām vā te puruṣeṣu  /
analyzed: anayā aham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyāḥ adūduṣam    yām kṣetre cakruḥ yām goṣu yām vā te puruṣeṣu

original: agham astu agha kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate  / pratyak pratiprahiṇmaḥ yathā kṛtyā kṛtam hanat  /
analyzed: agham astu agha kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate    pratyak pratiprahiṇmaḥ yathā kṛtyā kṛtam hanat  /

original: pratīcīnaḥ āṅgirasaḥ adhyakṣaḥ naḥ purohitaḥ  / pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ ākṛtya amūn kṛtyākṛtaḥ jahi  //
analyzed: pratīcīnaḥ āṅgirasaḥ adhyakṣaḥ naḥ purohitaḥ   pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ ākṛtya amūn kṛtyākṛtaḥ jahi  /

original: yaḥ tvā uvāca parehi iti pratikūlam udāyyam  / tam kṛtye abhinivartasva mā asmān ichaḥ anāgasaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā uvāca parehi iti pratikūlam udāyyam   tam kṛtye abhinivartasva mā asmān ichaḥ anāgasaḥ  /

original: yaḥ te parūṃṣi saṃdadhau rathasya iva rbhuḥ dhiyā  / tam gaccha tatra te ayanam a jñātaḥ te ayam janaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ te parūṃṣi saṃdadhau rathasya iva rbhuḥ dhiyā   tam gaccha tatra te ayanam a jñātaḥ te ayam janaḥ  /

original: ye tvā kṛtvā ālebhire vidvalāḥ abhicāriṇaḥ  / śaṃbhu idam kṛtyā dūṣaṇam prativartma punaḥsaram tena tvā snapayāmasi  //
analyzed: ye tvā kṛtvā ālebhire vidvalāḥ abhicāriṇaḥ    śaṃbhu idam kṛtyā dūṣaṇam prativartma punaḥsaram tena tvā snapayāmasi  /

original: yat durbhagām prasnapitām mṛta vatsām upeyima  / apaitu sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  //  //  // sarvam mat pāpa
analyzed: yat durbhagām prasnapitām mṛta vatsām upeyima   apaitu sarvam mat pāpam draviṇam mā upa tiṣṭhatu

original: yat te pitṛbhyaḥ dadataḥ yajñe vā nāma jagṛhuḥ  / saṃdeśyāt sarvasmāt pāpāt imāḥ muñcantu tvā oṣadhīḥ  /
analyzed: yat te pitṛbhyaḥ dadataḥ yajñe vā nāma jagṛhuḥ   saṃdeśyāt sarvasmāt pāpāt imāḥ muñcantu tvā oṣadhīḥ  /

original: deva enasāt pitryāt nāma grāhāt saṃdeśyāt abhiniṣkṛtāt  / muñcantu tvā vīrudhaḥ vīryeṇa brahmaṇā ṛgbhiḥ payasā ṛṣīṇām  /
analyzed: deva enasāt pitryāt nāma grāhāt saṃdeśyāt abhiniṣkṛtāt   muñcantu tvā vīrudhaḥ vīryeṇa brahmaṇā ṛgbhiḥ payasā ṛṣīṇām  /

original: yathā vātaḥ cyāvayati bhūmyāḥ reṇum antarikṣāt ca abhram  / eva mat sarvam durbhūtam brahma nuttam apāyati  //
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ cyāvayati bhūmyāḥ reṇum antarikṣāt ca abhram   eva mat sarvam durbhūtam brahma nuttam apāyati  /

original: apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhī iva  / kartṝn nakṣasva itas nuttā brahmaṇā vīryāvatā  /
analyzed: apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhī iva  / kartṝn nakṣasva itas nuttā brahmaṇā vīryāvatā  /

original: ayam panthāḥ kṛtyā iti tvā nayāmaḥ abhiprahitām prati tvā pra hiṇmaḥ  / tena abhi yāhi bhañjati anasvatī iva vāhinī viśva rūpā kurūtinī  /
analyzed: ayam panthāḥ kṛtyā iti tvā nayāmaḥ abhiprahitām prati tvā pra hiṇmaḥ   tena abhi yāhi bhañjati anasvatī iva vāhinī viśva rūpā kurūtinī  /

original: parāk te jyotiḥ apatham te arvāk anyatra asmat ayanā kṛṇuṣva  / pareṇa ihi navatim nāvyāḥ ati durgāḥ srotyāḥ mā kṣaṇiṣṭhāḥ parehi  /

original: aṣṭācakrā nava dvārā devānām pūḥ ayodhyā  / tasyām hiraṇyayaḥ kośaḥ svargaḥ jyotiṣā āvṛtaḥ  /

original: ayam me varaṇaḥ maṇiḥ sapatna kṣayaṇaḥ vṛṣā  / tena ā rabhasva tvam śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ  /

original: ayam maṇiḥ varaṇaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ haritaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ  / sa te śatrūn adharān pādayāti pūrvaḥ tān dabhnuhi ye tvā dviṣanti  /

original: ayam te kṛtyām vitatām pauruṣeyāt ayam bhayāt  / ayam tvā sarvasmāt pāpāt varaṇaḥ vārayiṣyate  /

original: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ  / yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran  /
analyzed: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ   yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran  /

original: svapnam suptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpam mṛgaḥ sṛtim yati dhāvāt ajuṣṭām  / parikṣavāt śakuneḥ pāpa vādāt ayam maṇiḥ varaṇaḥ vārayiṣyate  /

original: rājñaḥ varuṇasya bandhaḥ asi  / saḥ amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram anne prāṇe badhāna  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ maṇim phālam ghṛtaścutam ugram kadhiram ojase  / tam agniḥ prati amuñcata saḥ asmai duhe ājyam bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ maṇim phālam ghṛtaścutam ugram kadhiram ojase  / tam indraḥ prati amuñcata ojase vīryāya kam  / saḥ asmai balam id duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ vātāya maṇim āśave  / saḥ asmai vājinam id duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ vātāya maṇim āśave  / tena imām maṇinā kṛṣim aśvinau abhi rakṣataḥ  / sa bhiṣagbhyām mahaḥ duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ vātāya maṇim āśave  / tam bibhrat savitā maṇim tena idam ajayat svar  / saḥ asmai sūnṛtām duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ vātāya maṇim āśave  / tam āpaḥ bibhratīḥ maṇim sadā dhāvanti akṣitāḥ  / saḥ ābhyaḥ amṛtam id duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ vātāya maṇim āśave  / tam rājā varuṇaḥ maṇim prati amuñcata śaṃbhuvam  / saḥ asmai satyam id duhe bhūyas bhūyas śvas śvas tena tvam dviṣataḥ jahi  //

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ devebhyaḥ asura kṣitim  / sa mā ayam maṇiḥ āgamat saha gobhiḥ aja avibhiḥ annena prajayā saha  /

original: yam abadhnāt bṛhaspatiḥ devebhyaḥ asura kṣitim  / sa mā ayam maṇiḥ āgamat sarvābhiḥ bhūtibhiḥ saha  /

original: uttaram dviṣataḥ mām ayam maṇiḥ kṛṇotu deva jāḥ  / yasya lokāḥ ime trayaḥ payaḥ dugdham upāsate  / sa mā ayam adhi rohatu maṇiḥ śraiṣṭhyāya mūrdhataḥ  /

original: yathā bījam urvarāyām kṛṣṭe phālena rohati  / eva mayi prajā paśavaḥ annam annam vi rohatu  //

original: kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahar rātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne  / yatra prepsantīḥ abhiyanti āpaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ  /

analyzed: ā imāḥ aguḥ yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānāḥ ud tiṣṭha nāri tavasam rabhasva    su patnī patyā prajayā prajāvatī ā tvā agan yajñaḥ prati kumbham gṛbhāya  /

original: ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yaḥ purā vaḥ ṛṣi praśiṣṭā apaḥ ā bhara etāḥ  / ayam yajñaḥ gātu vid nātha vid prajā vid ugraḥ paśu vid vīra vid vaḥ astu  /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yaḥ purā vaḥ ṛṣi praśiṣṭā apaḥ ā bhara etāḥ    ayam yajñaḥ gātu vid nātha vid prajā vid ugraḥ paśu vid vīra vid vaḥ astu  /

original: agne caruḥ yajñiyaḥ tvā adhi arukṣat śuciḥ tapiṣṭhaḥ tapasā tapa enam  / ārṣeyāḥ daivāḥ abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imam tapiṣṭhāḥ ṛtubhiḥ tapantu  /
analyzed: agne caruḥ yajñiyaḥ tvā adhi arukṣat śuciḥ tapiṣṭhaḥ tapasā tapa enam    ārṣeyāḥ daivāḥ abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imam tapiṣṭhāḥ ṛtubhiḥ tapantu  /

original: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ āpaḥ carum ava sarpantu śubhrāḥ  / aduḥ prajām bahulām paśūn naḥ paktā odanasya su kṛtām etu lokam  /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ āpaḥ carum ava sarpantu śubhrāḥ   aduḥ prajām bahulām paśūn naḥ paktā odanasya su kṛtām etu lokam  /

original: brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ uta pūtāḥ ghṛtena somasya aṃśavaḥ taṇḍulāḥ yajñiyāḥ ime  / apaḥ pra viśata prati gṛhṇātu vaḥ caruḥ imam paktvā su kṛtām eta lokam  /
analyzed: brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ uta pūtāḥ ghṛtena somasya aṃśavaḥ taṇḍulāḥ yajñiyāḥ ime   apaḥ pra viśata prati gṛhṇātu vaḥ caruḥ imam paktvā su kṛtām eta lokam  /

original: uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ su kṛtasya loke  / pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajā upajā aham paktā pañcadaśaḥ te asmi  /
analyzed: uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ su kṛtasya loke   pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajā upajā aham paktā pañcadaśaḥ te asmi  /

original: sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ śata dhāraḥ akṣitaḥ brahmaudanaḥ deva yānaḥ svar gaḥ  / amūn te ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣaya enān bali hārāya mṛḍatāt mahyam eva  /  /
analyzed: sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ śata dhāraḥ akṣitaḥ brahmaudanaḥ deva yānaḥ svar gaḥ   amūn te ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣaya enān bali hārāya mṛḍatāt mahyam eva

original: udehi vedim prajayā vardhaya enām nudasva rakṣaḥ prataram dhehi enām  / śriyā samānān ati sarvān syāma adhaspadam dviṣataḥ pādayāmi  //
analyzed: udehi vedim prajayā vardhaya enām nudasva rakṣaḥ prataram dhehi enām    śriyā samānān ati sarvān syāma adhaspadam dviṣataḥ pādayāmi  /

original: abhyāvartasva paśubhiḥ saha enām pratyaṅ enām devatābhiḥ saha edhi  / mā tvā prāpat śapathaḥ mā abhicāraḥ sve kṣetre anamīvā vi rāja  /
analyzed: abhyāvartasva paśubhiḥ saha enām pratyaṅ enām devatābhiḥ saha edhi   mā tvā prāpat śapathaḥ mā abhicāraḥ sve kṣetre anamīvā vi rāja  /

original: ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hitā eṣā brahmaudanasya vihitā vediḥ agre  / aṃsadhrīm śuddhām upa dhehi nāri tatra odanam sādaya daivānām  /
analyzed: ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hitā eṣā brahmaudanasya vihitā vediḥ agre   aṃsadhrīm śuddhām upa dhehi nāri tatra odanam sādaya daivānām  /

original: aditeḥ hastām srucam etām dvitīyām sapta ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ yām akṛṇvan  / sā gātrāṇi viduṣī odanasya darviḥ vedyām adhi enam cinotu  //
analyzed: aditeḥ hastām srucam etām dvitīyām sapta ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ yām akṛṇvan    sā gātrāṇi viduṣī odanasya darviḥ vedyām adhi enam cinotu  /

original: śṛtam tvā havyam upa sīdantu daivāḥ niḥsṛpya agneḥ punar enān pra sīda  / somena pūtaḥ jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyāḥ te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ  /
analyzed: śṛtam tvā havyam upa sīdantu daivāḥ niḥsṛpya agneḥ punar enān pra sīda   somena pūtaḥ jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyāḥ te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ  /

original: soma rājan saṃjñānam ā vapa ebhyaḥ subrāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān  / ṛṣīn ārṣeyān tapasaḥ adhi jātān brahmaudane su havā johavīmi  //
analyzed: soma rājan saṃjñānam ā vapa ebhyaḥ subrāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān   ṛṣīn ārṣeyān tapasaḥ adhi jātān brahmaudane su havā johavīmi  /

original: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi  / yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ aham indraḥ marutvān sa dadāt idam me  /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi   yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ aham indraḥ marutvān sa dadāt idam me  /

original: idam me jyotiḥ amṛtam hiraṇyam pakvam kṣetrāt kāmadughā me eṣā  / idam dhanam ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthām pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ  /
analyzed: idam me jyotiḥ amṛtam hiraṇyam pakvam kṣetrāt kāmadughā me eṣā    idam dhanam ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthām pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ  /

original: agnau tuṣān ā vapa jātavedasi paras kambūkām apa mṛḍḍhi dūram  / etam śuśruma gṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛteḥ bhāgadheyam  /
analyzed: agnau tuṣān ā vapa jātavedasi paras kambūkām apa mṛḍḍhi dūram     etam śuśruma gṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛteḥ bhāgadheyam  /
śrāmyataḥ pacataḥ viddhi sunvataḥ panthām svargam adhi rohaya enam    yena rohāt param āpadya yat vayaḥ uttamam nākam paramam vyoma

original: babhreḥ adhvaryo mukham etat vi mṛḍḍhi ājyāya lokam kṛṇuhi pravidvān  / ghṛtena gātrāḥ anu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi kṛṇve panthām pitṛṣu yaḥ svar gaḥ  /
analyzed: babhreḥ adhvaryo mukham etat vi mṛḍḍhi ājyāya lokam kṛṇuhi pravidvān   ghṛtena gātrāḥ anu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi kṛṇve panthām pitṛṣu yaḥ svar gaḥ  /

original: babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapa ebhyaḥ a brāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān  / purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastāt ārṣeyāḥ te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ  /
analyzed: babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapa ebhyaḥ a brāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān   purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastāt ārṣeyāḥ te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ  /

original: ārṣeyeṣu ni dadhe odana tvā nānā ārṣeyāṇām api asti atra  / agniḥ me goptā marutaḥ ca sarve viśve devāḥ abhi rakṣantu pakvam  /

original: vṛṣabhaḥ asi svarge ṛṣīn ārṣeyān gaccha  / su kṛtām loke sīda tatra nau saṃskṛtam  /

original: bhava śarvau mṛḍatam mā abhi yātam bhūtapatī paśupatī namaḥ vām  / pratihitām āyatām mā vi srāṣṭam mā naḥ hiṃsiṣṭam dvipadaḥ mā catuṣpadaḥ  /

analyzed: bhava rudrau sayujā saṃvidānau ubhau ugrau carataḥ vīryāya   tābhyām namaḥ yatamasyām diśi itas

analyzed: namaḥ te astu āyate namaḥ astu parāyate   namaḥ te rudra tiṣṭhate āsīnāya uta te namaḥ  /

mā naḥ hiṃsīḥ adhi naḥ brūhi pari naḥ vṛṅdhi mā krudhaḥ   mā tvayā sam arāmahi

original: tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ mṛgāḥ vane hitāḥ haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunāḥ vayāṃsi  / tava yakṣam paśupate apsu antar tubhyam kṣaranti divyāḥ āpaḥ vṛdhe  /

original: tatas ca enam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīḥ yena ca etam pūrve ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan  / jyeṣṭhataḥ te prajā mariṣyati iti enam āha  / tam vai aham na arvāñcam na parāñcam na pratyañcam  / bṛhaspatinā śīrṣṇā  / tena enam prāśiṣam tena enam ajīgamam  / eṣa vai odanaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ  / sarva aṅgaḥ eva sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ sam bhavati yaḥ evam veda  / yaḥ evam veda  / yaḥ evam veda  /

original: namaḥ te astu āyate namaḥ astu parāyate  / namaḥ te prāṇa tiṣṭhate āsīnāya uta te namaḥ  /
analyzed: namaḥ te astu āyate namaḥ astu parāyate   namaḥ te prāṇa tiṣṭhate āsīnāya uta te namaḥ  /

original: namaḥ te prāṇa prāṇate namaḥ astu apānate  / parācīnāya te namaḥ pratīcīnāya te namaḥ sarvasmai te idam namaḥ  /
analyzed: namaḥ te prāṇa prāṇate namaḥ astu apānate   parācīnāya te namaḥ pratīcīnāya te namaḥ sarvasmai te idam namaḥ  /

original: yā te prāṇa priyā tanūḥ yā u te prāṇa preyasī  / atha u yat bheṣajam tava tasya naḥ dhehi jīvase  /

original: prāṇaḥ prajāḥ anu vaste pitā putram iva priyam  / prāṇaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yat ca prāṇati yat ca na  /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ prajāḥ anu vaste pitā putram iva priyam   prāṇaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yat ca prāṇati yat ca na  /

original: prāṇaḥ mṛtyuḥ prāṇaḥ takmā prāṇam devāḥ upāsate  / prāṇaḥ ha satya vādinam uttame loke ā dadhat  /

original: prāṇa apānau vrīhi yavau anaḍvān prāṇaḥ ucyate  / yave ha prāṇaḥ āhitaḥ apānaḥ vrīhiḥ ucyate  /

original: apānati prāṇati puruṣaḥ garbhe antarā  / yadā tvam prāṇa jinvasi atha sa jāyate punar  /

original: prāṇam āhuḥ mātariśvānam vātaḥ ha prāṇaḥ ucyate  / prāṇe ha bhūtam bhavyam ca prāṇe sarvam pratiṣṭhitam  /

original: ātharvaṇīḥ āṅgirasīḥ daivīḥ manuṣya jāḥ uta  / oṣadhayaḥ pra jāyante yadā tvam prāṇa jinvasi  //

original: yadā prāṇaḥ abhyavarṣīt varṣeṇa pṛthivīm mahīm  / oṣadhayaḥ pra jāyante atha u yāḥ kāḥ ca vīrudhaḥ  /

original: brahmacāriṇam pitaraḥ deva janāḥ pṛthak devāḥ anusaṃyanti sarve  / gandharvāḥ enam anu āyan trayastriṃśat tri śatāḥ ṣaṣ sahasrāḥ sarvān sa devān tapasā piparti  //

original: ācāryaḥ upanayamānaḥ brahmacāriṇam kṛṇute garbham antar  / tam rātrīḥ tisraḥ udare bibharti tam jātam draṣṭum abhisaṃyanti devāḥ  /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ upanayamānaḥ brahmacāriṇam kṛṇute garbham antar   tam rātrīḥ tisraḥ udare bibharti tam jātam draṣṭum abhisaṃyanti devāḥ  /

original: iyam samidh pṛthivī dyauḥ dvitīyā uta antarikṣam samidhā pṛṇāti  / brahmacārī samidhā mekhalayā śrameṇa lokān tapasā piparti  //
analyzed: iyam samidh pṛthivī dyauḥ dvitīyā uta antarikṣam samidhā pṛṇāti   brahmacārī samidhā mekhalayā śrameṇa lokān tapasā piparti  /

original: pūrvaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ brahmacārī gharmam vasānaḥ tapasā ud atiṣṭhat  / tasmāt jātam brāhmaṇam brahma jyeṣṭham devāḥ ca sarve amṛtena sākam  /

original: brahmacārī eti samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇam vasānaḥ dīkṣitaḥ dīrgha śmaśruḥ  / sa sadyas eti pūrvasmāt uttaram samudram lokān saṃgṛbhya muhur ācarikrat  /
analyzed: brahmacārī eti samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇam vasānaḥ dīkṣitaḥ dīrgha śmaśruḥ    sa sadyas eti pūrvasmāt uttaram samudram lokān saṃgṛbhya muhur ācarikrat  /

original: brahmacārī janayan brahma apaḥ lokam prajāpatim parameṣṭhinam virājam  / garbhaḥ bhūtvā amṛtasya yonau indraḥ ha bhūtvā asurān tatarha  /

original: ācāryaḥ tatakṣa nabhasī ubhe ime urvī gambhīre pṛthivīm divam ca  / te rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tasmin devāḥ saṃmanasaḥ bhavanti  //

original: imām bhūmim pṛthivīm brahmacārī bhikṣām ā jabhāra prathamaḥ divam ca  / te kṛtvā samidhau upāste tayoḥ ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā  /

original: san ucchiṣṭe asan ca ubhau mṛtyuḥ vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ  / laukyāḥ ucchiṣṭe āyattāḥ vraḥ ca draḥ ca api śrīḥ mayi  //

original: dṛḍhaḥ dṛṃha sthiraḥ nyaḥ brahma viśvasṛjaḥ daśa  / nābhim iva sarvatas cakram ucchiṣṭe devatāḥ śritāḥ  /
analyzed: dṛḍhaḥ dṛṃha sthiraḥ nyaḥ brahma viśvasṛjaḥ daśa    nābhim iva sarvatas cakram ucchiṣṭe devatāḥ śritāḥ  /

original: ṛc sāma yajuḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ udgīthaḥ prastutam stutam  / hiṅkāraḥ ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ sāmnaḥ meḍiḥ ca tat mayi  /
analyzed: ṛc sāma yajuḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ udgīthaḥ prastutam stutam    hiṅkāraḥ ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ sāmnaḥ meḍiḥ ca tat mayi  /

original: aindrāgnam pāvamānam mahānāmnīḥ mahāvratam  / ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṅgāni antar garbhe iva mātari  /
analyzed: aindrāgnam pāvamānam mahānāmnīḥ mahāvratam    ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṅgāni antar garbhe iva mātari  /

original: rājasūyam vājapeyam agniṣṭomaḥ tat adhvaraḥ  / arka aśvamedhau ucchiṣṭe jīvabarhiḥ madintamaḥ  /
analyzed: rājasūyam vājapeyam agniṣṭomaḥ tat adhvaraḥ   arka aśvamedhau ucchiṣṭe jīvabarhiḥ madintamaḥ  /

original: agnyādheyam atha u dīkṣā kāmapraḥ chandasā saha  / utsannāḥ yajñāḥ satrāṇi ucchiṣṭe adhi samāhitāḥ  /
analyzed: agnyādheyam atha u dīkṣā kāmapraḥ chandasā saha    utsannāḥ yajñāḥ satrāṇi ucchiṣṭe adhi samāhitāḥ  /

original: agnihotram ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāraḥ vratam tapaḥ  / dakṣiṇeṣṭam pūrtam ca ucchiṣṭe adhi samāhitāḥ  /
analyzed: agnihotram ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāraḥ vratam tapaḥ   dakṣiṇeṣṭam pūrtam ca ucchiṣṭe adhi samāhitāḥ  /

original: # eka rātraḥ dvi rātraḥ sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīḥ ukthyaḥ  / otam nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṇūni vidyayā  //  //  /|   /|   /|   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   //   /|   /
analyzed: eka rātraḥ dvi rātraḥ sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīḥ ukthyaḥ   otam nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṇūni vidyayā

original: catur rātraḥ pañca rātraḥ ṣaṣ rātraḥ ca ubhayaḥ saha  / ṣoḍaśī sapta rātraḥ ca ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve ye yajñāḥ amṛte hitāḥ  /
analyzed: catur rātraḥ pañca rātraḥ ṣaṣ rātraḥ ca ubhayaḥ saha   ṣoḍaśī sapta rātraḥ ca ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve ye yajñāḥ amṛte hitāḥ  /

original: pratīhāraḥ nidhanam viśvajit ca abhijit ca yaḥ  / sāhnā atirātrau ucchiṣṭe dvādaśa ahaḥ api tat mayi  /
analyzed: pratīhāraḥ nidhanam viśvajit ca abhijit ca yaḥ    sāhnā atirātrau ucchiṣṭe dvādaśa ahaḥ api tat mayi  /

original: sūnṛtā saṃnatiḥ kṣemaḥ svadhā ūrjā amṛtam sahaḥ  / ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tātṛpuḥ  /
analyzed: sūnṛtā saṃnatiḥ kṣemaḥ svadhā ūrjā amṛtam sahaḥ   ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tātṛpuḥ  /

original: nava bhūmīḥ samudrāḥ ucchiṣṭe adhi śritāḥ divaḥ  / ā sūryaḥ bhāti ucchiṣṭe ahar rātre api tat mayi  //
analyzed: nava bhūmīḥ samudrāḥ ucchiṣṭe adhi śritāḥ divaḥ   ā sūryaḥ bhāti ucchiṣṭe ahar rātre api tat mayi  /

original: upahavyam viṣūvantam ye ca yajñāḥ guhā hitāḥ  / bibharti bhartā viśvasya ucchiṣṭaḥ janituḥ pitā  /
analyzed: upahavyam viṣūvantam ye ca yajñāḥ guhā hitāḥ   bibharti bhartā viśvasya ucchiṣṭaḥ janituḥ pitā  /

original: pitā janituḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ asoḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ  / sa kṣiyati viśvasya īśānaḥ vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ  //
analyzed: pitā janituḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ asoḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ    sa kṣiyati viśvasya īśānaḥ vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ  /

original: ṛtam satyam tapaḥ rāṣṭram śramaḥ dharmaḥ ca karma ca  / bhūtam bhaviṣyat ucchiṣṭe vīryam lakṣmīḥ balam bale  /
analyzed: ṛtam satyam tapaḥ rāṣṭram śramaḥ dharmaḥ ca karma ca    bhūtam bhaviṣyat ucchiṣṭe vīryam lakṣmīḥ balam bale  /

original: samṛddhiḥ ojaḥ ākūtiḥ kṣatram rāṣṭram ṣaṭ urvyaḥ  / saṃvatsaraḥ adhi ucchiṣṭaḥ iḍā praiṣāḥ grahāḥ haviḥ  /
analyzed: samṛddhiḥ ojaḥ ākūtiḥ kṣatram rāṣṭram ṣaṭ urvyaḥ    saṃvatsaraḥ adhi ucchiṣṭaḥ iḍā praiṣāḥ grahāḥ haviḥ  /

original: caturhotāraḥ āpriyaḥ cāturmāsyāni nīvidaḥ  / ucchiṣṭe yajñāḥ hotrāḥ paśubandhāḥ tat iṣṭayaḥ  /
analyzed: caturhotāraḥ āpriyaḥ cāturmāsyāni nīvidaḥ   ucchiṣṭe yajñāḥ hotrāḥ paśubandhāḥ tad iṣṭayaḥ  /

original: ardha māsāḥ ca māsāḥ ca ārtavāḥ ṛtubhiḥ saha  / ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  // ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī  //  //
analyzed: ardha māsāḥ ca māsāḥ ca ārtavāḥ ṛtubhiḥ saha  / ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī          āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī

original: śarkarāḥ sikatāḥ aśmānaḥ oṣadhayaḥ vīrudhaḥ tṛṇā  / abhrāṇi vidyutaḥ varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā  /
analyzed: śarkarāḥ sikatāḥ aśmānaḥ oṣadhayaḥ vīrudhaḥ tṛṇā   abhrāṇi vidyutaḥ varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā  /

original: rāddhiḥ prāptiḥ samāptiḥ vyāptiḥ mahaḥ edhatuḥ  / atyāptiḥ ucchiṣṭe bhūtiḥ ca ahitā nihitā hitā  /
analyzed: rāddhiḥ prāptiḥ samāptiḥ vyāptiḥ mahaḥ edhatuḥ    atyāptiḥ ucchiṣṭe bhūtiḥ ca ahitā nihitā hitā  /

original: yat ca prāṇati prāṇena yat ca paśyati cakṣuṣā  / ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /
analyzed: yat ca prāṇati prāṇena yat ca paśyati cakṣuṣā   / ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /

original: ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇam yajuṣā saha  / ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇam yajuṣā saha    ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /

original: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā  / ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā     ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /

original: ānandāḥ modāḥ pramudaḥ abhīmoda mudaḥ ca ye / ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /
analyzed: ānandāḥ modāḥ pramudaḥ abhīmoda mudaḥ ca ye ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ  /
devāḥ pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ diviśritaḥ

original: yat manyuḥ jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhāt adhi  / ke āsan janyāḥ ke varāḥ kaḥ u jyeṣṭha varaḥ abhavat  /
analyzed: yat manyuḥ jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhāt adhi   ke āsan janyāḥ ke varāḥ kaḥ u jyeṣṭha varaḥ abhavat  /

original: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave  / te āsan janyāḥ te varāḥ brahma jyeṣṭha varaḥ abhavat  /
analyzed: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave   te āsan janyāḥ te varāḥ brahma jyeṣṭha varaḥ abhavat  /

original: daśa sākam ajāyanta devāḥ devebhyaḥ purā  / yaḥ vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣam sa vai adya mahat vadet  /
analyzed: daśa sākam ajāyanta devāḥ devebhyaḥ purā   yaḥ vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣam sa vai adya mahat vadet  /

original: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā  / vyāna udānau vāc manaḥ te vai ākūtim āvahan  //
analyzed: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā    vyāna udānau vāc manaḥ te vai ākūtim āvahan  /

analyzed: a jātāḥ āsan ṛtavaḥ atha u dhātā bṛhaspatiḥ   indra agnī aśvinā tarhi kam te jyeṣṭham upāsata  /

original: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave  / tapaḥ ha jajñe karmaṇaḥ tat te jyeṣṭham upāsata  /
analyzed: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave   tapaḥ ha jajñe karmaṇaḥ tat te jyeṣṭham upāsata  /

original: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā  / vyāna udānau vāc manaḥ śarīreṇa te īyante  /

original: āśiṣaḥ ca praśiṣaḥ ca saṃśiṣaḥ viśiṣaḥ ca yāḥ  / cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan  //
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ ca praśiṣaḥ ca saṃśiṣaḥ viśiṣaḥ ca yāḥ   cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan  /

original: āsteyīḥ ca vāsteyīḥ ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ ca yāḥ  / guhyāḥ śukrāḥ sthūlāḥ apaḥ tāḥ bībhatsau asādayan  //
analyzed: āsteyīḥ ca vāsteyīḥ ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ ca yāḥ   / guhyāḥ śukrāḥ sthūlāḥ apaḥ tāḥ bībhatsau asādayan  /

original: asthi kṛtvā samidham tat aṣṭa apaḥ asādayan  / retaḥ kṛtvā ājyam devāḥ puruṣam āviśan  //
analyzed: asthi kṛtvā samidham tat aṣṭa apaḥ asādayan   retaḥ kṛtvā ājyam devāḥ puruṣam āviśan  /

original: yāḥ āpaḥ yāḥ ca devatāḥ yāḥ virāj brahmaṇā saha  / śarīram brahma prāviśat śarīre adhi prajāpatiḥ  /
analyzed: yāḥ āpaḥ yāḥ ca devatāḥ yāḥ virāj brahmaṇā saha   / śarīram brahma prāviśat śarīre adhi prajāpatiḥ  /

original: sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇam puruṣasya vi bhejire  / atha asya itaram ātmānam devāḥ prāyacchan agnaye  /
analyzed: sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇam puruṣasya vi bhejire    atha asya itaram ātmānam devāḥ prāyacchan agnaye  /

original: tasmāt vai vidvān puruṣam idam brahma iti manyate  / sarvāḥ hi asmin devatāḥ gāvaḥ goṣṭhe iva āsate  /
analyzed: tasmāt vai vidvān puruṣam idam brahma iti manyate    sarvāḥ hi asmin devatāḥ gāvaḥ goṣṭhe iva āsate  /

original: prathamena pramāreṇa tredhā viṣvaṅ vi gacchati  / adaḥ ekena gacchati adaḥ ekena gacchati iha ekena ni sevate  /

analyzed: apsu stīmāsu vṛddhāsu śarīram antarā hitam   tasmin śavaḥ adhi antarā tasmāt śavaḥ adhi ucyate

original: ye bāhavaḥ yāḥ iṣavaḥ dhanvanām vīryāṇi ca  / asīn paraśūn āyudham citta ākūtam ca yat hṛdi  / sarvam tat arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya  //
analyzed: ye bāhavaḥ yāḥ iṣavaḥ dhanvanām vīryāṇi ca   asīn paraśūn āyudham citta ākūtam ca yat hṛdi    sarvam tat arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya  /

original: ud tiṣṭhata sam nahyadhvam mitrāḥ deva janāḥ yūyam  / saṃdṛṣṭāḥ guptāḥ vaḥ santu yā naḥ mitrāṇi arbude  /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata sam nahyadhvam mitrāḥ deva janāḥ yūyam   saṃdṛṣṭāḥ guptāḥ vaḥ santu yā naḥ mitrāṇi arbude  /

analyzed: ud tiṣṭhatam ā rabhetām ādāna saṃdānābhyām   amitrāṇām senāḥ abhi dhattam arbude  /

original: arbudiḥ nāma yaḥ devaḥ īśānaḥ ca nyarbudiḥ  / yābhyām antarikṣam āvṛtam iyam ca pṛthivī mahī  / tābhyām indra medibhyām aham jitam anu emi senayā  /
analyzed: arbudiḥ nāma yaḥ devaḥ īśānaḥ ca nyarbudiḥ   yābhyām antarikṣam āvṛtam iyam ca pṛthivī mahī   tābhyām indra medibhyām aham jitam anu emi senayā  /

original: yāvat te abhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā  / tāvat me cakṣuḥ mā mā iṣṭa uttarām uttarām samām  /

original: yat śayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇam sakhyam abhi bhūme pārśvam uttānāḥ tvā pratīcīm yat pṛṣṭībhiḥ adhiśemahe  / mā hiṃsīḥ tatra naḥ bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari  //

original: yat te bhūme vikhanāmi kṣipram tat api rohatu  / mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam  /
analyzed: yat te bhūme vikhanāmi kṣipram tat api rohatu   mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam  /

original: grīṣmaḥ te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiraḥ vasantaḥ  / ṛtavaḥ te vihitāḥ hāyanīḥ ahar rātre pṛthivi naḥ duhātām  //

original: yā apa sarpam vijamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsan agnayaḥ ye apsu antar  / parā dasyūn dadatī deva pīyūn indram vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtram śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe  /

original: yasyām sadaḥ havirdhāne yūpaḥ yasyām nimīyate  / brahmāṇaḥ yasyām arcanti ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajuḥ vidaḥ yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave  /

original: yasyām pūrve bhūta kṛtaḥ ṛṣayaḥ gāḥ udānṛcuḥ  / sapta satreṇa vedhasaḥ yajñena tapasā saha  /

original: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ ā diśatu yat dhanam kāmayāmahe  / bhagaḥ anuprayuṅktām indraḥ etu purogavaḥ  //  //  //
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ ā diśatu yat dhanam kāmayāmahe   bhagaḥ anuprayuṅktām indraḥ etu purogavaḥ

original: yasyām gāyanti nṛtyanti bhūmyām martyāḥ vyailabāḥ  / yudhyante yasyām ākrandaḥ yasyām vadati dundubhiḥ  / sā naḥ bhūmiḥ pra nudatām sapatnān asapatnam mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: yasyām gāyanti nṛtyanti bhūmyām martyāḥ vyailabāḥ   yudhyante yasyām ākrandaḥ yasyām vadati dundubhiḥ   sā naḥ bhūmiḥ pra nudatām sapatnān asapatnam mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu  /

original: yasyām annam vrīhi yavau yasyāḥ imāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ  / bhūmyai parjanya patnyai namaḥ astu varṣamedase  /
analyzed: yasyām annam vrīhi yavau yasyāḥ imāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ   bhūmyai parjanya patnyai namaḥ astu varṣamedase  /

original: yasyāḥ puras deva kṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyāḥ vikurvate  / prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīm viśva garbhām āśām āśām raṇyām naḥ kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: yasyāḥ puras deva kṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyāḥ vikurvate    prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīm viśva garbhām āśām āśām raṇyām naḥ kṛṇotu  /

original: nidhim bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇim hiraṇyam pṛthivī dadātu me  / vasūni naḥ vasu dāḥ rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā  /
analyzed: nidhim bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇim hiraṇyam pṛthivī dadātu me   vasūni naḥ vasu dāḥ rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā  /

original: janam bibhratī bahudhā vivācasam nānā dharmāṇam pṛthivī yathaukasam  / sahasram dhārāḥ draviṇasya me duhām dhruvā iva dhenuḥ an apasphurantī  /
analyzed: janam bibhratī bahudhā vivācasam nānā dharmāṇam pṛthivī yathaukasam    sahasram dhārāḥ draviṇasya me duhām dhruvā iva dhenuḥ an apasphurantī  /

original: yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ tṛṣṭa daṃśmā hemanta jabdhaḥ bhṛmalaḥ guhā śaye  / krimiḥ jinvat pṛthivi yat yat ejati prāvṛṣi tat naḥ sarpat mā upa sṛpat yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa  /
analyzed: yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ tṛṣṭa daṃśmā hemanta jabdhaḥ bhṛmalaḥ guhā śaye   krimiḥ jinvat pṛthivi yat yat ejati prāvṛṣi tat naḥ sarpat mā upa sṛpat yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa  /

original: ye te panthānaḥ bahavaḥ janāyanāḥ rathasya vartmānasaḥ ca yātave  / yaiḥ saṃcaranti ubhaye bhadra pāpāḥ tam panthānam jayema anamitram ataskaram yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa  //
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ bahavaḥ janāyanāḥ rathasya vartmānasaḥ ca yātave   yaiḥ saṃcaranti ubhaye bhadra pāpāḥ tam panthānam jayema anamitram ataskaram yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa  /

original: malvam bibhratī guru bhṛt bhadra pāpasya nidhanam titikṣuḥ  / varāheṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā sūkarāya vi jihīte mṛgāya  /
analyzed: malvam bibhratī guru bhṛt bhadra pāpasya nidhanam titikṣuḥ    varāheṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā sūkarāya vi jihīte mṛgāya  /

original: ye te āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ mṛgāḥ vane hitāḥ siṃhāḥ vyāghrāḥ puruṣādaḥ caranti  / ulam vṛkam pṛthivi duchunām itas ṛkṣīkām rakṣaḥ apa bādhaya asmat  /
analyzed: ye te āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ mṛgāḥ vane hitāḥ siṃhāḥ vyāghrāḥ puruṣādaḥ caranti   ulam vṛkam pṛthivi duchunām itas ṛkṣīkām rakṣaḥ apa bādhaya asmat  /

original: ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ye cārāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ  / piśācān sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmat bhūme yāvaya  //  //  //
analyzed: ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ye cārāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ   piśācān sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmat bhūme yāvaya

original: yām dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunāḥ vayāṃsi  / yasyām vātaḥ mātariśvā īyate rajāṃsi kṛṇvan cyāvayan ca vṛkṣān  / vātasya pravām upavām anu vāti arciḥ  /
analyzed: yām dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunāḥ vayāṃsi   yasyām vātaḥ mātariśvā īyate rajāṃsi kṛṇvan cyāvayan ca vṛkṣān    vātasya pravām upavām anu vāti arciḥ  /

original: yasyām kṛṣṇam aruṇam ca saṃhite ahar rātre vihite bhūmyām adhi  / varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtā āvṛtā sā naḥ dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmani dhāmani  //
analyzed: yasyām kṛṣṇam aruṇam ca saṃhite ahar rātre vihite bhūmyām adhi  / varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtā āvṛtā sā naḥ dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmani dhāmani  /

original: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca antarikṣam ca me vyacaḥ  / agniḥ sūryaḥ āpaḥ medhām viśve devāḥ ca sam daduḥ  /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca antarikṣam ca me vyacaḥ   agniḥ sūryaḥ āpaḥ medhām viśve devāḥ ca sam daduḥ  /

original: aham asmi sahamānaḥ uttaraḥ nāma bhūmyām  / abhīṣāh asmi viśvāṣāh āśām āśām viṣāsahiḥ  //
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānaḥ uttaraḥ nāma bhūmyām   abhīṣāh asmi viśvāṣāh āśām āśām viṣāsahiḥ  /

original: adaḥ yat devi prathamānā purastāt devaiḥ uktā vyasarpaḥ mahitvam  / ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /

original: aśvaḥ iva rajaḥ dudhuve vi tān janān yaḥ ākṣiyan pṛthivīm yāt ajāyata  / mandrā agretvarī bhuvanasya gopāḥ vanaspatīnām gṛbhiḥ oṣadhīnām  /

original: naḍam ā roha na te atra loke idam sīsam bhāgadheyam te ehi  / yaḥ goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmaḥ tena tvam sākam adharāṅ parehi  /
analyzed: naḍam ā roha na te atra loke idam sīsam bhāgadheyam te ehi   yaḥ goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmaḥ tena tvam sākam adharāṅ parehi  /

original: agha śaṃsa duḥśaṃsābhyām kareṇa anukareṇa ca  / yakṣmam ca sarvam tena itas mṛtyum ca niḥ ajāmasi  //
analyzed: agha śaṃsa duḥśaṃsābhyām kareṇa anukareṇa ca   yakṣmam ca sarvam tena itas mṛtyum ca niḥ ajāmasi  /

original: niḥ itas mṛtyum nirṛtim niḥ arātim ajāmasi  / yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi tam addhi agne akravyād yam u dviṣmaḥ tam u te pra suvāmasi  //
analyzed: niḥ itas mṛtyum nirṛtim niḥ arātim ajāmasi   yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi tam addhi agne akravyād yam u dviṣmaḥ tam u te pra suvāmasi  /

original: yadi agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghraḥ imam goṣṭham praviveśa anyokāḥ  / tam māṣa ājyam kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūram sa gacchatu apsuṣadaḥ api agnīn  /

original: yat tvā kruddhāḥ pracakruḥ manyunā puruṣe mṛte  / su kalpam agne tat tvayā punar tvā ud dīpayāmasi  //
analyzed: yat tvā kruddhāḥ pracakruḥ manyunā puruṣe mṛte    su kalpam agne tat tvayā punar tvā ud dīpayāmasi  /

original: punar tvā ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasu nītiḥ agne  / punar tvā brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ ādhāt dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /
analyzed: punar tvā ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasu nītiḥ agne   punar tvā brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ ādhāt dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya  /

original: yaḥ agniḥ kravyād praviveśa naḥ gṛham imam paśyan itaram jātavedasam  / tam harāmi pitṛ yajñāya dūram sa gharmam indhām parame sadhasthe  /
