original: kravya adam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ  / iha ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan  //
analyzed: kravya adam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ   iha ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan  /

original: kravya adam agnim iṣitaḥ harāmi janān dṛṃhantam vajreṇa mṛtyum  / ni tam śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇām loke api bhāgaḥ astu  /
analyzed: kravya adam agnim iṣitaḥ harāmi janān dṛṃhantam vajreṇa mṛtyum   ni tam śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇām loke api bhāgaḥ astu  /

original: udīcīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ vāyumadbhiḥ atikrāmantaḥ avarān parebhiḥ  / tris sapta kṛtvas ṛṣayaḥ paretāḥ mṛtyum prati auhan pada yopanena  /

original: ā yanti divaḥ pṛthivīm sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante adhi antarikṣam  / śuddhāḥ satīḥ tāḥ u śumbhantaḥ eva tāḥ naḥ svargam abhi lokam nayantu  //
analyzed: ā yanti divaḥ pṛthivīm sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante adhi antarikṣam   śuddhāḥ satīḥ tāḥ u śumbhantaḥ eva tāḥ naḥ svargam abhi lokam nayantu  /

original: uta iva prabhvīḥ uta saṃmitāsaḥ uta śukrāḥ śucayaḥ ca amṛtāsaḥ  / tāḥ odanam daṃpatibhyām praśiṣṭāḥ āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pacata sunāthāḥ  //
analyzed: uta iva prabhvīḥ uta saṃmitāsaḥ uta śukrāḥ śucayaḥ ca amṛtāsaḥ   tāḥ odanam daṃpatibhyām praśiṣṭāḥ āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pacata sunāthāḥ  /

original: saṃkhyātāḥ stokāḥ pṛthivīm sacante prāṇa apānaiḥ saṃmitāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ  / asaṃkhyātāḥ opyamānāḥ suvarṇāḥ sarvam vyāpuḥ śucayaḥ śuci tvam  /
analyzed: saṃkhyātāḥ stokāḥ pṛthivīm sacante prāṇa apānaiḥ saṃmitāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ   asaṃkhyātāḥ opyamānāḥ suvarṇāḥ sarvam vyāpuḥ śucayaḥ śuci tvam  /

original: ud yodhanti abhi valganti taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulān ca bindūn  / yoṣā iva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyāya etaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ bhavata sam āpaḥ  /
analyzed: ud yodhanti abhi valganti taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulān ca bindūn   yoṣā iva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyāya etaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ bhavata sam āpaḥ  /

original: ud thāpaya sīdataḥ budhne enān adbhiḥ ātmānam abhi sam spṛśantām  / amāsi pātraiḥ udakam yat etat mitāḥ taṇḍulāḥ pradiśaḥ yadi imāḥ  //  // {15}
analyzed: ud thāpaya sīdataḥ budhne enān adbhiḥ ātmānam abhi sam spṛśantām   amāsi pātraiḥ udakam yat etat mitāḥ taṇḍulāḥ pradiśaḥ yadi imāḥ

original: pra yaccha parśum tvarayā harausam a hiṃsantaḥ oṣadhīḥ dāntu parvan  / vāsām somaḥ pari rājyam babhūva amanyutā naḥ vīrudhaḥ bhavantu  /
analyzed: pra yaccha parśum tvarayā harausam a hiṃsantaḥ oṣadhīḥ dāntu parvan   vāsām somaḥ pari rājyam babhūva amanyutā naḥ vīrudhaḥ bhavantu  /

original: navam barhiḥ odanāya stṛṇīta priyam hṛdaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ valgu astu  / tasmin devāḥ saha daivīḥ viśantu imam prāśnantu ṛtubhiḥ niṣadya  //
analyzed: navam barhiḥ odanāya stṛṇīta priyam hṛdaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ valgu astu   tasmin devāḥ saha daivīḥ viśantu imam prāśnantu ṛtubhiḥ niṣadya  /

original: vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhiḥ agniṣṭobhaiḥ saṃmitaḥ devatābhiḥ  / tvaṣṭrā iva rūpam su kṛtam svadhityā enāḥ ā ihāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām  //
analyzed: vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhiḥ agniṣṭobhaiḥ saṃmitaḥ devatābhiḥ   tvaṣṭrā iva rūpam su kṛtam svadhityā enāḥ ā ihāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām  /

original: ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt svar pakvena abhi aśnavātai  / upa enam jīvān pitaraḥ ca putrāḥ etam svargam gamaya antam agneḥ  /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt svar pakvena abhi aśnavātai    upa enam jīvān pitaraḥ ca putrāḥ etam svargam gamaya antam agneḥ  /

original: dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyāḥ acyutam tvā devatāḥ cyāvayantu  / tam tvā daṃpatī jīvantau jīva putrau ud vāsayātaḥ pari agnidhānāt  /
analyzed: dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyāḥ acyutam tvā devatāḥ cyāvayantu   tam tvā daṃpatī jīvantau jīva putrau ud vāsayātaḥ pari agnidhānāt  /

original: sarvān samāgāḥ abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ sam atītṛpaḥ tān  / vi gāhethām āyavanam ca darviḥ ekasmin pātre adhi ud hara enam  /
analyzed: sarvān samāgāḥ abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ sam atītṛpaḥ tān    vi gāhethām āyavanam ca darviḥ ekasmin pātre adhi ud hara enam  /

original: upa stṛṇīhi prathaya purastāt ghṛtena pātram abhi ghāraya etat  / vāśrā iva usrā taruṇam stanasyum imam devāsaḥ abhihiṅkṛṇota  /
analyzed: upa stṛṇīhi prathaya purastāt ghṛtena pātram abhi ghāraya etat   vāśrā iva usrā taruṇam stanasyum imam devāsaḥ abhihiṅkṛṇota  /

original: upa astarīḥ akaraḥ lokam etam uruḥ prathatām asamaḥ svargaḥ  / tasmim chrayātai mahiṣaḥ suparṇaḥ devāḥ enam devatābhyaḥ pra yacchān  //
analyzed: upa astarīḥ akaraḥ lokam etam uruḥ prathatām asamaḥ svargaḥ   tasmim chrayātai mahiṣaḥ suparṇaḥ devāḥ enam devatābhyaḥ pra yacchān  /

original: yat yat jāyā pacati tvat paraḥ paraḥ patiḥ vā jāye tvat tiras  / sam tat sṛjethām saha vām tat astu saṃpādayantau saha lokam ekam  /
analyzed: yat yat jāyā pacati tvat paras paras patiḥ vā jāye tvat tiras    sam tat sṛjethām saha vām tat astu saṃpādayantau saha lokam ekam  /

original: yāvantaḥ asyāḥ pṛthivīm sacante asmat putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ  / sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān  // sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān  // sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān  // sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān  // sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān  // sarvān tām upa
analyzed: yāvantaḥ asyāḥ pṛthivīm sacante asmat putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ  / sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān    sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān     sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān        / sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān        /

original: vasoḥ yāḥ dhārāḥ madhunā prapīnāḥ ghṛtena miśrāḥ amṛtasya nābhayaḥ  / sarvāḥ tāḥ ava rundhe svargaḥ ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt  /
analyzed: vasoḥ yāḥ dhārāḥ madhunā prapīnāḥ ghṛtena miśrāḥ amṛtasya nābhayaḥ    sarvāḥ tāḥ ava rundhe svargaḥ ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt  /

original: nidhim nidhi pāḥ abhi enam ichāt anīśvarāḥ abhitas santu ye anye  / asmābhiḥ dattaḥ nihitaḥ svargaḥ tribhiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ trīn svargān arukṣat  /
analyzed: nidhim nidhi pāḥ abhi enam ichāt anīśvarāḥ abhitas santu ye anye    asmābhiḥ dattaḥ nihitaḥ svargaḥ tribhiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ trīn svargān arukṣat  /

original: agniḥ rakṣaḥ tapatu yat videvam kravyād piśācaḥ iha mā pra pāsta  / nudāmaḥ enam apa rudhmaḥ asmat ādityāḥ enam aṅgirasaḥ sacantām  /
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣaḥ tapatu yat videvam kravyād piśācaḥ iha mā pra pāsta   nudāmaḥ enam apa rudhmaḥ asmat ādityāḥ enam aṅgirasaḥ sacantām  /

original: ādityebhyaḥ aṅgirobhyaḥ madhu idam ghṛtena miśram prati vedayāmi  / śuddha hastau brāhmaṇasya a nihatya etam svargam su kṛtau a pītam  /
analyzed: ādityebhyaḥ aṅgirobhyaḥ madhu idam ghṛtena miśram prati vedayāmi    śuddha hastau brāhmaṇasya a nihatya etam svargam su kṛtau a pītam  /

original: idam prāpam uttamam kāṇḍam asya yasmāt lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa  / ā siñca sarpiḥ ghṛtavat sam aṅgdhi eṣa bhāgaḥ aṅgirasaḥ naḥ atra  /
analyzed: idam prāpam uttamam kāṇḍam asya yasmāt lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa   ā siñca sarpiḥ ghṛtavat sam aṅgdhi eṣa bhāgaḥ aṅgirasaḥ naḥ atra  /

original: satyāya ca tapase devatābhyaḥ nidhim śevadhim pari dadmaḥ etam  / mā naḥ dyūte ava gāt mā samityām mā sma anyasmai ud sṛjata purā mat  /
analyzed: satyāya ca tapase devatābhyaḥ nidhim śevadhim pari dadmaḥ etam    mā naḥ dyūte ava gāt mā samityām mā sma anyasmai ud sṛjata purā mat  /

original: aham pacāmi aham dadāmi mama id u karman karuṇe adhi jāyā  / kaumāraḥ lokaḥ ajaniṣṭa putraḥ anvārabhethām vayaḥ uttarāvat  /
analyzed: aham pacāmi aham dadāmi mama id u karman karuṇe adhi jāyā   kaumāraḥ lokaḥ ajaniṣṭa putraḥ anvārabhethām vayaḥ uttarāvat  /

original: na kilbiṣam atra na ādhāraḥ asti na yat mitraiḥ samamamānaḥ eti  / anūnam pātram nihitam naḥ etat paktāram pakvaḥ punar ā viśāti  /
analyzed: na kilbiṣam atra na ādhāraḥ asti na yat mitraiḥ samamamānaḥ eti   anūnam pātram nihitam naḥ etat paktāram pakvaḥ punar ā viśāti  /

original: priyam priyāṇām kṛṇavāma tamaḥ te yantu yatame dviṣanti  / dhenuḥ anaḍvān vayaḥ vayaḥ āyat eva pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyum nudantu  /
analyzed: priyam priyāṇām kṛṇavāma tamaḥ te yantu yatame dviṣanti   dhenuḥ anaḍvān vayaḥ vayaḥ āyat eva pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyum nudantu  /

original: # sam agnayaḥ viduḥ anyaḥ anyam yaḥ oṣadhīḥ sacate yaḥ ca sindhūn  / yāvantaḥ devāḥ divi ātapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva  / yāvantaḥ devāḥ divi ātapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva  //  // tapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti babhūva  //  // tapanti ba
analyzed: sam agnayaḥ viduḥ anyaḥ anyam yaḥ oṣadhīḥ sacate yaḥ ca sindhūn   yāvantaḥ devāḥ divi ātapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva    yāvantaḥ devāḥ divi ātapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva       tapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva

original: eṣā tvacām puruṣe sam babhūva anagnāḥ sarve paśavaḥ ye anye  / kṣatreṇa ātmānam pari dhāpayāthaḥ amotam vāsaḥ mukham odanasya  /
analyzed: eṣā tvacām puruṣe sam babhūva anagnāḥ sarve paśavaḥ ye anye   kṣatreṇa ātmānam pari dhāpayāthaḥ amotam vāsaḥ mukham odanasya  /

original: yat akṣeṣu vadāḥ yat samityām yat vā vadāḥ anṛtam vitta kāmyā  / samānam tantum abhi samvasānau tasmin sarvam śamalam sādayāthaḥ  /
analyzed: yat akṣeṣu vadāḥ yat samityām yat vā vadāḥ anṛtam vitta kāmyā    samānam tantum abhi samvasānau tasmin sarvam śamalam sādayāthaḥ  /

original: varṣam vanuṣva api gaccha devān tvacaḥ dhūmam pari ud pātayāsi  / viśva vyacāḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ bhaviṣyan sa yoniḥ lokam upa yāhi etam  /
analyzed: varṣam vanuṣva api gaccha devān tvacaḥ dhūmam pari ud pātayāsi    viśva vyacāḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ bhaviṣyan sa yoniḥ lokam upa yāhi etam  /

original: tanvam svargaḥ bahudhā vi cakre yathā vidaḥ ātman anya varṇām  / apājait kṛṣṇām ruśatīm punānaḥ yā lohinī tām te agnau juhomi  //
analyzed: tanvam svargaḥ bahudhā vi cakre yathā vidaḥ ātman anya varṇām   apājait kṛṣṇām ruśatīm punānaḥ yā lohinī tām te agnau juhomi  /

original: prācyai tvā diśe agnaye adhipataye asitāya rakṣitre ādityāya iṣumate  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: prācyai tvā diśe agnaye adhipataye asitāya rakṣitre ādityāya iṣumate    etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ    diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: dakṣiṇāyai tvā diśaḥ indrāya adhipataye tiraścirājaye rakṣitre yamāya iṣumate  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāyai tvā diśaḥ indrāya adhipataye tiraścirājaye rakṣitre yamāya iṣumate    etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ    diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: pratīcyai tvā diśe varuṇāya adhipataye pṛdākave rakṣitre annāya iṣumate  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: pratīcyai tvā diśe varuṇāya adhipataye pṛdākave rakṣitre annāya iṣumate    etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ   diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: udīcyai tvā diśe somāya adhipataye svajāya rakṣitre aśanyāḥ iṣumatyai  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: udīcyai tvā diśe somāya adhipataye svajāya rakṣitre aśanyāḥ iṣumatyai    etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ   diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: dhruvāyai tvā diśe viṣṇave adhipataye kalmāṣa grīvāya rakṣitre oṣadhībhyaḥ iṣumatībhyaḥ  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: dhruvāyai tvā diśe viṣṇave adhipataye kalmāṣa grīvāya rakṣitre oṣadhībhyaḥ iṣumatībhyaḥ   etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ    diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /

original: ūrdhvāyai tvā diśe bṛhaspataye adhipataye śvitrāya rakṣitre varṣāya iṣumate  / etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ  / diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /  / tat sam bhavema  /  / tat naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema  /  / tat saha sam bhavema  /
analyzed: ūrdhvāyai tvā diśe bṛhaspataye adhipataye śvitrāya rakṣitre varṣāya iṣumate    etam pari dadmaḥ tam naḥ gopāyata asmākam aitoḥ   diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

original: dadāmi iti eva brūyāt anu ca enām abhutsata  / vaśām brahmabhyaḥ yācadbhyaḥ tat prajāvat apatyavat  /
analyzed: dadāmi iti eva brūyāt anu ca enām abhutsata    vaśām brahmabhyaḥ yācadbhyaḥ tat prajāvat apatyavat  /

original: prajayā sa vi krīṇīte paśubhiḥ ca upa dasyati  / yaḥ ārṣeyebhyaḥ yācadbhyaḥ devānām gām na ditsati  /
analyzed: prajayā sa vi krīṇīte paśubhiḥ ca upa dasyati    yaḥ ārṣeyebhyaḥ yācadbhyaḥ devānām gām na ditsati  /

original: kūṭayā asya sam śīryante śloṇayā kāṭam ardati  / baṇḍayā dahyante gṛhāḥ kāṇayā dīyate svam  /
analyzed: kūṭayā asya sam śīryante śloṇayā kāṭam ardati   baṇḍayā dahyante gṛhāḥ kāṇayā dīyate svam  /

original: vilohitaḥ adhiṣṭhānāt śaknaḥ vindati gopatim  / tathā vaśāyāḥ saṃvidyam duradabhnā hi ucyase  /
analyzed: vilohitaḥ adhiṣṭhānāt śaknaḥ vindati gopatim    tathā vaśāyāḥ saṃvidyam duradabhnā hi ucyase  /

original: padoḥ asyāḥ adhiṣṭhānāt viklinduḥ nāma vindati  / anāmanāt sam śīryante yāḥ mukhena upajighrati  /
analyzed: padoḥ asyāḥ adhiṣṭhānāt viklinduḥ nāma vindati   anāmanāt sam śīryante yāḥ mukhena upajighrati  /

original: yaḥ asyāḥ karṇau āskunoti ā sa deveṣu vṛścate  / lakṣma kurve iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam  /
analyzed: yaḥ asyāḥ karṇau āskunoti ā sa deveṣu vṛścate    lakṣma kurve iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam  /

original: yat asyāḥ kasmai cit bhogāya bālān kaḥ cit prakṛntati  / tatas kiśorāḥ mriyante vatsān ca ghātukaḥ vṛkaḥ  /
analyzed: yat asyāḥ kasmai cit bhogāya bālān kaḥ cit prakṛntati   tatas kiśorāḥ mriyante vatsān ca ghātukaḥ vṛkaḥ  /

original: yat asyāḥ gopatau satyāḥ loma dhvāṅkṣaḥ ajīhiḍat  / tatas kumārāḥ mriyante yakṣmaḥ vindati anāmanāt  /
analyzed: yat asyāḥ gopatau satyāḥ loma dhvāṅkṣaḥ ajīhiḍat   tatas kumārāḥ mriyante yakṣmaḥ vindati anāmanāt  /

original: yat asyāḥ palpūlanam śakṛt dāsī samasyati  / tatas aparūpam jāyate tasmāt a vyeṣyat enasaḥ  /

original: ā te rāṣṭram iha rohitaḥ ahārṣīt vi āsthat mṛdhaḥ abhayam te abhūt  / tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmam duhātām iha śakvarībhiḥ  /
analyzed: ā te rāṣṭram iha rohitaḥ ahārṣīt vi āsthat mṛdhaḥ abhayam te abhūt    tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmam duhātām iha śakvarībhiḥ  /

original: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna tatra tantum parameṣṭhī tatāna  / tatra śiśriye ajaḥ eka pādaḥ adṛṃhat dyāvāpṛthivī balena  /
analyzed: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna tatra tantum parameṣṭhī tatāna   tatra śiśriye ajaḥ eka pādaḥ adṛṃhat dyāvāpṛthivī balena

original: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena sva stabhitam tena nākaḥ  / tena antarikṣam vimitāḥ rajāṃsi tena devāḥ amṛtam anu avindan  /
analyzed: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena sva stabhitam tena nākaḥ   tena antarikṣam vimitāḥ rajāṃsi tena devāḥ amṛtam anu avindan  /

original: vi rohitaḥ amṛśat viśva rūpam samākurvāṇaḥ praruhaḥ ruhaḥ ca  / divam rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā sam te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā ghṛtena  /
analyzed: vi rohitaḥ amṛśat viśva rūpam samākurvāṇaḥ praruhaḥ ruhaḥ ca    divam rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā sam te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā ghṛtena  /

original: yāḥ te ruhaḥ praruhaḥ yāḥ te āruhaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam  / tāsām brahmaṇā payasā vavṛdhānaḥ viśi rāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya  //
analyzed: yāḥ te ruhaḥ praruhaḥ yāḥ te āruhaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam    tāsām brahmaṇā payasā vavṛdhānaḥ viśi rāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya  /

original: yaḥ te viśaḥ tapasaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ vatsam gāyatrīm anu tāḥ iha āguḥ  / tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatsaḥ abhi etu rohitaḥ  // tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatsaḥ abhi etu rohitaḥ  // tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatsaḥ abhi etu rohitaḥ  // tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatsaḥ abhi etu rohitaḥ  // tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatsaḥ abhi etu rohitaḥ  // tāḥ tvā viśa

original: ūrdhvaḥ rohitaḥ adhi nāke asthāt viśvā rūpāṇi janayan yuvā kaviḥ  / tigmena agniḥ jyotiṣā vi bhāti tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi  //

original: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jātavedāḥ ghṛta āhutaḥ soma pṛṣṭhaḥ su vīraḥ  / mā mā hāsīt nāthitaḥ na id tvā jahāni go poṣam ca me vīra poṣam ca dhehi  /

original: rohitaḥ yajñasya janitā mukham ca rohitāya vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi  / rohitam devāḥ yanti sumanasyamānāḥ sa mā rohaiḥ sāmityai rohayatu  //

original: idam sadaḥ rohiṇī rohitasya asau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti  / tām gandharvāḥ kaśyapāḥ ud nayanti tām rakṣanti kavayaḥ apramādam  /
analyzed: idam sadaḥ rohiṇī rohitasya asau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti    tām gandharvāḥ kaśyapāḥ ud nayanti tām rakṣanti kavayaḥ apramādam  /

original: sūryasya aśvāḥ harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanti amṛtāḥ sukham ratham  / ghṛta pāvāḥ rohitaḥ bhrājamānaḥ divam devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveśa  /
analyzed: sūryasya aśvāḥ harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanti amṛtāḥ sukham ratham    ghṛta pāvāḥ rohitaḥ bhrājamānaḥ divam devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveśa  /

original: yaḥ rohitaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ pari agnim pari sūryam babhūva  / yaḥ viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīm divam ca tasmāt devāḥ adhi sṛṣṭīḥ sṛjante  /
analyzed: yaḥ rohitaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ pari agnim pari sūryam babhūva   yaḥ viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīm divam ca tasmāt devāḥ adhi sṛṣṭīḥ sṛjante  /

original: rohitaḥ divam āruhat mahataḥ pari arṇavāt  / sarvaḥ ruroha rohitaḥ ruhaḥ  /
analyzed: rohitaḥ divam āruhat mahataḥ pari arṇavāt   sarvaḥ ruroha rohitaḥ ruhaḥ  /

original: vi mimīṣva payasvatīm ghṛtācīm devānām dhenuḥ an apaspṛś eṣā  / indraḥ somam pibatu kṣemaḥ astu agniḥ pra stautu vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva  /
analyzed: vi mimīṣva payasvatīm ghṛtācīm devānām dhenuḥ an apaspṛś eṣā    indraḥ somam pibatu kṣemaḥ astu agniḥ pra stautu vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva  /

original: samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhānaḥ ghṛta vṛddhaḥ ghṛta āhutaḥ  / abhīṣāh viśvāṣāh agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama  /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhānaḥ ghṛta vṛddhaḥ ghṛta āhutaḥ   abhīṣāh viśvāṣāh agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama  /

original: hantu enān pra dahatu ariḥ yaḥ naḥ pṛtanyati  / kravyādā agninā vayam sapatnān pra dahāmasi  //
analyzed: hantu enān pra dahatu ariḥ yaḥ naḥ pṛtanyati   kravyādā agninā vayam sapatnān pra dahāmasi  /
avācīnān ava jahi indra vajreṇa bāhumān   adha sapatnān māmakān agneḥ tejobhiḥ ādiṣi

original: agne sapatnān adharān pādaya asmat vyathayā sajātam utpipānam bṛhaspate  / indra agnī mitrāvaruṇau adhare padyantām a pratimanyūyamānāḥ  /
analyzed: agne sapatnān adharān pādaya asmat vyathayā sajātam utpipānam bṛhaspate    indra agnī mitrāvaruṇau adhare padyantām a pratimanyūyamānāḥ  /

original: udyan tvam deva sūrya sapatnān ava me jahi  / ava enān aśmanā jahi te yantu adhamam tamaḥ  /
analyzed: udyan tvam deva sūrya sapatnān ava me jahi   ava enān aśmanā jahi te yantu adhamam tamaḥ  /

original: vatsaḥ virājaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ matīnām ā ruroha śukra pṛṣṭhaḥ antarikṣam  / ghṛtena arkam abhi arcanti vatsam brahma santam brahmaṇā vardhayanti  //
analyzed: vatsaḥ virājaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ matīnām ā ruroha śukra pṛṣṭhaḥ antarikṣam   ghṛtena arkam abhi arcanti vatsam brahma santam brahmaṇā vardhayanti  /

original: divam ca roha pṛthivīm ca roha rāṣṭram ca roha draviṇam ca roha  / prajām ca roha amṛtam ca roha rohitena tanvam sam spṛṣasva  //
analyzed: divam ca roha pṛthivīm ca roha rāṣṭram ca roha draviṇam ca roha    prajām ca roha amṛtam ca roha rohitena tanvam sam spṛṣasva  /

original: ye devāḥ rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ abhitas yanti sūryam  / taiḥ te rohitaḥ samvidānaḥ rāṣṭram dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ  /
analyzed: ye devāḥ rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ abhitas yanti sūryam   taiḥ te rohitaḥ samvidānaḥ rāṣṭram dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ  /

original: ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti  / tiras samudram ati rocase arṇavam  /
analyzed: ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti    tiras samudram ati rocase arṇavam  /

original: rohite dyāvāpṛthivī adhi śrite vasu jiti go jiti saṃdhanājiti  / sahasram yasya janimāni sapta ca voceyam te nābhim bhuvanasya adhi majmani  //
analyzed: rohite dyāvāpṛthivī adhi śrite vasu jiti go jiti saṃdhanājiti  / sahasram yasya janimāni sapta ca voceyam te nābhim bhuvanasya adhi majmani  /

analyzed: yaśāḥ yāsi pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca yaśāḥ paśūnām uta carṣaṇīnām   yaśāḥ pṛthivyāḥ adityāḥ upasthe aham bhūyāsam savitā iva cāruḥ  /

original: avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa padā vatsam bibratī gauḥ ud asthāt  / sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe asmin  /
analyzed: avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa padā vatsam bibratī gauḥ ud asthāt    sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe asmin  /

original: ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī  / sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti  /
analyzed: ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī    sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti  /

original: ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vacaḥ  / ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti  //
analyzed: ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vacaḥ    ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti  /

original: veda tat te amartya yat te ākramaṇam divi  / yat te sadhastham parame vyoman  /
analyzed: veda tat te amartya yat te ākramaṇam divi   yat te sadhastham parame vyoman  /

original: sūryaḥ dyām sūryaḥ pṛṭhivīm sūryaḥ āpaḥ ati paśyati  / sūryaḥ bhūtasya ekam cakṣuḥ ā ruroha divam mahīm  /
analyzed: sūryaḥ dyām sūryaḥ pṛṭhivīm sūryaḥ āpaḥ ati paśyati    sūryaḥ bhūtasya ekam cakṣuḥ ā ruroha divam mahīm  /

original: urvīḥ āsan paridhayaḥ vediḥ bhūmiḥ akalpata  / tatra etau agnī ādhatta himam ghraṃsam ca rohitaḥ  /

analyzed: svarvidaḥ rohitasya brahmaṇā agniḥ sam idhyate   tasmāt ghraṃsaḥ tasmāt dhimaḥ tasmāt yajñaḥ ajāyata  /

analyzed: vedim bhūmim kalpayitvā divam kṛtvā dakṣiṇām   ghraṃsam tat agnim kṛtvā cakāra viśvam ātmanvat varṣeṇa ājyena rohitaḥ  /

original: varṣam ājam ghraṃsaḥ agniḥ vediḥ bhūmiḥ akalpata  / tatra etān parvatān agniḥ gīrbhiḥ ūrdhvām akalpayat  /
analyzed: varṣam ājam ghraṃsaḥ agniḥ vediḥ bhūmiḥ akalpata   tatra etān parvatān agniḥ gīrbhiḥ ūrdhvām akalpayat  /

analyzed: gīrbhiḥ ūrdhvān kalpayitvā rohitaḥ bhūmim abravīt   tvayi idam sarvam jāyatām yat bhūtam yat ca bhāvyam  /

original: sa yajñaḥ prathamaḥ bhūtaḥ bhavyaḥ ajāyata  / tasmāt ha jajñe idam sarvam yat kim ca idam virocate rohitena ṛṣiṇā ābhṛtam  /
analyzed: sa yajñaḥ prathamaḥ bhūtaḥ bhavyaḥ ajāyata   tasmāt ha jajñe idam sarvam yat kim ca idam virocate rohitena ṛṣiṇā ābhṛtam  /

original: yaḥ ca gām padā sphurati pratyaṅ sūryam ca mehati  / tasya vṛścāmi te mūlam na chāyām karavaḥ aparam  /
analyzed: yaḥ ca gām padā sphurati pratyaṅ sūryam ca mehati   tasya vṛścāmi te mūlam na chāyām karavaḥ aparam  /

analyzed: yaḥ mā abhichāyam atyeṣi mām ca agnim ca antarā   / tasya vṛścāmi te mūlam na chāyām karavaḥ aparam  /

original: diśām prajñānām svarayantam arciṣā su pakṣam āśum patayantam arṇave  / stavāma sūryam bhuvanasya gopām yaḥ raśmibhiḥ diśaḥ ābhāti sarvāḥ  /

analyzed: yat prāṅ pratyaṅ svadhayā yāsi śībham nānā rūpe ahanī karṣi māyayā   tat āditya mahi tat te mahi śravaḥ yat ekaḥ viśvam pari bhūma jāyase  /

original: vipaścitam taraṇim bhrājamānam vahanti yam haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ  / srutāt yam attriḥ divam unnināya tam tvā paśyanti pariyāntam ājim  //
analyzed: vipaścitam taraṇim bhrājamānam vahanti yam haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ   srutāt yam attriḥ divam unnināya tam tvā paśyanti pariyāntam ājim  /

original: mā tvā dabhan pariyāntam ājim svasti durgām ati yāhi śībham  / divam ca sūrya pṛthivīm ca devīm ahar rātre vimimānaḥ yat eṣi  //
analyzed: mā tvā dabhan pariyāntam ājim svasti durgām ati yāhi śībham    divam ca sūrya pṛthivīm ca devīm ahar rātre vimimānaḥ yat eṣi  /

original: svasti te sūrya carase rathāya yena ubhau antau pariyāsi sadyas  / yam te vahanti haritaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvāḥ yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ  /
analyzed: svasti te sūrya carase rathāya yena ubhau antau pariyāsi sadyas    yam te vahanti haritaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvāḥ yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ  /

original: sukham sūrya ratham aṃśumantam syonam su vahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam  / yam te vahanti haritaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvāḥ yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ  /
analyzed: sukham sūrya ratham aṃśumantam syonam su vahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam    yam te vahanti haritaḥ vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvāḥ yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ  /

original: sapta sūryaḥ haritaḥ yātave rathe hiraṇya tvacasaḥ bṛhatīḥ ayukta  / amoci śukraḥ rajasaḥ parastāt vidhūya devaḥ tamaḥ divam āruhat  //
analyzed: sapta sūryaḥ haritaḥ yātave rathe hiraṇya tvacasaḥ bṛhatīḥ ayukta    amoci śukraḥ rajasaḥ parastāt vidhūya devaḥ tamaḥ divam āruhat  /

original: udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣe viśvā rupāṇi puṣyasi  / ubhā samudrau kratunā vi bhāsi sarvān lokān paribhūḥ bhrājamānaḥ  // {7}

original: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyayā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ arṇavam  / viśvā anyaḥ bhuvanā vicaṣṭe hairaṇyaiḥ anyam haritaḥ vahanti  //

analyzed: ubhau antau sam arṣasi vatsaḥ saṃmātarau iva    nanu etat itas purā brahma devāḥ amī viduḥ  /

original: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna yaḥ drāpim kṛtvā bhuvanāni vaste  / yasmin kṣiyanti pradiśaḥ ṣaṭ urvīḥ yāḥ pataṅgaḥ anu vicākaśīti  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / yasmāt vātāḥ ṛtuthā pavante yasmāt samudrāḥ adhi vikṣaranti  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  //
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna yaḥ drāpim kṛtvā bhuvanāni vaste    yasmin kṣiyanti pradiśaḥ ṣaṭ urvīḥ yāḥ pataṅgaḥ anu vicākaśīti    tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti   yasmāt vātāḥ ṛtuthā pavante yasmāt samudrāḥ adhi vikṣaranti    tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti     ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  /

original: yaḥ mārayati prāṇayati yasmāt prāṇanti bhuvanāni viśvā  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  /
analyzed: yaḥ mārayati prāṇayati yasmāt prāṇanti bhuvanāni viśvā    tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti    ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  /

original: yaḥ prāṇena dyāvāpṛthivī tarpayati apānena samudrasya jaṭharam yaḥ piparti  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  //
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇena dyāvāpṛthivī tarpayati apānena samudrasya jaṭharam yaḥ piparti   tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti    ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  /

original: yasmin virāj parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ saha paṅktyā śritaḥ  / yaḥ parasya prāṇam paramasya tejaḥ ādade  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / yasmin ṣaṭ urvīḥ pañca diśaḥ adhiśritāḥ catasraḥ āpaḥ yajñasya trayaḥ akṣarāḥ  / yaḥ antarā rodasī kruddhaḥ cakṣuṣā aikṣata  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / yaḥ anna ādaḥ ann
analyzed: yasmin virāj parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ saha paṅktyā śritaḥ   yaḥ parasya prāṇam paramasya tejaḥ ādade   tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti   yasmin ṣaṭ urvīḥ pañca diśaḥ adhiśritāḥ catasraḥ āpaḥ yajñasya trayaḥ akṣarāḥ   yaḥ antarā rodasī kruddhaḥ cakṣuṣā aikṣata    tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti     yaḥ anna ādaḥ anna a

original: kṛsṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti  / te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / yat te candram kaśyapa rocanāvat yat saṃhitam puṣkalam citra bhānu yasmin sūryāḥ ārpitāḥ sapta sākam  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  // tasya devasya kruddhasya e

original: nimrucaḥ tisraḥ vyuṣaḥ ha tisraḥ trīṇi rajāṃsi divaḥ aṅga tisraḥ  / vidma te agne tredhā janitram tredhā devānām janimāni vidma  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / vi yaḥ aurṇot pṛthivīm jāyamānaḥ ā samudram adadhāt antarikṣe  / tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti  / ud vepaya rohita pra kṣiṇīhi brahmajyasya prati muñca pāśān  //

original: bhagaḥ tvā itas nayatu hasta gṛhya aśvinā tvā pra vahatām rathena  / gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  //  // gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  //  // gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  //  // gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  //  // gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  //  // g
analyzed: bhagaḥ tvā itas nayatu hasta gṛhya aśvinā tvā pra vahatām rathena    gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi       gṛhān gaccha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi  /

original: iha priyam prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi  / enā patyā tanvam sam spṛśasva atha jirviḥ vidatham ā vadāsi  //
analyzed: iha priyam prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi   enā patyā tanvam sam spṛśasva atha jirviḥ vidatham ā vadāsi  /

original: iha eva stam mā vi yauṣṭam viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnutam  / krīḍantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ modamānau svastakau  /
analyzed: iha eva stam mā vi yauṣṭam viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnutam   krīḍantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ modamānau svastakau  /

original: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ arṇavam  / viśvā anyaḥ bhuvanā vicaṣṭe ṛtūṃr anyaḥ vidadhat jāyase navaḥ  /
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ arṇavam    viśvā anyaḥ bhuvanā vicaṣṭe ṛtūṃr anyaḥ vidadhat jāyase navaḥ  /

original: navaḥ navaḥ bhavasi jāyamānaḥ ahnām ketuḥ uṣasām eṣi agram  / bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāsi āyan pra candramaḥ tirase dīrgham āyuḥ  /
analyzed: navaḥ navaḥ bhavasi jāyamānaḥ ahnām ketuḥ uṣasām eṣi agram    bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāsi āyan pra candramaḥ tirase dīrgham āyuḥ  /

original: parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyaḥ vi bhaja vasu  / kṛtyā eṣā padvatī bhūtvā jāyā viśate patim  /
analyzed: parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyaḥ vi bhaja vasu   kṛtyā eṣā padvatī bhūtvā jāyā viśate patim  /

original: nīlalohitam bhavati kṛtyā āsaktiḥ vi ajyate  / edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate  /
analyzed: nīlalohitam bhavati kṛtyā āsaktiḥ vi ajyate   edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate  /

original: aślīlā tanūḥ bhavati ruśatī pāpayā amuyā  / patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute  /
analyzed: aślīlā tanūḥ bhavati ruśatī pāpayā amuyā   patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute  /

original: āśasanam viśasanam atho adhivikartanam  / sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahma uta śumbhati  //
analyzed: āśasanam viśasanam atho adhivikartanam    sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahma uta śumbhati  /

original: tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam a pāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etat attave  / sūryām yaḥ brahmā veda saḥ id vādhūyam arhati  //
analyzed: tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam a pāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etat attave   sūryām yaḥ brahmā veda saḥ id vādhūyam arhati  /

original: saḥ id tat syonam harati brahmā vāsaḥ su maṅgalam  / prāyaścittim yaḥ adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati  //  //  //
analyzed: saḥ id tat syonam harati brahmā vāsaḥ su maṅgalam   prāyaścittim yaḥ adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati

original: yuvam bhagam sam bharatam samṛddham ṛtam vadantau ṛtodyeṣu  / brahmaṇas pate patim asyai rocaya cāru saṃbhalaḥ vadatu vācam etām  /
analyzed: yuvam bhagam sam bharatam samṛddham ṛtam vadantau ṛtodyeṣu   brahmaṇas pate patim asyai rocaya cāru saṃbhalaḥ vadatu vācam etām  /

original: iha id asātha na paras gamātha imam gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha  / śubham yatīḥ usriyāḥ soma varcasaḥ viśve devāḥ kran iha vaḥ manāṃsi  //
analyzed: iha id asātha na paras gamātha imam gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha    śubham yatīḥ usriyāḥ soma varcasaḥ viśve devāḥ kran iha vaḥ manāṃsi  /

original: imam gāvaḥ prajayā sam viśātha ayam devānām na mināti bhāgam  / asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaḥ ca sarve asmai vaḥ dhātā savitā suvāti  //
analyzed: imam gāvaḥ prajayā sam viśātha ayam devānām na mināti bhāgam    asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaḥ ca sarve asmai vaḥ dhātā savitā suvāti  /

original: anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthanaḥ yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti naḥ vareyam  / sam bhagena sam aryamṇā sam dhātā sṛjatu varcasā  /
analyzed: anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthanaḥ yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti naḥ vareyam    sam bhagena sam aryamṇā sam dhātā sṛjatu varcasā  /

original: yat ca varcaḥ akṣeṣu surāyām ca yat āhitam  / yat goṣu aśvinā varcaḥ tena imām varcasā avatam  /
analyzed: yat ca varcaḥ akṣeṣu surāyām ca yat āhitam   yat goṣu aśvinā varcaḥ tena imām varcasā avatam  /

original: yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā surā  / yena akṣāḥ abhyaṣicyanta tena imām varcasā avatam  /
analyzed: yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā surā    yena akṣāḥ abhyaṣicyanta tena imām varcasā avatam  /

original: yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar yam viprāsaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu  / apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāvān  /
analyzed: yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar yam viprāsaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu    apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāvān  /

original: idam aham ruśantam grābham tanū dūṣim apohāmi  / yaḥ bhadraḥ rocanaḥ tam ud acāmi  //
analyzed: idam aham ruśantam grābham tanū dūṣim apohāmi   yaḥ bhadraḥ rocanaḥ tam ud acāmi  /

original: ā asyai brāhmaṇāḥ snapanīḥ harantu avīra ghnīḥ ud ajantu āpaḥ  / aryamṇaḥ agnim pari etu pūṣan pratīkṣante śvaśuraḥ devaraḥ ca  /
analyzed: ā asyai brāhmaṇāḥ snapanīḥ harantu avīra ghnīḥ ud ajantu āpaḥ   aryamṇaḥ agnim pari etu pūṣan pratīkṣante śvaśuraḥ devaraḥ ca  /

original: khe rathasya khe anasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato  / apālām indra tris pūtvā akṛṇoḥ sūrya tvacam  /
analyzed: khe rathasya khe anasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato    apālām indra tris pūtvā akṛṇoḥ sūrya tvacam  /

original: āśāsānā saumanasam prajām saubhāgyam rayim  / patyuḥ anuvratā bhūtvā sam nahyasva amṛtāya kam  /
analyzed: āśāsānā saumanasam prajām saubhāgyam rayim   patyuḥ anuvratā bhūtvā sam nahyasva amṛtāya kam  /

original: yathā sindhuḥ nadīnām sāmrājyam suṣuve vṛṣā  / eva tvam samrājñī edhi patyuḥ astam paretya  //
analyzed: yathā sindhuḥ nadīnām sāmrājyam suṣuve vṛṣā     eva tvam samrājñī edhi patyuḥ astam paretya  /

original: samrājñī edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñī uta devṛṣu  / nanānduḥ samrājñī edhi samrājñī uta śvaśrvāḥ  /
analyzed: samrājñī edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñī uta devṛṣu   nanānduḥ samrājñī edhi samrājñī uta śvaśrvāḥ

original: yāḥ akṛntan avayan yāḥ ca tatnire yāḥ devīḥ antām abhitas adadanta  / tāḥ tvā jarase sam vyayantu āyuṣmatī idam pari dhatsva vāsaḥ  /
analyzed: yāḥ akṛntan avayan yāḥ ca tatnire yāḥ devīḥ antām abhitas adadanta    tāḥ tvā jarase sam vyayantu āyuṣmatī idam pari dhatsva vāsaḥ  /

original: jīvam rudanti vi nayanti adhvaram dīrghām anu prasitim dīdhyuḥ naraḥ  / vāmam pitṛbhyaḥ ye idam samīrire mayaḥ patibhyaḥ janaye pariṣvaje  /
analyzed: jīvam rudanti vi nayanti adhvaram dīrghām anu prasitim dīdhyuḥ naraḥ    vāmam pitṛbhyaḥ ye idam samīrire mayaḥ patibhyaḥ janaye pariṣvaje  /

original: syonam dhruvam prajāyai dhārayāmi te aśmānam devyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ upasthe  / tam ā tiṣṭha anumādyā su varcāḥ dīrgham te āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: syonam dhruvam prajāyai dhārayāmi te aśmānam devyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ upasthe   tam ā tiṣṭha anumādyā su varcāḥ dīrgham te āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu  /

original: yena agniḥ asyāḥ bhūmyāḥ hastam jagrāha dakṣiṇam  / tena gṛhṇāmi te hastam mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ mayā saha prajayā ca dhanena ca  /
analyzed: yena agniḥ asyāḥ bhūmyāḥ hastam jagrāha dakṣiṇam   tena gṛhṇāmi te hastam mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ mayā saha prajayā ca dhanena ca  /

original: devaḥ te savitā hastam gṛhṇātu somaḥ rājā suprajasam kṛṇotu  / agniḥ subhagām jatavedāḥ patye patnīm jaradaṣṭim kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: devaḥ te savitā hastam gṛhṇātu somaḥ rājā suprajasam kṛṇotu   agniḥ subhagām jatavedāḥ patye patnīm jaradaṣṭim kṛṇotu  /

original: gṛhṇāmi te saubhaga tvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asaḥ  / bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ  // bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ  //  // bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ  //  //
analyzed: gṛhṇāmi te saubhaga tvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asaḥ  / bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ   bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ             /

original: bhagaḥ te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt  / patnī tvam asi dharmaṇā aham gṛhapatiḥ tava  /
analyzed: bhagaḥ te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt   patnī tvam asi dharmaṇā aham gṛhapatiḥ tava  /

original: mama iyam astu poṣyā mahyam tvā adāt bṛhaspatiḥ  / mayā patyā prajāvati sam jīva śaradaḥ śatam  /
analyzed: mama iyam astu poṣyā mahyam tvā adāt bṛhaspatiḥ   mayā patyā prajāvati sam jīva śaradaḥ śatam  /

original: tvaṣṭā vāsaḥ vi adadhāt śubhe kam bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām  / tena imām nārīm savitā bhagaḥ ca sūryām iva pari dhattām prajayā  /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā vāsaḥ vi adadhāt śubhe kam bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām    tena imām nārīm savitā bhagaḥ ca sūryām iva pari dhattām prajayā  /

original: indra agnī dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā  / bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ brahma somaḥ imām nārim prajayā vardhayantu  //
analyzed: indra agnī dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā    bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ brahma somaḥ imām nārim prajayā vardhayantu  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keśām akalpayat  / tena imām aśvinā nārīm patye sam śobhayāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keśām akalpayat   tena imām aśvinā nārīm patye sam śobhayāmasi  /

original: idam tat rūpam yat avasta yoṣā jāyām jijñāse manasā carantīm  / tām anu artiṣye sakhibhiḥ navagvaiḥ kaḥ imān vidvān vi cacarta pāśān  /
analyzed: idam tat rūpam yat avasta yoṣā jāyām jijñāse manasā carantīm    tām anu artiṣye sakhibhiḥ navagvaiḥ kaḥ imān vidvān vi cacarta pāśān  /

original: aham vi syāmi mayi rūpam asyāḥ vedat id paśyat manasaḥ kulāyam  / na steyam admi manasā ud amucye svayam śrathnānaḥ varuṇasya pāśān  /
analyzed: aham vi syāmi mayi rūpam asyāḥ vedat id paśyat manasaḥ kulāyam   na steyam admi manasā ud amucye svayam śrathnānaḥ varuṇasya pāśān  /

original: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā su śevāḥ  / urum lokam sugam atra panthām kṛṇomi tubhyam sahapatnyai vadhu  //
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā su śevāḥ   urum lokam sugam atra panthām kṛṇomi tubhyam sahapatnyai vadhu  /

original: ud yacchadhvam apa rakṣaḥ hanātha imam nārīm su kṛte dadhāta  / dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhagaḥ rājā puraḥ etu prajānan  //
analyzed: ud yacchadhvam apa rakṣaḥ hanātha imam nārīm su kṛte dadhāta   dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhagaḥ rājā puras etu prajānan  /

original: bhagaḥ tatakṣa caturaḥ pādān bhagaḥ tatakṣa catvāri uṣpalāni  / tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyataḥ anu vardhrān sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī  /
analyzed: bhagaḥ tatakṣa caturaḥ pādān bhagaḥ tatakṣa catvāri uṣpalāni   tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyataḥ anu vardhrān sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī  /

original: su kiṃśukam vahatum viśva rūpam hiraṇya varṇam suvṛtam su cakram  / ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam syonam patibhyaḥ vahatum kṛṇu tvam  /
analyzed: su kiṃśukam vahatum viśva rūpam hiraṇya varṇam suvṛtam su cakram   ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam syonam patibhyaḥ vahatum kṛṇu tvam  /

original: a bhrātṛ ghnīm varuṇā paśu ghnīm bṛhaspate  / indrāpati ghnīm putriṇīm ā asmabhyam savitar vaha  //
analyzed: a bhrātṛ ghnīm varuṇā paśu ghnīm bṛhaspate   indrāpati ghnīm putriṇīm ā asmabhyam savitar vaha  /

original: mā hiṃsiṣṭam kumāryam sthūṇe deva kṛte pathi  / śālāyāḥ devyāḥ dvāram syonam kṛṇmaḥ vadhū patham  /
analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭam kumāryam sthūṇe deva kṛte pathi    śālāyāḥ devyāḥ dvāram syonam kṛṇmaḥ vadhū patham  /
brahma aparam yujyatām brahma pūrvam brahma antatas madhyatas brahma sarvatas   anāvyādhām deva purām prapadya śivā syonā pati loke vi rāja

original: tubhyam agre pari avahan sūryām vahatunā saha  / sa naḥ patibhyaḥ jāyām dāḥ agne prajayā saha  /
analyzed: tubhyam agre pari avahan sūryām vahatunā saha    sa naḥ patibhyaḥ jāyām dāḥ agne prajayā saha  /

original: punar patnīm agniḥ adāt āyuṣā saha varcasā  / dīrgha āyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam  /
analyzed: punar patnīm agniḥ adāt āyuṣā saha varcasā    dīrgha āyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam  /

original: somasya jāyā prathamam gandharvaḥ te aparaḥ patiḥ  / tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ turīyaḥ te manuṣya jāḥ  /
analyzed: somasya jāyā prathamam gandharvaḥ te aparaḥ patiḥ   tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ turīyaḥ te manuṣya jāḥ  /

original: somaḥ dadat gandharvāya gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye  / rayim ca putrān ca adāt agniḥ mahyam atha u imām  /
analyzed: somaḥ dadat gandharvāya gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye   rayim ca putrān ca adāt agniḥ mahyam atha u imām  /

original: ā vām agan sumatiḥ vājinīvasū ni aśvinā hṛtsu kāmāḥ araṃsata  / abhūtam gopāḥ mithunā śubhaḥ patī priyāḥ aryamṇaḥ duryām aśīmahi  //
analyzed: ā vām agan sumatiḥ vājinīvasū ni aśvinā hṛtsu kāmāḥ araṃsata    abhūtam gopāḥ mithunā śubhaḥ patī priyāḥ aryamṇaḥ duryām aśīmahi  /

original: sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayim dhehi sarva vīram vacasyam  / sugam tīrtham su prapāṇam śubhaḥ patī sthāṇum pathiṣṭhām apa durmatim hatam  /
analyzed: sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayim dhehi sarva vīram vacasyam    sugam tīrtham su prapāṇam śubhaḥ patī sthāṇum pathiṣṭhām apa durmatim hatam  /

original: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ yāni kṣetrāṇi yāḥ vanā  / tāḥ tvā vadhu prajāvatīm patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ  /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ yāni kṣetrāṇi yāḥ vanā   tāḥ tvā vadhu prajāvatīm patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ  /

original: ā imam panthām arukṣāma sugam svastivāhanam  / yasmin vīraḥ na riṣyati anyeṣām vindate vasu  //
analyzed: ā imam panthām arukṣāma sugam svastivāhanam    yasmin vīraḥ na riṣyati anyeṣām vindate vasu  /

original: idam su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayā āśiṣā daṃpatī vāmam aśnutaḥ  / ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ca devīḥ eṣu vānaspatyeṣu ye adhi tasthuḥ  / syonāḥ te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣuḥ vahatum uhyamānam  /
analyzed: idam su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayā āśiṣā daṃpatī vāmam aśnutaḥ   ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ca devīḥ eṣu vānaspatyeṣu ye adhi tasthuḥ   syonāḥ te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣuḥ vahatum uhyamānam  /

original: # ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum yakṣmāḥ yanti janān anu  / punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ nayantu yatas āgatāḥ  //  //  /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /|   /
analyzed: ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum yakṣmāḥ yanti janān anu   punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ nayantu yatas āgatāḥ

original: mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ye āsīdanti daṃpatī  / sugena durgam atītām apa drāntu arātayaḥ  /
analyzed: mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ye āsīdanti daṃpatī    sugena durgam atītām apa drāntu arātayaḥ  /

original: sam kāśayāmi vahatum brahmaṇā gṛhaiḥ aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa  / paryāṇaddham viśva rūpam yat asti syonam patibhyaḥ savitā tat kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: sam kāśayāmi vahatum brahmaṇā gṛhaiḥ aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa    paryāṇaddham viśva rūpam yat asti syonam patibhyaḥ savitā tat kṛṇotu  /

original: śivā nārī iyam astam āgan imam dhātā lokam asyai dideśa  / tām aryamā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu  /
analyzed: śivā nārī iyam astam āgan imam dhātā lokam asyai dideśa    tām aryamā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu  /

original: ātmanvatī urvarā nārī iyam āgan tasyām naraḥ vapata bījam asyām  / sā vaḥ prajām janayat vakṣaṇābhyaḥ bibhratī dugdham ṛṣabhasya retaḥ  /
analyzed: ātmanvatī urvarā nārī iyam āgan tasyām naraḥ vapata bījam asyām    sā vaḥ prajām janayat vakṣaṇābhyaḥ bibhratī dugdham ṛṣabhasya retaḥ  /

original: prati tiṣṭha virāj asi viṣṇuḥ iva iha sarasvati  / sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat  /
analyzed: prati tiṣṭha virāj asi viṣṇuḥ iva iha sarasvati    sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat  /

original: ud vaḥ ūrmiḥ śamyā hantu āpaḥ yoktrāṇi muñcata  / mā aduṣkṛtau vyenasau aghnyau aśunam āratām  /
analyzed: ud vaḥ ūrmiḥ śamyā hantu āpaḥ yoktrāṇi muñcata   mā aduṣkṛtau vyenasau aghnyau aśunam āratām  /

original: aghora cakṣuḥ a pati ghnī syonā śagmā su śevā su yamā gṛhebhyaḥ  / vīrasūḥ devṛ kāmā sam tvayā edhiṣīmahi sumasyamānā  /
analyzed: aghora cakṣuḥ a pati ghnī syonā śagmā su śevā su yamā gṛhebhyaḥ    vīrasūḥ devṛ kāmā sam tvayā edhiṣīmahi sumasyamānā  /

original: a devṛ ghnī a pati ghnī iha edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ su yamā su varcāḥ  / prajāvatī vīrasūḥ devṛ kāmā syonā imam agnim gārhapatyam saparya  //
analyzed: a devṛ ghnī a pati ghnī iha edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ su yamā su varcāḥ   prajāvatī vīrasūḥ devṛ kāmā syonā imam agnim gārhapatyam saparya  /

original: ud tiṣṭha itas kim ichanti idam āgāḥ aham tvā iḍe abhibhūḥ svāt gṛhāt  / śūnya eṣī nirṛte yājagantha ud tiṣṭha arāte pra pata mā iha raṃsthāḥ  /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha itas kim ichanti idam āgāḥ aham tvā iḍe abhibhūḥ svāt gṛhāt    śūnya eṣī nirṛte yājagantha ud tiṣṭha arāte pra pata mā iha raṃsthāḥ  /

original: yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agnim vadhūḥ iyam  / adhā sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaḥ ca namaḥ kuru  // {8}
analyzed: yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agnim vadhūḥ iyam    adhā sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaḥ ca namaḥ kuru  /

original: śarma varma etat ā hara asyai nāryāḥ upastire  / sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat  /
analyzed: śarma varma etat ā hara asyai nāryāḥ upastire    sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat  /

original: yam balbajam nyasyatha carma ca upastṛṇīthana  / tat ā rohatu su prajā yā kanyā vindate patim  /
analyzed: yam balbajam nyasyatha carma ca upastṛṇīthana   tat ā rohatu su prajā yā kanyā vindate patim  /

original: upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite  / tatra upaviśya suprajāḥ imam agnim saparyatu  //
analyzed: upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite    tatra upaviśya suprajāḥ imam agnim saparyatu  /

original: ā roha carma upa sīda agnim eṣa devaḥ hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā  / iha prajām janaya patye asmai su jyaiṣṭhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ te eṣaḥ  /
analyzed: ā roha carma upa sīda agnim eṣa devaḥ hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā    iha prajām janaya patye asmai su jyaiṣṭhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ te eṣaḥ  /

original: vi tiṣṭhantām mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthāt nānā rūpāḥ paśavaḥ jāyamānāḥ  / su maṅgalī upa sīda imam agnim saṃpatnī prati bhūṣa iha devān  /
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhantām mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthāt nānā rūpāḥ paśavaḥ jāyamānāḥ   su maṅgalī upa sīda imam agnim saṃpatnī prati bhūṣa iha devān  /

original: su maṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇām su śevā patye śvaśurāya śaṃbhūḥ  / syonā śvaśrvai pra gṛhān viśaḥ imān  /
analyzed: su maṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇām su śevā patye śvaśurāya śaṃbhūḥ   syonā śvaśrvai pra gṛhān viśaḥ imān  /

original: syonā bhava śvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ  / syonā asyai sarvasyai viśe syonā puṣṭāya eṣām bhava  /
analyzed: syonā bhava śvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ   syonā asyai sarvasyai viśe syonā puṣṭāya eṣām bhava  /

original: su maṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ imām sameta paśyata  / saubhāgyam asyai dattvā daurbhāgyaiḥ viparetana  /
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ imām sameta paśyata    saubhāgyam asyai dattvā daurbhāgyaiḥ viparetana  /

original: yāḥ durhārdaḥ yuvatayaḥ yāḥ ca iha jaratīḥ api  / varcaḥ nu asyai sam datta atha astam viparetana  /
analyzed: yāḥ durhārdaḥ yuvatayaḥ yāḥ ca iha jaratīḥ api   varcaḥ nu asyai sam datta atha astam viparetana  /

original: rukma prastaraṇam vahyam viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam  / ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam  //  // {9}
analyzed: rukma prastaraṇam vahyam viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam     ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam

original: ā roha talpam sumanasyamānā iha prajām janaya patye asmai  / indrāṇī iva su budhā budhyamānā jyotiḥ agrāḥ uṣasaḥ prati jāgarāsi  //
analyzed: ā roha talpam sumanasyamānā iha prajām janaya patye asmai   / indrāṇī iva su budhā budhyamānā jyotiḥ agrāḥ uṣasaḥ prati jāgarāsi  /

original: devāḥ agre ni apadyanta patnīḥ sam aspṛśanta tanvaḥ tanūbhiḥ  / sūryā iva nāri viśva rūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patyā sam bhava iha  /
analyzed: devāḥ agre ni apadyanta patnīḥ sam aspṛśanta tanvaḥ tanūbhiḥ   sūryā iva nāri viśva rūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patyā sam bhava iha  /

original: ud tiṣṭha itas viśvāvaso namasā iḍāmahe tvā  / jāmim icha pitṛṣadam nyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi  /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha itas viśvāvaso namasā iḍāmahe tvā   jāmim icha pitṛṣadam nyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi  /

original: apsarasaḥ sadhamādam madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryam ca  / tāḥ te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namaḥ te gandharva ṛtunā kṛṇomi  //
analyzed: apsarasaḥ sadhamādam madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryam ca    tāḥ te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namaḥ te gandharva ṛtunā kṛṇomi  /

original: namaḥ gandharvasya namase namaḥ bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ  / viśvāvaso brahmaṇā te namaḥ abhi jāyāḥ apsarasaḥ parehi  /
analyzed: namaḥ gandharvasya namase namaḥ bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ   viśvāvaso brahmaṇā te namaḥ abhi jāyāḥ apsarasaḥ parehi  /

original: rāyāḥ vayam sumanasaḥ syāma ud itas gandharvam āvīvṛtāma  / agan sa devaḥ paramam sadhastham aganma yatra pratirantaḥ āyuḥ  /
analyzed: rāyāḥ vayam sumanasaḥ syāma ud itas gandharvam āvīvṛtāma    agan sa devaḥ paramam sadhastham aganma yatra pratirantaḥ āyuḥ  /

original: sam pitarau ṛtviye sṛjethām mātā pitā ca retasaḥ bhavāthaḥ  / maryaḥ iva yoṣām adhi rohaya enām prajām kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyatam rayim  //
analyzed: sam pitarau ṛtviye sṛjethām mātā pitā ca retasaḥ bhavāthaḥ   maryaḥ iva yoṣām adhi rohaya enām prajām kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyatam rayim  /

original: tām pūṣam śivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyāḥ vapanti  / yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ  //
analyzed: tām pūṣam śivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyāḥ vapanti   yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ  /

original: ā roha ūrum upa dhatsva hastam pari svajasva jāyām sumanasyamānaḥ  / prajām kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau dīrgham vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: ā roha ūrum upa dhatsva hastam pari svajasva jāyām sumanasyamānaḥ    prajām kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau dīrgham vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu  /

original: ā vām prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ ahar rātrābhyām sam anaktu aryamā  / a durmaṅgalī pati lokam ā viśa imam śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade  //  // {10}
analyzed: ā vām prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ ahar rātrābhyām sam anaktu aryamā   a durmaṅgalī pati lokam ā viśa imam śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: devaiḥ dattam manunā sākam etat vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram  / yaḥ brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti saḥ id rakṣāṃsi talpāni hanti  //
analyzed: devaiḥ dattam manunā sākam etat vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram   yaḥ brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti saḥ id rakṣāṃsi talpāni hanti  /

original: yam me dattaḥ brahma bhāgam vadhūyoḥ vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram  / yuvam brahmaṇe anumanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraḥ ca dattam  /
analyzed: yam me dattaḥ brahma bhāgam vadhūyoḥ vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram   yuvam brahmaṇe anumanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraḥ ca dattam  /

original: syonāt yoneḥ adhi badhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau  / sugū su putrau su gṛhau tarāthaḥ jīvau uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ  /
analyzed: syonāt yoneḥ adhi badhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau    sugū su putrau su gṛhau tarāthaḥ jīvau uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ  /

original: navam vasānaḥ surabhiḥ su vāsāḥ udāgām jīvaḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ  / āṇḍāt patatrī iva amukṣi viśvasmāt enasaḥ pari  /
analyzed: navam vasānaḥ surabhiḥ su vāsāḥ udāgām jīvaḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ   āṇḍāt patatrī iva amukṣi viśvasmāt enasaḥ pari  /

original: śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahivrate  / āpaḥ sapta susruvuḥ devīḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahivrate    āpaḥ sapta susruvuḥ devīḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ  /

original: sūryāyai devebhyaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca  / ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ tebhyaḥ idam akaram namaḥ  //
analyzed: sūryāyai devebhyaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca   ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ tebhyaḥ idam akaram namaḥ  /

original: yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaḥ ātṛdaḥ  / saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasuḥ niṣkartā vihrutam punar  /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaḥ ātṛdaḥ    saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasuḥ niṣkartā vihrutam punar  /

original: apa asmat tamaḥ ucchatu nīlam piśaṅgam uta lohitam yat  / nirdahanī yā pṛṣātakī asmin tām sthāṇau adhi ā sajāmi  //
analyzed: apa asmat tamaḥ ucchatu nīlam piśaṅgam uta lohitam yat    nirdahanī yā pṛṣātakī asmin tām sthāṇau adhi ā sajāmi  /

original: yāvatīḥ kṛtyāḥ upavāsane yāvantaḥ rājñaḥ varuṇasya pāśāḥ  / vyṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asamṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asmin tāḥ sthāṇau adhi sādayāmi  //
analyzed: yāvatīḥ kṛtyāḥ upavāsane yāvantaḥ rājñaḥ varuṇasya pāśāḥ   vyṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asamṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asmin tāḥ sthāṇau adhi sādayāmi  /

original: yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ  / tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma  // tasya agre tvam vanaspate n
analyzed: yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ  / tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma    tasya agre tvam vanaspate nīvim kṛṇuṣva mā vayam riṣāma

original: ye antāḥ yāvatīḥ sicaḥ ye otavaḥ ye ca tantavaḥ  / vāsaḥ yat patnībhiḥ utam tat na syonam upa spṛśāt  /
analyzed: ye antāḥ yāvatīḥ sicaḥ ye otavaḥ ye ca tantavaḥ   vāsaḥ yat patnībhiḥ utam tat na syonam upa spṛśāt  /

original: uśatīḥ kanyalāḥ imāḥ pitṛ lokāt patim yatīḥ  / ava dīkṣām asṛkṣata svāhā  /
analyzed: uśatīḥ kanyalāḥ imāḥ pitṛ lokāt patim yatīḥ    ava dīkṣām asṛkṣata svāhā

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / varcaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   varcaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / tejaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   tejaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / bhajaḥ goṣu praviṣṭaḥ yaḥ tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   bhajaḥ goṣu praviṣṭaḥ yaḥ tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / yaśaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   yaśaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / payaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   payaḥ goṣu praviṣṭam yat tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan  / rasaḥ goṣu praviṣṭaḥ yaḥ tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan   rasaḥ goṣu praviṣṭaḥ yaḥ tena imām sam sṛjāmasi  /

original: yadi ime keśinaḥ janāḥ gṛhe te samanartiṣuḥ rodena kṛṇvantaḥ agham  / agniḥ tvā tasmāt enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām  /

original: na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanti ete devānām spaśaḥ iha ye caranti  / anyena mat āhanaḥ yāhi tūyam tena vi vṛha rathyā iva cakrā  /

original: rātrībhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ daśasyet sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhur ud mimīyāt  / divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi  // divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi  // divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi  // divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi  // divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi  // divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sab
analyzed: rātrībhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ daśasyet sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhur ud mimīyāt    divā pṛthivyāḥ mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya vivṛhāt ajāmi

original: ā gha tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavan ajāmi  / upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam ichasva subhage patim mat  /
analyzed: ā gha tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavan ajāmi    upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam ichasva subhage patim mat  /

original: kim bhrātā asat yat anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchāt  / kāma mūtā bahu etat rapāmi tanvā me tanvam sam pipṛgdhi  //
analyzed: kim bhrātā asat yat anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchāt   kāma mūtā bahu etat rapāmi tanvā me tanvam sam pipṛgdhi  /

original: na te nātham yamī atra aham asmi na te tanūm tanvā sam papṛcyām  / anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭi etat  /
analyzed: na te nātham yamī atra aham asmi na te tanūm tanvā sam papṛcyām   anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭi etat  /

original: na vai u te tanūm tanvā sam pipṛcyām pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt  / asaṃyat etat manasaḥ hṛdaḥ me bhrātā svasuḥ śayane yat śayīya  /
analyzed: na vai u te tanūm tanvā sam pipṛcyām pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt   asaṃyat etat manasaḥ hṛdaḥ me bhrātā svasuḥ śayane yat śayīya  /

original: bata asi yama na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidām ā  / anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam pari svajātau libujā iva vṛkṣam  /
analyzed: bata asi yama na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidām ā   / anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam pari svajātau libujā iva vṛkṣam  /

original: anyam u su yami anyaḥ u tvām pari svajātau libujā iva vṛkṣam  / tasya vā tvam manaḥ ichā sa vā tava adhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidam su bhadrām  /
analyzed: anyam u su yami anyaḥ u tvām pari svajātau libujā iva vṛkṣam    tasya vā tvam manaḥ ichā sa vā tava adhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidam su bhadrām  /

original: trīṇi chandāṃsi kavayaḥ vi yetire puru rūpam darśatam viśva cakṣaṇam  / āpaḥ vātāḥ oṣadhayaḥ tāni ekasmin bhuvane ārpitāni  //
analyzed: trīṇi chandāṃsi kavayaḥ vi yetire puru rūpam darśatam viśva cakṣaṇam    āpaḥ vātāḥ oṣadhayaḥ tāni ekasmin bhuvane ārpitāni  /

original: vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ  / viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyaḥ yajati yajñiyān ṛtūn  /
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ   viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyaḥ yajati yajñiyān ṛtūn  /

original: rapat gandharvīḥ apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu naḥ manaḥ  / iṣṭasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ bhrātā naḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamaḥ vi vocati  //
analyzed: rapat gandharvīḥ apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu naḥ manaḥ   iṣṭasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ bhrātā naḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamaḥ vi vocati  /

original: so cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatī uṣāḥ uvāsa manave svarvatī  / yat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan  // tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan  // tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan  // tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan  // tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan  // tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram v
analyzed: sā u cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatī uṣāḥ uvāsa manave svarvatī    yat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan   tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan    tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan     tat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan                  anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan

original: adha tyam drapsam vibhvam vicakṣanam viḥ ābharat iṣiraḥ śyenaḥ adhvare  / yadī viśaḥ vṛṇate dasmam āryāḥ agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata  /
analyzed: adha tyam drapsam vibhvam vicakṣanam viḥ ābharat iṣiraḥ śyenaḥ adhvare   yadī viśaḥ vṛṇate dasmam āryāḥ agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata  /

original: sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate hotrābhiḥ agne manuṣaḥ su adhvaraḥ  / viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyaḥ vājam sasavān upayāsi bhūribhiḥ  //
analyzed: sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate hotrābhiḥ agne manuṣaḥ su adhvaraḥ   viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyaḥ vājam sasavān upayāsi bhūribhiḥ  /

original: ud īraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam iyakṣati haryataḥ hṛttaḥ iṣyati  / vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhaḥ taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī  /
analyzed: ud īraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam iyakṣati haryataḥ hṛttaḥ iṣyati   vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhaḥ taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī  /

original: yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akhyat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve  / iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ ā sa dyumān amavān bhūṣati dyūn  /
analyzed: yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akhyat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve    iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ ā sa dyumān amavān bhūṣati dyūn  /

original: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum  / ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ  /
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum    ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ  /

original: yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti devī deveṣu yajata yajatra  / ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvas bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantam vītāt  /
analyzed: yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti devī deveṣu yajata yajatra   ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvas bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantam vītāt  /

original: anu agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat anu ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ  / anu sūryaḥ uṣasaḥ anu raśmīn dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa  /
analyzed: anu agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat anu ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ   anu sūryaḥ uṣasaḥ anu raśmīn dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa  /

original: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat prati ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ  / prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna  /
analyzed: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat prati ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ   prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna  /

original: dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satya vācā  / devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdat hotā pratyaṅ svam asum yan  /
analyzed: dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satya vācā    devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdat hotā pratyaṅ svam asum yan  /

original: devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena vaha naḥ havyam prathamaḥ cikitvān  / dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ mandraḥ hotā nityaḥ vācā yajīyān  //  //  //
analyzed: devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena vaha naḥ havyam prathamaḥ cikitvān   dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ mandraḥ hotā nityaḥ vācā yajīyān

original: arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me / ahā yat devāḥ asu nītim āyan madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām  /
analyzed: arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me  ahā yat devāḥ asu nītim āyan madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām  /

original: svāvṛt devasya amṛtam yadī goḥ atas jātāsaḥ dhārayantaḥ urvī  / viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ duhe yat enī divyam ghṛtam vār  /
analyzed: svāvṛt devasya amṛtam yadī goḥ atas jātāsaḥ dhārayantaḥ urvī    viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ duhe yat enī divyam ghṛtam vār  /

original: kim svid naḥ rājā jagṛhe kad asya ati vratam cakṛma kaḥ vi veda  / mitraḥ cit hi ṣmā juhurāṇaḥ devām ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti  /
analyzed: kim svid naḥ rājā jagṛhe kad asya ati vratam cakṛma kaḥ vi veda   mitraḥ cit hi ṣmā juhurāṇaḥ devām ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti  /

original: durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma sa lakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti  / yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi a prayuchan  /
analyzed: durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma sa lakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti    yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi a prayuchan  /

original: yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante  / sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā  /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante    sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā  /

original: yasmin devāḥ manmani saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma  / mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat  /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ manmani saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma   mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat  /

original: sakhāyaḥ ā śiṣāmahe brahma indrāya vajriṇe  / stuṣe u su nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave  /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā śiṣāmahe brahma indrāya vajriṇe   stuṣe u su nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave  /

original: śavasā hi asi śrutaḥ vṛtra hatyena vṛtra hā  / maghaiḥ maghonaḥ ati śūra dāśasi  //
analyzed: śavasā hi asi śrutaḥ vṛtra hatyena vṛtra hā   maghaiḥ maghonaḥ ati śūra dāśasi  /

original: stegaḥ na kṣām ati eṣi pṛthivīm mahī naḥ vātāḥ iha vāntu bhūmau  / mitraḥ naḥ atra varuṇaḥ yujamānaḥ agniḥ vane na vi asṛṣṭa śokam  /
analyzed: stegaḥ na kṣām ati eṣi pṛthivīm mahī naḥ vātāḥ iha vāntu bhūmau   mitraḥ naḥ atra varuṇaḥ yujamānaḥ agniḥ vane na vi asṛṣṭa śokam  /

original: stuhi śrutam garta sadam janānām rājānam bhīmam upahatnum ugram  / mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavānaḥ anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  //  // _ jaritre rudra stavānaḥ anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam  //  //  //
analyzed: stuhi śrutam garta sadam janānām rājānam bhīmam upahatnum ugram    mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavānaḥ anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam

original: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne  / sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt  /
analyzed: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne    sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt  /

original: sarasvatīm pitaraḥ havante dakṣinā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ  / āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ā dhehi asme  /
analyzed: sarasvatīm pitaraḥ havante dakṣinā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ   āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ā dhehi asme  /

original: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha ukthaiḥ svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī  / sahasra argham iḍaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi  //
analyzed: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha ukthaiḥ svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī    sahasra argham iḍaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi  /

original: ud īratām avaraḥ ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ  / asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu  /
analyzed: ud īratām avaraḥ ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ   asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu  /

original: ā aham pitṝn suvidatrām avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ  / barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ  /
analyzed: ā aham pitṝn suvidatrām avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ    barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ  /

original: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye aparāsaḥ īyuḥ  / ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣaktāḥ ye vā nūnam suvṛjanāsu dikṣu  /
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye aparāsaḥ īyuḥ   ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣaktāḥ ye vā nūnam suvṛjanāsu dikṣu  /

original: mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ  / yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu  /
analyzed: mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ   yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu  /

original: svāduḥ kila ayam madhumān uta ayam tīvraḥ kila ayam rasavān uta ayam  / uta u nu asya papivāṃsam indram na kaḥ cana sahate āhaveṣu  /
analyzed: svāduḥ kila ayam madhumān uta ayam tīvraḥ kila ayam rasavān uta ayam    uta u nu asya papivāṃsam indram na kaḥ cana sahate āhaveṣu  /

original: pareyivāṃsam pravataḥ mahīḥ iti bahubhyaḥ panthām an upaspaśānam  / vaivasvatam saṃgamanam janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā saparyata  /
analyzed: pareyivāṃsam pravataḥ mahīḥ iti bahubhyaḥ panthām an upaspaśānam    vaivasvatam saṃgamanam janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā saparyata  /

original: yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣā gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u / yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ  // yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ  // yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ  // yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ  // yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu
analyzed: yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣā gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u  yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ   yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ    yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ

original: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūti arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam  / te ā gatāvasā śaṃtamena adhāḥ naḥ śam yos arapaḥ dadhāta  /
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūti arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam   te ā gatāvasā śaṃtamena adhāḥ naḥ śam yos arapaḥ dadhāta  /

original: ācyā jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya idam naḥ haviḥ abhi gṛṇantu viśve  / mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma  /
analyzed: ācyā jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya idam naḥ haviḥ abhi gṛṇantu viśve   mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma  /

original: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti tena idam viśvam bhuvanam sam eti  / yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa  //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti tena idam viśvam bhuvanam sam eti   yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa  /

original: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ yena te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ  / ubhā rājānau svadhayā madantau yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam  /
analyzed: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ yena te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ   ubhā rājānau svadhayā madantau yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam  /

original: apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas asmai etam pitaraḥ lokam akran  / ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai  /
analyzed: apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas asmai etam pitaraḥ lokam akran   ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai  /

original: uśantaḥ tvā idhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi  / uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave  /
analyzed: uśantaḥ tvā idhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi    uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave  /

original: dyumantaḥ tvā idhīmahi dyumantaḥ sam idhīmahi  / dyumān dyumataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave  /
analyzed: dyumantaḥ tvā idhīmahi dyumantaḥ sam idhīmahi    dyumān dyumataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave  /

original: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ  / teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma  /
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ   teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma  /

original: aṅgirobhiḥ yajñiyaiḥ ā gahi iha yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva  / vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te asmin barhiṣi ā niṣadya  //
analyzed: aṅgirobhiḥ yajñiyaiḥ ā gahi iha yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva   vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te asmin barhiṣi ā niṣadya  /

original: imam yama prastaram ā hi roha aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ  / ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enāḥ rājan haviṣaḥ mādayasva  //
analyzed: imam yama prastaram ā hi roha aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ   ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enāḥ rājan haviṣaḥ mādayasva  /

original: yamāya somaḥ pavate yamāya kriyate haviḥ  / yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ  /
analyzed: yamāya somaḥ pavate yamāya kriyate haviḥ   yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ  /

original: yamāya madhumattamam juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata  / idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ  /
analyzed: yamāya madhumattamam juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata    idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ  /

original: yamāya ghṛtavat payaḥ rājñe haviḥ juhotana  / sa naḥ jīveṣu ā yamet dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase  /
analyzed: yamāya ghṛtavat payaḥ rājñe haviḥ juhotana    sa naḥ jīveṣu ā yamet dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase  /

original: mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śūśucaḥ mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram  / śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ atha īm enam pra hiṇutāt pitṝn upa  /
analyzed: mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śūśucaḥ mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram   śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ atha īm enam pra hiṇutāt pitṝn upa  /

original: yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ atha imam enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ  / yadā u gacchāti asu nītim etām atha devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti  //
analyzed: yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ atha imam enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ   yadā u gacchāti asu nītim etām atha devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti  /

original: trikadrukebhiḥ pavate ṣaṭ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat  / triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tāḥ yamaḥ ārpitā  /
analyzed: trikadrukebhiḥ pavate ṣaṭ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat   triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tāḥ yamaḥ ārpitā  /

original: sūryam cakṣuṣā gaccha vātam ātmanā divam ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmabhiḥ  / apaḥ vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ  /
analyzed: sūryam cakṣuṣā gaccha vātam ātmanā divam ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmabhiḥ   apaḥ vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ  /

original: ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasaḥ tam tapasva tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ  / yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtām u lokam  /
analyzed: ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasaḥ tam tapasva tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ   yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtām u lokam  /

original: yāḥ te śocayaḥ raṃhayaḥ jātavedaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam  / ajam yantam anu tāḥ sam ṛṇvatām atha itarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtam kṛdhi  //
analyzed: yāḥ te śocayaḥ raṃhayaḥ jātavedaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam   ajam yantam anu tāḥ sam ṛṇvatām atha itarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtam kṛdhi  /
ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhāvān    āyuḥ vasānaḥ upa yātu śeṣaḥ sam gacchatām tanvā su varcāḥ

original: ati drava śvānau sārameyau catur akṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā  / adha pitṝn suvidatrām apīhi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti  //

original: yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau catur akṣau pathiṣadī nṛ cakṣasā  / tābhyām rājan pari dhehi enam svasti asmai anamīvam ca dhehi  //
analyzed: yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau catur akṣau pathiṣadī nṛ cakṣasā      tābhyām rājan pari dhehi enam svasti asmai anamīvam ca dhehi  /

original: urūṇasau asutṛpau udumbalau yamasya dūtau carataḥ janām anu  / tau asmabhyam dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adya iha bhadram  /

original: pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān an aṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ  / sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ agniḥ devebhyaḥ suvi datriyebhyaḥ  /
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān an aṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ    sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ agniḥ devebhyaḥ suvi datriyebhyaḥ  /

original: āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt  / yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te īyuḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu  //
analyzed: āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt   yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te īyuḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu  /

original: imau yunajmi te vahnī asunītāya voḍhave  / tābhyām yamasya sādanam samitiḥ ca ava gacchatāt  /
analyzed: imau yunajmi te vahnī asunītāya voḍhave   tābhyām yamasya sādanam samitiḥ ca ava gacchatāt  /

original: etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamam nu āgan apa etat ūha yat iha ābibhar purā  / iṣṭāpūrtam anusaṃkrāma vidvān yatra te dattam bahudhā vibandhuṣu  /
analyzed: etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamam nu āgan apa etat ūha yat iha ābibhar purā    iṣṭāpūrtam anusaṃkrāma vidvān yatra te dattam bahudhā vibandhuṣu  /

original: agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam prorṇuṣva medasā pīvasā ca  / na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ dadhṛṣāṇaḥ vidhakṣan parīṅkhayātai  /
analyzed: agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam prorṇuṣva medasā pīvasā ca    na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ dadhṛṣāṇaḥ vidhakṣan parīṅkhayātai  /

analyzed: daṇḍam hastāt ādadānaḥ gatāsoḥ saha śrotreṇa varcasā balena    atra eva tvam iha vayam su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema  /

original: iyam nārī pati lokam vṛṇānā ni padyate upa tvā martya pretam  / dharmam purāṇam anupālayantī tasyai prajām draviṇam ca iha dhehi  //

original: devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kim amṛtam na avṛṇīta  / bṛhaspatiḥ yajñam atanuta ṛṣiḥ priyām yamaḥ tanvam ā rireca  //

original: tvam agne īḍitaḥ jātavedaḥ avāṭ havyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvā  / prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvam deva prayatā havīṃṣi  /

original: āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya  / putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta  /
analyzed: āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya   putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta  /

original: agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata sadaḥsadaḥ sadata su praṇītayaḥ  / attaḥ havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣi rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram dadhāta  /
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata sadaḥsadaḥ sadata su praṇītayaḥ   attaḥ havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣi rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram dadhāta  /

original: upahūtāḥ naḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu  / te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te avantu asmān  /
analyzed: upahūtāḥ naḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu   te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te avantu asmān  /

original: ye naḥ pituḥ pitaraḥ ye pitāmahāḥ anūjahire soma pītham vasiṣṭhāḥ  / tebhiḥ yamaḥ samrarāṇaḥ havīṃṣi uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu  //

original: ye tātṛṣuḥ devatrā jehamānāḥ hotrāvidaḥ stoma taṣṭāsaḥ arkaiḥ  / ā agne yāhi sahasram deva vandaiḥ satyaiḥ kavibhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ  /

original: ye satyāsaḥ haviḥ adaḥ haviṣpāḥ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham tureṇa  / ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvāṅ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ  /
analyzed: ye satyāsaḥ haviḥ adaḥ haviṣpāḥ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham tureṇa    ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvāṅ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ  /

original: upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uru vyacasam pṛthivīm su śevām  / ūrṇamradāḥ pṛthivī dakṣiṇāvataḥ eṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt  /

original: ā rohata janitrīm jātavedasaḥ pitṛ yānaiḥ sam vaḥ ā rohayāmi  / avāṭ havya iṣitaḥ havyavāhaḥ ījānam yuktāḥ su kṛtām dhatta loke  /

original: devāḥ yajñam ṛtavaḥ kalpayanti haviḥ puroḍāśam srucaḥ yajñāyudhāni  / tebhiḥ yāhi pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ yaiḥ ījānāḥ svargam yanti lokam  /

original: ṛtasya panthām anu paśya sādhu aṅgirasaḥ su kṛtaḥ yena yanti  / tebhiḥ yāhi pathibhiḥ svargam yatra ādityāḥ madhu bhakṣayanti tṛtīye nāke adhi vi śrayasva  //
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anu paśya sādhu aṅgirasaḥ su kṛtaḥ yena yanti   tebhiḥ yāhi pathibhiḥ svargam yatra ādityāḥ madhu bhakṣayanti tṛtīye nāke adhi vi śrayasva  /

original: trayaḥ suparṇāḥ uparasya māyū nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi viṣṭapi śritāḥ  / svargāḥ lokāḥ amṛtena viṣṭhāḥ iṣam ūrjam yajamānāya duhrām  /
