analyzed: oṣa darbha sapatnān me oṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ   oṣa me sarvān durhārdaḥ oṣa me dviṣataḥ maṇe  /

original: daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ  / daha me sarvān durhārdaḥ daha me dviṣataḥ maṇe  /
analyzed: daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ   daha me sarvān durhārdaḥ daha me dviṣataḥ maṇe  /

original: jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ  / jahi me sarvān durhārdaḥ jahi me dviṣataḥ maṇe  /
analyzed: jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ   jahi me sarvān durhārdaḥ jahi me dviṣataḥ maṇe  /

original: yat te darbha jarā mṛtyu śatam varmasu varma te  / tena imam varmiṇam kṛtvā sapatnām jahi vīryaiḥ  //
analyzed: yat te darbha jarā mṛtyu śatam varmasu varma te    tena imam varmiṇam kṛtvā sapatnām jahi vīryaiḥ

original: śatam te darbha varmāṇi sahasram vīryāṇi te  / tam asmai viśve tvām devāḥ jarase bhartavai aduḥ  /
analyzed: śatam te darbha varmāṇi sahasram vīryāṇi te   tam asmai viśve tvām devāḥ jarase bhartavai aduḥ  /

original: tvām āhuḥ deva varma tvām darbha brahmaṇaḥ patim  / tvām indrasya āhuḥ varma tvam rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi  //
analyzed: tvām āhuḥ deva varma tvām darbha brahmaṇaḥ patim   tvām indrasya āhuḥ varma tvam rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi  /

original: sapatna kṣayaṇam darbha dviṣataḥ tapanam hṛdaḥ  / maṇim kṣatrasya vardhanam tanū pānam kṛṇomi te  /
analyzed: sapatna kṣayaṇam darbha dviṣataḥ tapanam hṛdaḥ   maṇim kṣatrasya vardhanam tanū pānam kṛṇomi te  /

original: yat samudraḥ abhyakrandat parjanyaḥ vidyutā saha  / tatas hiranyayaḥ binduḥ tatas darbhaḥ ajāyata  //
analyzed: yat samudraḥ abhyakrandat parjanyaḥ vidyutā saha   tatas hiranyayaḥ binduḥ tatas darbhaḥ ajāyata  /

original: audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭi kāmāya vedhasā  / paśūṇām sarveṣām sphātim goṣṭhe me savitā karat  /
analyzed: audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭi kāmāya vedhasā   paśūṇām sarveṣām sphātim goṣṭhe me savitā karat  /

original: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipāḥ asat  / audumbaraḥ vṛṣā maṇiḥ sam mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipāḥ asat    audumbaraḥ vṛṣā maṇiḥ sam mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā  /

original: karīṣiṇīm phalavatīm svadhām irām ca naḥ gṛhe  / audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭim dadhātu me  /
analyzed: karīṣiṇīm phalavatīm svadhām irām ca naḥ gṛhe    audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭim dadhātu me  /

original: yat dvipād ca catuṣpād ca yāni annāni ye rasāḥ  / gṛhṇe aham tu eṣām bhūmānam bibhrat audumbaram maṇim  //
analyzed: yat dvipād ca catuṣpād ca yāni annāni ye rasāḥ   gṛhṇe aham tu eṣām bhūmānam bibhrat audumbaram maṇim  /

original: puṣṭim paśūnām pari jagrabha aham catuṣpadām dvipadām yat ca dhānyam  / payaḥ paśūnām rasam oṣadhīnām bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yacchāt  /
analyzed: puṣṭim paśūnām pari jagrabha aham catuṣpadām dvipadām yat ca dhānyam   payaḥ paśūnām rasam oṣadhīnām bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yacchāt  /

original: aham paśūnām adhipāḥ asāni mayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ dadhātu  / mahyam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ draviṇāni ni yacchatu  //
analyzed: aham paśūnām adhipāḥ asāni mayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ dadhātu   mahyam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ draviṇāni ni yacchatu  /

original: upa mā audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca  / indreṇa jinvitaḥ maṇiḥ ā mā agan saha varcasā  /
analyzed: upa mā audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca   indreṇa jinvitaḥ maṇiḥ ā mā agan saha varcasā  /

original: devaḥ maṇiḥ sapatna hā dhana sāḥ dhana sātaye  / paśoḥ annasya bhūmānam gavām sphātim ni yacchatu  //
analyzed: devaḥ maṇiḥ sapatna hā dhana sāḥ dhana sātaye   paśoḥ annasya bhūmānam gavām sphātim ni yacchatu  /

original: yathā agre tvam vanaspate puṣṭhyā saha jajñiṣe  / eva dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī  /
analyzed: yathā agre tvam vanaspate puṣṭhyā saha jajñiṣe   eva dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī  /

original: ā me dhanam sarasvatī paya sphātim ca dhānyam  / sinīvālī upa ā vahāt ayam ca audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ  /
analyzed: ā me dhanam sarasvatī payaḥ sphātim ca dhānyam    sinīvālī upa ā vahāt ayam ca audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ  /

original: tvam maṇīṇām adhipāḥ vṛṣā asi tvayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ jajāna  / tvayi ime vājāḥ draviṇāni sarva audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmat sahasva ārāt ārāt arātim amatim kṣudham ca  /
analyzed: tvam maṇīṇām adhipāḥ vṛṣā asi tvayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ jajāna   tvayi ime vājāḥ draviṇāni sarva audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmat sahasva ārāt ārāt arātim amatim kṣudham ca  /

original: grāmaṇīḥ asi grāmaṇīḥ utthāya abhiṣiktaḥ abhi mā siñca varcasā  / tejaḥ asi tejaḥ mayi dhāraya adhi rayiḥ asi rayim me dhehi  //
analyzed: grāmaṇīḥ asi grāmaṇīḥ utthāya abhiṣiktaḥ abhi mā siñca varcasā   tejaḥ asi tejaḥ mayi dhāraya adhi rayiḥ asi rayim me dhehi  /

original: puṣṭiḥ asi puṣṭyāḥ mā sam aṅgdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatim mā kṛṇu  / audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmāsu dhehi rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha rāyaḥ poṣāya prati muñce aham tvām  /
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ asi puṣṭyāḥ mā sam aṅgdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatim mā kṛṇu   audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmāsu dhehi rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha rāyaḥ poṣāya prati muñce aham tvām  /

original: ayam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate  / sa naḥ sanim madhumatīm kṛṇotu rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yacchāt  /
analyzed: ayam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate   sa naḥ sanim madhumatīm kṛṇotu rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yacchāt  /

original: śata kāṇḍaḥ duścyavanaḥ sahasra parṇaḥ uttiraḥ  / darbhaḥ yaḥ ugraḥ oṣadhiḥ tam te badhnāmi āyuṣe  /
analyzed: śata kāṇḍaḥ duścyavanaḥ sahasra parṇaḥ uttiraḥ    darbhaḥ yaḥ ugraḥ oṣadhiḥ tam te badhnāmi āyuṣe  /

original: na asya keśān pra vapanti na urasi tāḍam ā ghnate  / yasmai a chinna parṇena darbhena śarma yacchati  //
analyzed: na asya keśān pra vapanti na urasi tāḍam ā ghnate   yasmai a chinna parṇena darbhena śarma yacchati  /

original: divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ  / tvayā sahasra kāṇḍena āyuḥ pra vardhayāmahe  //
analyzed: divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ   tvayā sahasra kāṇḍena āyuḥ pra vardhayāmahe  /

original: tisraḥ divaḥ ati atṛṇat tisraḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta  / tvayā aham durhārdaḥ jihvām ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi  //
analyzed: tisraḥ divaḥ ati atṛṇat tisraḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta    tvayā aham durhārdaḥ jihvām ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi  /

original: tvam asi sahamānaḥ aham asmi sahasvān  / ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnān sahiṣīvahi  //
analyzed: tvam asi sahamānaḥ aham asmi sahasvān   ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnān sahiṣīvahi  /

original: sahasva naḥ abhimātim sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ  / sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ suhārdaḥ me bahūn kṛdhi  //
analyzed: sahasva naḥ abhimātim sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ   sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ suhārdaḥ me bahūn kṛdhi  /

original: darbheṇa deva jātena divi ṣṭambhena śaśvat id  / tena aham śaśvataḥ janām asanam sanavāni ca  /
analyzed: darbheṇa deva jātena divi ṣṭambhena śaśvat id   tena aham śaśvataḥ janām asanam sanavāni ca  /

original: priyam mā darbha kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyām śūdrāya ca āryāya ca  / yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate  //
analyzed: priyam mā darbha kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyām śūdrāya ca āryāya ca   yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate  /

original: yaḥ jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhat yaḥ astabhnāt antarikṣam divam ca  / yam bibhratam nanu pāpmā viveda sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ varuṇaḥ divā kaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhat yaḥ astabhnāt antarikṣam divam ca   yam bibhratam nanu pāpmā viveda sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ varuṇaḥ divā kaḥ  /

original: sapatna hā śata kāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnām prathamaḥ sam babhūva  / sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ  /
analyzed: sapatna hā śata kāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnām prathamaḥ sam babhūva   sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ  /

original: sahasra arghaḥ śata kāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agniḥ vīrudhām rājasūyam  / sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas devaḥ maṇiḥ āyuṣā sam sṛjāti naḥ  /
analyzed: sahasra arghaḥ śata kāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agniḥ vīrudhām rājasūyam     sa naḥ ayam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas devaḥ maṇiḥ āyuṣā sam sṛjāti naḥ  /

original: ghṛtāt ulluptaḥ madhumān payasvān bhūmi dṛṃhaḥ acyutaḥ cyāvayiṣṇuḥ  / nudan sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvan darbhāḥ roha mahatām indriyeṇa  /
analyzed: ghṛtāt ulluptaḥ madhumān payasvān bhūmi dṛṃhaḥ acyutaḥ cyāvayiṣṇuḥ   nudan sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvan darbhāḥ roha mahatām indriyeṇa  /

original: tvam bhūmim ati eṣi ojasā tvam vedyām sīdasi cāruḥ adhvare  / tvām pavitram ṛṣayaḥ abharanta tvam punīhi duritāni asmat  /
analyzed: tvam bhūmim ati eṣi ojasā tvam vedyām sīdasi cāruḥ adhvare   tvām pavitram ṛṣayaḥ abharanta tvam punīhi duritāni asmat  /

original: tīkṣṇaḥ rājā viṣāsahī rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ  / ojaḥ devānām balam ugram etat tam te badhnāmi jarase svastaye  /
analyzed: tīkṣṇaḥ rājā viṣāsahī rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ    ojaḥ devānām balam ugram etat tam te badhnāmi jarase svastaye  /

original: darbheṇa tvam kṛṇavat vīryāṇi darbham bibhrat ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ  / atiṣṭhāya varcasā adhānyān sūryaḥ iva ā bhāhi pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /
analyzed: darbheṇa tvam kṛṇavat vīryāṇi darbham bibhrat ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ   atiṣṭhāya varcasā adhānyān sūryaḥ iva ā bhāhi pradiśaḥ catasraḥ  /

original: jāṅgiḍaḥ asi jaṅgiḍaḥ rakṣitā asi jaṅgidaḥ  / dvipād catuṣpād asmākam sarvam rakṣatu jaṅgidaḥ  /
analyzed: jāṅgiḍaḥ asi jaṅgiḍaḥ rakṣitā asi jaṅgidaḥ    dvipād catuṣpād asmākam sarvam rakṣatu jaṅgidaḥ  /

original: yāḥ gṛtsyaḥ tri pañca āśīḥ śatam kṛtyā kṛtaḥ ca ye / sarvān vinaktu tejasaḥ arasām jaṅgidaḥ karat  /
analyzed: yāḥ gṛtsyaḥ tri pañca āśīḥ śatam kṛtyā kṛtaḥ ca ye sarvān vinaktu tejasaḥ arasām jaṅgidaḥ karat  /

original: arasam kṛtrimam nādam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ  / apetaḥ jaṅgiḍāmatim iṣum astā iva śātaya  //
analyzed: arasam kṛtrimam nādam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ   apetaḥ jaṅgiḍāmatim iṣum astā iva śātaya  /

original: kṛtyā dūṣaṇaḥ eva ayam atha u arāti dūṣaṇaḥ  / atha u sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra naḥ āyumṣi tāriṣat  /
analyzed: kṛtyā dūṣaṇaḥ eva ayam atha u arāti dūṣaṇaḥ   atha u sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra naḥ āyumṣi tāriṣat  /

original: sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari naḥ pātu viśvatas  / viṣkandham yena sāsaha saṃskandham ojaḥ ojasā  /
analyzed: sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari naḥ pātu viśvatas   viṣkandham yena sāsaha saṃskandham ojaḥ ojasā  /

original: tris tvā devāḥ ajanayat niṣṭhitam bhūmyām adhi  / tam u tvā aṅgirāḥ iti brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvyāḥ viduḥ  /
analyzed: tris tvā devāḥ ajanayat niṣṭhitam bhūmyām adhi   tam u tvā aṅgirāḥ iti brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvyāḥ viduḥ  /

original: na tvā pūrvāḥ oṣadhayaḥ na tvā taranti yāḥ navāḥ  / vibādhaḥ ugraḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /
analyzed: na tvā pūrvāḥ oṣadhayaḥ na tvā taranti yāḥ navāḥ   vibādhaḥ ugraḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ  /

original: atha upadāna bhagavaḥ jāṅgiḍa amita vīrya  / purā te ugrā grasataḥ upendraḥ vīryam dadau //
analyzed: atha upadāna bhagavaḥ jāṅgiḍa amita vīrya   purā te ugrā grasataḥ upendraḥ vīryam dadau

original: ugraḥ id te vanaspate indraḥ ojmānam ā dadhau / amīvāḥ sarvāḥ cātayam jahi rakṣāṃsi oṣadhe //
analyzed: ugraḥ id te vanaspate indraḥ ojmānam ā dadhau amīvāḥ sarvāḥ cātayam jahi rakṣāṃsi oṣadhe

original: āśarīkam viśarīkam balāsam pṛṣṭyāmayam  / takmānam viśva śāradam arasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat  /
analyzed: āśarīkam viśarīkam balāsam pṛṣṭyāmayam   takmānam viśva śāradam arasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat  /

original: indrasya nāma gṛhṇantaḥ ṛsayaḥ jaṅgidam daduḥ  / devāḥ yam cakruḥ bheṣajam agre viṣkandha dūṣaṇam  /
analyzed: indrasya nāma gṛhṇantaḥ ṛsayaḥ jaṅgidam daduḥ   devāḥ yam cakruḥ bheṣajam agre viṣkandha dūṣaṇam  /

original: sa naḥ rakṣatu jaṅgiḍaḥ dhana pālaḥ dhanā iva  / devāḥ yam cakruḥ brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arāti ham  /
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣatu jaṅgiḍaḥ dhana pālaḥ dhanā iva    devāḥ yam cakruḥ brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arāti ham  /

original: durhārdaḥ saṃghoram cakṣuḥ pāpa kṛtvānam āgamam  / tān tvam sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāṇaḥ asi jaṅgiḍaḥ  /
analyzed: durhārdaḥ saṃghoram cakṣuḥ pāpa kṛtvānam āgamam    tān tvam sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāṇaḥ asi jaṅgiḍaḥ  /

original: pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ  / pari mā bhūtāt pari mā uta bhavyāt diśaḥ diśaḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ pātu asmān  /
analyzed: pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ   pari mā bhūtāt pari mā uta bhavyāt diśaḥ diśaḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ pātu asmān  /

original: yaḥ ṛṣṇavaḥ deva kṛtāḥ yaḥ uta u vavṛte anyaḥ  / sarvān stān viśva bheṣajaḥ arasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat  /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛṣṇavaḥ deva kṛtāḥ yaḥ uta u vavṛte anyaḥ    sarvān stān viśva bheṣajaḥ arasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat  /

original: śata vāraḥ anīnaśat yakṣmān rakṣāṃsi tejasā  / ārohan varcasā saha maṇiḥ durṇāma cātanaḥ  /
analyzed: śata vāraḥ anīnaśat yakṣmān rakṣāṃsi tejasā   ārohan varcasā saha maṇiḥ durṇāma cātanaḥ  /

original: śṛṅgābhyām rakṣaḥ nudate mūlena yātudhānyaḥ  / madhyena yakṣmam bādhate na enam pāpmā ati tatrati  //
analyzed: śṛṅgābhyām rakṣaḥ nudate mūlena yātudhānyaḥ   madhyena yakṣmam bādhate na enam pāpmā ati tatrati  /

original: ye yakṣmāsaḥ arbhakāḥ mahāntaḥ ye ca śabdinaḥ  / sarvām durṇāmahāḥ maṇiḥ śata vāraḥ anīnaśat  /
analyzed: ye yakṣmāsaḥ arbhakāḥ mahāntaḥ ye ca śabdinaḥ    sarvām durṇāmahāḥ maṇiḥ śata vāraḥ anīnaśat  /

original: śatam vīrān ajanayat śatam yakṣmān apāvapat  / durṇāmnaḥ sarvān hatvā ava rakṣāṃsi dhūnute  /
analyzed: śatam vīrān ajanayat śatam yakṣmān apāvapat    durṇāmnaḥ sarvān hatvā ava rakṣāṃsi dhūnute  /

original: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ śāta vāraḥ ayam maṇiḥ  / durṇāmnaḥ sarvān tṛdhvā ava rakṣāṃsi akramīt  /
analyzed: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ śāta vāraḥ ayam maṇiḥ   durṇāmnaḥ sarvān tṛdhvā ava rakṣāṃsi akramīt  /

original: śatam aham durṇāmnīnām gandharva apsarasām śatam  / śatam śaśvanvatīnām śata vāreṇa vāraye  //
analyzed: śatam aham durṇāmnīnām gandharva apsarasām śatam    śatam śaśvanvatīnām śata vāreṇa vāraye  /

original: idam varcaḥ agninā dattam āgan bhargaḥ yaśaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam  / trayastriṃśat yāni ca vīryāṇi tāni agniḥ pra dadātu me  /
analyzed: idam varcaḥ agninā dattam āgan bhargaḥ yaśaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam   trayastriṃśat yāni ca vīryāṇi tāni agniḥ pra dadātu me  /

original: varcaḥ ā dhehi me tanvām sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam  / indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śata śāradāya  //
analyzed: varcaḥ ā dhehi me tanvām sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam    indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śata śāradāya  /

original: ūrje tvā balāya tvā ojase sahase tvā  / abhibhūyāya tvā rāṣṭra bhṛtyāya pari ūhāmi śata śāradāya  //
analyzed: ūrje tvā balāya tvā ojase sahase tvā    abhibhūyāya tvā rāṣṭra bhṛtyāya pari ūhāmi śata śāradāya  /

original: ṛtubhyaḥ tvā ārtavebhyaḥ mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ  / dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje  //
analyzed: ṛtubhyaḥ tvā ārtavebhyaḥ mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ    dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje  /

original: na tam yakṣmāḥ arundhate na enam śapathaḥ aśnute  / yam bheṣajasya gulguloḥ surabhiḥ gandhaḥ aśnute  /
analyzed: na tam yakṣmāḥ arundhate na enam śapathaḥ aśnute   yam bheṣajasya gulguloḥ surabhiḥ gandhaḥ aśnute  /

original: viṣvañcaḥ tasmāt yakṣmāḥ mṛgāḥ aśvāḥ iva īrate  / yat gulgulu saindhavam yat vā api asi samudriyam  /
analyzed: viṣvañcaḥ tasmāt yakṣmāḥ mṛgāḥ aśvāḥ iva īrate   yat gulgulu saindhavam yat vā api asi samudriyam  /

original: ubhayoḥ agrabham nāma asmai ariṣṭatātaye //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ agrabham nāma asmai ariṣṭatātaye

original: aitu devaḥ trāyamāṇaḥ kuṣṭhaḥ himavataḥ pari  / takmānam sarvam nāśaya sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ  /
analyzed: aitu devaḥ trāyamāṇaḥ kuṣṭhaḥ himavataḥ pari   takmānam sarvam nāśaya sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ  /

original: trīṇi te kuṣṭha nāmāni nadyamāraḥ nadyāḥ ariṣaḥ  / nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat  / yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā  /
analyzed: trīṇi te kuṣṭha nāmāni nadyamāraḥ nadyāḥ ariṣaḥ    nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat   yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atha u divā

original: jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvantaḥ nāma te pitā  / nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat  / yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyam prātar atho divā  /
analyzed: jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvantaḥ nāma te pitā    nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat   yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyam prātar atha u divā  /

original: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva  / nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat  / yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyam prātar atho divā  /
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva    nadyāḥ ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat   yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyam prātar atha u divā  /

original: tris śāmbubhyaḥ aṅgirebhyaḥ tris ādityebhyaḥ pari  / tris jātaḥ viśva devebhyaḥ  / sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati  / aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi  / tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata  / sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati  / hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi  / tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata  / sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sāka
analyzed: tris śāmbubhyaḥ aṅgirebhyaḥ tris ādityebhyaḥ pari   tris jātaḥ viśva devebhyaḥ sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati   aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi   tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata     sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati   hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi   tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata          sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam

original: śīrṣa śokam tṛtīyakam sa daṃdiḥ yaḥ ca hāyanaḥ  / takmānam viśvadhā vīrya adharāñcam parā suva  /
analyzed: śīrṣa śokam tṛtīyakam sa daṃdiḥ yaḥ ca hāyanaḥ   takmānam viśvadhā vīrya adharāñcam parā suva  /

original: yat me chidram manasaḥ yat ca vācaḥ sarasvatī manyumantam jagāma  / viśvaiḥ tat devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ sam dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ  /
analyzed: yat me chidram manasaḥ yat ca vācaḥ sarasvatī manyumantam jagāma    viśvaiḥ tat devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ sam dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ  /

original: mā naḥ āpaḥ medhām mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana  / suṣyadā yūyam syandadhvam upahūtaḥ aham sumedhāḥ varcasvī  /
analyzed: mā naḥ āpaḥ medhām mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana   suṣyadā yūyam syandadhvam upahūtaḥ aham sumedhāḥ varcasvī  /

original: mā naḥ medhām mā naḥ dīkṣām mā naḥ hiṃsiṣṭam yat tapaḥ  / śivāḥ naḥ śam santu āyuṣe śivāḥ bhavantu mātaraḥ  /
analyzed: mā naḥ medhām mā naḥ dīkṣām mā naḥ hiṃsiṣṭam yat tapaḥ   śivāḥ naḥ śam santu āyuṣe śivāḥ bhavantu mātaraḥ  /

original: yā naḥ pīparat aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamaḥ tiras  / tām asme rāsatām iṣam  /
analyzed: yā naḥ pīparat aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamaḥ tiras   tām asme rāsatām iṣam  /

original: bhadram ichantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ svar vidaḥ tapaḥ dīkṣām upaniṣeduḥ agre  / tatas rāṣṭram balam ojaḥ ca jātam tat asmai devāḥ upasaṃnamantu  //
analyzed: bhadram ichantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ svar vidaḥ tapaḥ dīkṣām upaniṣeduḥ agre   tatas rāṣṭram balam ojaḥ ca jātam tat asmai devāḥ upasaṃnamantu  /

original: brahma hotā brahma yajñāḥ brahmaṇā svaravaḥ mitāḥ  / adhvaryuḥ brahmaṇaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ antarhitam haviḥ  /
analyzed: brahma hotā brahma yajñāḥ brahmaṇā svaravaḥ mitāḥ   adhvaryuḥ brahmaṇaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ antarhitam haviḥ  /

original: brahma srucaḥ ghṛtavatīḥ brahmaṇā vediḥ uddhitā  / brahma yajñasya tattvam ca ṛtvijaḥ ye haviṣkṛtaḥ  / śamitāya svāhā  /
analyzed: brahma srucaḥ ghṛtavatīḥ brahmaṇā vediḥ uddhitā   brahma yajñasya tattvam ca ṛtvijaḥ ye haviṣkṛtaḥ   śamitāya svāhā  /

original: aṃhaḥ muce pra bhare manīṣām ā sutrāvṇe sumatim āvṛṇānaḥ  / imam indra prati havyam gṛbhāya satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ  /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ muce pra bhare manīṣām ā sutrāvṇe sumatim āvṛṇānaḥ   imam indra prati havyam gṛbhāya satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ  /

original: aṃhaḥ mucam vrṣabham yajñiyānām virājantam prathamam adhvarāṇam  / apām napātam aśvinā huve dhiyaḥ indriyeṇa te indriyam dattam ojaḥ  //
analyzed: aṃhaḥ mucam vrṣabham yajñiyānām virājantam prathamam adhvarāṇam    apām napātam aśvinā huve dhiyaḥ indriyeṇa te indriyam dattam ojaḥ  /

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / agniḥ mā tatra nayatu agniḥ medhā dadhātu me  / agnaye svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   agniḥ mā tatra nayatu agniḥ medhā dadhātu me   agnaye svāhā  /

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / vāyuḥ mā tatra nayatu vāyuḥ praṇān dadhātu me vāyave svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha    vāyuḥ mā tatra nayatu vāyuḥ praṇān dadhātu me vāyave svāhā  /

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / sūryaḥ mā tatra nayatu cakṣuḥ sūryaḥ dadhātu me  / sūryāya svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   sūryaḥ mā tatra nayatu cakṣuḥ sūryaḥ dadhātu me   sūryāya svāhā  /

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / candraḥ mā tatra nayatu manaḥ candraḥ dadhātu me  / candrāya svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   candraḥ mā tatra nayatu manaḥ candraḥ dadhātu me

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / somaḥ mā tatra nayatu payaḥ somaḥ dadhātu me  / somāya svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   somaḥ mā tatra nayatu payaḥ somaḥ dadhātu me    somāya svāhā  /

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / indraḥ mā tatra nayatu balam indraḥ dadhātu me  / indrāya svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   indraḥ mā tatra nayatu balam indraḥ dadhātu me    indrāya svāhā

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / āpaḥ mā tatra nayatu amṛtam mā upa tiṣṭhatu  / adbhyaḥ svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   āpaḥ mā tatra nayatu amṛtam mā upa tiṣṭhatu   adbhyaḥ svāhā

original: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha  / brahmā mā tatra nayatu brahmā brahma dadhātu me  / brahmaṇe svāhā  /
analyzed: yatra brahma vidaḥ yānti dīkṣayā tapasā saha   brahmā mā tatra nayatu brahmā brahma dadhātu me

original: āyuṣaḥ asi prataraṇam vipram bheṣajam ucyase  / tat āñjana tvam śaṃtāte śam āpaḥ abhayam kṛtam  /
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ asi prataraṇam vipram bheṣajam ucyase   tat āñjana tvam śaṃtāte śam āpaḥ abhayam kṛtam  /

original: yaḥ harimā jāyānyaḥ aṅgabhedaḥ viṣalpakaḥ  / sarvam te yakṣmam aṅgebhyaḥ bahis niḥ hantu āñjanam  //
analyzed: yaḥ harimā jāyānyaḥ aṅgabhedaḥ viṣalpakaḥ    sarvam te yakṣmam aṅgebhyaḥ bahis niḥ hantu āñjanam  /

original: āñjanam pṛthivyām jātam bhadram puruṣa jīvanam  / kṛṇotu apramāyukam ratha jūtim anāgasam  /
analyzed: āñjanam pṛthivyām jātam bhadram puruṣa jīvanam   kṛṇotu apramāyukam ratha jūtim anāgasam  /

original: prāṇa prāṇam trāyasva asave mṛḍa  / nirṛte nirṛtyā naḥ pāśebhyaḥ muñca  /
analyzed: prāṇa prāṇam trāyasva asave mṛḍa nirṛte nirṛtyāḥ naḥ pāśebhyaḥ muñca  /

original: sindhoḥ garbhaḥ asi vidyutām puṣpam  / vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ divaḥ payaḥ  /
analyzed: sindhoḥ garbhaḥ asi vidyutām puṣpam   vātaḥ prāṇaḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ divaḥ payaḥ  /

original: devāñjana traikakuda pari mā pāhi viśvatas  / na tvā taranti oṣadhayaḥ bāhyāḥ parvatīyāḥ uta  /
analyzed: devāñjana traikakuda pari mā pāhi viśvatas    na tvā taranti oṣadhayaḥ bāhyāḥ parvatīyāḥ uta

original: vi idam madhyam avāsṛpat rakṣaḥ hā amīva cātanaḥ  / amīvāḥ sarvāḥ cātayat nāśayat abhibhāḥ itas  /
analyzed: vi idam madhyam avāsṛpat rakṣaḥ hā amīva cātanaḥ   amīvāḥ sarvāḥ cātayat nāśayat abhibhāḥ itas  /

original: bahu idam rājan varuṇa anṛtam āha pūruṣaḥ  / tasmāt sahasra vīrya muñca naḥ pari aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: bahu idam rājan varuṇa anṛtam āha pūruṣaḥ   tasmāt sahasra vīrya muñca naḥ pari aṃhasaḥ  /

original: yat āpaḥ aghnyāḥ iti varuṇa iti yat ūcima  / tasmāt sahasra vīrya muñca naḥ pari aṃhasaḥ  /
analyzed: yat āpaḥ aghnyāḥ iti varuṇa iti yat ūcima   tasmāt sahasra vīrya muñca naḥ pari aṃhasaḥ  /

original: mitraḥ ca tvā varuṇaḥ ca anupreyatuḥ āñjana  / tau tvā anugatya dūram bhogāya punar ohatuḥ  //
analyzed: mitraḥ ca tvā varuṇaḥ ca anupreyatuḥ āñjana   tau tvā anugatya dūram bhogāya punar ohatuḥ  /

original: ṛṇāt ṛṇam iva sam naya kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛtaḥ gṛham  / cakṣuḥ mantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīḥ api śṛṇāñjana  /
analyzed: ṛṇāt ṛṇam iva sam naya kṛtyām kṛtyā kṛtaḥ gṛham   cakṣuḥ mantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīḥ api śṛṇāñjana  /

original: yat asmāsu duṣvapnyam yat goṣu yat ca naḥ gṛhe  / anāmagaḥ tam ca durhārdaḥ priyaḥ prati muñcatām  /
analyzed: yat asmāsu duṣvapnyam yat goṣu yat ca naḥ gṛhe   anāmagaḥ tam ca durhārdaḥ priyaḥ prati muñcatām  /

original: apām ūrjaḥ ojasaḥ vāvṛdhānam agneḥ jātam adhi jātavedasaḥ  / catur vīram parvatīyam yat āñjanam diśaḥ pradiśaḥ karat id śivāḥ te  /
analyzed: apām ūrjaḥ ojasaḥ vāvṛdhānam agneḥ jātam adhi jātavedasaḥ    catur vīram parvatīyam yat āñjanam diśaḥ pradiśaḥ karat id śivāḥ te  /

original: catur vīram badhyate āñjanam te sarvāḥ diśaḥ abhayāḥ te bhavantu  / dhruvaḥ tiṣṭhāsi savitā iva cāryaḥ imāḥ viśaḥ abhi harantu te balim  /
analyzed: catur vīram badhyate āñjanam te sarvāḥ diśaḥ abhayāḥ te bhavantu   dhruvaḥ tiṣṭhāsi savitā iva cāryaḥ imāḥ viśaḥ abhi harantu te balim  /

original: ākṣva ekam maṇim ekam krṇuṣva snāhi ekena piba ekam eṣām  / catur vīram nairṛtebhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ grāhyā bandhebhyaḥ pari pātu asmān  /
analyzed: ākṣva ekam maṇim ekam krṇuṣva snāhi ekena piba ekam eṣām    catur vīram nairṛtebhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ grāhyā bandhebhyaḥ pari pātu asmān  /

original: agniḥ mā agninā avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase  / tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /
analyzed: agniḥ mā agninā avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā

original: indraḥ mā indriyeṇa avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase  / tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /
analyzed: indraḥ mā indriyeṇa avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /

original: somaḥ mā saumyena avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase  / tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /
analyzed: somaḥ mā saumyena avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /

original: bhagaḥ ma bhagena avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase  / tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /
analyzed: bhagaḥ ma bhagena avatu prāṇāya apānāya āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase svastaye subhūtaye svāhā

original: marutaḥ mā gaṇaiḥ avantu prāṇāya apāna āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase  / svastaye subhūtaye svāhā  /
analyzed: marutaḥ mā gaṇaiḥ avantu prāṇāya apāna āyuṣe varcase ojase tejase

original: prajāpatiḥ tvā badhnāt prathamam a stṛtam vīryāya kam  / tat te badhnāmi āyuṣe varcase ojase ca balāya ca astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  //
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tvā badhnāt prathamam a stṛtam vīryāya kam   tat te badhnāmi āyuṣe varcase ojase ca balāya ca astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhatu rakṣan apramādam astṛta imam mā tvā dabhan paṇayaḥ yātudhānāḥ  / indraḥ iva dasyūn ava dhūnuṣva pṛtanyataḥ sarvām chatrūn vi sahasva astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhatu rakṣan apramādam astṛta imam mā tvā dabhan paṇayaḥ yātudhānāḥ   indraḥ iva dasyūn ava dhūnuṣva pṛtanyataḥ sarvām śatrūn vi sahasva astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: śatam ca na praharantaḥ nighnantaḥ na tastire  / tasmin indraḥ pari adatta cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam a stṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: śatam ca na praharantaḥ nighnantaḥ na tastire   tasmin indraḥ pari adatta cakṣuḥ prāṇam atho balam a stṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: indrasya tvā varmaṇā pari dhāpayāmaḥ yaḥ devānām adhirājaḥ babhūva  / punar tvā devāḥ pra nayantu sarve a stṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: indrasya tvā varmaṇā pari dhāpayāmaḥ yaḥ devānām adhirājaḥ babhūva   punar tvā devāḥ pra nayantu sarve a stṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: asmin maṇau eka śatam vīryāṇi sahasram prāṇāḥ asmin astṛte  / vyāghraḥ śatrūn abhi tiṣṭha sarvān yaḥ tvā pṛtanyāt adharaḥ saḥ astu astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: asmin maṇau eka śatam vīryāṇi sahasram prāṇāḥ asmin astṛte    vyāghraḥ śatrūn abhi tiṣṭha sarvān yaḥ tvā pṛtanyāt adharaḥ saḥ astu astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: ghṛtāt ulluptaḥ madhumān payasvān sahasra prāṇaḥ śata yoniḥ vayodhāḥ  / śambhūḥ ca mayobhūḥ ca ūrjasvān ca payasvān ca āstṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: ghṛtāt ulluptaḥ madhumān payasvān sahasra prāṇaḥ śata yoniḥ vayodhāḥ    śambhūḥ ca mayobhūḥ ca ūrjasvān ca payasvān ca āstṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /

original: yathā tvam uttaraḥ asaḥ asapatnaḥ sapatna hā  / sajātānām asat vaśī tathā tvā savitā karat astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu  /
analyzed: yathā tvam uttaraḥ asaḥ asapatnaḥ sapatna hā    sajātānām asat vaśī tathā tvā savitā karat astṛtaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu

original: ā rātri pārthivam rajaḥ pituḥ aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ  / divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhase ā tveṣam vartate tamaḥ  /
analyzed: ā rātri pārthivam rajaḥ pituḥ aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ    divaḥ sadāṃsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhase ā tveṣam vartate tamaḥ  /

original: na yasyāḥ pāram dadṛśe na yoyuvat viśvam asyām ni viśate yat ejati  / ariṣṭāsaḥ te urvi tamasvati rātri pāram aśīmahi bhadre pāram aśīmahi  //
analyzed: na yasyāḥ pāram dadṛśe na yoyuvat viśvam asyām ni viśate yat ejati   ariṣṭāsaḥ te urvi tamasvati rātri pāram aśīmahi bhadre pāram aśīmahi  /

original: ye te rātri nṛ cakṣasaḥ draṣṭāraḥ navatiḥ nava  / aśītiḥ santi aṣṭa uta u te sapta saptatiḥ  /
analyzed: ye te rātri nṛ cakṣasaḥ draṣṭāraḥ navatiḥ nava     santi aṣṭa uta u te sapta saptatiḥ  /

original: ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ṣaṭ ca revati pañcāśat pañca sumnayi  / catvāraḥ catvāriṃśat ca trayaḥ triṃśat ca vājini  //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ṣaṭ ca revati pañcāśat pañca sumnayi    catvāraḥ catvāriṃśat ca trayaḥ triṃśat ca vājini  /

original: dvau ca te viṃśatiḥ ca te rātri ekādaśa avamāḥ  / tebhiḥ naḥ adya pāyubhiḥ nu pāhi duhitar divaḥ  /
analyzed: dvau ca te viṃśatiḥ ca te rātri ekādaśa avamāḥ    tebhiḥ naḥ adya pāyubhiḥ nu pāhi duhitar divaḥ  /

original: rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata  / mā naḥ adya gavām stenaḥ māvīnām vṛkaḥ īśata  /
analyzed: rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śaṃsaḥ īśata mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata   mā naḥ adya gavām stenaḥ māvīnām vṛkaḥ īśata  /

original: mā aśvānām bhadre taskaraḥ mā nṛṇām yātudhānyaḥ  / paramebhiḥ pathibhiḥ stenaḥ dhāvatu taskaraḥ  / pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu  //
analyzed: mā aśvānām bhadre taskaraḥ mā nṛṇām yātudhānyaḥ    paramebhiḥ pathibhiḥ stenaḥ dhāvatu taskaraḥ   pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu  /

original: adha rātri tṛṣṭa dhūmam a śīrṣāṇam ahim kṛṇu  / hanū vṛkasya jambhayā stenam drupade jahi  //
analyzed: adha rātri tṛṣṭa dhūmam a śīrṣāṇam ahim kṛṇu   hanū vṛkasya jambhayā stenam drupade jahi  /

original: tvayi rātri vasāmasi svapiṣyāmasi jāgṛhi  / gobhyaḥ naḥ śarma yaccha aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ  /
analyzed: tvayi rātri vasāmasi svapiṣyāmasi jāgṛhi   gobhyaḥ naḥ śarma yaccha aśvebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ

original: atha u yāni ca yasmā ha yāni ca antar parīṇahi  / tāni te pari dadmasi  //
analyzed: atha u yāni ca yasmai ha yāni ca antar parīṇahi    tāni te pari dadmasi  /

original: rātri mātar uṣase naḥ pari dehi  / uṣāḥ naḥ ahne pari dadātu ahar tubhyam vibhāvari  //
analyzed: rātri mātar uṣase naḥ pari dehi   uṣāḥ naḥ ahne pari dadātu ahar tubhyam vibhāvari  /

original: yat kim ca idam patayati yat kim ca idam sarīsṛpam  / yat kim ca parvata ayāsa tvam tasmāt tvam rātri pāhi naḥ  /
analyzed: yat kim ca idam patayati yat kim ca idam sarīsṛpam   yat kim ca parvata ayāsa tvam tasmāt tvam rātri pāhi naḥ  /

original: sā paścāt pāhi sā puras sā uttarāt adharāt uta  / gopāya naḥ vibhāvari stotāraḥ te iha smasi  //
analyzed: sā paścāt pāhi sā puras sā uttarāt adharāt uta  / gopāya naḥ vibhāvari stotāraḥ te iha smasi  /

original: ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati  / paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te naḥ ātmasu jāgrati te naḥ paśuṣu jāgrati  //
analyzed: ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati   paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te naḥ ātmasu jāgrati te naḥ paśuṣu jāgrati  /

original: veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vai asi  / tām tvām bharadvājaḥ veda sā naḥ vitte adhi jāgrati  //
analyzed: veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vai asi   tām tvām bharadvājaḥ veda sā naḥ vitte adhi jāgrati  /

original: iṣirā yoṣā yuvatiḥ damūnā rātrī devasya savituḥ bhagasya  / aśva kṣabhā su havā saṃbhṛta śrīḥ ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā  /
analyzed: iṣirā yoṣā yuvatiḥ damūnā rātrī devasya savituḥ bhagasya   aśva kṣabhā su havā saṃbhṛta śrīḥ ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā  /

original: ati viśvāni aruhat gambhiraḥ varṣiṣṭham aruhanta śraviṣṭhāḥ  / uśatī rātri anu sā bhadrā abhi tiṣṭhate mitraḥ iva svadhābhiḥ  //
analyzed: ati viśvāni aruhat gambhiraḥ varṣiṣṭham aruhanta śraviṣṭhāḥ   uśatī rātri anu sā bhadrā abhi tiṣṭhate mitraḥ iva svadhābhiḥ  /

original: varye vande subhage sujāte ājagan rātri sumanāḥ iha syām  / asmān trāyasva naryāṇi jātāḥ atho yāni gavyāni puṣṭyā  /
analyzed: varye vande subhage sujāte ājagan rātri sumanāḥ iha syām    asmān trāyasva naryāṇi jātāḥ atho yāni gavyāni puṣṭyā  /

original: siṃhasya rātri uśatī pīṃṣasya vyāghrasya dvīpinaḥ varcaḥ ā dade  / aśvasya bradhnam puruṣasya māyum puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī  /
analyzed: siṃhasya rātri uśatī pīṃṣasya vyāghrasya dvīpinaḥ varcaḥ ā dade   aśvasya bradhnam puruṣasya māyum puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī  /

original: śivām rātrim anusūryam ca himasya mātā su havā naḥ astu  / asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu  /
analyzed: śivām rātrim anusūryam ca himasya mātā su havā naḥ astu    asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu  /

original: stomasya naḥ vibhāvari rātri rājā iva joṣase  / asāma sarva vīrāḥ bhavāma sarva vedasaḥ vyuchantīḥ anūṣasaḥ  /
analyzed: stomasya naḥ vibhāvari rātri rājā iva joṣase    asāma sarva vīrāḥ bhavāma sarva vedasaḥ vyuchantīḥ anūṣasaḥ  /

original: śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā  / rātrīhi tān asutapāḥ yaḥ stenaḥ na vidyate yat punar na vidyate  /
analyzed: śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā   rātrīhi tān asutapāḥ yaḥ stenaḥ na vidyate yat punar na vidyate  /

original: bhadrā asi rātri camasaḥ na viṣṭaḥ viṣvaṅ go rūpam yuvatiḥ bibharṣi  / cakṣuṣmatī me uśatī vapūmṣi prati tvam divyā na kṣām amukthāḥ  /
analyzed: bhadrā asi rātri camasaḥ na viṣṭaḥ viṣvaṅ go rūpam yuvatiḥ bibharṣi    cakṣuṣmatī me uśatī vapūmṣi prati tvam divyā na kṣām amukthāḥ  /

original: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati aghāyuḥ martyaḥ ripuḥ  / rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvāḥ pra śiraḥ hanat  //
analyzed: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati aghāyuḥ martyaḥ ripuḥ   rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvāḥ pra śiraḥ hanat  /

original: pra pādau na yathāyati pra hastau na yathā āśiṣat  / yaḥ malimluḥ upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati  / apāyati su apāyati śuṣke sthāṇau apāyati  //
analyzed: pra pādau na yathā āyati pra hastau na yathā āśiṣat    yaḥ malimluḥ upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati   apāyati su apāyati śuṣke sthāṇau apāyati  /

original: adha rātri tṛṣṭa dhūmam a śīrṣāṇam ahim kṛṇu  / akṣau vṛkasya niḥ jahyāḥ tena tam drupade jahi  //
analyzed: adha rātri tṛṣṭa dhūmam a śīrṣāṇam ahim kṛṇu   akṣau vṛkasya niḥ jahyāḥ tena tam drupade jahi  /

original: ye te rātri anaḍvāhaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṅgāḥ su āśavaḥ  / tebhiḥ naḥ adya pārayāti durgāṇi viśvahā  /
analyzed: ye te rātri anaḍvāhaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṅgāḥ su āśavaḥ   tebhiḥ naḥ adya pārayāti durgāṇi viśvahā  /

original: rātrim rātrim ariṣyantaḥ tarema tanvā vayam  / gambhīram aplavāḥ iva na tareyuḥ arātayaḥ  /
analyzed: rātrim rātrim ariṣyantaḥ tarema tanvā vayam   gambhīram aplavāḥ iva na tareyuḥ arātayaḥ  /

original: yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatan apavān na anuvidyate  / eva rātri pra pātaya yaḥ asmām abhyaghāyati  //
analyzed: yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatan apavān na anuvidyate   / eva rātri pra pātaya yaḥ asmām abhyaghāyati  /

original: apa stenam vāsayaḥ go ajam uta taskaram  / atha u yaḥ arvataḥ śiraḥ abhidhāya ninīṣati  //
analyzed: apa stenam vāsayaḥ go ajam uta taskaram    atha u yaḥ arvataḥ śiraḥ abhidhāya ninīṣati  /

original: yat adya rātri subhage vibhajanti ayaḥ vasu  / yat etat asmān bhojaya yathā id anyān upāyasi  //
analyzed: yat adya rātri subhage vibhajanti ayaḥ vasu   yat etat asmān bhojaya yathā id anyān upāyasi  /

original: uṣase naḥ pari dehi sarvān rātri anāgasaḥ  / uṣāḥ naḥ ahne ā bhajāt ahar tubhyam vibhāvari  //
analyzed: uṣase naḥ pari dehi sarvān rātri anāgasaḥ   uṣāḥ naḥ ahne ā bhajāt ahar tubhyam vibhāvari  /

original: ayutaḥ aham ayutaḥ me ātmā ayutam me cakṣuḥ ayutam me śrotram  / ayutaḥ me prāṇaḥ ayutaḥ me apānaḥ ayutaḥ me vyānaḥ ayutaḥ aham sarvaḥ  /
analyzed: ayutaḥ aham ayutaḥ me ātmā ayutam me cakṣuḥ ayutam me śrotram   ayutaḥ me prāṇaḥ ayutaḥ me apānaḥ ayutaḥ me vyānaḥ ayutaḥ aham sarvaḥ  /

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām prasūtaḥ ā rabhe //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām prasūtaḥ ā rabhe

original: kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt  / sa kāma kāmena bṛhatā sayonī rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi  //
analyzed: kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt    sa kāma kāmena bṛhatā sayonī rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi  /

original: tvam kāma sahasā asi pratiṣṭhitaḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā sakhaḥ ā sakhīyate  / tvam ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sasahiḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ yajamānāya dhehi  //
analyzed: tvam kāma sahasā asi pratiṣṭhitaḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā sakhaḥ ā sakhīyate    tvam ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sasahiḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ yajamānāya dhehi  /

original: dūrāt cakamānāya pratipāṇāya akṣaye  / ā asmai aśṛṇvan āśāḥ kāmena ajanayan svar  /
analyzed: dūrāt cakamānāya pratipāṇāya akṣaye   ā asmai aśṛṇvan āśāḥ kāmena ajanayan svar  /

original: kāmena mā kāmaḥ āgan hṛdayāt dhṛdayam pari  / yat amīṣām adaḥ manaḥ tat aitu upa mām iha  /
analyzed: kāmena mā kāmaḥ āgan hṛdayāt dhṛdayam pari   yat amīṣām adaḥ manaḥ tat aitu upa mām iha  /

original: yat kāma kāmayamānāḥ idam kṛṇmasi te haviḥ  / tat naḥ sarvam sam ṛdhyatām atha etasya haviṣaḥ vīhi svāhā  /
analyzed: yat kāma kāmayamānāḥ idam kṛṇmasi te haviḥ   tat naḥ sarvam sam ṛdhyatām atha etasya haviṣaḥ vīhi svāhā  /

original: kālaḥ aśvaḥ vahati sapta raśmiḥ sahasra akṣaḥ ajaraḥ bhūri retāḥ  / tam ā rohanti kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā  /
analyzed: kālaḥ aśvaḥ vahati sapta raśmiḥ sahasra akṣaḥ ajaraḥ bhūri retāḥ   tam ā rohanti kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā  /

original: sapta cakrān vahati kālaḥ eṣa sapta asya nābhīḥ amṛtam nu akṣaḥ  / saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni añjat kālaḥ saḥ īyate prathamaḥ nu devaḥ  /
analyzed: sapta cakrān vahati kālaḥ eṣa sapta asya nābhīḥ amṛtam nu akṣaḥ    saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni añjat kālaḥ saḥ īyate prathamaḥ nu devaḥ  /

original: pūrṇaḥ kumbhaḥ adhi kāle āhitaḥ tam vai paśyāmaḥ bahudhā nu santam  / saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālam tam āhuḥ parame vyoman  /
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ kumbhaḥ adhi kāle āhitaḥ tam vai paśyāmaḥ bahudhā nu santam    saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālam tam āhuḥ parame vyoman  /

original: saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni ābharat saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni pari ait  / pitā san abhavat putraḥ eṣām tasmāt vai na anyat param asti tejaḥ  /
analyzed: saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni ābharat saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni pari ait   pitā san abhavat putraḥ eṣām tasmāt vai na anyat param asti tejaḥ  /

original: kālaḥ amūm divam ajanayat kālaḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta  / kāle ha bhūtam bhavyam ceṣitam ha vi tiṣṭhate  //
analyzed: kālaḥ amūm divam ajanayat kālaḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta   kāle ha bhūtam bhavyam ceṣitam ha vi tiṣṭhate  /

original: kālaḥ bhūtim asṛjata kāle tapati sūryaḥ  / kāle ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣuḥ vi paśyati  //
analyzed: kālaḥ bhūtim asṛjata kāle tapati sūryaḥ   kāle ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣuḥ vi paśyati  /

original: kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam  / kālena sarvāḥ nandanti āgatena prajāḥ imāḥ  /
analyzed: kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam   kālena sarvāḥ nandanti āgatena prajāḥ imāḥ  /

original: kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭham kāle brahma samāhitam  / kālaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yaḥ pitā āsīt prajāpateḥ  /
analyzed: kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭham kāle brahma samāhitam   kālaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yaḥ pitā āsīt prajāpateḥ  /

original: tena iṣitam tena jātam tat u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam  / kālaḥ ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam  /
analyzed: tena iṣitam tena jātam tat u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam   kālaḥ ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam  /

original: kālaḥ prajāḥ asṛjata kālaḥ agre prajāpatim  / svayaṃbhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālāt ajāyata  /
analyzed: kālaḥ prajāḥ asṛjata kālaḥ agre prajāpatim   svayaṃbhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālāt ajāyata  /

original: kālāt āpaḥ sam abhavan kālāt brahma tapaḥ diśaḥ  / kālena ud eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punar  /
analyzed: kālāt āpaḥ sam abhavan kālāt brahma tapaḥ diśaḥ   kālena ud eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punar  /

original: kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī  / dyauḥ mahī kāle āhitā  /
analyzed: kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī   dyauḥ mahī kāle āhitā  /

original: kālaḥ ha bhūtam bhavyam ca putraḥ ajanayat purā  / kālāt ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuḥ kālāt ajāyata  /
analyzed: kālaḥ ha bhūtam bhavyam ca putraḥ ajanayat purā   kālāt ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuḥ kālāt ajāyata  /

original: kālaḥ yajñam sam airayat devebhyaḥ bhāgam akṣitam  / kāle gandharva apsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ  /
analyzed: kālaḥ yajñam sam airayat devebhyaḥ bhāgam akṣitam   kāle gandharva apsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ  /

original: kāle ayam aṅgirāḥ devaḥ atharvā ca adhi tiṣṭhataḥ  / imam ca lokam paramam ca lokam puṇyān ca lokān vidhṛtīḥ ca puṇyāḥ  / sarvān lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ saḥ īyate paramaḥ nu devaḥ  /
analyzed: kāle ayam aṅgirāḥ devaḥ atharvā ca adhi tiṣṭhataḥ    imam ca lokam paramam ca lokam puṇyān ca lokān vidhṛtīḥ ca puṇyāḥ    sarvān lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ saḥ īyate paramaḥ nu devaḥ  /

original: rātrim rātrim a prayātam bharantaḥ aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai  / rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /
analyzed: rātrim rātrim a prayātam bharantaḥ aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai    rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /

original: yā te vasoḥ vātaḥ iṣuḥ sā te eṣā tayā naḥ mṛḍa  / rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /
analyzed: yā te vasoḥ vātaḥ iṣuḥ sā te eṣā tayā naḥ mṛḍa   rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma  /

original: sāyam sāyam gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ prātar prātar saumanasasya dātā  / vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema  /
analyzed: sāyam sāyam gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ prātar prātar saumanasasya dātā   vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema  /

original: prātar prātar gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ sāyaṃsāyam saumanasasya dātā  / vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi indhānāḥ tvā śataṃhimāḥ ṛdhema  /
analyzed: prātar prātar gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ sāyaṃsāyam saumanasasya dātā   vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi indhānāḥ tvā śataṃhimāḥ ṛdhema  /

original: a paścā dagdha annasya bhūyāsam  / anna ādāya annapataye rudrāya namaḥ agnaye  / sabhyaḥ sabhām me pāhi ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ  /
analyzed: a paścā dagdha annasya bhūyāsam   anna ādāya annapataye rudrāya namaḥ agnaye   sabhyaḥ sabhām me pāhi ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ  /

original: tvām indra puruhūta viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavan  / aharahar balim id te harantaḥ aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne  /
analyzed: tvām indra puruhūta viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavan   aharahar balim id te harantaḥ aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne  /

original: yamasya lokāt adhi ā babhūvitha pramadāḥ martyān pra yunakṣi dhīraḥ  / ekākinā sa ratham yāsi vidvān svapnam mimānaḥ asurasya yonau  /
analyzed: yamasya lokāt adhi ā babhūvitha pramadāḥ martyān pra yunakṣi dhīraḥ    ekākinā sa ratham yāsi vidvān svapnam mimānaḥ asurasya yonau  /

original: bandhaḥ tvā agre viśva cayāḥ apaśyat purā rātryāḥ janitoḥ eke ahni  / tatas svapna idam adhi ā babhūvitha bhiṣagbhyaḥ rūpam apagūhamānaḥ  /
analyzed: bandhaḥ tvā agre viśva cayāḥ apaśyat purā rātryāḥ janitoḥ eke ahni    tatas svapna idam adhi ā babhūvitha bhiṣagbhyaḥ rūpam apagūhamānaḥ  /

original: bṛhat gāvāsurebhyaḥ adhi devān upāvartata mahimānam ichan  / tasmai svapnāya dadhuḥ ādhipatyam trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ  /
analyzed: bṛhat gāvāsurebhyaḥ adhi devān upāvartata mahimānam ichan    tasmai svapnāya dadhuḥ ādhipatyam trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ  /

original: na etām viduḥ pitaraḥ na uta devāḥ yeṣām jalpiḥ carati antarā idam  / trite svapnam adadhuḥ āptye naraḥ ādityāsaḥ varuṇena anuśiṣṭāḥ  /
analyzed: na etām viduḥ pitaraḥ na uta devāḥ yeṣām jalpiḥ carati antarā idam   trite svapnam adadhuḥ āptye naraḥ ādityāsaḥ varuṇena anuśiṣṭāḥ  /

original: yasya krūram abhajanta duṣkṛtaḥ asvapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ  / svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manasaḥ adhi jajñiṣe  /
analyzed: yasya krūram abhajanta duṣkṛtaḥ asvapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ   svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manasaḥ adhi jajñiṣe  /

original: vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastāt vidma svapna yaḥ adhipāḥ iha te  / yaśaśvinaḥ naḥ yaśasā iha pāhi ārāt dviṣebhiḥ apa yāhi dūram  /
analyzed: vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastāt vidma svapna yaḥ adhipāḥ iha te   yaśaśvinaḥ naḥ yaśasā iha pāhi ārāt dviṣebhiḥ apa yāhi dūram  /

original: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam samnayanti  / eva duṣvapnyam sarvam apriye sam nayāmasi  //
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam samnayanti    eva duṣvapnyam sarvam apriye sam nayāmasi  /

original: sam rājānaḥ aguḥ sam ṛṇāmi aguḥ sam kuṣṭhāḥ aguḥ sam kalāḥ aguḥ  / sam asmāsu yat duṣvapnyam niḥ dviṣate duṣvapnyam suvāma  /
analyzed: sam rājānaḥ aguḥ sam ṛṇāmi aguḥ sam kuṣṭhāḥ aguḥ sam kalāḥ aguḥ    sam asmāsu yat duṣvapnyam niḥ dviṣate duṣvapnyam suvāma  /

original: devānām patnīnām garbha yamasya kara yaḥ bhadraḥ svapna  / sa mama yaḥ pāpaḥ tat dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ  / mā tṛṣṭānām asi kṛṣṇa śakuneḥ mukham  /
analyzed: devānām patnīnām garbha yamasya kara yaḥ bhadraḥ svapna   sa mama yaḥ pāpaḥ tat dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ   mā tṛṣṭānām asi kṛṣṇa śakuneḥ mukham  /

original: tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa tvam svapna aśvaḥ iva kāyam aśvaḥ iva nīnāham  / anā asmākam deva pīyum piyārum vapa yat asmāsu duṣvapnyam yat goṣu yat ca naḥ gṛhe  /
analyzed: tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa tvam svapna aśvaḥ iva kāyam aśvaḥ iva nīnāham    anā asmākam deva pīyum piyārum vapa yat asmāsu duṣvapnyam yat goṣu yat ca naḥ gṛhe  /

original: anā asmākaḥ tat deva pīyuḥ piyāruḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcatām  / nava aratnīn apamayāḥ asmākam tatas pari  / duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate niḥ dayāmasi  //
analyzed: anā asmākaḥ tat deva pīyuḥ piyāruḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcatām   nava aratnīn apamayāḥ asmākam tatas pari   duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate niḥ dayāmasi  /

original: ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā sa devā saṃvatsaram haviṣā vardhayantī  / śrotram cakṣuḥ prāṇaḥ achinnaḥ naḥ astu achinnāḥ vayam āyuṣaḥ varcasaḥ  /
analyzed: ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā sa devā saṃvatsaram haviṣā vardhayantī   śrotram cakṣuḥ prāṇaḥ achinnaḥ naḥ astu achinnāḥ vayam āyuṣaḥ varcasaḥ  /

original: upa asmān prāṇaḥ hvayatām upa prāṇam havāmahe  / varcaḥ jagrāha pṛthivī antarikṣam varcaḥ somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vidhattā  /
analyzed: upa asmān prāṇaḥ hvayatām upa prāṇam havāmahe   varcaḥ jagrāha pṛthivī antarikṣam varcaḥ somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vidhattā  /

original: varcasaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvathuḥ varcaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema  / yaśasam gāvaḥ gopatim upa tiṣṭhanti āyatīḥ yaśaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema  /
analyzed: varcasaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvathuḥ varcaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema   yaśasam gāvaḥ gopatim upa tiṣṭhanti āyatīḥ yaśaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema  /

original: vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ varma ā sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni  / puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ a dhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam  /
analyzed: vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ varma ā sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni   puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ a dhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam  /

original: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi  / imam yajñam vitatam viśvakarmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ  /
analyzed: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi    imam yajñam vitatam viśvakarmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ  /

original: ye devānām ṛtvijaḥ ye ca yajñiyāḥ yebhyaḥ havyam kriyate bhāgadheyam  / imam yajñam saha patnībhiḥ etya yāvantaḥ devāḥ taviṣā mādayantām  /
analyzed: ye devānām ṛtvijaḥ ye ca yajñiyāḥ yebhyaḥ havyam kriyate bhāgadheyam    imam yajñam saha patnībhiḥ etya yāvantaḥ devāḥ taviṣā mādayantām  /

original: tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi devaḥ ā martyeṣu ā  / tvam yajñeṣu īḍyaḥ  /
analyzed: tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi devaḥ ā martyeṣu ā   tvam yajñeṣu īḍyaḥ

original: yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣām devāḥ aviduṣṭarāsaḥ  / agniḥ tat viśvāt ā pṛṇātu vidvān somasya yaḥ brāhmaṇām āviveśa  /
analyzed: yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣām devāḥ aviduṣṭarāsaḥ   agniḥ tat viśvāt ā pṛṇātu vidvān somasya yaḥ brāhmaṇām āviveśa  /

original: ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anupravoḍhum  / agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt saḥ id hotā saḥ adhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti  //
analyzed: ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anupravoḍhum   agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt saḥ id hotā saḥ adhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti  /

original: vāc me āsan nasoḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ akṣṇoḥ śrotram karṇayoḥ  / a palitāḥ keśāḥ a śoṇāḥ dantāḥ bahu bāhvoḥ balam  /
analyzed: vāc me āsan nasoḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ akṣṇoḥ śrotram karṇayoḥ   a palitāḥ keśāḥ a śoṇāḥ dantāḥ bahu bāhvoḥ balam  /

original: ūrvoḥ ojaḥ jaṅghayoḥ javaḥ pādayoḥ  / pratiṣṭhā ariṣṭāni me sarvātmā anibhṛṣṭaḥ  /
analyzed: ūrvoḥ ojaḥ jaṅghayoḥ javaḥ pādayoḥ   pratiṣṭhā ariṣṭāni me sarvātmā anibhṛṣṭaḥ

original: tanūḥ tanvā me sahe dataḥ sarvam āyuḥ aśīya  / syonam me sīda puruḥ pṛṇasva pavamānaḥ svarge  /
analyzed: tanūḥ tanvā me sahe dataḥ sarvam āyuḥ aśīya    syonam me sīda puruḥ pṛṇasva pavamānaḥ svarge  /

original: priyam mā kṛṇu deveṣu priyam rājasu mā kṛṇu  / priyam sarvasya paśyataḥ uta śūdraḥ uta ārye  /
analyzed: priyam mā kṛṇu deveṣu priyam rājasu mā kṛṇu   priyam sarvasya paśyataḥ uta śūdraḥ uta ārye  /

original: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devān yajñena bodhaya  / āyuḥ prāṇam prajām paśūn kīrtim yajamānam ca vardhaya  //
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devān yajñena bodhaya   āyuḥ prāṇam prajām paśūn kīrtim yajamānam ca vardhaya  /

original: agne samidham āhārṣam bṛhate jātavedase  / sa me śraddhām ca medhām ca jātavedāḥ pra yacchatu  //
analyzed: agne samidham āhārṣam bṛhate jātavedase    sa me śraddhām ca medhām ca jātavedāḥ pra yacchatu  /

original: idhmena tvā jātavedaḥ samidhā vardhayāmasi  / tathā tvam asmān vardhaya prajayā ca dhanena ca  /
analyzed: idhmena tvā jātavedaḥ samidhā vardhayāmasi   tathā tvam asmān vardhaya prajayā ca dhanena ca  /

original: yat agne yāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi  / sarvam tat astu me śivam tat juṣasva yaviṣṭhya  //
analyzed: yat agne yāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi   sarvam tat astu me śivam tat juṣasva yaviṣṭhya  /

original: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ tvam iddhaḥ samidh bhava  / āyuḥ asmāsu dhehi amṛta tvam ācāryāya  //
analyzed: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ tvam iddhaḥ samidh bhava   āyuḥ asmāsu dhehi amṛta tvam ācāryāya  /

original: hariḥ suparṇaḥ divam āruhaḥ arciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam  / ava tām jahi harasā jātavedaḥ a bibhyat ugraḥ arciṣā divam ā roha sūrya  //
analyzed: hariḥ suparṇaḥ divam āruhaḥ arciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam   ava tām jahi harasā jātavedaḥ a bibhyat ugraḥ arciṣā divam ā roha sūrya  /

original: ayaḥ jālāḥ asurāḥ māyinaḥ ayasmayaiḥ pāśaiḥ aṅkinaḥ ye caranti  / tān te randhayāmi harasā jātavedaḥ sahasra ṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan pāhi vajraḥ  /
analyzed: ayaḥ jālāḥ asurāḥ māyinaḥ ayasmayaiḥ pāśaiḥ aṅkinaḥ ye caranti   tān te randhayāmi harasā jātavedaḥ sahasra ṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan pāhi vajraḥ  /

analyzed: paśyema śaradaḥ śatam

analyzed: saṃjīvāḥ stha sam jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam  /

analyzed: jīvalā stha jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

analyzed: stutā mayā vara dā veda mātā pra codayantām pāvamānī dvijānām    āyuḥ prāṇam prajām paśum kīrtim draviṇam brahmavarcasam   mahyam dattvā vrajata brahma lokam  /

analyzed: yasmāt kośāt udabharāma vedam tasmin antar ava dadhmaḥ enam   kṛtam iṣṭam brahmaṇaḥ vīryeṇa tena mā devāḥ tapasā avata iha  /

original: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe  / sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ  /
analyzed: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe    sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ  / sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ  /
analyzed: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ    sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ

original: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase  / stomaiḥ vidhema agnaye  /
analyzed: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase   / stomaiḥ vidhema agnaye

analyzed: marutaḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibantu  /

analyzed: agniḥ āgnīdhrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

analyzed: indraḥ brahmā brāhmaṇāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

analyzed: devaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

original: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam pibā imam  / ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama  /
analyzed: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam pibā imam   ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama  /

original: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā  / upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu  //
analyzed: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā    upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu  /

original: brahmāṇaḥ tvā vayam yujā soma pām indra sominaḥ  / sutāvantaḥ havāmahe  //
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ tvā vayam yujā soma pām indra sominaḥ    sutāvantaḥ havāmahe  /

analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi sutāvataḥ asmākam suṣṭutīḥ upa   pibā su śiprin andhasaḥ

original: ā te siñcāmi kukṣyoḥ anu gātrā vi dhāvatu  / gṛbhāya jihvayā madhu  //
analyzed: ā te siñcāmi kukṣyoḥ anu gātrā vi dhāvatu   gṛbhāya jihvayā madhu  /

original: svāduḥ te astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava  / somaḥ śam astu te hṛde  /
analyzed: svāduḥ te astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava    somaḥ śam astu te hṛde  /

original: ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīḥ iva abhi saṃvṛtaḥ  / pra somaḥ indra sarpatu  /
analyzed: ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīḥ iva abhi saṃvṛtaḥ   pra somaḥ indra sarpatu  /

original: tuvi grīvaḥ vapodaraḥ su bāhuḥ andhasaḥ sade  / indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate  /
analyzed: tuvi grīvaḥ vapodaraḥ su bāhuḥ andhasaḥ sade   indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate  /

original: indra prehi puras tvam viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā  / vṛtrāṇi vṛtraham jahi  //
analyzed: indra prehi puras tvam viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā   vṛtrāṇi vṛtraham jahi  /

original: dīrghaḥ te astu aṅkuśaḥ yena vasu prayacchasi  / yajamānāya sunvate  /
analyzed: dīrghaḥ te astu aṅkuśaḥ yena vasu prayacchasi   yajamānāya sunvate

original: ayam te indra somaḥ nipūtaḥ adhi barhiṣi  / ehi īm asya drava piba  /
analyzed: ayam te indra somaḥ nipūtaḥ adhi barhiṣi    ehi īm asya drava piba  /

original: śāci go śāci pūjana ayam raṇāya te sutaḥ  / ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase  /
analyzed: śāci go śāci pūjana ayam raṇāya te sutaḥ   ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase  /

original: yaḥ te śṛṅga vṛṣaḥ napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ  / ni asmin dadhre ā manaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ te śṛṅga vṛṣaḥ napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ   ni asmin dadhre ā manaḥ

original: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe  / sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ  /
analyzed: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe    sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: indra kratu vidam sutam somam harya puruṣṭuta  / pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim  /
analyzed: indra kratu vidam sutam somam harya puruṣṭuta   pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim

original: indra pra naḥ dhitāvānam yajñam viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ  / tira stavāna viśpate  /
analyzed: indra pra naḥ dhitāvānam yajñam viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ   tira stavāna viśpate  /

original: indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime tava pra yanti satpate  / kṣayam candrāsaḥ indavaḥ  /
analyzed: indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime tava pra yanti satpate    kṣayam candrāsaḥ indavaḥ  /

original: dadhiṣva jaṭhare sutam somam indra vareṇyam  / tava dyukṣāsaḥ indavaḥ  /
analyzed: dadhiṣva jaṭhare sutam somam indra vareṇyam   tava dyukṣāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ajyase  / indra tvā adātam id yaśaḥ  /
analyzed: girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ajyase   indra tvā adātam id yaśaḥ

original: abhi dyumnāni vaninaḥ indram sacante akṣitā  / pītvī somasya vāvṛdhe  /
analyzed: abhi dyumnāni vaninaḥ indram sacante akṣitā   pītvī somasya vāvṛdhe  /

original: arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi parāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan  / imā juṣasva naḥ giraḥ  /
analyzed: arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi parāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan   imā juṣasva naḥ giraḥ

original: yat antarā parāvatam arvāvatam ca hūyase  / indra iha tatas ā gahi  //
analyzed: yat antarā parāvatam arvāvatam ca hūyase   indra iha tatas ā gahi  /

original: ud gha id abhi śrutāmagham vṛṣabham narya apasam  / astāram eṣi sūrya  /
analyzed: ud gha id abhi śrutāmagham vṛṣabham narya apasam   astāram eṣi sūrya  /

original: nava yaḥ navatim puras bibheda bāhu ojasā  / ahim ca vṛtrahā avadhīt  /
analyzed: nava yaḥ navatim puras bibheda bāhu ojasā   ahim ca vṛtrahā avadhīt  /

original: sa naḥ indraḥ śivaḥ sakhā aśvāvat gomat yavamat  / uru dhārā iva dohate  /
analyzed: sa naḥ indraḥ śivaḥ sakhā aśvāvat gomat yavamat    uru dhārā iva dohate  /

original: indra kratu vidam sutam somam harya puruṣṭuta  / pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim  /
analyzed: indra kratu vidam sutam somam harya puruṣṭuta   pibā vṛṣasva tātṛpim

original: eva pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasva uta gīrbhiḥ  / āvis sūryam kṛṇuhi pīpihi iṣaḥ jahi śatrūṃr abhi gāḥ indra tṛndhi  //
analyzed: eva pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasva uta gīrbhiḥ   āvis sūryam kṛṇuhi pīpihi iṣaḥ jahi śatrūṃr abhi gāḥ indra tṛndhi  /

original: arvāṅ ehi soma kāmam tvā āhuḥ ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya  / uru vyacāḥ jaṭhare ā vṛṣasva pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ  /
analyzed: arvāṅ ehi soma kāmam tvā āhuḥ ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya   uru vyacāḥ jaṭhare ā vṛṣasva pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ  /

original: āpūrṇaḥ asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sektā iva kośam siṣice pibadhyai  / sam u priyāḥ āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇit abhi somāsaḥ indram  /
analyzed: āpūrṇaḥ asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sektā iva kośam siṣice pibadhyai   sam u priyāḥ āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇit abhi somāsaḥ indram  /

original: tam vaḥ dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasoḥ mandānam andhasaḥ  / abhi vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ indram gīrbhiḥ navāmahe  /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasoḥ mandānam andhasaḥ    abhi vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ indram gīrbhiḥ navāmahe  /

original: dyukṣam sudānum taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam girim na puru bhojasam  / kṣumantam vājam śatinam sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe  /
analyzed: dyukṣam sudānum taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam girim na puru bhojasam    kṣumantam vājam śatinam sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe  /

original: tat tvā yāmi su vīryam tat brahma pūrvacittaye  / yena yatibhyaḥ bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha  //
analyzed: tat tvā yāmi su vīryam tat brahma pūrvacittaye   yena yatibhyaḥ bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha  /

original: yena samudram asṛjaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ tat indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ  / sadyas saḥ asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yam kṣoṇīḥ anucakrade  /
analyzed: yena samudram asṛjaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ tat indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ    sadyas saḥ asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yam kṣoṇīḥ anucakrade  /

original: ud u te madhumattamāḥ giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate  / satrājitaḥ dhanasāḥ akṣita ūtayaḥ vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva  /
analyzed: ud u te madhumattamāḥ giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate    satrājitaḥ dhanasāḥ akṣita ūtayaḥ vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva  /

original: kaṇvāḥ iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryāḥ iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ  / indram stomebhiḥ mahayantaḥ āyavaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ asvaran  /
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryāḥ iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ   indram stomebhiḥ mahayantaḥ āyavaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ asvaran  /

original: indraḥ pūrbhid ātirat dāsam arkaiḥ vidat vasuḥ dayamānaḥ vi śatrūn  / brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ bhūri dātraḥ āpṛṇat rodasī ubhe  /
analyzed: indraḥ pūrbhid ātirat dāsam arkaiḥ vidat vasuḥ dayamānaḥ vi śatrūn    brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ bhūri dātraḥ āpṛṇat rodasī ubhe  /

original: makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan  / indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇām viśām daivīnām uta pūrva yāvā  /
analyzed: makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan   indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇām viśām daivīnām uta pūrva yāvā  /

original: indraḥ vṛtram avṛṇot śardhanītiḥ pra māyinām amināt varpaṇītiḥ  / ahan vyaṃsam uśadhak vaneṣu āvis dhenāḥ akṛṇot rāmyāṇām  /
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram avṛṇot śardhanītiḥ pra māyinām amināt varpaṇītiḥ   ahan vyaṃsam uśadhak vaneṣu āvis dhenāḥ akṛṇot rāmyāṇām  /

original: indraḥ svarṣā janayan ahāni jigāya uśigbhiḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ  / prārocayat manave ketum ahnām avindat jyotiḥ bṛhate raṇāya  /
analyzed: indraḥ svarṣā janayan ahāni jigāya uśigbhiḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ   prārocayat manave ketum ahnām avindat jyotiḥ bṛhate raṇāya  /

original: indraḥ tujaḥ barhaṇāḥ ā viveśa nṛvat dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi  / acetayat dhiyaḥ imā jaritre pra imam varṇam atirat śukram āsām  /
analyzed: indraḥ tujaḥ barhaṇāḥ ā viveśa nṛvat dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi    acetayat dhiyaḥ imā jaritre pra imam varṇam atirat śukram āsām  /

original: mahaḥ mahāni panayanti asya indrasya karma su kṛtā purūṇi  / vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa māyābhiḥ dasyūṃr abhibhūti ojāḥ  /
analyzed: mahaḥ mahāni panayanti asya indrasya karma su kṛtā purūṇi    vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa māyābhiḥ dasyūṃr abhibhūti ojāḥ  /

original: yudhā indraḥ mahnā varivaḥ cakāra devebhyaḥ sat patiḥ carṣaṇiprāḥ  / vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprāḥ ukthebhiḥ kavayaḥ gṛṇanti  //
analyzed: yudhā indraḥ mahnā varivaḥ cakāra devebhyaḥ sat patiḥ carṣaṇiprāḥ   vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprāḥ ukthebhiḥ kavayaḥ gṛṇanti  /

original: satrāsāham vareṇyam sahaḥ dām sasavāṃsam svar apaḥ ca devīḥ  / sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām indram madanti anu dhīraṇāsaḥ  /
analyzed: satrāsāham vareṇyam sahaḥ dām sasavāṃsam svar apaḥ ca devīḥ    sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām indram madanti anu dhīraṇāsaḥ  /

original: sasāna atyām uta sūryam sasāna indraḥ sasāna puru bhojasam gām  / hiraṇyayam uta bhogam sasāna hatvī dasyūn prāryam varṇam āvat  /
analyzed: sasāna atyām uta sūryam sasāna indraḥ sasāna puru bhojasam gām    hiraṇyayam uta bhogam sasāna hatvī dasyūn prāryam varṇam āvat  /

original: indraḥ oṣadhīḥ asanot ahāni vanaspatīn asanot antarikṣam  / bibheda balam nunude vivācaḥ atha abhavat damitā abhikratūnām  /
analyzed: indraḥ oṣadhīḥ asanot ahāni vanaspatīn asanot antarikṣam   bibheda balam nunude vivācaḥ atha abhavat damitā abhikratūnām  /

original: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau  / śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām  /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau    śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām  /

original: ud u brahmāṇi airata śravasya indram samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha  / ā yaḥ viśvāni śavasā tatāna upaśrotā me īvataḥ vacāṃsi  /
analyzed: ud u brahmāṇi airata śravasya indram samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha   ā yaḥ viśvāni śavasā tatāna upaśrotā me īvataḥ vacāṃsi  /

original: ayāmi ghoṣaḥ indra deva jāmiḥ irajyanta yat śurudhaḥ vivāci  / nahi svam āyuḥ cikite janeṣu tāni id aṃhāṃsi ati parṣi asmān  /
analyzed: ayāmi ghoṣaḥ indra deva jāmiḥ irajyanta yat śurudhaḥ vivāci   nahi svam āyuḥ cikite janeṣu tāni id aṃhāṃsi ati parṣi asmān  /

original: yuje ratham gaveṣaṇam haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ  / vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvā indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghanvān  /
analyzed: yuje ratham gaveṣaṇam haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ   vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvā indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghanvān  /

original: āpaḥ cit pipyuḥ staryaḥ na gāvaḥ nakṣan ṛtam jaritāraḥ te indra  / yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ achā tvam hi dhībhiḥ dayase vi vājān  /
analyzed: āpaḥ cit pipyuḥ staryaḥ na gāvaḥ nakṣan ṛtam jaritāraḥ te indra   yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ achā tvam hi dhībhiḥ dayase vi vājān  /

original: te tvā madāḥ indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇam tuvi rādhasam jaritre  / ekaḥ devatrā dayase hi martān asmin śūra savane mādayasva  /
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇam tuvi rādhasam jaritre    ekaḥ devatrā dayase hi martān asmin śūra savane mādayasva  /

original: eva id indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum vasiṣṭhāsaḥ abhi arcanti arkaiḥ  / sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /
analyzed: eva id indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum vasiṣṭhāsaḥ abhi arcanti arkaiḥ   sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /

original: ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ turāṣāh chuṣmī rājā vṛtra hā soma pāvā  / yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsat arvāk mādhyaṃdine savane matsat indraḥ  /
analyzed: ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ turāṣāh chuṣmī rājā vṛtra hā soma pāvā    yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsat arvāk mādhyaṃdine savane matsat indraḥ  /

original: indraḥ ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate asmin yajñe mandasānāḥ vṛṣaṇvasū  / ā vām viśantu indavaḥ svābhuvaḥ asme rayim sarva vīram ni yacchatam  /
analyzed: indraḥ ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate asmin yajñe mandasānāḥ vṛṣaṇvasū   ā vām viśantu indavaḥ svābhuvaḥ asme rayim sarva vīram ni yacchatam  /

original: ā vaḥ vahantu saptayaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ raghu patvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ  / sīdata barhiḥ uru vaḥ sadaḥ kṛtam mādayadhvam marutaḥ madhvaḥ andhasaḥ  /
analyzed: ā vaḥ vahantu saptayaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ raghu patvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ   sīdata barhiḥ uru vaḥ sadaḥ kṛtam mādayadhvam marutaḥ madhvaḥ andhasaḥ  /

original: imam stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahema manīṣayā  / bhadrā hi naḥ pramatiḥ asya saṃsadi agne sakhye mā riṣāma vayam tava  /
analyzed: imam stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahema manīṣayā    bhadrā hi naḥ pramatiḥ asya saṃsadi agne sakhye mā riṣāma vayam tava  /

original: a ebhiḥ agne sa ratham yāhi arvāk nānā ratham vā vibhavaḥ hi aśvāḥ  / patnīvataḥ triṃśatam trīn ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva  /
analyzed: a ebhiḥ agne sa ratham yāhi arvāk nānā ratham vā vibhavaḥ hi aśvāḥ    patnīvataḥ triṃśatam trīn ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva  /

original: vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūram na kad cit bharantaḥ avasyavaḥ  / vāje citram havāmahe  / vāje citram havāmahe  /
analyzed: vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūram na kad cit bharantaḥ avasyavaḥ   vāje citram havāmahe    vāje citram havāmahe

original: upa tvā karman ūtaye sa naḥ yuvā ugraḥ cakrāma yaḥ dhṛṣat  / tvām id hi avitāram vavṛmahe sakhāyaḥ indra sānasim  /
analyzed: upa tvā karman ūtaye sa naḥ yuvā ugraḥ cakrāma yaḥ dhṛṣat    tvām id hi avitāram vavṛmahe sakhāyaḥ indra sānasim  /

original: yaḥ naḥ idam idam purā pra vasyaḥ ānināya tam u vaḥ stuṣe  / sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye  /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ idam idam purā pra vasyaḥ ānināya tam u vaḥ stuṣe    sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye  /

original: haryaśvam sat patim carṣaṇīsaham sa hi sma yaḥ amandata  / ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavā śatam  /
analyzed: haryaśvam sat patim carṣaṇīsaham sa hi sma yaḥ amandata   ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavā śatam  /

original: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satya śuṣmāya tavase matim bhare  / apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharam rādhaḥ viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam  /
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satya śuṣmāya tavase matim bhare    apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharam rādhaḥ viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam  /

original: adha te viśvam anu hāsat iṣṭayaḥ āpaḥ nimnā iva savanā haviṣmataḥ  / yat parvate na samaśīta haryataḥ indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ  //
analyzed: adha te viśvam anu hāsat iṣṭayaḥ āpaḥ nimnā iva savanā haviṣmataḥ   yat parvate na samaśīta haryataḥ indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ  /

original: asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvaraḥ uṣaḥ na śubhraḥ ā bhara panīyase  / yasya dhāma śravase nāma indriyam jyotiḥ akāri haritaḥ nāyase  /
analyzed: asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvaraḥ uṣaḥ na śubhraḥ ā bhara panīyase    yasya dhāma śravase nāma indriyam jyotiḥ akāri haritaḥ nāyase  /

original: ime te indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvā ārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso  / nahi tvat anyaḥ girvaṇaḥ giraḥ sadhat kṣoṇīḥ iva prati naḥ harya tat vacaḥ  /
analyzed: ime te indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvā ārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso    nahi tvat anyaḥ girvaṇaḥ giraḥ sadhat kṣoṇīḥ iva prati naḥ harya tat vacaḥ  /

original: bhūri te indra vīryam tava smasi asya stotuḥ maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa  / anu te dyauḥ bṛhatī vīryam mama iyam ca te pṛthivī neme ojase  /
analyzed: bhūri te indra vīryam tava smasi asya stotuḥ maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa   anu te dyauḥ bṛhatī vīryam mama iyam ca te pṛthivī neme ojase  /

original: tvam tam indra parvatam mahām urum vajreṇa vajrin parvaśas cakartitha  / avāsṛjaḥ nivṛtāḥ sartavai apaḥ satrā viśvam dadhiṣe kevalam sahaḥ  //
analyzed: tvam tam indra parvatam mahām urum vajreṇa vajrin parvaśas cakartitha    avāsṛjaḥ nivṛtāḥ sartavai apaḥ satrā viśvam dadhiṣe kevalam sahaḥ  /

original: udaprutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ  / giri bhrajaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan  //
analyzed: udaprutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ   giri bhrajaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan  /

original: sam gobhiḥ aṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ bhagaḥ iva id aryamaṇam nināya  / jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr iva ājau  /
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ aṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ bhagaḥ iva id aryamaṇam nināya   jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr iva ājau  /

original: sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ  / bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyaḥ vitūryāḥ niḥ gāḥ ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ  /
analyzed: sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ   bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyaḥ vitūryāḥ niḥ gāḥ ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ  /

original: āpruṣāyat madhunā ṛtasya yonim avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva dyoḥ  / bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vi tvacam bibheda  /
analyzed: āpruṣāyat madhunā ṛtasya yonim avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva dyoḥ    bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vi tvacam bibheda  /

original: apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣat udnaḥ śīpālam iva vātaḥ ājat  / bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśyā valasyā abhram iva vātaḥ ā cakre ā gāḥ  /
analyzed: apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣat udnaḥ śīpālam iva vātaḥ ājat    bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśyā valasyā abhram iva vātaḥ ā cakre ā gāḥ  /

original: yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet bṛhaspatiḥ agni tapobhiḥ arkaiḥ  / dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādat āvis nidhīṃr akṛṇot usriyāṇām  /
analyzed: yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet bṛhaspatiḥ agni tapobhiḥ arkaiḥ   dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādat āvis nidhīṃr akṛṇot usriyāṇām  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyad āsām nāma svarīṇām sadane guhā yat  / āṇḍā iva bhitvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ajat  /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyad āsām nāma svarīṇām sadane guhā yat    āṇḍā iva bhitvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ajat  /

original: aśnā apinaddham madhu pari apaśyat matsyam na dīnaḥ udani kṣiyantam  / niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇa vikṛtya  /
analyzed: aśnā apinaddham madhu pari apaśyat matsyam na dīnaḥ udani kṣiyantam   niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇa vikṛtya  /

original: sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi  / bṛhaspatiḥ go vapuṣaḥ valasya niḥ majjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra  //
analyzed: sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi   bṛhaspatiḥ go vapuṣaḥ valasya niḥ majjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra  /

original: himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ  / anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mithas uccarātaḥ  /
analyzed: himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ   anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mithas uccarātaḥ  /

original: abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ dyām apiṃśan  / rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ  /
analyzed: abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ dyām apiṃśan   rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ  /

original: idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīḥ anu ānonavīti  / bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt  /
analyzed: idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīḥ anu ānonavīti   bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt  /

original: achā me indram matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīḥ viśvāḥ uśatīḥ anūṣata  / pari svajante janayaḥ yathā patim maryam na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye  /
analyzed: achā me indram matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīḥ viśvāḥ uśatīḥ anūṣata    pari svajante janayaḥ yathā patim maryam na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye  /

original: na ghā tvadrik apa veti me manaḥ tve id kāmam puruhūta śiśraya  / rājā iva dasma ni sadaḥ adhi barhiṣi asmin su some avapānam astu te  /
analyzed: na ghā tvadrik apa veti me manaḥ tve id kāmam puruhūta śiśraya   rājā iva dasma ni sadaḥ adhi barhiṣi asmin su some avapānam astu te  /

original: viṣūvṛt indraḥ amuteḥ uta kṣudhaḥ saḥ id rāyaḥ maghavā vasvaḥ īśate  / tasya id ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavaḥ vayaḥ vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ  /
analyzed: viṣūvṛt indraḥ amuteḥ uta kṣudhaḥ saḥ id rāyaḥ maghavā vasvaḥ īśate    tasya id ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavaḥ vayaḥ vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ  /

original: vayaḥ na vṛkṣam su palāśam āsadan somāsaḥ indram mandinaḥ camūṣadaḥ  / pra eṣām anīkam śavasā davidyutat vidat svar manave jyotiḥ āryam  //
analyzed: vayaḥ na vṛkṣam su palāśam āsadan somāsaḥ indram mandinaḥ camūṣadaḥ    pra eṣām anīkam śavasā davidyutat vidat svar manave jyotiḥ āryam  /

original: kṛtam na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargam yat maghavā sūryam jayat  / na tat te anyaḥ anu vīryam śakat na purāṇaḥ maghavan na uta nūtanaḥ  /
analyzed: kṛtam na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargam yat maghavā sūryam jayat    na tat te anyaḥ anu vīryam śakat na purāṇaḥ maghavan na uta nūtanaḥ  /

original: viśam viśam maghavā pari aśāyata janānām dhenāḥ avacākaśat vṛṣā  / yasya aha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati sa tīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ  /
analyzed: viśam viśam maghavā pari aśāyata janānām dhenāḥ avacākaśat vṛṣā    yasya aha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati sa tīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ  /

original: āpaḥ na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran somāsaḥ indram kulyāḥ iva hradam  / vardhanti viprāḥ mahaḥ asya sādane yavam na vṛṣṭiḥ divyena dānunā  /
analyzed: āpaḥ na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran somāsaḥ indram kulyāḥ iva hradam   vardhanti viprāḥ mahaḥ asya sādane yavam na vṛṣṭiḥ divyena dānunā  /

original: vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayat rajaḥsu ā yaḥ arya patnīḥ akṛṇot imāḥ apaḥ  / sa sunvate maghavā jīra dānave avindat jyotiḥ manave haviṣmate  /
analyzed: vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayat rajaḥsu ā yaḥ arya patnīḥ akṛṇot imāḥ apaḥ    sa sunvate maghavā jīra dānave avindat jyotiḥ manave haviṣmate  /

original: ud jāyatām paraśu jyotiṣā saha bhūyāḥ ṛtasya su dughā purāṇavat  / vi rocatām aruṣaḥ bhānunā śuciḥ svar na śukram śuśucīta satpatiḥ  /
analyzed: ud jāyatām paraśu jyotiṣā saha bhūyāḥ ṛtasya su dughā purāṇavat    vi rocatām aruṣaḥ bhānunā śuciḥ svar na śukram śuśucīta satpatiḥ  /

original: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām  / vayam rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāni asmākena vṛjanena jayema  /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām    vayam rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāni asmākena vṛjanena jayema  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ  / indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ   indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu  /

analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya    dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /

analyzed: vayam u tvā taditarthāḥ indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ   kaṇvāḥ ukthebhiḥ jarante  /
