analyzed: sutesute nyokase bṛhat bṛhataḥ ā id ariḥ   / indrāya śūṣam arcati  /

original: viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekam vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svar saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak  / tam tvā nāvam na parṣaṇim śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi  / indram na yajñaiḥ catayantaḥ āyavaḥ stomebhiḥ indram āyavaḥ  //
analyzed: viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekam vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svar saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak   tam tvā nāvam na parṣaṇim śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi    indram na yajñaiḥ catayantaḥ āyavaḥ stomebhiḥ indram āyavaḥ  /

original: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ  / yat gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi  / āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam  /
analyzed: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ    yat gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi    āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam  /

original: uta u naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ juṣeta hi arkasya bodhi haviṣaḥ havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ  / yat indra hantave mṛghaḥ vṛṣā vajrim ciketasi  / ā me asya vedhasaḥ navīyasaḥ manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ  /
analyzed: uta u naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ juṣeta hi arkasya bodhi haviṣaḥ havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ    yat indra hantave mṛghaḥ vṛṣā vajrim ciketasi    ā me asya vedhasaḥ navīyasaḥ manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ  /

original: tubhya id imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi  / tvam nṛbhiḥ havyaḥ viśvadhā asi  /
analyzed: tubhya id imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi   tvam nṛbhiḥ havyaḥ viśvadhā asi  /

original: nu cit nu te manyamānasya dasmaḥ ud aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra  / na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ  //
analyzed: nu cit nu te manyamānasya dasmaḥ ud aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra   na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ  /

original: pra vaḥ mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatim kṛṇudhvam  / viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra cara carṣaṇiprāḥ  /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatim kṛṇudhvam   viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra cara carṣaṇiprāḥ  /

original: yadā vajram hiraṇyam id athā ratham harī yamasya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ  / ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśrutaḥ indraḥ vājasya dīrghaśravasaḥ patiḥ  /
analyzed: yadā vajram hiraṇyam id athā ratham harī yamasya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ   ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśrutaḥ indraḥ vājasya dīrghaśravasaḥ patiḥ  /

original: so cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā sacām indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute  / ava veti su kṣayam sute madhu ud id dhūṇoti vātaḥ yathā vanam  /
analyzed: sā u cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā sacām indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute   ava veti su kṣayam sute madhu ud id dhūṇoti vātaḥ yathā vanam  /

original: yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhra vācaḥ purū sahasra aśivā jaghāna  / tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ  /
analyzed: yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhra vācaḥ purū sahasra aśivā jaghāna   tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ  /

original: yat cit hi satya soma pāḥ anāśastāḥ iva smasi  / ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: yat cit hi satya soma pāḥ anāśastāḥ iva smasi   ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā  / ā tu naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā    ā tu naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: ni svāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām a budhyamāne  / ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: ni svāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām a budhyamāne      ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: sasantu tyāḥ arātayaḥ bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ  / ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  //
analyzed: sasantu tyāḥ arātayaḥ bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ   ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam papaya amuyā  / ā tu naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam papaya amuyā    ā tu naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūram vātaḥ vanāt adhi  / ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūram vātaḥ vanāt adhi   ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: sarvam parikrośam jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam  / ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /
analyzed: sarvam parikrośam jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam    ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha  /

original: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ  / yat gavyanta dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi  / āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam  /
analyzed: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ    yat gavyanta dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi    āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam  /

original: viduḥ te asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puraḥ yat indra śāradīḥ avātiraḥ sāsahānaḥ avātiraḥ  / śāsaḥ tam indra martyam ayajum śavasaḥ pate  / mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imāḥ apaḥ mandasānaḥ imāḥ apaḥ  /
analyzed: viduḥ te asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puraḥ yat indra śāradīḥ avātiraḥ sāsahānaḥ avātiraḥ    śāsaḥ tam indra martyam ayajum śavasaḥ pate   mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imāḥ apaḥ mandasānaḥ imāḥ apaḥ  /

original: āt id te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣan uśijaḥ yat āvitha sakhīyataḥ yat āvitha  / cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave  / te anyām anyām nadyam saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata  /
analyzed: āt id te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣan uśijaḥ yat āvitha sakhīyataḥ yat āvitha     cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave   te anyām anyām nadyam saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata  /

original: vane na vā yaḥ ni adhāyi cākram chuciḥ vām stomaḥ bhuraṇau ajīgaḥ  / yasya id indraḥ puru dineṣu hotā nṛṇām narvaḥ nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān  //
analyzed: vane na vā yaḥ ni adhāyi cākram chuciḥ vām stomaḥ bhuraṇau ajīgaḥ    yasya id indraḥ puru dineṣu hotā nṛṇām narvaḥ nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān  /

original: pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ nṛtau syāma nṛtam asya nṛṇām  / anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahat nṝn kutsena rathaḥ yaḥ asat sasavān  //
analyzed: pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ nṛtau syāma nṛtam asya nṛṇām    anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahat nṝn kutsena rathaḥ yaḥ asat sasavān  /

original: kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt duraḥ giraḥ abhi ugraḥ vi dhāva  / kad vāho arvāk upa mā manīṣāḥ ā tvā śakyām upamam rādhaḥ annaiḥ  /
analyzed: kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt duraḥ giraḥ abhi ugraḥ vi dhāva   kad vāho arvāk upa mā manīṣāḥ ā tvā śakyām upamam rādhaḥ annaiḥ  /

original: kad u dyumnam indra tvāvataḥ nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kad naḥ āgan  / mitraḥ na satyaḥ urugāya bhṛtyāḥ anne samasya yat asat manīṣāḥ  /
analyzed: kad u dyumnam indra tvāvataḥ nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kad naḥ āgan   mitraḥ na satyaḥ urugāya bhṛtyāḥ anne samasya yat asat manīṣāḥ  /

original: preraya sūraḥ artham na pāram ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ iva gman  / giraḥ ca ye te tuvi jāta pūrvīḥ naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ  /
analyzed: preraya sūraḥ artham na pāram ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ iva gman    giraḥ ca ye te tuvi jāta pūrvīḥ naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ  /

original: mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena  / varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādnan bhavantu pītaye madhūni  //
analyzed: mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena   varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādnan bhavantu pītaye madhūni  /

original: ā madhvaḥ asmai asican amatram indrāya pūrṇam sa hi satya rādhāḥ  / sa vāvṛdhe variman ā pṛthivyāḥ abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ ca  /
analyzed: ā madhvaḥ asmai asican amatram indrāya pūrṇam sa hi satya rādhāḥ    sa vāvṛdhe variman ā pṛthivyāḥ abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ ca  /

original: vi ānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojāḥ ā asmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ  / ā smā ratham na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse  /
analyzed: vi ānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojāḥ ā asmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ   ā smā ratham na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse  /

original: ā satyaḥ yātu maghavā ṛjīṣī dravantu asya harayaḥ upa naḥ  / tasmai id andhaḥ suṣuma su dakṣam iha abhipitvam karate gṛṇānaḥ  /
analyzed: ā satyaḥ yātu maghavā ṛjīṣī dravantu asya harayaḥ upa naḥ    tasmai id andhaḥ suṣuma su dakṣam iha abhipitvam karate gṛṇānaḥ  /

original: ava sya śūra adhvanaḥ na ante asmin naḥ adya savane mandadhyai  / śaṃsāti uktham uśanā iva vedhāḥ cikituṣe asuryāya manma  /
analyzed: ava sya śūra adhvanaḥ na ante asmin naḥ adya savane mandadhyai    śaṃsāti uktham uśanā iva vedhāḥ cikituṣe asuryāya manma  /

original: kaviḥ na niṇyam vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekam vipipānaḥ arcāt  / divaḥ itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cit cakruḥ vayunā gṛṇantaḥ  /
analyzed: kaviḥ na niṇyam vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekam vipipānaḥ arcāt    divaḥ itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cit cakruḥ vayunā gṛṇantaḥ  /

original: svar yat vedi su dṛśīkam arkaiḥ mahi jyotīḥ rurucuḥ yat ha vastoḥ  / andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ abhiṣṭau  /
analyzed: svar yat vedi su dṛśīkam arkaiḥ mahi jyotīḥ rurucuḥ yat ha vastoḥ   andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ abhiṣṭau  /

original: vavakṣe indraḥ amitam ṛjiṣi ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā  / atas cit asya mahimā vi reci abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā babhūva  /
analyzed: vavakṣe indraḥ amitam ṛjiṣi ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā   atas cit asya mahimā vi reci abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā babhūva  /

original: viśvāni śakraḥ naryāṇi vidvān apaḥ rireca sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ  / aśmānam cit ye bibhiduḥ vacobhiḥ vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ  //
analyzed: viśvāni śakraḥ naryāṇi vidvān apaḥ rireca sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ   aśmānam cit ye bibhiduḥ vacobhiḥ vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ  /

original: apaḥ vṛtram vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ  / pra arṇāṃsi samudriyāṇi ainoḥ patiḥ bhavam śavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo  /
analyzed: apaḥ vṛtram vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ   pra arṇāṃsi samudriyāṇi ainoḥ patiḥ bhavam śavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo  /

original: apaḥ yat adrim puruhūta dardar āvis bhuvat saramā pūrvyam te  / sa naḥ netā vājam ā darṣi bhūrim gotrā rujan aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ  /
analyzed: apaḥ yat adrim puruhūta dardar āvis bhuvat saramā pūrvyam te     sa naḥ netā vājam ā darṣi bhūrim gotrā rujan aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ  /

original: tat vaḥ gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane  / śam yat gave na śākine  /
analyzed: tat vaḥ gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane    śam yat gave na śākine  /

original: na ghā vasuḥ ni yamate dānam vājasya gomataḥ  / yat sīm upa śravat giraḥ  /
analyzed: na ghā vasuḥ ni yamate dānam vājasya gomataḥ   yat sīm upa śravat giraḥ  /

original: kuvitsasya pra hi vrajam gomantam dasyu hā gamat / śacībhiḥ apa naḥ varat //
analyzed: kuvitsasya pra hi vrajam gomantam dasyu hā gamat śacībhiḥ apa naḥ varat

original: indra kratum naḥ ā bhara pitā putrebhyaḥ yathā  / śikṣa naḥ asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi  //
analyzed: indra kratum naḥ ā bhara pitā putrebhyaḥ yathā   / śikṣa naḥ asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi  /

original: mā naḥ ajñātāḥ vṛjanāḥ durādhyaḥ mā aśivāsaḥ ava kramuḥ  / tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apaḥ ati śūra tarāmasi  //
analyzed: mā naḥ ajñātāḥ vṛjanāḥ durādhyaḥ mā aśivāsaḥ ava kramuḥ   tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apaḥ ati śūra tarāmasi  /

original: indra jyeṣṭham naḥ ā bharam ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ  / yena ime citra vajrahasta rodasī ā ubhe su śipra prāḥ  /
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭham naḥ ā bharam ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ    yena ime citra vajrahasta rodasī ā ubhe su śipra prāḥ  /

original: tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsaham rājan deveṣu hūmahe  / viśvā su naḥ vithurā pibdanā vaso amitrān suṣahān kṛdhi  //
analyzed: tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsaham rājan deveṣu hūmahe    viśvā su naḥ vithurā pibdanā vaso amitrān suṣahān kṛdhi  /

original: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmiḥ uta syuḥ  / na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī  /
analyzed: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmiḥ uta syuḥ    na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī  /

original: ā paprātha mahinā kṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā  / asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ  /
analyzed: ā paprātha mahinā kṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā   asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ  /

original: yat indra yāvataḥ tvam etāvat aham īśīya  / stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpa tvāya rāsīya  /
analyzed: yat indra yāvataḥ tvam etāvat aham īśīya   stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpa tvāya rāsīya  /

original: śikṣeyam id mahayate divedive rāyaḥ ā kuhacid vide  / nahi tvat anyat maghavan naḥ āpyam vasyaḥ asti pitā cana  /
analyzed: śikṣeyam id mahayate divedive rāyaḥ ā kuhacid vide   nahi tvat anyat maghavan naḥ āpyam vasyaḥ asti pitā cana  /

original: indra tri dhātu śaraṇam tri varūtham svastimat  / chardiḥ yaccha maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca yāvaya didyum ebhyaḥ  /
analyzed: indra tri dhātu śaraṇam tri varūtham svastimat    chardiḥ yaccha maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca yāvaya didyum ebhyaḥ  /

original: ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhuḥ abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā  / agha smā naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ tanū pāḥ antamaḥ bhava  /
analyzed: ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhuḥ abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā    agha smā naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ tanū pāḥ antamaḥ bhava  /

original: indra ā yāhi citra bhāno sutāḥ ime tvāyavaḥ  / aṇvībhiḥ tanā pūtāsaḥ  /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi citra bhāno sutāḥ ime tvāyavaḥ   aṇvībhiḥ tanā pūtāsaḥ  /

original: indra ā yāhi dhiyā iṣitaḥ vipra jutaḥ sutāvataḥ  / upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ  /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi dhiyā iṣitaḥ vipra jutaḥ sutāvataḥ      / upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ  /

original: indra ā yāhi tūtujānaḥ upa brahmāṇi harivas  / sute dadhiṣva naḥ canaḥ  /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi tūtujānaḥ upa brahmāṇi harivas    sute dadhiṣva naḥ canaḥ  /

original: mā cit anyat vi śaṃsata sakhāyaḥ mā riṣaṇyata  / indram id stotā vṛṣaṇam sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata  /
analyzed: mā cit anyat vi śaṃsata sakhāyaḥ mā riṣaṇyata    indram id stotā vṛṣaṇam sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata  /

original: avakrakṣiṇam vṛṣabham yathā ajuram gām na carṣaṇīsaham  / vidveṣaṇam saṃvanana ubhayaṃkaram maṃhiṣṭham ubhayāvinam  /
analyzed: avakrakṣiṇam vṛṣabham yathā ajuram gām na carṣaṇīsaham    vidveṣaṇam saṃvanana ubhayaṃkaram maṃhiṣṭham ubhayāvinam  /

original: yat cit hi tvā janāḥ ime nānā havante ūtaye  / asmākam brahmā idam indra bhūtu te ahā viśvā ca vardhanam  /
analyzed: yat cit hi tvā janāḥ ime nānā havante ūtaye    asmākam brahmā idam indra bhūtu te ahā viśvā ca vardhanam  /

original: vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścitaḥ aryaḥ vipaḥ janānām  / upa kramasva puru rūpam ā bhara vājam nediṣṭham ūtaye  /
analyzed: vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścitaḥ aryaḥ vipaḥ janānām     upa kramasva puru rūpam ā bhara vājam nediṣṭham ūtaye  /

original: brahmaṇā te brahma yujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamādaḥ āśū  / sthiram ratham sukham indra adhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam  /
analyzed: brahmaṇā te brahma yujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamādaḥ āśū    sthiram ratham sukham indra adhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam  /

original: adhvaryavaḥ aruṇam dugdham aṃśum juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām  / gaurāt vedīyām avapānam indraḥ viśvāhā id yāti suta somam ichan  /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ aruṇam dugdham aṃśum juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām    gaurāt vedīyām avapānam indraḥ viśvāhā id yāti suta somam ichan  /

original: yat dadhiṣe pradivi cāru annam divedive pītim id asya vakṣi  / uta hṛdā uta manasā juṣāṇaḥ uśan indra prasthitān pāhi somān  /
analyzed: yat dadhiṣe pradivi cāru annam divedive pītim id asya vakṣi    uta hṛdā uta manasā juṣāṇaḥ uśan indra prasthitān pāhi somān  /

original: jajñānaḥ somam sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca  / ā indra paprātha uru antarikṣam yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha  /
analyzed: jajñānaḥ somam sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca    ā indra paprātha uru antarikṣam yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha  /

original: yat yodhaya mahataḥ manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān  / yat vā nṛbhiḥ vṛtaḥ indra abhiyudhyāḥ tam tvayā ājim sauśravasam jayema  /
analyzed: yat yodhaya mahataḥ manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān    yat vā nṛbhiḥ vṛtaḥ indra abhiyudhyāḥ tam tvayā ājim sauśravasam jayema  /

original: pra indrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra  / yadā id adevīḥ asahiṣṭa māyāḥ atha abhavat kevalaḥ somaḥ asya  /
analyzed: pra indrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra   yadā id adevīḥ asahiṣṭa māyāḥ atha abhavat kevalaḥ somaḥ asya  /

original: tava idam viśvam abhitas paśavyam yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya  / gavām asi gopatiḥ ekaḥ indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ  /
analyzed: tava idam viśvam abhitas paśavyam yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya    gavām asi gopatiḥ ekaḥ indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ  /

original: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya  / dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya    dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ  /

original: yaḥ tastambha sahasā vi jmaḥ antān bṛhaspatiḥ triṣadhasthaḥ raveṇa  / tam pratnāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dīdhyānāḥ puras viprāḥ dadhire mandra jihvam  /
analyzed: yaḥ tastambha sahasā vi jmaḥ antān bṛhaspatiḥ triṣadhasthaḥ raveṇa    tam pratnāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dīdhyānāḥ puras viprāḥ dadhire mandra jihvam  /

original: dhunetayaḥ supraketam madantaḥ bṛhaspate abhi ye naḥ tatasre  / pṛṣantam sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatāt asya yonim  /
analyzed: dhunetayaḥ supraketam madantaḥ bṛhaspate abhi ye naḥ tatasre    pṛṣantam sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatāt asya yonim  /

original: bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvat atas ā te ṛta spṛśaḥ ni seduḥ  / tubhyam khātāḥ avatāḥ adri dugdhāḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam  /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvat atas ā te ṛta spṛśaḥ ni seduḥ   tubhyam khātāḥ avatāḥ adri dugdhāḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ mahaḥ jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman  / sapta āsyaḥ tuvi jātaḥ raveṇa vi sapta raśmiḥ adhamat tamāṃsi  /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ mahaḥ jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman    sapta āsyaḥ tuvi jātaḥ raveṇa vi sapta raśmiḥ adhamat tamāṃsi  /

original: sa suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena valam ruroja phaligam ravena  / bṛhaspatiḥ usriyā havya sūdaḥ kanikradat vāvaśatīḥ ud ājat  /
analyzed: sa suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena valam ruroja phaligam ravena    bṛhaspatiḥ usriyā havya sūdaḥ kanikradat vāvaśatīḥ ud ājat  /

original: eva pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ  / bṛhaspate su prajāḥ vīravantaḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām  /
analyzed: eva pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ   bṛhaspate su prajāḥ vīravantaḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām  /

original: astā iva su prataram lāyam asyan bhūṣan iva pra bhara stomam asmai  / vācā viprāḥ tarata vācam aryaḥ ni rāmaya jaritaḥ somaḥ indram  /
analyzed: astā iva su prataram lāyam asyan bhūṣan iva pra bhara stomam asmai    vācā viprāḥ tarata vācam aryaḥ ni rāmaya jaritar somaḥ indram  /

original: dohena gām upa śikṣa sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram  / kośam na pūrṇam vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya magha deyāya śūram  /
analyzed: dohena gām upa śikṣa sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram   kośam na pūrṇam vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya magha deyāya śūram  /

original: kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayam tvā śṛṇomi  / apnasvatī mama dhīḥ astu śakra vasu vidam bhagam indra ā bhara naḥ  /
analyzed: kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayam tvā śṛṇomi    apnasvatī mama dhīḥ astu śakra vasu vidam bhagam indra ā bhara naḥ  /

original: tvām janāḥ mamasatyeṣu indra saṃtasthānāḥ vi hvayante samīke  / atrā yujam kṛṇute yaḥ haviṣmān na a sunvatā sakhyam vaṣṭi śūraḥ  /
analyzed: tvām janāḥ mamasatyeṣu indra saṃtasthānāḥ vi hvayante samīke    atrā yujam kṛṇute yaḥ haviṣmān na a sunvatā sakhyam vaṣṭi śūraḥ  /

original: dhanam naḥ spandram bahulam yaḥ asmai tīvrān somān āsunoti prayasvān  / tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahnaḥ ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram  /
analyzed: dhanam naḥ spandram bahulam yaḥ asmai tīvrān somān āsunoti prayasvān   tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahnaḥ ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram  /

original: yasmin vayam dadhima śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme  / ārāt cit san bhayatām asya śatruḥ ni asmai dyumnā janyā namantām  /
analyzed: yasmin vayam dadhima śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme    ārāt cit san bhayatām asya śatruḥ ni asmai dyumnā janyā namantām  /

original: ārāt śatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugraḥ yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena  / asme dhehi yavamat gomat indra kṛdhī dhiyam jaritre vāja ratnām  /
analyzed: ārāt śatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugraḥ yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena    asme dhehi yavamat gomat indra kṛdhī dhiyam jaritre vāja ratnām  /

original: pra yam antar vṛṣa savāsaḥ ajman tīvrāḥ somāḥ bahulāntāsaḥ indram  / na aha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam  /
analyzed: pra yam antar vṛṣa savāsaḥ ajman tīvrāḥ somāḥ bahulāntāsaḥ indram    na aha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam  /

original: uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle  / yaḥ deva kāmaḥ na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam id tam rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ  //
analyzed: uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle    yaḥ deva kāmaḥ na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam id tam rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ  /

original: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena vā kṣudham puruhūta viśve  / vayam rājasu prathamā dhanāni ariṣṭāsaḥ vṛjanībhiḥ jayema  /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena vā kṣudham puruhūta viśve    vayam rājasu prathamā dhanāni ariṣṭāsaḥ vṛjanībhiḥ jayema  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ  / indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varīyaḥ kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ   indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varīyaḥ kṛṇotu  /

original: yaḥ adribhid prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ haviṣmān  / dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā naḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti  /
analyzed: yaḥ adribhid prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ haviṣmān    dvibarhajmā prāgharmasad pitā naḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti  /

original: janāya cit yaḥ īvate u lokam bṛhaspatiḥ deva hūtau cakāra  / ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puraḥ dardarīti jayam śatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan  //
analyzed: janāya cit yaḥ īvate u lokam bṛhaspatiḥ deva hūtau cakāra   ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puraḥ dardarīti jayam śatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayat vasūni mahaḥ vrajān gomate devaḥ eṣaḥ  / apaḥ siṣāsan svar a pratītaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ hanti amitram arkaiḥ  /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayat vasūni mahaḥ vrajān gomate devaḥ eṣaḥ    apaḥ siṣāsan svar a pratītaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ hanti amitram arkaiḥ  /

original: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat  / turīyam svid janayat viśvajanyaḥ ayāsyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsan  /
analyzed: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat    turīyam svid janayat viśvajanyaḥ ayāsyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsan  /

original: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ  / vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta  /
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ   vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta  /

original: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśman mayāni nahanā vyasyan  / bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ud ca vidvām agāyat  //
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśman mayāni nahanā vyasyan    bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ud ca vidvām agāyat  /

original: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau  / bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ ichan ud usrāḥ ākaḥ vi hi tisraḥ āvaḥ  //
analyzed: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau    bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ ichan ud usrāḥ ākaḥ vi hi tisraḥ āvaḥ  /

original: vibhidya īm apācīm niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat  / bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ  //
analyzed: vibhidya īm apācīm niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat    bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ  /

original: indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām kareṇa iva vi cakarta raveṇa  / sveda añjibhiḥ āśiram ichamānaḥ arodayat paṇim ā gāḥ amuṣṇāt  /
analyzed: indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām kareṇa iva vi cakarta raveṇa    sveda añjibhiḥ āśiram ichamānaḥ arodayat paṇim ā gāḥ amuṣṇāt  /

original: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardaḥ  / brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ gharma svedebhiḥ draviṇam vi ānaṭ  //
analyzed: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardaḥ    brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ gharma svedebhiḥ draviṇam vi ānaṭ  /

original: te satyena manasā go patim gāḥ iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ  / bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ ud usriyāḥ asṛjata sva yugbhiḥ  /
analyzed: te satyena manasā go patim gāḥ iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ   bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ ud usriyāḥ asṛjata sva yugbhiḥ  /

original: tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadatam sadhasthe  / bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum  //
analyzed: tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadatam sadhasthe    bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum  /

original: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma  / bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā  /
analyzed: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma    bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā  /

original: satyam āśiṣam kṛṇuta vayodhai kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ  / paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve  /
analyzed: satyam āśiṣam kṛṇuta vayodhai kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ   paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve  /

original: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya  / ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ  /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya   ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ  /

original: abhi pra gopatim girā indram arca yathā vide  / sūtum satyasya satpatim  /
analyzed: abhi pra gopatim girā indram arca yathā vide    sūtum satyasya satpatim  /

original: ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire aruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi  / yatra abhi saṃnavāmahe  //
analyzed: ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire aruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi   yatra abhi saṃnavāmahe  /

original: indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram duduhre vajriṇe madhu  / yat sīm upahvare vidat  /
analyzed: indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram duduhre vajriṇe madhu   yat sīm upahvare vidat  /

original: ud yat bradhnasya viṣṭapam gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi  / madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi tris sapta sakhyuḥ pade  /
analyzed: ud yat bradhnasya viṣṭapam gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi    madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi tris sapta sakhyuḥ pade  /

original: arcata prārcata priyamedhāsaḥ arcata  / arcantu putrakāḥ uta puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata  /
analyzed: arcata prārcata priyamedhāsaḥ arcata    arcantu putrakāḥ uta puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata  /

original: ava svarāti gargaraḥ godhā pari saniṣvaṇat  / piṅgā pari caniṣkadat indrāya brahma udyatam  /
analyzed: ava svarāti gargaraḥ godhā pari saniṣvaṇat    piṅgā pari caniṣkadat indrāya brahma udyatam  /

original: ā yat patanti enyaḥ su dughāḥ an apasphuraḥ  / apasphuram gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave  /
analyzed: ā yat patanti enyaḥ su dughāḥ an apasphuraḥ   apasphuram gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave  /

original: apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ viśve devāḥ amatsata  / varuṇaḥ id iha kṣayat tam āpaḥ abhī anūṣata vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva  /
analyzed: apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ viśve devāḥ amatsata    varuṇaḥ id iha kṣayat tam āpaḥ abhī anūṣata vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva  /

original: sudevaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ  / anukṣaranti kākudam sūryam suṣirām iva  /
analyzed: sudevaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ   anukṣaranti kākudam sūryam suṣirām iva  /

original: yaḥ vyatīn aphāṇayat su yuktām upa dāśuṣe  / takvaḥ netā tat id vapuḥ upamā yaḥ amucyata  /
analyzed: yaḥ vyatīn aphāṇayat su yuktām upa dāśuṣe   / takvaḥ netā tat id vapuḥ upamā yaḥ amucyata  /

original: ati id u śakraḥ ohate indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ  / bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam pacyamānam paras girā  /
analyzed: ati id u śakraḥ ohate indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ   bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam pacyamānam paras girā  /

original: arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ adhi tiṣṭhan avam ratham  / sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum  /
analyzed: arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ adhi tiṣṭhan avam ratham   sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum  /

original: ā tū su śipra daṃpate ratham tiṣṭha hiraṇyayam  / adha dyukṣam sacevahi sahasra pādam aruṣam svasti gām anehasam  //
analyzed: ā tū su śipra daṃpate ratham tiṣṭha hiraṇyayam   adha dyukṣam sacevahi sahasra pādam aruṣam svasti gām anehasam  /

original: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate  / artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave āvartayanti dāvane  /
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate    artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave āvartayanti dāvane  /

original: anu pratnasya okasaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ eṣām  / pūrvām anu prayatim vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ āśata  /
analyzed: anu pratnasya okasaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ eṣām   pūrvām anu prayatim vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ āśata  /

original: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ  / viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe  /
analyzed: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ    viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe  /

original: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari  / hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ  /
analyzed: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari    hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ  /

original: nakir tam karmaṇā naśat yaḥ cakāra sadāvṛdham  / indram na yajñaiḥ viśva gūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭam dhṛṣṇu ojasam  /
analyzed: nakir tam karmaṇā naśat yaḥ cakāra sadāvṛdham    indram na yajñaiḥ viśva gūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭam dhṛṣṇu ojasam  /

original: aṣālham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahim yasmin mahīḥ uru jrayaḥ  / sam dhenavaḥ jāyamāne anonavuḥ dyāvaḥ kṣāmaḥ anonavuḥ  //
analyzed: aṣālham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahim yasmin mahīḥ uru jrayaḥ   sam dhenavaḥ jāyamāne anonavuḥ dyāvaḥ kṣāmaḥ anonavuḥ  /

original: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmīḥ uta syuḥ  / na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī  /
analyzed: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmīḥ uta syuḥ    na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī  /

original: ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā  / asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ  /
analyzed: ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā   asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ  /

original: ud tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivas  / ava brahma dviṣaḥ jahi  //
analyzed: ud tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivas    ava brahma dviṣaḥ jahi  /

original: padā paṇīn arādhasaḥ ni bādhasva mahān asi  / nahi tvā kaḥ cana prati  /
analyzed: padā paṇīn arādhasaḥ ni bādhasva mahān asi    nahi tvā kaḥ cana prati  /

original: tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām  / tvam rājā janānām  /
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām   tvam rājā janānām

original: īṅkhayantīḥ apasyuvaḥ indram jātam upāsate  / bhejānāsaḥ su vīryam  /
analyzed: īṅkhayantīḥ apasyuvaḥ indram jātam upāsate    bhejānāsaḥ su vīryam  /

original: tvam indra balāt adhi sahasaḥ jātaḥ ojasaḥ  / tvam vṛṣan vṛṣā id asi  /
analyzed: tvam indra balāt adhi sahasaḥ jātaḥ ojasaḥ   tvam vṛṣan vṛṣā id asi  /

original: tvam indra asi vṛtrahā vi antarikṣam atiraḥ  / ud dyām astabhnāḥ ojasā  /
analyzed: tvam indra asi vṛtrahā vi antarikṣam atiraḥ   ud dyām astabhnāḥ ojasā

original: tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ  / vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā  /
analyzed: tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ   vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā  /

original: tvam indra abhibhuḥ asi viśvā jātāni ojasā  / sa viśvā bhuvaḥ ābhavaḥ  /
analyzed: tvam indra abhibhuḥ asi viśvā jātāni ojasā   sa viśvā bhuvaḥ ābhavaḥ

original: ā yātu indraḥ sva patiḥ madāya yaḥ dharmaṇā tūtujānaḥ tuviṣmān  / pratvakṣāṇaḥ ati viśvā sahāṃsi apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena  /
analyzed: ā yātu indraḥ sva patiḥ madāya yaḥ dharmaṇā tūtujānaḥ tuviṣmān   pratvakṣāṇaḥ ati viśvā sahāṃsi apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena  /

original: suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajraḥ nṛpate gabhastau  / śībham rājan su pathā yāhi arvāṅ vardhāma te papusaḥ vṛṣṇyāni  //
analyzed: suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajraḥ nṛpate gabhastau    śībham rājan su pathā yāhi arvāṅ vardhāma te papusaḥ vṛṣṇyāni  /

original: indra vāhaḥ nṛpatim vajra bāhum ugram ugrāsaḥ taviṣāsaḥ enam  / pratvakṣasam vṛṣabham satya śuṣmam ā īm asmatrā sadhamādaḥ vahantu  //
analyzed: indra vāhaḥ nṛpatim vajra bāhum ugram ugrāsaḥ taviṣāsaḥ enam    pratvakṣasam vṛṣabham satya śuṣmam ā īm asmatrā sadhamādaḥ vahantu  /

original: eva patim droṇasācam sacetasam ūrjaḥ skambham dharuṇaḥ ā vṛṣāyase  / ojaḥ kṛṣva sam gṛbhāya tve api asaḥ yathā kenipānām inaḥ vṛdhe  /
analyzed: eva patim droṇasācam sacetasam ūrjaḥ skambham dharuṇaḥ ā vṛṣāyase   ojaḥ kṛṣva sam gṛbhāya tve api asaḥ yathā kenipānām inaḥ vṛdhe  /

original: gaman asme vasūni ā hi śaṃsiṣam su āśiṣam bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ  / tvam īśiṣe sā asmin ā satsi barhiṣi anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā  /
analyzed: gaman asme vasūni ā hi śaṃsiṣam su āśiṣam bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ    tvam īśiṣe sā asmin ā satsi barhiṣi anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā  /

original: pṛthak prāyan prathamāḥ deva hūtayaḥ akṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣṭarā  / na ye śekuḥ yajñiyām nāvam āruham irmā eva te ni aviśanta kepayaḥ  /
analyzed: pṛthak prāyan prathamāḥ deva hūtayaḥ akṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣṭarā   na ye śekuḥ yajñiyām nāvam āruham irmā eva te ni aviśanta kepayaḥ  /

original: eva eva apāk apare santu dūdhyaḥ aśvāḥ yeṣām duryuge āyuyujre  / itthā ye prāk upare santi dāvane purūṇi yatra vayunāni bhojanā  /
analyzed: eva eva apāk apare santu dūdhyaḥ aśvāḥ yeṣām duryuge āyuyujre    itthā ye prāk upare santi dāvane purūṇi yatra vayunāni bhojanā  /

original: girīn ajrān rejamānām adhārayat dyauḥ krandat antarikṣāṇi kopayat  / samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi skabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā made ukthāni śaṃsati  //
analyzed: girīn ajrān rejamānām adhārayat dyauḥ krandat antarikṣāṇi kopayat    samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi skabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā made ukthāni śaṃsati  /

original: imam bibharmi su kṛtam te aṅkuśam yena ārujāsi maghavam chaphārujaḥ  / asmin su te savane astu oktyam sutaḥ iṣṭau maghavan bodhi ābhagaḥ  //
analyzed: imam bibharmi su kṛtam te aṅkuśam yena ārujāsi maghavam chaphārujaḥ    asmin su te savane astu oktyam sutaḥ iṣṭau maghavan bodhi ābhagaḥ  /

original: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām  / vayam rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāni asmākena vṛjanena jayema  /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām    vayam rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāni asmākena vṛjanena jayema  /

original: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ  / indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu  //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ   indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu  /

original: trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yava āśiram tuvi śuṣmaḥ tṛpat somam apibat viṣṇunā sutam yathā avaśat  / saḥ īm mamāda mahi karma kartave mahām urum sā enam saścat devaḥ devam satyam indram satyaḥ induḥ  /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yava āśiram tuvi śuṣmaḥ tṛpat somam apibat viṣṇunā sutam yathā avaśat    saḥ īm mamāda mahi karma kartave mahām urum sā enam saścat devaḥ devam satyam indram satyaḥ induḥ  /

original: pra u su asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata  / abhīke cit u loka kṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahā asmākam bodhi coditāḥ nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu  //
analyzed: pra u su asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata    abhīke cit u loka kṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahā asmākam bodhi coditāḥ nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu  /

original: tvam sindhūṃr avāsṛjaḥ adharācaḥ ahan ahim  / a śatruḥ indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryam tam tvā pari svajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu  //
analyzed: tvam sindhūṃr avāsṛjaḥ adharācaḥ ahan ahim   a śatruḥ indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryam tam tvā pari svajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu  /

original: vi su viśvāḥ arātayaḥ aryaḥ naśanta naḥ dhiyaḥ  / astāsi śatrave vadham yaḥ naḥ indra jighāṃsati yā te rātiḥ dadiḥ vasu  / nabhantām anyakeṣām jyakāḥ adhi dhanvasu  //
analyzed: vi su viśvāḥ arātayaḥ aryaḥ naśanta naḥ dhiyaḥ   astāsi śatrave vadham yaḥ naḥ indra jighāṃsati yā te rātiḥ dadiḥ vasu   nabhantām anyakeṣām jyakāḥ adhi dhanvasu  /

original: tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya pāhi sarva rathā vi harī iha muñca  / indra mā tvā yajamānāsaḥ anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ  /
analyzed: tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya pāhi sarva rathā vi harī iha muñca    indra mā tvā yajamānāsaḥ anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ  /

original: tubhyam sutāḥ tubhyam u sotvāsaḥ tvām giraḥ śvātryāḥ ā hvayanti  / indra idam adya savanam juṣāṇaḥ viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam  /
analyzed: tubhyam sutāḥ tubhyam u sotvāsaḥ tvām giraḥ śvātryāḥ ā hvayanti   indra idam adya savanam juṣāṇaḥ viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam  /

original: yaḥ uśatā manasā somam asmai sarva hṛdā deva kāmaḥ sunoti  / na gāḥ indraḥ tasya parā dadāti praśastam id cārum asmai kṛṇoti  //
analyzed: yaḥ uśatā manasā somam asmai sarva hṛdā deva kāmaḥ sunoti   na gāḥ indraḥ tasya parā dadāti praśastam id cārum asmai kṛṇoti  /

original: anuspaṣṭaḥ bhavati eṣaḥ asya yaḥ asmai revān na sunoti somam  / niḥ aratnau maghavā tam dadhāti brahma dviṣaḥ hanti anānudiṣṭaḥ  /
analyzed: anuspaṣṭaḥ bhavati eṣaḥ asya yaḥ asmai revān na sunoti somam   niḥ aratnau maghavā tam dadhāti brahma dviṣaḥ hanti anānudiṣṭaḥ  /

original: aśvāyantaḥ gavyantaḥ vājayantaḥ havāmahe tvā upagantavai u / ābhūṣantaḥ te sumatau navāyām vayam indra tvā śunam huvema  /
analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ gavyantaḥ vājayantaḥ havāmahe tvā upagantavai u ābhūṣantaḥ te sumatau navāyām vayam indra tvā śunam huvema  /

original: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rāja yakṣmāt  / grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi etat tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam  /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rāja yakṣmāt    grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi etat tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam  /

original: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva  / tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt a spārśam enam śata śāradāya  /
analyzed: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva   tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt a spārśam enam śata śāradāya  /

original: sahasra akṣeṇa śata vīryeṇa śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  / indraḥ yathā enam śaradaḥ nayāti ati viśvasya duritasya pāram  /
analyzed: sahasra akṣeṇa śata vīryeṇa śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam    indraḥ yathā enam śaradaḥ nayāti ati viśvasya duritasya pāram  /

original: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān  / śatam te indraḥ agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  /
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān    śatam te indraḥ agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam  /

original: āhārṣam avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ  / sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam  /
analyzed: āhārṣam avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ    sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam  /

original: brahmaṇā agniḥ samvidānaḥ rakṣaḥ hā bādhatām itas  / amīvā yaḥ te garbham durṇāmāḥ yonim āśaye  /
analyzed: brahmaṇā agniḥ samvidānaḥ rakṣaḥ hā bādhatām itas    amīvā yaḥ te garbham durṇāmāḥ yonim āśaye  /

original: yaḥ te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye  / agniḥ tam brahmaṇā saha niḥ kravya adam anīnaśat  /
analyzed: yaḥ te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye   agniḥ tam brahmaṇā saha niḥ kravya adam anīnaśat  /

original: yaḥ te hanti patayantam niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam  / jātam yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ te hanti patayantam niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam   jātam yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: yaḥ te ūrū viharati antarā dampatī śaye  / yonim yaḥ antar ārelhi tam itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ te ūrū viharati antarā dampatī śaye    yonim yaḥ antar ārelhi tam itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: yaḥ tvā bhrātā patiḥ bhūtvā jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate  / prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ tvā bhrātā patiḥ bhūtvā jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate   prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: yaḥ tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate  / prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  //
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate   prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi  /

original: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi  / yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi  / yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt  / yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt    yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: hṛdayāt te pari klomnaḥ halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām  / yakṣmam matasnābhyām plīhnaḥ yaknaḥ te vi vṛhāmasi  //
analyzed: hṛdayāt te pari klomnaḥ halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām    yakṣmam matasnābhyām plīhnaḥ yaknaḥ te vi vṛhāmasi  /

original: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ udarāt adhi  / yakṣmam kukṣibhyām plāśeḥ nābhyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ udarāt adhi   yakṣmam kukṣibhyām plāśeḥ nābhyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām  / yakṣmam bhasadyam śroṇibhyām bhāsadam bhāṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām   yakṣmam bhasadyam śroṇibhyām bhāsadam bhāṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: mehanāt vanaṃkaraṇāt lomabhyaḥ te nakhebhyaḥ  / yakṣmam sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: mehanāt vanaṃkaraṇāt lomabhyaḥ te nakhebhyaḥ   yakṣmam sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: asthibhyaḥ te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyaḥ dhamanibhyaḥ  / yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyaḥ nakhebhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /
analyzed: asthibhyaḥ te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyaḥ dhamanibhyaḥ   yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyaḥ nakhebhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te  /

original: aṅge aṅge lomni lomni yaḥ te parvaṇi parvaṇi  / yakṣam tvacasyam te vayam kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi  //
analyzed: aṅge aṅge lomni lomni yaḥ te parvaṇi parvaṇi    yakṣam tvacasyam te vayam kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi  /

original: apehi manasas pate apa kāma paras cara  / paras nirṛtyāḥ ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvataḥ manaḥ  /
analyzed: apehi manasas pate apa kāma paras cara   paras nirṛtyāḥ ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvataḥ manaḥ  /

original: vayam enam idā hyopīpema iha vajriṇam  / tasmai u adya samanā sutam bhara nūnam bhūṣata śrute  /
analyzed: vayam enam idā hya upīpema iha vajriṇam    tasmai u adya samanā sutam bhara nūnam bhūṣata śrute  /

original: vṛkaḥ cit asya vāraṇaḥ urāmathiḥ ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati  / sa imam naḥ stomam jujuṣāṇaḥ ā gahi indra pra citrayā dhiyā  /
analyzed: vṛkaḥ cit asya vāraṇaḥ urāmathiḥ ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati    sa imam naḥ stomam jujuṣāṇaḥ ā gahi indra pra citrayā dhiyā  /

original: kad u nu asya akṛtam indrasya asti pauṃsyam  / kena u nu kam śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā  /
analyzed: kad u nu asya akṛtam indrasya asti pauṃsyam   kena u nu kam śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā  /

original: tvām id hi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ  / tvām vṛtreṣu indra satpatim naraḥ tvām kāṣṭhāsu arvataḥ  /
analyzed: tvām id hi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ   tvām vṛtreṣu indra satpatim naraḥ tvām kāṣṭhāsu arvataḥ  /

original: sa tvam naḥ citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyāḥ mahaḥ stavānaḥ adrivas  / gām aśvam rathyam indra sam kira satrā vājam na jigyuṣe  /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyāḥ mahaḥ stavānaḥ adrivas    gām aśvam rathyam indra sam kira satrā vājam na jigyuṣe  /

original: abhi tvā pūrva pītaye indra stomebhiḥ āyavaḥ  / samīcīnāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrāḥ gṛṇanta pūrvyam  /
analyzed: abhi tvā pūrva pītaye indra stomebhiḥ āyavaḥ   samīcīnāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrāḥ gṛṇanta pūrvyam  /

original: asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi  / adya tam asya mahimānam āyavaḥ anu stuvanti pūrvathā  /
analyzed: asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi    adya tam asya mahimānam āyavaḥ anu stuvanti pūrvathā  /

original: adhā hi indra girvaṇaḥ upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe  / udeva yantaḥ udabhiḥ  /
analyzed: adhā hi indra girvaṇaḥ upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe   udeva yantaḥ udabhiḥ

original: vār na tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi  / vār na tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi  / vāvṛdhvāṃsam cit adrivas divedive  /
analyzed: vār na tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi   vār na tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi   vāvṛdhvāṃsam cit adrivas divedive  /

original: yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayā urau rathe uru yuge  / indra vāhā vacaḥ yujā  /
analyzed: yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayā urau rathe uru yuge    indra vāhā vacaḥ yujā  /

original: agnim dūtam vṛṇīmahe hotāram viśva vedasam  / asya yajñasya sukratum  / asya yajñasya sukratum  /
analyzed: agnim dūtam vṛṇīmahe hotāram viśva vedasam    asya yajñasya sukratum    asya yajñasya sukratum

original: agnim agnim havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim  / havyavāham puru priyam  /
analyzed: agnim agnim havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim     havyavāham puru priyam  /

original: agne devān iha ā vaha jajñānaḥ vṛkta barhiṣe  / asi hotā naḥ īḍyaḥ  /
analyzed: agne devān iha ā vaha jajñānaḥ vṛkta barhiṣe   asi hotā naḥ īḍyaḥ  /

original: īlenyaḥ namasyaḥ tiras tamāṃsi darśataḥ  / sam agniḥ idhyate vṛṣā  /
analyzed: īlenyaḥ namasyaḥ tiras tamāṃsi darśataḥ   sam agniḥ idhyate vṛṣā  /

original: vṛṣaḥ agniḥ sam idhyate aśvaḥ na deva vāhanaḥ  / tam haviṣmantaḥ īlate  /
analyzed: vṛṣaḥ agniḥ sam idhyate aśvaḥ na deva vāhanaḥ   tam haviṣmantaḥ īlate  /

original: vṛṣaṇam tvā vayam vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi  / agne dīdyatam bṛhat  /
analyzed: vṛṣaṇam tvā vayam vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi   agne dīdyatam bṛhat

original: agnim īliṣva avase gāthābhiḥ śīra śociṣam  / agnim rāye purumīlha śrutam naraḥ agnim su dītaye chardiḥ  /
analyzed: agnim īliṣva avase gāthābhiḥ śīra śociṣam   agnim rāye purumīlha śrutam naraḥ agnim su dītaye chardiḥ  /

original: agne ā yāhi agnibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe  / ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhiḥ āsade  /
analyzed: agne ā yāhi agnibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe   ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhiḥ āsade  /

original: acha hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaḥ caranti adhvare  / ūrjaḥ napātam ghṛta keśam īmahe agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam  //
analyzed: acha hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaḥ caranti adhvare    ūrjaḥ napātam ghṛta keśam īmahe agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam  /

original: imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama  / pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ abhi stomaiḥ anūṣata  /
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama   pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ abhi stomaiḥ anūṣata  /

original: ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe  / satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛne śavaḥ yajñeṣu vipra rājye  /
analyzed: ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe    satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛne śavaḥ yajñeṣu vipra rājye  /

original: ā naḥ viśvāsu havyaḥ indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu  / upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtra hā parama jyāḥ ṛcīṣamaḥ  /
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvāsu havyaḥ indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu   / upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtra hā parama jyāḥ ṛcīṣamaḥ  /

original: tvam dātā prathamaḥ rāghasām asi asi satyaḥ īśāna kṛt  / tuvi dyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavasaḥ mahaḥ  /
analyzed: tvam dātā prathamaḥ rāghasām asi asi satyaḥ īśāna kṛt   tuvi dyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavasaḥ mahaḥ  /

original: tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ  / aśasti hā janitā viśvatūr asi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ  /
analyzed: tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ   aśasti hā janitā viśvatūr asi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ  /

original: anu te śuṣmam turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśum na mātarā  / viśvāḥ te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtram yat indra tūrvasi  //
analyzed: anu te śuṣmam turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśum na mātarā   viśvāḥ te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtram yat indra tūrvasi  /

original: itas ūtī vaḥ ajaram prahetāram aprahitam  / āśum jetāram hetāram rathītamam atūrtam tugryāvṛdham  /
analyzed: itas ūtī vaḥ ajaram prahetāram aprahitam    āśum jetāram hetāram rathītamam atūrtam tugryāvṛdham  /

original: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ  / viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe  /
analyzed: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ    viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe  /

original: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari  / hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ  /
analyzed: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari    hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ  /

original: tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum  / vajram śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam  /
analyzed: tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum   vajram śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam

original: tava dyauḥ indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ  / tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire  /
analyzed: tava dyauḥ indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ   tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire  /

original: tvām viṣṇuḥ bṛhan kṣayaḥ mitraḥ gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ  / tvām śardhaḥ madati anu mārutam  /
analyzed: tvām viṣṇuḥ bṛhan kṣayaḥ mitraḥ gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ   tvām śardhaḥ madati anu mārutam  /

original: sam asya manyave viśaḥ viśvā namanta kuṣṭayaḥ  / samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ  /
analyzed: sam asya manyave viśaḥ viśvā namanta kuṣṭayaḥ    samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ

original: ojaḥ tat asya titviṣaḥ ubhe yat samavartayat  / indraḥ carmā iva rodasī  /
analyzed: ojaḥ tat asya titviṣaḥ ubhe yat samavartayat   indraḥ carmā iva rodasī  /

original: vi cit vṛtrasya dodhataḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā  / śiraḥ bibhet vṛṣṇinā  /
analyzed: vi cit vṛtrasya dodhataḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā   śiraḥ bibhet vṛṣṇinā

original: tat id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yatas jajñe ugraḥ tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ  / sadyas jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yat enam madanti viśve ūmāḥ  /
analyzed: tat id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yatas jajñe ugraḥ tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ   sadyas jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yat enam madanti viśve ūmāḥ  /

original: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūri ojāḥ śatruḥ dāsāya bhiyasam dadhāti  / avyanat ca vyanat ca sasni sam te navanta prabhṛtāḥ madeṣu  /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūri ojāḥ śatruḥ dāsāya bhiyasam dadhāti   avyanat ca vyanat ca sasni sam te navanta prabhṛtāḥ madeṣu  /

original: tve kratum api pṛñcanti bhūri dvis yat ete tris bhavanti ūmāḥ  / svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛja sam adaḥ su madhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ  /
analyzed: tve kratum api pṛñcanti bhūri dvis yat ete tris bhavanti ūmāḥ   svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛja sam adaḥ su madhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ  /

original: yadi cit nu tvā dhanā jayantam raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ  / ojīyaḥ śuṣmin sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ kaśokāḥ  /
analyzed: yadi cit nu tvā dhanā jayantam raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ    ojīyaḥ śuṣmin sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ kaśokāḥ  /

original: tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyantaḥ yudhenyāni bhūri  / codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi  /
analyzed: tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyantaḥ yudhenyāni bhūri   codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi  /

original: ni tat dadhiṣe avare pare ca yasmin āvitha avasā duroṇe  / ā sthāpayata mātaram jigatnum atas invata karvarāṇi bhūri  //
analyzed: ni tat dadhiṣe avare pare ca yasmin āvitha avasā duroṇe   ā sthāpayata mātaram jigatnum atas invata karvarāṇi bhūri  /

original: stuṣva varṣman puru vartmānam sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām  / ā darśati śavasā bhūri ojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ  /
analyzed: stuṣva varṣman puru vartmānam sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām   ā darśati śavasā bhūri ojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ  /

original: imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavat indrāya śūṣam agniyaḥ svarṣāḥ  / mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati svarājā turaḥ cit viśvam arṇavat tapasvān  /
analyzed: imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavat indrāya śūṣam agniyaḥ svarṣāḥ   mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati svarājā turaḥ cit viśvam arṇavat tapasvān  /

original: eva mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā avocat svām tanvam indram eva  / svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti ca ene śavasā vardhayanti ca  /
analyzed: eva mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā avocat svām tanvam indram eva   svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti ca ene śavasā vardhayanti ca  /

original: citram devānām ketuḥ anīkam jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūryaḥ udyan  / divākaraḥ ati dyumnaiḥ tamāṃsi viśvātārīt duritāni śukraḥ  /
analyzed: citram devānām ketuḥ anīkam jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūryaḥ udyan    divākaraḥ ati dyumnaiḥ tamāṃsi viśvātārīt duritāni śukraḥ  /

original: citram devānām ud agāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ  / āprāt dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca  /
analyzed: citram devānām ud agāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ    āprāt dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca  /

original: sūryaḥ devīm uṣasam rocamānām maryaḥ na yoṣām abhī eti paścāt  / yatra naraḥ devayantaḥ yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram  /
analyzed: sūryaḥ devīm uṣasam rocamānām maryaḥ na yoṣām abhī eti paścāt    yatra naraḥ devayantaḥ yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram  /

original: tvam naḥ indra ā bharam ojaḥ nṛmṇam śatakrato vicarṣaṇe  / ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham  /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra ā bharam ojaḥ nṛmṇam śatakrato vicarṣaṇe    ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham  /

original: tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha  / adhā te sumnam īmahe  /
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha    adhā te sumnam īmahe  /

original: tvām śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato  / sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam  /
analyzed: tvām śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato    sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam  /

original: svādoḥ itthā viṣuvataḥ madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ  / yāḥ indreṇa sa yāvarīḥ vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  /
analyzed: svādoḥ itthā viṣuvataḥ madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ   yāḥ indreṇa sa yāvarīḥ vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  /

original: tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ  / priyāḥ indrasya dhenavaḥ vajram hinvanti sāyakam vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  //
analyzed: tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ   priyāḥ indrasya dhenavaḥ vajram hinvanti sāyakam vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  /

original: tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ  / vratāni asya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  //
analyzed: tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ   vratāni asya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam  /

original: indrāya madūne sutam pari stobhantu naḥ giraḥ  / arkam arcantu kāravaḥ  /
analyzed: indrāya madūne sutam pari stobhantu naḥ giraḥ   arkam arcantu kāravaḥ

original: yasmin viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ  / indram sute havāmahe  //
analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ   indram sute havāmahe  /

original: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata  / tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ  /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata   tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ  /

original: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yat vā gha trita āptye  / yat vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ  /
analyzed: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yat vā gha trita āptye   yat vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ

original: yat vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase  / asmākam id sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ  /
analyzed: yat vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase    asmākam id sute raṇa sam indubhiḥ

original: yat vā asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ yajamānasya satpate  / ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ  /
analyzed: yat vā asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ yajamānasya satpate    ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ  /

original: yat adya kac ca vṛtrahan udagāḥ abhi sūrya  / sarvam tat indra te vaśe //
analyzed: yat adya kad ca vṛtrahan udagāḥ abhi sūrya      sarvam tat indra te vaśe

original: yat vā pravṛddha satpate na marāḥ iti manyase  / uta u tat satyam id tava  /
analyzed: yat vā pravṛddha satpate na marāḥ iti manyase   uta u tat satyam id tava  /

original: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire  / sarvān tām indra gacchasi  //
analyzed: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire    sarvān tām indra gacchasi  /

original: ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ  / satrācyā maghavā soma pītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭhaḥ ā gamat  /
analyzed: ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ   satrācyā maghavā soma pītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭhaḥ ā gamat  /

original: tam hi sva rājam vṛṣabham tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ  / uta upamānām prathamaḥ ni sīdasi soma kāmam hi te manaḥ  /
analyzed: tam hi sva rājam vṛṣabham tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ    uta upamānām prathamaḥ ni sīdasi soma kāmam hi te manaḥ  /

original: abhrātṛvyaḥ aanā tvam anāpiḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi  / yudhā id āpi tvam ichase  /
analyzed: abhrātṛvyaḥ aanā tvam anāpiḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi    yudhā id āpi tvam ichase  /

original: nakī revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ  / yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanum sam ūhasi āt id pitā iva hūyase  /
analyzed: nakir revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ   yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanum sam ūhasi āt id pitā iva hūyase  /

original: aham id hi pituḥ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha  / aham sūryaḥ iva ajani  //
analyzed: aham id hi pituḥ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha   aham sūryaḥ iva ajani  /

original: aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇva vat / yena indraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe //
analyzed: aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇva vat  yena indraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe

original: ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvuḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ  / mama id vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ  /
analyzed: ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvuḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ   mama id vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ  /

original: mā bhūma niṣṭyāḥ iva indra tvat araṇāḥ iva  / vanāni ni prajahitāni adrivas duroṣāsaḥ amanmahi  //
analyzed: mā bhūma niṣṭyāḥ iva indra tvat araṇāḥ iva   vanāni ni prajahitāni adrivas duroṣāsaḥ amanmahi  /

original: amanmahi id anāśavaḥ anugrāsaḥ ca vṛtrahan  / su kṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mudīmahi  //
analyzed: amanmahi id anāśavaḥ anugrāsaḥ ca vṛtrahan    su kṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mudīmahi  /

original: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yam te suṣāva haryaśva adriḥ  / sotuḥ bāhubhyām su yataḥ na arvā  /
analyzed: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yam te suṣāva haryaśva adriḥ    sotuḥ bāhubhyām su yataḥ na arvā  /

original: yaḥ te madaḥ yujaḥ cāruḥ asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi  / sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu  //
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ yujaḥ cāruḥ asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi    sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu  /

original: bodha su me maghavan vācam ā imām yām te vasiṣṭhaḥ arcati praśastim  / imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva  /
analyzed: bodha su me maghavan vācam ā imām yām te vasiṣṭhaḥ arcati praśastim   imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva  /

original: śagdhi u su śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ  / bhagam na hi tvā yaśasam vasu vidam anu śūra carāmasi  //
analyzed: śagdhi u su śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ   bhagam na hi tvā yaśasam vasu vidam anu śūra carāmasi  /

original: pauraḥ aśvasya puru kṛt gavām asi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ  / nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yat yat yāmi tat ā bhara  //
analyzed: pauraḥ aśvasya puru kṛt gavām asi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ   nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yat yat yāmi tat ā bhara  /

original: indram id devatātaye indram prayati adhvare  / indram samīke vaninaḥ havāmahe indram dhanasya sātaye  /
analyzed: indram id devatātaye indram prayati adhvare    indram samīke vaninaḥ havāmahe indram dhanasya sātaye  /

original: indraḥ mahnā rodasī paprathat śavaḥ indraḥ sūryam arocayat  / indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemire indre suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ  /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā rodasī paprathat śavaḥ indraḥ sūryam arocayat   indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemire indre suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ  /

original: astāvi manma pūrvyam brahma indrāya vocata  / pūrvīḥ ṛtasya bṛhatīḥ anūṣata stotuḥ meghāḥ asṛkṣata  /
analyzed: astāvi manma pūrvyam brahma indrāya vocata   pūrvīḥ ṛtasya bṛhatīḥ anūṣata stotuḥ meghāḥ asṛkṣata  /

original: turaṇyavaḥ madhumantam ghṛtaścutam viprāsaḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ  / asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ asme suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ  /
analyzed: turaṇyavaḥ madhumantam ghṛtaścutam viprāsaḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ   asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ asme suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ  /

original: yat indra prāk apāk udak nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ  / simā purū nṛṣūtaḥ asi ānave asi praśardha turvaśe  /
analyzed: yat indra prāk apāk udak nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ   simā purū nṛṣūtaḥ asi ānave asi praśardha turvaśe  /

original: yat vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpe indra mādayase sacā  / kaṇvāsaḥ tvā brahmabhiḥ stoma vāhasaḥ indra ā yacchanti ā gahi  //
analyzed: yat vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpe indra mādayase sacā   kaṇvāsaḥ tvā brahmabhiḥ stoma vāhasaḥ indra ā yacchanti ā gahi  /

original: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ a dugdhāḥ iva dhenavaḥ  / īśānam asya jagataḥ svar dṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ  /
analyzed: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ a dugdhāḥ iva dhenavaḥ   īśānam asya jagataḥ svar dṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ  /

original: na tvāvām anyaḥ divyaḥ na pārthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate  / aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe  /
analyzed: na tvāvām anyaḥ divyaḥ na pārthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate    aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe  /

original: revatīḥ naḥ sadhamāde indre santu tuvi vājāḥ  / kṣumantaḥ yābhiḥ madema  /
analyzed: revatīḥ naḥ sadhamāde indre santu tuvi vājāḥ   kṣumantaḥ yābhiḥ madema  /

original: ā gha tvāvān tmanā āpta stotṛbhyaḥ dhṛṣṇo iyānaḥ  / ṛṇoḥ akṣam na cakrayoḥ  /
analyzed: ā gha tvāvān tmanā āpta stotṛbhyaḥ dhṛṣṇo iyānaḥ    ṛṇoḥ akṣam na cakrayoḥ  /

original: ā yat duvaḥ śatakrato ā kāmam jaritṝṇām  / ṛṇoḥ akṣam na śacībhiḥ  /
analyzed: ā yat duvaḥ śatakrato ā kāmam jaritṝṇām   ṛṇoḥ akṣam na śacībhiḥ

original: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahitvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra  / yadā id ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthāt āt rātrī vāsaḥ tanute simasmai  /
analyzed: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahitvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra   yadā id ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthāt āt rātrī vāsaḥ tanute simasmai  /

original: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe  / anantam anyat ruśat asya prājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyat haritaḥ sam bharanti  //
analyzed: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe    anantam anyat ruśat asya prājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyat haritaḥ sam bharanti  /

original: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā  / kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā  /
analyzed: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā   kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā  /

original: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ  / dṛlhā cit āruje vasu  //
analyzed: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ   dṛlhā cit āruje vasu  /

original: abhi su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām  / śatam bhavāsi ūtibhiḥ  /
analyzed: abhi su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām   śatam bhavāsi ūtibhiḥ

original: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ  / yajñam ca naḥ tanvam ca prajām ca ādityaiḥ indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti  //
analyzed: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ   yajñam ca naḥ tanvam ca prajām ca ādityaiḥ indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti  /

original: ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmākam bhūtu avitā tanūnām  / hatvāya devāḥ asurān yat āyan devāḥ deva tvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ  /
analyzed: ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmākam bhūtu avitā tanūnām   hatvāya devāḥ asurān yat āyan devāḥ deva tvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ  /

original: pratyañcam arkam anayam śacībhiḥ āt id svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan  / ayā vājam deva hitam sanema madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ  /
analyzed: pratyañcam arkam anayam śacībhiḥ āt id svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan    ayā vājam deva hitam sanema madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ  /

original: apa indra prācaḥ maghavan amitrān apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva  / apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ urau yathā tava śarman madema  /
analyzed: apa indra prācaḥ maghavan amitrān apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva    apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ urau yathā tava śarman madema  /

original: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya  / iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namaḥ vṛktim na jagmuḥ  /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya   iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namaḥ vṛktim na jagmuḥ  /

original: nahi sthūrī ṛtuthā yātam asti na uta śravaḥ vivide saṃgameṣu  / gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ  /
analyzed: nahi sthūrī ṛtuthā yātam asti na uta śravaḥ vivide saṃgameṣu    gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ  /

original: yuvam surāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā  / vipipānā śubhaḥ patī indram karmasu āvatam  /
analyzed: yuvam surāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā    vipipānā śubhaḥ patī indram karmasu āvatam  /

original: putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ  / yat surāmam vi apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavan abhiṣṇak  /
analyzed: putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ   yat surāmam vi apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavan abhiṣṇak  /

original: indraḥ sutrāmā svavām avobhiḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ  / bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma  /
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā svavām avobhiḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ   bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma  /

original: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asmat ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu  / tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma  /
analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asmat ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu    tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma  /

original: vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata na indram devam amaṃsata  / yatra amadat vṛṣākapiḥ aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu mad sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata na indram devam amaṃsata    yatra amadat vṛṣākapiḥ aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu mad sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: parā hi indra dhāvasi vṛṣākapeḥ ati vyathiḥ  / naḥ aha pra vindasi anyatra soma pītaye viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: parā hi indra dhāvasi vṛṣākapeḥ ati vyathiḥ   naḥ aha pra vindasi anyatra soma pītaye viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: kim ayam tvām vṛṣākapiḥ cakāra haritaḥ mṛgaḥ  / yasmai irasyasi id u nu aryaḥ vā puṣṭimat vasu viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: kim ayam tvām vṛṣākapiḥ cakāra haritaḥ mṛgaḥ   yasmai irasyasi id u nu aryaḥ vā puṣṭimat vasu viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: yam imam tvam vṛṣākapim priyam indra abhirakṣasi  / śvā nu asya jambhiṣat api karṇe varāhayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: yam imam tvam vṛṣākapim priyam indra abhirakṣasi   śvā nu asya jambhiṣat api karṇe varāhayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: priyā taṣṭāni me kapiḥ vyaktā vi adūduṣat  / śiraḥ nu asya rāviṣam na sugam duṣkṛte bhuvam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: priyā taṣṭāni me kapiḥ vyaktā vi adūduṣat    śiraḥ nu asya rāviṣam na sugam duṣkṛte bhuvam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat  / na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthi udyamīyasī viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat   na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthi udyamīyasī viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: uve amba sulābhike yathā iva aṅgam bhaviṣyati  / bhasat me amba sakthi me śiraḥ me vi iva hṛṣyati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: uve amba sulābhike yathā iva aṅgam bhaviṣyati   bhasad me amba sakthi me śiraḥ me vi iva hṛṣyati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: kim su bāho su aṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthu jāghane  / kim śūra patni naḥ tvam abhi amīṣi vṛṣākapim viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: kim su bāho su aṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthu jāghane   kim śūra patni naḥ tvam abhi amīṣi vṛṣākapim viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: a vīrām iva mām ayam śarāruḥ abhi manyate  / uta aham asmi vīriṇī indra patnī marut sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: a vīrām iva mām ayam śarāruḥ abhi manyate    uta aham asmi vīriṇī indra patnī marut sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: saṃhotram sma purā nārī samanam vāva gacchati  / vedhāḥ ṛtasya vīriṇī indra patnī mahīyate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: saṃhotram sma purā nārī samanam vāva gacchati   vedhāḥ ṛtasya vīriṇī indra patnī mahīyate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam  / nahi asyāḥ aparam cana jarasā marate patiḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam    nahi asyāḥ aparam cana jarasā marate patiḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: na aham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyuḥ vṛṣākapeḥ ṛte  / yasya idam apyam haviḥ priyam deveṣu gacchati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: na aham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyuḥ vṛṣākapeḥ ṛte   yasya idam apyam haviḥ priyam deveṣu gacchati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: vṛsākapāyi revati su putraḥ āt u su snuṣe  / ghasat te indraḥ ukṣaṇaḥ priyam kācid karam haviḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: vṛsākapāyi revati su putraḥ āt u su snuṣe   ghasat te indraḥ ukṣaṇaḥ priyam kācid karam haviḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: ukṣṇaḥ hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃsatim  / uta aham admi pīvaḥ id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: ukṣṇaḥ hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃsatim     uta aham admi pīvaḥ id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: vṛṣabhaḥ na tigma śṛṅgaḥ antar yūtheṣu roruvat  / manthaḥ te indra śam hṛde yam te sunoti bhāvayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ na tigma śṛṅgaḥ antar yūtheṣu roruvat  / manthaḥ te indra śam hṛde yam te sunoti bhāvayuḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: na sa īśe yasya rambate antarā sakthyā kapṛt  / sedi īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya rambate antarā sakthyā kapṛt   sedi īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: na sa īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate  / sedi īśe yasya rambate antarā sakthyā kapṛth viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate   sedi īśe yasya rambate antarā sakthyā kapṛth viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantam hatam vidat  / asim sūnām navam carum āt edhasyānaḥ ācitam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantam hatam vidat    asim sūnām navam carum āt edhasyānaḥ ācitam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: ayam emi vicākaśat vicinvan dāsam āryam  / pibāmi pāka sutvanaḥ abhi dhīram acākaśam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: ayam emi vicākaśat vicinvan dāsam āryam   pibāmi pāka sutvanaḥ abhi dhīram acākaśam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: dhanva ca yat kṛntatram ca kati svid tā vi yojanā  / nedīyasaḥ vṛṣākape astam ehi gṛhān upa viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: dhanva ca yat kṛntatram ca kati svid tā vi yojanā    nedīyasaḥ vṛṣākape astam ehi gṛhān upa viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: punar ehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai  / yaḥ eṣa svapna naṃśanaḥ astam eṣi pathā punar viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: punar ehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai    yaḥ eṣa svapna naṃśanaḥ astam eṣi pathā punar viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: yat udañcaḥ vṛṣākape gṛham indra ajagantana  / kva sya pulvaghaḥ mṛgaḥ kam agam jana yopanaḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: yat udañcaḥ vṛṣākape gṛham indra ajagantana    kva sya pulvaghaḥ mṛgaḥ kam agam jana yopanaḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: parśuḥ ha nāma mānavī sākam sasūva viṃśatim  / bhadram bhala tyasyāḥ abhūt yasyāḥ udaram āmayat viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /
analyzed: parśuḥ ha nāma mānavī sākam sasūva viṃśatim   bhadram bhala tyasyāḥ abhūt yasyāḥ udaram āmayat viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ  /

original: idam janāḥ upa śruta narāśaṃsaḥ staviṣyate  / ṣaṣṭim sahasrā navatim ca kauramaḥ ā ruśameṣu dadmahe  /
analyzed: idam janāḥ upa śruta narāśaṃsaḥ staviṣyate   ṣaṣṭim sahasrā navatim ca kauramaḥ ā ruśameṣu dadmahe  /

original: uṣṭrāḥ yasya pravāhaṇaḥ vadhūmantaḥ dvis daśa  / varṣmā rathasya ni jihīḍate divaḥ īṣamāṇāḥ upaspṛśaḥ  /
analyzed: uṣṭrāḥ yasya pravāhaṇaḥ vadhūmantaḥ dvis daśa    varṣmā rathasya ni jihīḍate divaḥ īṣamāṇāḥ upaspṛśaḥ  /

original: eṣaḥ iṣāya māmahe śatam niṣkān daśa srajaḥ  / trīṇi śatāni arvatām sahasrā daśa gonām  /
analyzed: eṣaḥ iṣāya māmahe śatam niṣkān daśa srajaḥ   trīṇi śatāni arvatām sahasrā daśa gonām  /

original: vacyasva rebha vacyasva vṛkṣe na pakve śakunaḥ  / naṣṭe jihvā carcarī iti kṣuraḥ na bhurijoḥ iva  /
analyzed: vacyasva rebha vacyasva vṛkṣe na pakve śakunaḥ   naṣṭe jihvā carcarī iti kṣuraḥ na bhurijoḥ iva  /

original: pra rebhāsaḥ manīṣāḥ vṛṣā gāvaḥ iva īrate  / amota putrakāḥ eṣām amota gāḥ iva āsate  /
analyzed: pra rebhāsaḥ manīṣāḥ vṛṣā gāvaḥ iva īrate   amota putrakāḥ eṣām amota gāḥ iva āsate  /

original: pra rebha dhīm bharasva go vidam vasu vidam  / devatrā imām vācam srīṇīhi iṣuḥ na avīra stāram  //
analyzed: pra rebha dhīm bharasva go vidam vasu vidam

original: rājñaḥ viśvajanīnasya yaḥ devaḥ martyām ati  / vaiśvānarasya suṣṭutim ā sunota parikṣitaḥ  /
analyzed: rājñaḥ viśvajanīnasya yaḥ devaḥ martyām ati    vaiśvānarasya suṣṭutim ā sunota parikṣitaḥ  /

original: parichinnaḥ kṣemam akarot tamaḥ āsanam ācaran  / kulāyan kṛṇvan kauravyaḥ patiḥ vadati jāyayā  /
analyzed: parichinnaḥ kṣemam akarot tamaḥ āsanam ācaran   kulāyan kṛṇvan kauravyaḥ patiḥ vadati jāyayā  /

original: katarat te ā harāṇi dadhi manthām pari śrutam  / jāyāḥ patim vi pṛchati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ  /
analyzed: katarat te ā harāṇi dadhi manthām pari śrutam    jāyāḥ patim vi pṛcchati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ  /

original: abhīvasvaḥ pra jihīte yavaḥ pakvaḥ pathaḥ bilam  / janaḥ sa bhadram edhati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ  /
analyzed: abhīvasvaḥ pra jihīte yavaḥ pakvaḥ pathaḥ bilam   janaḥ sa bhadram edhati rāṣṭre rājñaḥ parikṣitaḥ  /

original: indraḥ kārum abūbudhat uttiṣṭha vi cara janam  / mama id ugrasya carkṛdhi sarvaḥ id te pṛṇāt ariḥ  /
analyzed: indraḥ kārum abūbudhat uttiṣṭha vi cara janam    mama id ugrasya carkṛdhi sarvaḥ id te pṛṇāt ariḥ  /

original: iha gāvaḥ pra jāyadhvam iha aśvāḥ iha pūruṣāḥ  / iha u sahasra dakṣiṇaḥ pi pūṣā ni sīdati  //
analyzed: iha gāvaḥ pra jāyadhvam iha aśvāḥ iha pūruṣāḥ   iha u sahasra dakṣiṇaḥ pi pūṣā ni sīdati  /

original: na imāḥ indra gāvaḥ riṣan mā u āsām gopa rīriṣat  / mā āsām amitra yuḥ janaḥ indra mā stenaḥ īśata  /
analyzed: na imāḥ indra gāvaḥ riṣan mā u āsām gopa rīriṣat    mā āsām amitra yuḥ janaḥ indra mā stenaḥ īśata  /

original: upa naḥ na ramasi sūktena vacasā vayam bhadreṇa vacasā vayam  / vanāt adhidhvanaḥ giraḥ na riṣyema kadā cana  /
analyzed: upa naḥ na ramasi sūktena vacasā vayam bhadreṇa vacasā vayam    vanāt adhidhvanaḥ giraḥ na riṣyema kadā cana  /

original: yaḥ sabheyaḥ vidathyaḥ sutvā yajvā atha pūruṣaḥ  / sūryam ca amuḥ riśādasaḥ tat devāḥ prāk akalpayan  //
analyzed: yaḥ sabheyaḥ vidathyaḥ sutvā yajvā atha pūruṣaḥ    sūryam ca amuḥ riśādasaḥ tat devāḥ prāk akalpayan  /

original: yaḥ jāmyāḥ aprathayaḥ tat yat sakhāyam dudhūrṣati  / jyeṣṭhaḥ yat apracetāḥ tat āhuḥ adharāk iti  /
analyzed: yaḥ jāmyāḥ aprathayaḥ tat yat sakhāyam dudhūrṣati   jyeṣṭhaḥ yat apracetāḥ tat āhuḥ adharāk iti  /

original: yat bhadrasya puruṣasya putraḥ bhavati dādhṛṣiḥ  / tat vipraḥ abravīt u tat gandharvaḥ kāmyam vacaḥ  /
analyzed: yat bhadrasya puruṣasya putraḥ bhavati dādhṛṣiḥ   tat vipraḥ abravīt u tat gandharvaḥ kāmyam vacaḥ  /

original: yaḥ ca paṇi raghujiṣṭhyaḥ yaḥ ca devām adāśuriḥ  / dhīrāṇām śaśvatām aham tat apāk iti śuśruma  /
analyzed: yaḥ ca paṇi raghujiṣṭhyaḥ yaḥ ca devām adāśuriḥ   / dhīrāṇām śaśvatām aham tat apāk iti śuśruma  /

original: ye ca devāḥ ayajanta atho ye ca parādadiḥ  / sūryaḥ divam iva gatvāya maghavā naḥ vi rapśate  /
analyzed: ye ca devāḥ ayajanta atho ye ca parādadiḥ    sūryaḥ divam iva gatvāya maghavā naḥ vi rapśate  /

original: yaḥ an ākta akṣaḥ an abhyaktaḥ a maṇivaḥ a hiraṇyavaḥ  / a brahmā brahmaṇaḥ putra stotā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: yaḥ an ākta akṣaḥ an abhyaktaḥ a maṇivaḥ a hiraṇyavaḥ   a brahmā brahmaṇaḥ putra stotā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: yaḥ ākta akṣaḥ subhyaktaḥ su maṇiḥ su hiraṇyavaḥ  / subrahmā brahmaṇaḥ putra stotā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: yaḥ ākta akṣaḥ subhyaktaḥ su maṇiḥ su hiraṇyavaḥ    subrahmā brahmaṇaḥ putra stotā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: aprapāṇā ca veśantā revām apratidiśyayaḥ  / ayabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: aprapāṇā ca veśantā revām apratidiśyayaḥ    ayabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: suprapāṇā ca veśantā revān supratidiśyayaḥ  / suyabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: suprapāṇā ca veśantā revān supratidiśyayaḥ     suyabhyā kanyā kalyāṇī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: parivṛktā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhim gamaḥ  / anāśuraḥ ca āyāmī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: parivṛktā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhim gamaḥ    anāśuraḥ ca āyāmī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: vāvātā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhim gamaḥ  / śvāśuraḥ ca āyāmī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /
analyzed: vāvātā ca mahiṣī svastyā ca yudhim gamaḥ    śvāśuraḥ ca āyāmī totā kalpeṣu saṃmitā  /

original: yat indra ādaḥ dāśa rājñe mānuṣam vi gāhathāḥ  / virūpaḥ sarvasmai āsīt saha yakṣāya kalpate  /
analyzed: yat indra ādaḥ dāśa rājñe mānuṣam vi gāhathāḥ   virūpaḥ sarvasmai āsīt saha yakṣāya kalpate  /

original: tvam vṛṣā akṣum maghavan amram maryākaraḥ raviḥ  / tvam rauhiṇam vyāsyaḥ vi vṛtrasya abhinat śiraḥ  /
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā akṣum maghavan amram maryākaraḥ raviḥ   tvam rauhiṇam vyāsyaḥ vi vṛtrasya abhinat śiraḥ  /

original: yaḥ parvatān vyadadhāt yaḥ apaḥ vyagāhathāḥ  / indraḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā anmaham tasmāt indra namaḥ astu te  /
analyzed: yaḥ parvatān vyadadhāt yaḥ apaḥ vyagāhathāḥ   indraḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā anmaham tasmāt indra namaḥ astu te  /

original: pṛṣṭham dhāvantam haryoḥ auccais śravasam abruvan  / svastyaśva jaitrāya indram ā vaha susrajam  /
analyzed: pṛṣṭham dhāvantam haryoḥ auccais śravasam abruvan   svastyaśva jaitrāya indram ā vaha susrajam  /

analyzed: ye tvā śvetāḥ ajaiśravasaḥ hāryaḥ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam   pūrvā namasya devānām bibhrat indra mahīyate  /
